Ninga awemilisi wakamone ayuya imwana hawalonga, awecho kwa wecho, ‘Ayuno no muhasi; handikoni chimukome! Kamei chilonde uhasi wakwe.’
Hawamukola, hawamulafa kunje yo mugunda we misabibu, howomukoma.
Nghona yakwija ayuya imwenyemugunda we misabibu kowatenda nhani awemilisi?”
Howomugamba, “Yakwenda yawakome fibi awaya awemilisi wehile No umugunda we misabibu yakwenda yawenghe wemilisi wengi, awakwenda wamwinghe si sabibu ku ugele wakwe.”
Yesu hakawagamba, “Musinati musome mu matulumo?
‘Diwe dyowalemile awajengaji,
Adyo digaluka diwe dikulu dye inghindiso!’
Kosoko iyo nikumutamilani, Undewa wa Mulungu, ukuleusigwa ukwenu, wakwenda wenghigwe ditaifa dingi idikweleka mamudyo gakwe.
Naye yakwenda yogwe mudiwe didyo, yakudumuka fiponge ponge; na yuya imwene dikwende dimugwile dikumutiginha tiki tiki.”
Awakulu wa Makuhani na Mafalisayo, wakahulike si mbasi sakwe, hawatanga fina yakuwalonga awene.
Ninga fowahanangage kumukola, howokogoha amatewa, kosoko awene hawamona fina mugonesi.
iYesu hakabidula, hakawatamila kahi kwa mbasi, yakugamba,
“Undewa wa kulanga ukifana Mundewa yumonga, yamugolosela imwanagwe halusi.
Hoyowatuma awatumwa wakwe wawenange awaya awagonekigwe kwija kuhalusi; nawo howolema kwija,

Hoyotuma kahi watumwa wengi, yakugamba, ‘Watamileni awaya awagonekigwe, Langeni, nifulusa kugolosa ifyakudiya fyangu; sing'ombe sangu na finonile fifulusa kuchinjigwa, na fyose fifuluka, mwije kuhalusi.’
Ninga hawona si chinhu, howoleuka, yumonga kaluta kumugunda wakwe: Yumonga kubiyashala yakwe,
awasigale howowakola awatumwa wakwe, howowatenda fibi na kuwakoma.
Kamei iMundewa yuya hoyosuha; hoyokwigala wasilikali wakwe we inghondo, howowakoma awakomaji waya na kuisoma ikaya yawo.
Kamei, hoyowagamba awatumwa wakwe, ‘Ugele we halusi ufika, ninga awaya awagonekigwe wasagiligwe.
Handikoni luteni kusinjila mhanda sa mabalabala, na wose womukona wenangeni weje kudikumbo.’
Awatumwa waya hawalawa na kulata kusinjila singhulu, howowalonda wose wowawonile, awehile na waswanu; dikumbo dye halusi hadimema wageni.
“Ninga foyengile iMundewa yuya kuwalanga awageni wakwe, hoyokona umuya munhu yumwedu yechaka suke ye halusi.
Hakamugamba, ‘Mbwiyangu, kwingila nhani muno nagwe kwechaka suke ya halusi?’ Hoyonyamala twi.
iMundewa hoyowagamba awatumwa wakwe, ‘Moheni, imikono ne migulu, mulondeni mukamutage kuchisa cha kunje, no kukwenda kuwe chililo na kugwegwejula meno.’
Kosoko wengi awakwinangigwa, amba wakusaguligwa wakefu.”
Noho Mafalisayo howoluta, howogolosa mulundo, uleke wamutege kwa simbuli sakwe.

Howotuma ukwakwe awefusa wawo hamwedu na Mahelodi, hawagamba, “Mwalimu, chimanya agweye kwa munhu wa chawelu ne injila ya Mulungu ukuifusa mu chawelu kahi nghukogoha ukulu we munhu wowose, kosoko nghukulanga sifuta sa wanhu.
Haya chitamile, Ukona nhani. Ni fiswanu kumwingha Kaisali kodi, ama si fiswanu?”
Ninga iYesu hakamanya uwihi wawo, hakagamba, “Nhani mukunigesa anyeye mwine ichimwefe?
Nyoneseni ifesa ye kodi!” Howomwigalila dinali.
Hakawagamba, “Isanamu ino yani, ne anuwani ino?”
Howomugamba, “Ni ya Kaisali.” Hakawagamba, “Basi muliheni Kaisali age Kaisali, ne Mulungu age Mulungu.”
Wakahulike, hawajuma; hawamuleka, na kuleuka.
Dijuwa didyo, Masadukayo, wanhu wakugamba kwichaka kwinuka awanhu wafile, howomulutila, howomusa,
wakugamba, “Mwalimu, Musa yagamba fina, imunhu yanghafa, nghona nghalekile mwana, imunduguse yamutole imwigane yuya yowe muke, kosoko yamwelekele imunduguse cheleko.
Hambiya, ukwetu hakuwa wandugu mufungate, iwenghonga hoyotola, hoyokufa, kosoko nghalekile mwana, hoyomulekela imunduguse imuke,
Nheifo na wakeli naye, na wakadatu mpaka wose mufungate.
Hanyuma ya wose ayuya mwanamuke naye hoyokufa.
Dijuwa dye ndumo ye chilunga yakwenda yowe muke wa yehoki? Kosoko wose mufungate hawowa naye.”
Yesu hoyobidula, hoyowagamba, “Mwagilila! Kosoko musimanyile matulumo kahi udaha we Mulungu.
Kosoko ku ndumo ye chilunga wasikutola kahi wasikutoligwa, ninga wakuwa kifana malaika wa kulanga.
Kahi, imbuli ya wafile kwinuka, musisomile imbuli ilongigwe na Mulungu, yakugamba,
‘Aniye na Mulungu wa Ibulahimu, na Mulungu wa Isaka, na Mulungu wa Yakobo.’ Si Mulungu wa wafile, ninga wa womi.”
Na matewa wakahulike, howojuma kosoko ya mafuso gakwe.
Na Amafalisayo wakahulike fina Yesu kawanyamasa Masadukayo, hawakitanganyila hamwedu.
Yumwedu wawo, mulahi, hoyomusa, kwa kumugesa,
“Mwalimu, Mu tolati ligasilo dikulu no dihoki?”
Hakamugamba, “Umwende Mundewa Mulungu wako kwa umoyo wako wose, na chidoga chako chose, na misungu yako yose.
Adino no dilagiso dikulu, kahi no dya kunghonga.
Na dya keli dikifana na didino, nadyo no dino: ‘Umwende imiyago fina foukiyenda agweye gomwecho.’
Malagiso gose ga Musa na mafuso ga wagonesi gakwegamila mumalagiso agano ameli.”
Amafalisayo wakakitanganyile hamwedu, Yesu hoyowosa, yekuwagamba,
“Anyeye mukona nhani muchanhya ya Kilisito? Togoleni ni mwana wani? Howomubidula, wa Daudi.”
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Ikudahika nhani fina kwa udaha wa Muhe Daudi yakumwinanga imwene Mundewa? Yekugamba,
‘Mundewa hoyomutamila Mundewa wangu,
Ikala ukulume kwangu,
mpaka niweke awanghondo wako
hasi ye migulu yako.’
Daudi hona yakumwinanga Kilisito iMundewa, yakuwa nhani mwanagwe?”
Hachaka munhu kahi yadahile kumubidula. Na kulawa dijuwa didyo hechaka yadahile kumusa iswali.
Kamei Yesu hakawagamba amatewa na wefusa wakwe, fina,
“Awatulumi na Mafalisayo wekala mwigoda dya Musa,
ninga, gose gawakumutamilani mugakole na kugagolosa, ninga kusinhenda sawo munghagolose; kosoko awene wakulonga ninga wasikugolosa.
Awene wakoha makanda masito na kuwatwika awanhu mu mayega gawo; awene awecho wasikwenda kugasegesa makanda gaya ne fidole fyawo.
Kahi sinhenda sawo sose wakugolosa uleke wonigwe na wanhu, wakufala mikanda mikulu ina simbuli sa Mulungu siandikigwe, wakugalamula amapindo ga makasu gawo.
Wakwenda amagoda ga kumwande mumajuwa ge sikukuu na kwikala kumwande mumasinagogi;
na kulamusigwa mumagulilo, na kwinangigwa na wanhu, ‘Labi’.
Ninga anyeye munghenangigwe ‘Labi’, kosoko iMwalimu wenu yumwedu anye wose mwa ndugu.
Munghamwinange munhu ‘Baba’, muchilunga, kosoko mwina Baba yenu yumwedu, iyowile kulanga.
Kahi munghenangigwe Filongosi, kosoko ichilongosi wenu yumwedu, imwene no Kilisito.
Mukulu wenu yakuwa mutumwa wenu.
Na wowose iyakiinula yakudulisigwa, na wowose iyekidulisa, yekukwisigwa.”
“Usungu wenu, watulumi na Mafalisayo! Mwine chimwefe! Kosoko mukuwa hindila awanhu undewa wa kulanga, anye muwecho musikwingila, na awaya awakuhananga kwingila musikuwaleka wengile!
Usungu wenu watulumi na Mafalisayo, mwine chimwefe! Kosoko mukudiya musinyumba sa wegane na kwa chimwefe mukutasa nhasa nhali; kosoko iyo mukupata uliganiso mukulu lugano.

Usungu wenu watulumi na Mafalisayo! Mwine chimwefe! Kosoko mukusunguluta kuisi na kubahali kumugolosa munhu yabiduke na kumwandamilani, kamei nomoyabiduke yakuwa mwana wa jehanumu mikangha mili kusuma anyeye muwecho.
“Usungu wenu mufilongosi mudula, anyeye mukugamba, imunhu yekilaha kwa dihekalu, siyo chinhu; ninga iyakilaha kwa sahabu ya kwi hekalu, kakiyoha.
Mubwalata nyeye! Kahi mwa mudula inghulu no ihoki, aiya hefugilo, ama adiya dihekalu idikuisunha hefugilo?
Kahi anyeye mukugamba imunhu yakilaha kwa mumasabahu si chinhu; ninga yanghakilaha kwa digelo duwile mu masabahu, yakiyoha.
Mwafidula nyeye! Kosoko inghulu no ihoki, adiya digelo, ama amafugilo agakusunha digelo?
Basi ayuya yakilaha kwa mafugilo, yakilaha kwa iyo na kwa ifinhu fyose fuwile muchanhya yakwe;
naye iyakilaha kwa dihekalu, yakilaha kwa didyo, na kwa yuya iyakwikala mugati yakwe;
na iyakilaha kwa ulanga, yakilaha kudigoda dyo undewa we Mulungu, na kwa imwene iyakudikalila.

“Usungu wenu watulumi na Mafalisayo! Mwine chimwefe! Kosoko mulafa filafywa fya munanaa, bisali na jila, ninga muleka simbuli singhulu se malagiso naso no usindamafu, ubasi, na dihuwi; ago iwagila kugagolosa, ninga gaya gamonga munghagaleke.
Filongosi mudula mukuchuja ujuguni mukumesa ingamia!
Usungu wenu watulumi na Mafalisayo! Mwine chimwefe! Kosoko mukusunha kunje ye fikombe na mabakuli kugati yakwe fimema uhiji na upujili.
Agwe Gomufalisayo chidula! Yenda kusunha, kugati ye chikombe, ne sahani uleke kunje yakwe nako kuwe kuswanu!
“Usungu wenu, watulumi na Mafalisayo, mwine chimwefe! Kosoko mukifana filalo fibakigwe swakaya, nafyo kunje fikoneka fiswanu, ninga kugati fimema maguha ga wanhu wafile na uwafu wose.
No nheifo anye nanye, kwa kunje mukoneka fina wanhu waswanu, ninga kugati mumema chimwefe na wihi.”
“Usungu wenu watulumi na Mafalisayo! Mwine chimwefe! Kosoko mukujengela ifilalo fya wagonesi na kuhamba ifilalo fya wanhu waswamu;
mukugamba, ‘Nhanga aseye chowile uko ugele wa waBaba setu, chisowile chikihasa nawo musakame ya wagonesi.’
Mukihomelela muwecho fina anyeye mwa wana wawo awawakomile awagonesi!
Chimemeleseni ichipimo cha wababasenu!
Anyeye mumajoka, cheleko cha majoka! Moitija nhani iliganiswa kwa jehanumu?

Kosoko iyo, mulangisise, aniye nikwigala ukwenu awagonesi na wena imisungu na watulumi; wamonga mukwende muwakome na kuwatungika, na wamonga mukwenda muwatowe mumasinagogi genu, na kuwawinga kulawa kaya mpaka kaya;

kwa nheifo ikwija muchanhya yenu isakame yose ya wanhu waswanu iitike mu iisi, kukongela sakame ya Habili, ayuya iwechawelu mpaka isakame ya Sakalia imwanagwe wa Balakia, yomwakomile hagati gati ya ahasunhile na masabahu.
Chawelu, nikumutamilani: Simbuli siso sose sikwenda sije muchanhya ye cheleko chino!”

“Agwe Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu! Go ukukoma awagonesi, na kuwatowa na mawe awaya awatumigwe ukwako! Ni mikangha mingahi nihananga kukunyatila hamwedu awanago fina inghuku foikukunyagisa hamwedu ifyanagwe hasi ye mabawa gakwe, ninga musendile!
Mulangisise, Inyumba yenu ikusimiligwa na kulekigwa.
Kosoko nikumutamilani, Musikwenda munyone kahi kulawa hambiya, mpaka fomukwija mugamba, ‘Kamotesigwa iyakwija kwe disina dye Mundewa.’”
Yesu hakaleuke, mwihekalu; awefusa wakwe hawamulutila, uleke wamonese amajengo ge dihekalu.
Imwene hakawabidula, “Mukugona agano gose? Chawelu, nikumutamilani: Disikusigala ahano diwe muchanhya ye diwe idyene disikumoligwa.”

Hata foyeja yekala muditunda dya Miseituni, awefusa wakwe howomwijila kwa chinyele, wakugamba, “Chitamile simbuli sino sikuwa milaki. Ne chitangilo cho kwija kwako chikuwa choni, na indumo ye chilunga?”
Yesu yabidula, yakuwagamba, “Mulangisise imunhu yanghawadanhiliseni.
Kosoko wengi wakwenda weje kwi disina dyangu, wakugamba ‘Aniye no ni Kilisito!’ Nawo wakwenda wawadanhilise wengi.
Mohulika simbuli se singhondo; na fununu se singhondo; mulangisise, munghogohe; kosoko ago gakwenda galawanise; ninga indumo iyecho inghali.
Kosoko ditaifa dimwedu dikwinuka na dikitowa na ditaifa dingi; undewa kitowa na undewa; kukwenda kuwe na njala, na disingisi dye iisi kose kose.
Ago gose no nghonga ya usungu kifana wakweleka kwa mwanamuke.
“Ugele uwo wakwenda wamugumeni mu magayo, nawo womukomani, nanye mukuwa wanhu wasuligwe na wanhu wose kosoko ya disina dyangu.
Noho wengi wokuya kunyuma, kisongesa na kisula.
Wagonesi wengi wa udasi wakwija walawanisa, na kuwadanhilisa wengi.
Kosoko ya kongeseka uwihi, uwendo wa wanhu wengi ukwija uhola.
Ninga iyakufinyilisa mpaka kundumo, noyakwenda yahone.
Kahi imbuli iswanu ya undewa ikwija ihubiliigwa muchilunga yuwe uhomelesi ku mataifa gose; aho noho iya indumo ikwija.”
“Ugele womukamukona Disinhu dihile dya kubana, adiya dyalongigwe ne mugonesi Danyeli, dima ahanhu asunhile (iyakusoma yamanye).
Noho wowile Uyahudi watijile kumatunda,
na yowile ukano yanghahumuluke kulonda ifinhu fuwile munyumba yakwe,
yowile kumugunda yanghoye ukaya kulonda si suke sakwe;
Usungu wawo awena siinda na wakonghesa majuwa gago!
Mutase uleke kutija kwenu kunghowe ichigele che imheho au dijuwa dye sabato!
Kosoko ugele uwo kukwija kukuwa lwidaso lugano, agene gasinati goneke gafanile gago kulawa kunghonga ye chilunga mpaka ugele uno, kahi isikwijaikuwa nheifo kahi.
Nhanga amajuwa gago woile gasahunguligwe, nghowile yakuhona munhu wowose yuya; ninga kosoko ya wasaguligwe majuwa ago gohunguligwa.
“Ugele uwo imunhu yanghawagamba, ‘Langa Kilisito! Kowa hano’, ama ‘kowa kuya’, munghahuwile.
Kosoko gakwenda galawanise Makilisito ga udasi, na wagonesi wa udasi, wogolosa fitangilo fingi na majumo; wawagilise, inghadahika du hata waya awasaguligwe.
Langa! Nifulusa kumutamilani gasinati galawanise.
Waghamugambani, ‘Langa kowa kunyika!’ Munghaleuke; ‘kowa kumabuha ga kugati!’ Munghahuwile.
Kosoko fina ulumwemwe foukoneka kulawa kundawilo ye dijuwa mpaka kukuswila dijuwa, nofo kukwenda kuwe kukwija kwakwe Imwana we Munhu.
Hena umufimba noho sikitanganyila si numba.”
“Chimwande, kulawa kwidasigwa kwa majuwa gago, dijuwa dikugumigwa chisa, umwesi nawo usikwijalafa ujelu wakwe, na sinyelesi sikwija silagala kulawa kulanga, uludole lwa kulanga losingisika,

Noho chikwija chikoneka ichitangilo chakwe iMwana we Munhu kulanga; noho amataifa gose ge chilunga gakwija golila, wekwija wamona iMwana we Munhu yakwija mumafunde ga kulanga na ludole na ditunyo ikulu.

Yakwija yowatuma malaika wakwe ne dijwi dikulu dyo lwinango nawo wakwenda wawakonghole awasagulwe kulawa si sandi sose ine, we digunda kulawa ulwandi luno lwe ndumo yo ulanga mpaka ulwandi luya lwe indumo yo ulanga.”
“Kwibiki dyo mutini mukifuse imbasi; manhambi gakwe ganghalafa na kusanhula manyagala, mukutanga fina ugele we dibahu wahabehi;
anye nanye nhaifo, fomukugona ago gose, mutange fina kahabehi, hamulango.
Chawelu, nikuwatamilani, Icheleko chino chisikuloka, mpaka ago gose gamemelesigwe.
Ulanga ne chilunga fikuloka; ninga simbuli sangu sisikuloka ng'o.”
“Ninga dijuwa diya na ugele uya hechaka iyamanyile, kahimalaika wowile kulanga, kahiiMwana; ninga iBaba yemwene.
Kosoko fina mumajuwa ga Nuhu nofo kukuwa kukwija kwakwe iMwana we Munhu.
Kosoko fina amajuwa gaya Difaluko foduwile dikali, awanhu fowendawodiya, na kunywa, wakutola na kutoligwa, mpaka dijuwa diya doyengila Nuhu musafina;
wasamanyile mpaka Digalika fodejile, hodiwalonda wose, nofo kukwenda kuwe kwakwe iMwana we Munhu.
Ugele uwo wanhu weli wokuwa kumugunda; yumonga yakulondigwa, yumonga yekulekigwa;
wanawake weli wakuwa wakusaga: Yumonga yakulondigwa, yumonga yakusigala.
Mwikale meso; kosoko musimanyile dijuwa dihoki dyo yakayokwija Mundewa wenu.
“Ninga mumanye imbuli ino; imwenyenyumba nhanga yamanyile dijuwa dyo yakwija imuhiji, nhanga yekale meso, nghowile yakuleka inyumba yakwe ibenigwe.
Kosoko iyo anye nanye, ikaleni meso, kosoko isaa yo musimanyile Mwana we Munhu yakwija.”
“No nani imutumwa, yekuhuwiligwa, na yene misungu. Imwene yalekeligwe ne Mundewa wakwe inyumba yakwe, yawenghe wanhu ichakudiya ku ugele wakwe?
Ibeka imutumwa yuya imwene, iMundewa wakwe foyakwija yamufike yakugolosa nheifo.
Chawelu, kumutamilani, yakwenda yamwike kulangisisa ifinhu fyakwe fyose.
Ninga imutumwa yuya yehile yanghagamba mu moyo wakwe, ‘iMundewa yekuchelewa,’
yanghakonga kuwatowa wayagwe na kudiya na kunywa hamwedu na walefi.
iMundewa wakwe imutumwa yuya yakayakwija dijuwa dyonghamanyile na isaa yonghamanyile.
Yakumudumula mahindi meli, na kumwika hamwedu na wechimwefe, no kokuwa chililo na kugwegwejula meno.”
“Noho undewa wa kulanga ukwija uliganiswa na wali ikumi, awalonda sitaa sawo, howolawa kuluta kumuhokela bwana halusi.
Washano wawo howokuwa wabwalasi, na washano wena misungu.
Awaya awabwalasi howolonda sitaa sawo, howoleka kulonda na mafuta;
ninga awaya awene misungu howolonda sitaa sawo na mafuta gasigafu mufiya fyawo.
Kamei ibwana halusi yakachelewe kwija, wose howasisila howogona.
Ninga muchilo gati, hokuwa na chowe, ‘Handikoni, ibwana halusi keja mumuhokele!’
“Chimwande, hawaleuka, awali waya wose na kugolosa sitaa sawo.
Awaya awabwalasi howowalonga awene misungu, ‘Chingheni amafuta genu makefu du, kosoko sitaa setu sikusima.’
Ninga waya wene misungu hawawabidula wakugamba, ‘Kaa, gasikuchenela aseye na nyeye; ibeka mulute kumaduka, mukagule.’
Ugele awaya wakalute kukugula; ibwana halusi keja. Awaya awowile baho howokwingila hamwedu naye kuhalusi, umulango howuhindigwa.
“Howokwija awamonga waya, wakugamba, ‘Mundewa, Mundewa! Chikumulile!’
Hakawabidula, yakuwagamba, ‘Chawelu, nikumutamilani, siwamanyileni nyeye.’
Mwikale meso, kosoko musimanyile dijuwa kahi ugele.”
“Kosoko ikifana imunhu yakuluta kunhambo, hakawenanga awatumwa wakwe, hakeka isawo yakwe ukwawo.
Hakamwingha yumonga talanda shano, yumonga talanda mbili, yumonga talanda imwedu; chila yumwedu kaliganiswa ifene fyo yakudaha, kamei hakaluta.
Chimwande ayuya yenghigwe talanda shano, hakaluta kwambasa na si talanda siya, na kupata talanda singi shano.
Nheifo ayuya naye we simbili, naye hakapata talanda singi mbili.
Ninga ayuya yahokele talanda imwedu, hakaluta na kufukula hasi, na kufisa italanda ye Mundewa wakwe.
“Gakaloke majuwa mengi hakeja, iMundewa wa watumwa waya, hakatala ifesa iya hamwedu nawo.
Yakeje ayuya yahokele talanda shano, na kwigala talanda singi shano, hakagamba, ‘Mundewa hakwika ukwangu talanda shano, Langa nipata talanda singi shano.’
iMundewa wakwe hakamugamba, ‘Fiswamu, mutumwa muswamu, na wakuhuwilwa! Hakuhuwiligwa kwa makefu, nikwenda nikwike muchanhya ya mengi. Ingila mu chinyemi che Mundewa wako!’
“Hakeja ayuya iyahokela sitalanda mbili, hakagamba, ‘Mundewa, hakwika ukwangu talanda mbili. Langa nipata talanda singi mbili.’
iMundewa wakwe hakamugamba, ‘Fiswamu, mutumwa muswamu na wakuhuwilwa! Hakuhuwiligwa kwa makefu, nikukwika muchanhya ya mengi. Ingila mu chinyemi che Mundewa wako!’
“Kamei hakeja na ayuya iyahokele italanda imwedu, hakagamba, ‘Mundewa, hanimanya agweye kwa munhu mukugutu; ukugola honghuhandile, ukulunda honghwanjase.
Kamei hanyogoha, haniluta na kufisa italanda yako musanga. Langa! Aino no iiya iyako.’
“Mundewa wakwe yabidula, yakumugamba, ‘Agwe kwa mutumwa wihile na mudoba! Hakumanya fina nikugola hosihandile, nikulunda, hosanjase;
Haikwagila kwikisa isawo yangu ku wakwambasa na kulafa nyongesa, nani fonikwija nipate iyangu ne nyongesa yakwe.
Muhokeni italanda iyo, mwingheni ayuya iyenaso ikumi.
Kosoko chila iyena chinhu yekwinghigwa, na kongesigwa telele; ninga iyechaka, hata achiya cho yenacho yakuhokigwa.
Na imutumwa yuya yehile, mumutage kutali ku chisa cha kunje, no kukuwa chililo na kugwegwejula meno.’”
“Nghona yakwija iMwana we Munhu mu ditunyo dyakwe, hamwedu na malaika wasunhile wose, noho yekwikala mwigoda dyakwe dya ditunyo dya undewa wakwe;
kumwande yakwe wakwenda wakitang'anyile awanhu wa mataifa gose, naye yakwenda yawabagule fina imudimi foyakubagula singholo na simhene;
yakusika singholo umukono wakwe wo kulume na simhene umukono wakwe wo kumoso.
Kamei Mundewa yakuwagamba awaya awowile kumukono wakwe wokulume; ‘Wijeni, anyeye mulugutiswe ne Babangu! Muhale undewa womwikiligwe kulawa kukumbigwa kwe chilunga;
kosoko hanuwa na njala, homuningha chakudiya, hanuwa na nghilu homunigha meji go kunywa; hanuwa mugeni, hamunihokela.
Hanuwa mwasi; hamunifasa, hanuwa mutamu; hamwija munilanga, hanuwa kuchifungo; homunijila.’
“Noho awanhu waswamu, womubidula, ‘Mundewa, milaki fochakonile kwina njala, hochikwingha chakudiya, ama kwina nghilu hochikwingha meji?
Kahi milaki fochakonile kwa mugeni, hochikukalibisha, ama kwa mwasi hochikufasa?
na kahi milaki chakonile umutamu, kahi kwa muchifungo, hochikwijila?’
iMundewa yakuwabidula yekuwagamba, ‘Chawelu, nikumutamilani, ifyene fyomumugolosele yumwedu wa wano awandugusangu awadodogi, munigolosela niye.’
“Kamei yakuwalonga awaya awowile umukono wakwe wo kumoso, ‘Leukeni ukwangu, muligitiswe, mulute ku umoto wa majuwa gose! Woyafuluse kwikiligwa iLuhoma na malaika wakwe;
kosoko hanuwa na njala, musaninghile chakudiya; hanuwa na nghilu; musaninghile meji;
hanuwa mugeni; musanihokele, hanuwa mwasi; musanifasile, hanuwa mutamu na muchifungo; musejile kunilanga.’
“Kamei nawo wakubidula, wakugamba, ‘Mundewa milaki, fochakonile agweye kwina njala kahe kwina nghilu, kahe kwa mugeni, kahe kwa mwasi, kahe kwa mutamu, kahe kwa muchifungo, hochileka kukutogomela?’
Yakwenda yawabidule, yekugamba, ‘Chawelu nikuwatamilani, ifyene fo musimugolosele yumwedu wa awa awadodogi, musinigolosele niye.’
Kamei awo nawo wakwenda walute kwingila mu usungu wa majuwa gose; ninga awanhu waswamu wakuluta ku wumi wa majuwa gose.”
Yesu yakamale kulonga simbuli siso sose, hoyowagamba awefusa wakwe,
“Mumanya fina fogakuloka majuwa meli ikuwa Pasaka,
Ugele uwo awakulu wa makuhani na wasehe wa wanhu, weja wakitang'anyila mudijumba dye Kuhani Mukulu, iyenangagwa Kayafa;
Wagolosa masimulisi hamwedu ifene fowakudaha kumukola Yesu kwa chimwefe na kumukoma.
Ninga howogamba, “Unghowe ugele we sikukuu, ungheje ulawanisa mugogolo ku wanhu.”
Imwene Yesu hoyokuwa Betania munyumba ya Simoni mukoma,
mwanamuke yene chichupa cha mafuta ga malihamu, ga diliho ikulu lugano hakamusegelela na kumwitilila mwitwi dyakwe ugele yekale hachakudiya.
Awefusa wakwe wakone nhaifo, howosuha, howogamba, “Hasala yaki ino?
Kosoko amafuta gano hagowa gakudaha kuguligwa kwa mapesa mengi howogawiligwa awakiwa.”
Yesu yakamanye, hoyowagamba, “Nhani mukumwidasa imwanamuke? Kosoko kanigolosela chinhu chiswanu.
Kosoko majuwa gose awakiwa mwinawo hamwedu nanye, ninga niye si hamwedu nanye majuwa gose.
Kosoko kwa kunyitilila umutufi wangu amafuta gano, kagolosa nhaifo kosoko ya kutandila amasiko gangu.
Chawelu, nimukuwatamilani, chila ahakuhubiliigwa imbuli iswamu muchilunga chose, ichinhu chino choyagolose chotambuligwa, kosoko ya kumugelegela.”
Ugele uwo iyumonga wa waya ikumi na weli, disina dyakwe Yuda Isikalioti, hakawalutila awakulu wa makuhani,
hakagamba Moningha choni, ninghamulafa ukwenu? Howomuliha fipande makumi madatu fya fesa.
Kulawa ugele uwo yende yohananga luneka lwa kumusongesa.
Dijuwa dya kukonga dye mikate isigumigwe nungo, awefusa wakwe hawamulutila Mundewa Yesu, na kumugamba, “Ukuhananga chigolose hoki uleke ukadiile iPasaka?”
Hakagamba, “Luteni ukaya kwa munhu yumonga, Mukamugambe: ‘Mwalimu yekugamba; ugele wangu wahabehi; ukwako nikuhananga nigolose iPasaka hamwedu na wefusa wangu.’”
Awefusa hawagolosa fina Yesu foyawasigilile kamei hawaitandila iPasaka.
Ikowe hegulo hakekala hachakudiya hamwedu na waya wefusa wakwe ikumi na weli.
Fowendewodiya, hakagamba, “Chawelu nikumutamilani, Yumwedu wenu yakunisongesa.”
Hawakona usungu lugano, hawakonga kiyusa yumwe yumwe, “No niye, Mundewa?”
Hakabidula yakugamba, “Iyengise umukono wakwe mwibakuli hamwedu na uwangu, noyakwenda yanisongese.
Imwana we Munhu yakuluta ifene foyaandikiigwe, ninga usungu wakwe imunhu yuya imwene yekumusongesa imwana wa Munhu! Hayuwa ibeka kwe munhu yuyo yowile nghelekigwe!”
Yuda ayuya imwene yekumusongesa, hoyobidula, “Togola no niye, Mundewa? Hoyomugamba Agweye kuilonga.”
Ugele fowadiyage, Yesu hakalonda mukate, hakaulugutisa, hakaubendula, hakawengha awefusa wakwe, yakugamba, “Londeni mudiye, auno no mutufi wangu.”
Hakalonda ichikombe, hakalumba, na kuwengha, yakugamba, “Munywile mose muchichino.
Kosoko aino no sakame yangu ya dilagano iikwitika, kosoko ya wengi kuwaleusila uwihi.
Ninga nikumutamilani, sikunywa kahi kulawa hambiya difai aino ikulawa mumisabibu, mpaka fonikanikunywa aiya inyisha hamwedu nanye, mu undewa we Babangu.”
Kamei wakamale kwimba lwimbo, hawalawa kunje, hawaluta kwitunda dya Miseituni.
Noho Yesu hoyowagamba, “Anye mose motija kosoko yangu ichilo chino cha diyelo,” kosoko iandikigwa, “Nikumutowa imudimi, ditewa dye singholo, dyokiyagala.
Ninga, fonikwinuka kulawa mu difa, nowalongolela kuluta Galilaya.”
Petulo hakagamba, “Wose wanghatija kosoko yako, aniye sikutija ng'o!”
Yesu hakamugamba, “Huwila, nikukutamila agweye, ugele dijogolo disinati dike, ukuwa unikanile, kadatu.
Petulo, hoyomugamba, ‘Inghanyagila kufa nagwe, sikukukana ng'o!’ Awefusa wamonga nawo howolonga nheifo.”
Yesu hakaluta hamwedu nawo mpaka ahanhu henangagwe Getisemane, hakawagamba awefusa wakwe, “Ikaleni baha, ani nilute kuya nikatase.”
Hakamulonda Petulo na awaya awana aweli wa Sebedayo, howokonga kuwa na usungu na kwidasika.
Hakagamba, “Nina usungu lugano, kifana kufa. Ikaleni hano, muwe meso hamwedu naniye.”
Hakaluta kumwande chidodogi, na kugwa chifunhifunhi, hoyotasa, yakugamba, “Baba, inghadahika, unileusile ichikombe chino cha magayo dino! Ninga si fina fonikuhananga niye, ninga foukuhananga agweye.”
Hakawejila awaya awefusa, na kuwefika wagonile; hakamugamba, “Petulo Mulemeligwa kwikala meso na niye hata isaa imwedu?
Ikaleni meso, mutase, mungheje mukwingila mumagesa; ichidoga chikufumila, ninga umutufi wechaka ludole.”
Hakaluta kahi, keli, yakutasa, yakugamba, “Baba nghonaga isikudahika kunileusila ichikombe chino cha magayo, ninghachunywe, foukwenda gweye nofoyuwe.”
Hoyokwija kahi, na kuwona wagonile; kosoko ameso gawo hagowa masito.
Hoyowaleka kahi, hoyoluta, kuwomba lwa kadatu, yakulonga simbuli sisiya.
Kamei hoyowejila awefusa wakwe, na kuwawagamba, “Munghali mugonile na kubwihila; Langeni, ugele usegelela, Imwana we Munhu yakugumigwa mumikono ya wanhu awena uwihi.
Inukeni, chigendeni. Langeni, ayuya iyakunisongesa kasegelela.”
Ugele foyalongage, Yuda, yumwedu, wa awaya ikumi na weli hoyokwija, hamwedu na itewa ikulu dya wanhu wena mapanga na mapulo walawa ku wakulu wa Makuhani na awasehe wa wanhu.
Na yuya yakumusongesa hakawengha chitangilo, kawagamba, “Wonikwenda nimunonele no yuyo Mukoleni”
Chimwandemwande, hoyomulutila Yesu, hoyogamba, “Baho hako Mundewa!” Hoyomunonela.
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Mbwiyangu, golosa idikwigale” Howoluta howogolola imikono yawo, howomukola Yesu.
Langa yumwedu wawo awaya awowile hamwedu na Yesu, hoyogolola umukono wakwe, hoyokwega dipanga dyakwe, hoyomutema imutumishi we kuhani Mukulu, hoyomudumula inghutwi.
Kamei Yesu hoyomugamba, “Yuwisa dipanga dyako baho hodyowile, Kosoko wose wakukola mapanga wakukomigwa na mapanga.”
Kahi ukona fina aniye sikudaha kumutasa iBaba, naye yakunigalila hambiya hano matewa ga wasilikali malaika kumi na meli?
Amatulumo gomemelesigwa nhani fina agakugamba ikuwa nheifo?
Ugele uwo Yesu hoyowagamba matewa fina, “Togoleni, mulawa kifana kumukola muhiji, mwina mapanga na mapulo, kosoko ya kunikola? Majuwa gose hanikala Mwihekalu na kufusa, musanikolile.
Ninga agano gose gagaluka nheifino, uleke amatulumo ga wagonesi gamemelesigwe.” Noho awefusa wakwe wose howotija, howomuleka.
Nawo awamukolile Yesu hawamwigala kwa Kayafa, Ikuhani Mukulu, kowamemile awatulumi na wasehe.
Na Petulo yeja yandamila kwa hatali, mpaka kwi kumbo dye Kuhani Mukulu, hakengila kugati, na kwikala hamwedu na watumwa yone indumo yokuwa nhani.
Awakulu wa Makuhani na dibalasa dyose howohananga uhomelesi wo udasi, kosoko ya Yesu, uleke wamukome;
howoswela kamei, hawalawanisa wahomelesi wengi wa udasi, kulawabaho howolawanisa weli
wakugamba, “Ayuno hakagamba, ‘Yakudaha kudimola dihekalu dya Mulungu, na kudijenga kwa majuwa madatu.’”
Kamei Ikuhani Mukulu hoyokwinuka hakamugamba, “Nghukubidula mbuli? Awano wakukuhomelesa choni?”
Ninga Yesu hakanyamala. Kuhani Mukulu hoyomugamba, “Nikukwilahisa kwa Mulungu imumi: Chitamile, nghona agweye no Kilisito, Mwana we Mulungu.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Agwe nanga kuilonga. Ninga nikumutamilani kulawa hambiya mukwenda mumone iMwana we Munhu yekale kumukono wo kulume wo ludole, yakwija mumafunde ga kuulanga.”
Ikuhani Mukulu, hoyodega si suke sakwe, yakugamba, “Lubeso. Nhani chikuhananga wahomelesi kahi? Langeni hambiya muhulika ulubeso lwakwe.
Mukulamula nhani nyeye?” Howobidula, howogamba, “Imwagila yakomigwe.”
Howomutwila amate kuchihanga, howomutowa, wamonga howomutowa makofi,
wakugamba, “Agwe Kilisito! Tanga, nani yakutowile?”
Petulo hoyokuwa yekale kunje ye dikumbo; mwamuke yumonga hoyomulutila, hoyogamba, “Agwe nagwe hakuwa hamwedu na Yesu wa Galilaya.”
Ninga hakakana kumwade ya wose, na kugamba, “Simanyile cho ukulonga.”
Kamei yakalawe kunje mpaka habalasa, mwanamuke yungi hoyomona, hoyowatamila awanhu wowile baho, “Imunhu yuno hakowa hamwedu na Yesu Munasaleti.”
Hakakana kahi kwa kilaha, “Simumanyile imunhu yuno.”
Chikaloke chipisi chidodogi, awaya awowile baho howomwijila Petulo, howomugamba Chawelu agwe nagwe kwa yumwedu wawo, “Kosoko hata inonga yako ikukusongesa.”
Hoyokonga kuligita na kilaha yakugamba, “Simumanyile imunhu yuno!” Ugele uwo dijogolo hodikwika.
Petulo hakagelegela imbuli yoyalongile Yesu fina, “Ugele dijogolo disinati dike, agweye ukuwa unikanile kadatu.” Hoyolawa kunje, hoyolila kwa usungu lugano.
Ikowe nhosikusiku, wakulu wa makuhani wose na wasehe wa wanhu, haweka mulundo kosoko ya Yesu, uleke wamukome;
Hawamoha, na kumulonda kumwigala kwa Pilato yowile liwali.
Kamei, Yuda ayuya yamusongese, yakone fina kafulusa kuliganiswa, hoyokalala, hoyowowisila awakulu wa makuhani na wasehe wa wanhu fipande fiya fye ifesa, makumi madatu,
hoyogamba, “Hanibana, fonaisongese isakame ichaka wihi.” Howagamba, “Ago gena choni ukwetu. Ugalange agweye gomwecho.”
Hoyafikubita afiya ifipande fye ifesa kugati ya dihekalu hoyoleuka; hoyoluta, na hoyejakinyonga.
Awakulu wawatambiki howofilonda afiya ifipande fye ifesa, howogamba, “Si fiswanu kufika mudisanduku dya filafwa, kosoko ni fesa ya sakame.”
Howokifumilisa fina, wagule ilolo dya ulongo we chumbo howe hanhu hakusikila wageni.
Kosoko iyo dilolo didyo dikwinangigwa, Ilolo dya sakame mpaka diyelo.
Hoimemelesigwa imbuli yalongigwa ne mugonesi Yelemia: Yagamba, “Howofilonda fibemhe makumi madatu fye fesa, diliho dyakwe dyafumiligwe, na wana wa Isilaeli,
howofilafa kwa kugulila ilolo dya ulongo we chumbo, fina iMundewa foyanisigilile.”
Hoyokwima kumwande ya liwali; liwali hoyomusa, yakugamba, “Agweye no goMundewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu hoyogamba, “Agwe kuilonga.”
Ninga foyaliganiswe na wakulu wa makuhani na wasehe, nghabidule mbuli.
Noho Pilato hoyomugamba, “Nghukuhulika amabuli gose gowakukuhomelela?”
Hoyoleka kumubidula hata mbuli imwedu, iliwali hoyokisina lugano.
Ugele we sikukuu iliwali hakasowela kuwadoholela mufungwa yumwedu wowakuhananga.
Baho hahowa na mufungwa yumonga yamanyike lugano majuwa gaya, disina dyakwe Balaba.
Wakakitang'anyile, Pilato hakawagamba, “Mukuhananga nimulekele yehoki? Ayuya iBalaba ama iYesu yekwinangigwa Kilisito?”
Kosoko hakamanya fina hawamulafa kwa finju.
Yakekale mwigoda dyakwe dyo uliganisi, imuke hoyomwigalila, nonga yakugamba fina, “Unghowe na mbuli na yuya imunhu imuswamu; kosoko nidasigwa lugano musinjosi diyelo kosoko yakwe.”
Awakulu wa makuhani na wasehe wa wanhu howowagongelesa matewa wamuhanange Balaba, na kumukoma Yesu.
Iliwali hoyobidula kahi hoyowagamba, “Mukuhananga niwadoholele yehoki mu awano aweli?” Howogamba, “Balaba!”
Pilato hoyowagamba, “Nimugolose nhani Yesu iyekwinangwa Kilisito?” Howobidula wose, “Yasambasigwe!”
Hoyogamba, “Nhani, wihi waki woyagolose?” Howokongesa kujoja wakugamba, “Yatungikigwe!”

Baho Pilato yakone nghodaha chochose, ninga chiyunguyungu chikongeseka du, hoyolonda meji, hoyonawa mikono kumwande ya matewa, hoyogamba, “Aniye nachaka uwihi kusakame ye munhu yuno imuswamu! Mugalange ago anyeye muwecho.”
Wanhu wose howobidula howogamba, “Isakame yakwe yuwe muchanhya yetu na muchanhya ya awana wetu!”
Kamei hoyomukumulila Balaba; Yakamale kumutowa Yesu mikotya, yamulafa uleke wakamusambase.
Noho wasilikali wa liwali hawomwigala Yesu ku Plitolio, howomumemelela ichitewa chose.
Hawamuhambula si suke, howomufasa ikasu indunghu.
Hawaluka nghofia ya miwa, howomufasa mwitwi dyakwe, hawamwingha mhando ya digwami mumukono wakwe wo kulume, hawafugama kumwande yakwe, na kumuhowa wakugamba, “Baho hako, Mundewa wa Wayahudi!”
Kahi howomutwila mate, hawalonda imhando iya howomutowa towa mwitwi.
Wakamale kumogelela, howomuhambula dikasu diya, howomufasa sisuke sakwe, howomulonda kuluta kumusambasa.
Wokowe wakulawa hawona munhu wa Kilene, disina dyakwe Simoni; ayuno howomudindilisa yalonde umusalaba wakwe.
Wakafike ahanhu hekwinangwa Goligota, (nong'amba, ahanhu hediguha dye ditwi,)
howomwingha yonywe difai ihanganisigwe ne sungwi; ninga yakainomole du nghendile kuyunywa.
Wakafuluse kumutungika mumusalaba, “Howogawa sisuke sakwe, howositowela kula.”
Howokwikala, wakumugojelesa uko.
Howokwika hachanhya ye ditwi dyakwe usongesi wawo diandiko dikugamba, “AYUNO NO YESU MUNDEWA WA WAYAHUDI.”
Ugele uwo wahiji weli howosambasigwa hamwedu naye, yumonga umukono wakwe wo kulume, na yumonga umukono wakwe wo kumoso.
Awalokage munjila howomuliga, wakusingisasingisa amatwi gawo,
Wakugamba, “Agweye go ukudimola dihekalu na kudijenga kwa majuwa madatu! Kihonye gomwecho; honaga no mwana we Mulungu, humuluka mumusalaba.”
No nheifo awaya awakulu wa makuhani fowamogelele hamwedu na watulumi na wasehe, wakugamba,
“Hakawahonya wamonga, nghakudaha kihonya imwecho. Aye iMundewa wa Isilaeli; yahumuluke hambiya mumusalaba, nase chomuhuwila.
Kamuhuwila Mulungu; na yamuhonye hambiya, nghona yakumuhananga; kosoko hakagamba, ‘Aniye na Mwana we Mulungu.’”
Nheifo awaya awahiji nawo awasambasigwe hamwedu naye hawamuliga.
Kulawa isaa ya mutandatu mpaka isaa ya ikenda iisi yose hayuwa na chisa.
Ikafike isaa ya ikenda nhafi, iYesu yekwinula dijwi dyakwe kwa ludole, yekugamba, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Nong'agamba, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, nhani unilekile?”
Na wamonga awowile baho, wakahulike, hawagamba, “Ayuno yakumwinanga Eliya!”
Chimwandemwande yumwedu wawo hoyobilima, hoyolonda sifongo hoyoiloweka mu siki, hoyoiguma mu chigwami, hoyomwingha yonywe.
Awaya wamonga howogamba, “Leka chilange nghona Eliya kokwija kumuhonya!”
Naye Yesu yakenule dijwi kwa ludole, hoyolafa ichidoga chakwe.
Langa dipasia dye dihekalu hadidegeka fibemhe fili, kulawa kuchanhya mpaka hasi; iyisi hoisingisika; amawe hogotulika;
ifilalo hofigubuka; hoikwinuka mitufi mingi ya wasunhile awagonile mufilalo.
Kamei wakafuluse kulawa mufilalo, wakafuluse kwinuka, howokwingila mukaya isunhile, hawokonigwa na wengi.
Kamei ayuya iakida, hamwedu na waya wowile hamwedu naye wakumugojelesa Yesu, wokone umusingisiko we iisi na agaya gagoloseke, howokogoha lugano, howogamba, “Chawelu ayuno hakowa Mwana we iMulungu!”
Hahowa na wanawake wengi baho wakulanga kwa hatali, awo no weja wamwandamila Yesu kulawa Galilaya, na kumutogomela.
Mugati yawo hakowa umo Maliamu Magidalena, na Maliamu ing'ina yawo cha Yakobo na Yusufu na ng'ina yawo awana wa Sebedayo.
Ikowe hegulo hoyokwija munhu yumonga mugoli wa Alimataya, disina dyakwe Yusufu, imwene naye hakowa mwifusa wa Yesu;
imunhu yuyo hoyomulutila Pilato, hoyoutasa umutufi wa Yesu. Kamei Pilato hoyolagisa yenghigwe.
Yusufu, hoyoulonda umutufi, hoyousingilisa ne sanda ye bafuta swanu.
Hoyowika muchilalo chakwe chisha, choyasongole mwiwe, hoyofingilisa diwe dikulu hamulango we chilalo, yaleuka.
Baho hahowa na Maliamu Magidalena, na Maliamu ayuya wa keli, wekala wekulanga ku chilalo.
Dijuwa dya keli, idyoile dye Isabato, wakulu wa makuhani, na Mafalisayo howomwijila Pilato;
wakugamba, “Mundewa, chigelegela fina ayuya imusugu, foyowile yakali mumi hakagamba, ‘Ganghaloka majuwa madatu yakwinuka.’
Ulagise ichilalo chimilisigwe fiswanu mpaka dijuwa dya kadatu, wangheje awefusa wakwe womuhija na kuwatamila wanhu, Kenuka kulawa kuwafile; na udasi wa keli ukusuma auya we nghonga.”
Pilato hoyowagamba, “Mwina wasilikali, mulute mukemilise ichilalo fiswamu fomukudaha.”
Hawaluta, howokwimilisa ichilalo fiswamu, howodiguma diwe diya muhuli na kwika wemilisi.
Isabato ikahele, fokwakongile kucha dijuwa dye inghonga ye dijuma, Maliamu Magidalena na Maliamu yuya wa keli, howoluta kwijalanga ichilalo.
Langa, hokukuwa musingisiko mukulu we iisi; kosoko imalaika we Mundewa hakadulika kulawa kulanga, hoyokwija, hoyodifingilisa diwe diya hoyodikalila.
Ifuta yakwe hayuwa kifana lumwemwe, na sisuke sakwe njelu swe swe swe.
Kosoko yo kumogoha, awaya awemilisi hawahihima, na kuwa kifana wanhu wafile.
Kamei malaika yakawagamba awaya awanawake, “Munghogohe anyeye; kosoko nimanya mukumuhananga Yesu yasambasigwe.”
Kahechaka hano; kosoko kenuka, fina fyoyalongile. Wijeni mulange ahanhu hoyekigwe.
Nanye luteni chimwande, mukawatamile awefusa wakwe. Kenuka kulawa kuwanhu wafile; Langeni! Yakuwalongolela kuluta Galilaya; ako noko mukamwona. Handikoni, nifulusa kumutamilani.
Hawaleuka chimwande kulawa hechilalo, kwa itisi uwoga ne chinyemi chikulu, howobilima kwijawatamila simbuli siso awefusa wakwe.
Langa, Yesu hakakitang'anyila nawo, yakugamba, “Bahoni!” Howomusegelela, howomukola imigulu, howomufugamila.
Kamei Yesu hoyowagamba, “Munghogohe; gendeni mukawatamile wandugusangu walute Galilaya, nokowakanyona.”
Ugele awaya fowalutage, langa wamonga wa wasilikali howokwingila mukaya, howatamila awakulu wa makuhani gose agagoloseke.
Howokitanganyila hamwedu na wasehe, howokifumilisa, howowengha wasilikali fesa nyingi,
wakugamba, “Watamileni wanhu fina awefusa wakwe weja nechilo, wamuhija, fochowile chigonile.
Imbuli ino inghahulikigwa kwa liwali, aseye, chikwenda chilonge naye, anye nanye chiwaleusila lwidaso.”
Kamei howohokela ifesa iya, howogolosa fina fowafundigwe. Na imbuli iyo hoikwenela ku Wayahudi wose mpaka diyelo.
Awaya awefusa wakwe ikumi na yumwedu hawaluta Galilaya mpaka ditunda diya Yesu dyoyawasigilile.
Nawo wakamwone, howomufugamila, ninga awamonga hawowa na manhonge.
Yesu hoyowejila, hoyolonga nawo, hoyowagamba, “Ninghigwa udaha wose wa kulanga na wa muisi.
Luteni mukawagolose mataifa gose wowe wefusa: Muwabatise kudisina dya Baba, na Mwana, na Muhe Musunhile,
na kuwafusa wagakole gose gonimulagiseni anyeye; langa aniye nikuwa hamwedu nanye majuwa gose, mpaka kundumo ye chilunga.”
Inghonga ya Imbuli swanu ya Yesu Kilisito Mwana we Mulungu,
fina yofoitulumwe ne mugonesi Isaya:
“Langa nikumutuma imutumigwa wangu
kumwande yako
Iyakwenda yaigolose injila yako.
Dijwi dye imunhu yekujoja munyika
Igoloseni injila ye Mundewa;
Sigoloseni si njila sakwe!”
Yohana mubatisaji yasololoka munyika, yakuhubili ubatiso wo Kulamba uwukwigala kuleusiligwa uwihi.
Iyisi yose ya Uyahudi wejawamulutila na wanhu wose wa Yelusalemu; na kuwabatisa mulwanda lwa Yolodani, wakulamba uwihi wawo.
Yohana hakafala singa se ngamia na mukanda we nghingo muchuno chakwe, chakudiya chakwe sige na uki wa filambo.
Yawahubiliya awanhu, yakugamba, “Hanyuma yangu yakwija yena udaha kusuma niye, aniye sagiligwe kufunama na kudohola sisigi se filwatu fyakwe.
Aniye nikumubatisani kwa meji, ninga imwene yakwenda yamubatiseni kwa Muhe Musunhile.”
Amajuwa gago Yesu yeja kulawa Nasaleti ya Galilaya, hoyabatisigwa na Yohana mu ulwanda lwa Yolodani.
Kamei yakalawe kunje ya meji, chimwande yeja yona ulanga ugubuka na Muhe yakudulika muchanhya yakwe kifana huwa;
dijwi dyalawa kulanga, “Agweye no mwanangu mwendigwa; nyendesigwa nagweye.”
Chimwande Muhe Musunhile kamulongosa kunyika.
Naye yowa uko kunyika kwa majuwa makumi mane; yakugesigwa na Luhoma, yowaga na makewe ga kumbago, na malaika wende womutogomela.
Hambiya, Yohana yakohigwe, Yesu yeja Galilaya, yakuhubili imbuli swanu ye Mulungu
yakugamba, “Ugele wija, undewa we Mulungu usegelela, Mulambe, na kuihuwila imbuli swanu.”
Ugele foyagendage munghingi ye bahali ya Galilaya, yamona Simoni ne munduguse Andelea, wakuguma ulwafu lwawo mubahali, kosoko hawowa walowaji wa somba.
Yesu yawagamba, “Nyandamileni, nani nowagolosa muwe walowa wanhu.”
Kamei chimwande wejawaleka si nyafu sawo na kumwandamila.
Hawaluta hamwande habehibehi, hawamona Yakobo wa Sebedayo, na Yohana imunduguse, nawo nheifiya hawowa mu chiya, wakusigolosa si nyafu sawo,
Kamei chimwande, yeja yawenanga; howomuleka iBaba yawo Sebedayo mu chiya hamwedu na wanhu we maliho, na kumwandamila.
Wejawaluta Kapelinaumu, chimwande dijuwa dye sabato yejayengila mwisinagogi na kufusa.
Wejawajuma lugano kosoko ya mafuso gakwe, kosoko yendeyofusa fina munhu yena udaha, kahi si fina watulumi.
Kamei chimwande, hamuwa na munhu yena digini dihile umo mwisinagogi dyawo;
kamei hakajoja China choni nagweye, “Yesu wa Nasaleti? Togola kwija uchimalagise? Nikumanya gwegwe no Imusunhile we Mulungu.”
Ninga Yesu yaigombela yakugamba, “Nyamala na umulawe!”
Kamei dyamuguma chisilisi, na kujoja kwa ijwi ikulu na kumulawa.
Wose wejawajuma, wakiyusa, wakugamba, “Choni chino? Ifuso isha! Kwa udaha yakulagisa hata magini gehile nago gakumuhulika.”
Simbuli sakwe hosikwenela chimwande ku si iisi sose sikusunguluta Galilaya.
Kamei chimwande wakalawe mwisinagogi, wejawengila ukaya kwa cha Simoni na Andelea, hamwedu na Yakobo na Yohana.
Imukwewe wa Simoni, ing'ina we imuke, hakowa mwisasi, kena mhungo; kamei chimwande wejawamutamila simbuli sakwe.
Hoyamusegelela, na kumwinula kwa kumukola umukono, imhungo haimuleka, na kuwatogomela.
Hegulo iya dijuwa dikoswe, wejawamwigalila wose awowile na sinhamu na wowile na magini.
Awanhu wose we ikaya iya howokwija howomema hamulango.
Hakawahonya matewa na matamu ga hayo hayo, na kulafa magini itewa, nghagalekile magini galonge, kosoko hagamumanya.
Nhosikusiku, kwikali malisalisa, yejayenuka na kuluta kunhu kwichaka wanhu, uko yowa na mawombi.
iSimoni na wayagwe hawamwandamila,
na kumona hawamugamba, “Awanhu wose wakukuhananga.”
Yawagamba, “Chigendeni kwingi, kufikaya fihamwande, uleke nihubili uko nako kosoko iyo nochileka nejile.”
Yaluta kuhubili, iisi yose ya Galilaya mumasinagogi gawo na kulafa magini.
Yamwijila munhu yena ukoma, yakumugongelesa kwa kumufugamila, yakugamba, “Unghenda ukudaha kunihonya.”
Naye yamonele ubasi, na kugolola umukono wakwe, na kumukwafa, yakugamba, “Nikwenda, uhone.”
Kamei chimwande ukoma wamuleuka hakahonyigwa.
kamei Yesu yamugamba yalute chimwande
na kumugamba, “Langa, unghamutamile munhu mbuli yoyose; nanga ulute ukakiyonese ku watambiki, go mwenyecho ukalafe isadaka foyalagisa iMusa, kosoko ya kuhona kwako; chuwe chitangilo ukwawo.”

Ninga, hakalawa na kukonga kuibwambwasa na kuyenesa imbuli iya mpaka isidahike kahi kwa Yesu kwingila mukaya yakoneke na wanhu. Ninga hakasigala kunje ahanhu hasowile na wanhu, hawamulutila kulawa chila ulwandi.
Gakaloke majuwa makefu, yoya kahi Kapelinaumu, hawahulika fina kowa ukaya.
Wanhu itewa weja welunda hamwedu mpaka hamulango, hokukuwa chaka luneka kosoko yawo; naye yendeyowahubili imbuli yakwe.
Haweja wanhu wegale mutamu yaholole, kenuligwa na wanhu wane.
Wakalemeligwe kumusegelela kosoko ya matewa, Howaimola ikano, ahaya hoyowile. Wakamale kuitobola hawamuhulumusa mwisasi dyoyagonele ayuya iyaholole.
Kamei Yesu yakone dihuwi dyawo, hakamugamba ayuya iyaholole, “Mwanangu kuleusiligwa uwihi wako.”
Awamonga wa Watulumi awowile uko, hawekala na kudoga mufidoga fyawo,
“Nhani yuno yakulonga nhafi? Yakutofula. No nani yakudaha kuleusa uwihi langa yu mwedu du naye no Mulungu!”
Chimwande Yesu, yakamanye muchidoga chakwe fina wakudoga nheifo mufidoga fyawo, yawagamba, “Nhani mukudoga nhafi mufidoga fyenu?
Chihufu no chihoki, kumugamba yaholole, ‘Kuleusiligwa uwihi wako,’ ama kugamba, ‘Inuka, kitwike disasi dyako, ulute?’
Ninga mumanye fina Mwana we Munhu kena udaha muchilunga wo kuleusa uwihi.” Kamei yamugamba ayuya yaholole
Nikugamba, “Inuka kitwike disasi dyako ulute ukaya ukwako.”
Chimwande hakenuka, na kitwika disasi dyakwe na kulawa kumwande yawo wose. Wose wejawajuma na kumutunya Mulungu, wakugamba, “Chisinati chone chinhu fina chino ugele wowose!”
Hakaleuka kahi na kuluta kunghingi ye bahali, ditewa dyose hodimusunguluta, hoyowafusa:
Foyalokage, yamona Lawi imwana wa Alifayo, kekala hachibanda cho kulihila kodi, hakamugamba, “Nyandamile. Hakenuka na kumwandamila.”
Ugele foyekale wakudiya kunyumba yakwe ditewa dye wakonghosa kodi na wena uwihi hawekala hamwedu na Yesu, na wefusa wakwe, kosoko hawowa itewa wamwandamilage.
Watulumi na Mafalisayo fowamonile yakudiya hamwedu na wakonghosa kodi na wena uwihi, hawawagamba awefusa wakwe, “Nhani yakudiya hamwedu na wakonghosa kodi na wena uwihi?”
Yesu yakahulike hoyowagamba, “Awomi wasikuhananga muganga ninga awatamu. Sijile kwinanga awomi ninga awene wihi.”
Awefusa wa Yohana na Wamafalisayo weja wafungaga; kamei, haweja, wakumugamba, “Nhani awefusa wa Yohana na wefusa wa Mafalisayo wakufunga, ninga awefusa awako wasikufunga?”
Yesu hakawagamba, “Awowile mu halusi wakudaha kufunga nhani ugele ibwana halusi kahamwedu nawo?” Ichigele chose nghona ibwana halusi ye hamwedu nawo, wasikudaha kufunga.
Ninga amajuwa gakwija iBwana halusi yakwija yoleusigwa, dijuwa dyo noho wakawofunga.
Hechaka munhu yakusona ndame nyisha mu suke ya katali, yanghasona, achiya ichisha chikuigolosa idegeke aiya isuke ya katali, ahaya ahadegeke hakongeseka kudegeka.
Kahe hechaka munhu yakuguma difai nyisha muchibuyu cha katali, yanghaguma aiya idifai nyisha ikwenda ifitule ifibuyu fiya, ninga difai nyisha ikugumigwa mufibuyu fisha.
Yakowe yakuloka mumigunda ye ngano dijuwa dye sabato; fowaleukage awefusa wakwe hawakonga kukwanyula masanja ge ingano.
Mafalisayo hawamugamba, “Langa, nhani wakugolosa dilemesigwe kugolosa mwijuwa dye Sabato?”
Kamei yawagamba, “Musinati musome hohose foyagolose Daudi, foyowile na njala, imwene na wayagwe:
ifene foyengile mu nyumba ye Mulungu, ugele we mutambiki mukulu Abiyasali, na kudiya imikate iya yokonesa iyene isikudiigwa na wanhu wowose ninga na watambiki du, na kuwenghawayagwe?”
Hoyowagamba, “Isabato haigoloseka kosoko ye munhu; siyo imunhu kosoko ye isabato.
Ninga Mwana we Munhu no Mundewa we sabato nheifia.”
Yengila kahi mwisinagogi; umo hamuwa munhu yena mukono uholole.
Wende womutegela uleke wone nghona yomuhonya dijuwa dye sabato; uleke wamukole chikono.
Kamei yamugamba ayuya yena umukono uholole nyagula
Hakawagamba, “Ni fiswanu dijuwa dye sabato kugolosa maswanu ama gehile, Kuhonya chidoga ama kukoma?” Ninga hawanyamala.
Hakawakumhulila meso kose kose kwa nyono, yena usungu kosoko yo ukugutu we fidoga fyawo. Yakumugamba ayuya imunhu, “Golola umukono wako. Naye hakaugolola, na umukono wakwe houhona.”
Amafalisayo hawalawa na chimwande haweka njama hamwedu na Mahelodiya kosoko yakwe uleke wamukome.
Yesu yaleuke hamwedu na wefusa wakwe, kuluta kunghingi ye bahali na wanhu itewa kulawa Galilaya weja wamwandamila; kahi kulawa Uyahudi,
na Yelusalemu, na Idumaya, na umwambu wa Yolodani, na ulwandi lwa Tilo na Sidoni. Itewa ikulu, wakahulike simbuli sose soyagolose, hawamwijila.
Hakawalonga awefusa wakwe fina wamwikile chiya habehi naye, kosoko ya ditewa dya wanhu, wangheje womukanhamisa;
Kosoko hakahonya matewa, hata awaya awowile na sinhamu, weja wakisegesaga uleke wamukwafe.
Na wena magini gehile chila fowakumona, wakugwa na kujoja, wakugamba, “Agweye no umwana we Mulungu.”
Hakawalemesa lugano, wanghamubwambwase kuwanhu.
Kahi hakakwila kwitunda na kuwenanga wose woyendile howomwijila.
Kamei yawasagula ikumi na weli, wowe hamwedu naye, uleke yawatume kuhubili.
Kahi wowe na udaha wa kulafa magini:
Simoni yamwingha disina dya Petulo;
Yakobo imwana wa Sebedayo, na Yohana imunduguse wa Yakobo, yoyawengha disina dya Boanege, nong'amba, “Wana we ididimo;”
Andilea na Filipo, na Batolomayo, na Matayo, na Tomaso, na Yakobo imwana wa Alufayo na Tadei na Simoni Mukananayo,
na Yuda Isikalioti, iyamusongesa. Kamei hakaluta ukaya.
Ditewa dya wanhu dyakitang'anyila kahi, hata awene wasapata luneka lwa kudiya.
Awanduguse wakahulike simbuli so, hawamulutila uleke wamukole; kosoko hawagamba, “Ditwi dyakwe dijuguma.”
Na Watulumi awadulike kulawa Yelusalemu, hawagamba, “Kena Belisebuli, na yakulafa simhepo kwa udaha we mukulu wa magini.”
Hakawenanga, na kuwatamila kwa mbasi: “Iluhoma kodaha kumulafa Luhoma?
Nghona Undewa unghakitemanula uwecho kwa wecho usikudaha kugendelela.
Na inyumba inghakitemanula iyecho kwa iyecho, inyumba yo isikudaha kugendelela.
Iluhoma yanghakisuhila imwecho na kigawa nghekudaha kugendelela, ninga indumo yakwe ija.
Kwechaka munhu yekudaha kwingila kunyumba ye munhu yena ludole na kulonda ifinhu fyakwe, mpaka yakonge kumoha imunhu wo ludole; noho yakudaha kulonda inyumba yakwe.
Chawelu, nikumutamilani, uwihi wose wa awanhu wakudaha kuleusiligwa, na matofulo gose gowekulonga;
Ninga imunhu iyakwenda yamutofule Muhe Musunhile yakuwa na wihi wa majuwa gose.”
Kosoko wagambile fina Kena magini gehile.
Haweja ing'ina ne wanduguse: Wema kunje, walagisa munhu yamwinange.
Amatewa hawowa wekale, wamusunguluta, wamugamba, “Langa, ing'inako na wanduguso, wowa kunje wakukuhananga.”
Yawabidula, yekugamba, “Imayi na wandugu sangu no chenani?”
Yawalanga awaya awekale na kumusunguluta kose kose na kuwagamba, “Langa! Imayi na wandugu sangu!
Kosoko imunhu wowose iyakugolosa foyakuhananga iMulungu, ayo no mundugusangu, no lumbu dyangu no ng'inangu.”

Yakonga kahi kuwafusa kunghingi ye bahali. Ditewa ikulu lugano dya wanhu, dyamusunguluta, imwene yengile muchiya, na kwikala muchiya ulwandi lwe bahali, ditewa hodikuwa kunje ye bahali, kuisi kwichaka meji.
Yawafusa mbuli nyingi kwa mbasi, mumafuso gakwe yawagamba:
Hulikiseni! “Imuhandi yaluta kuhanda.
Kamei ugele foyahandage imbeyu imonga hoilagalila munghanda ye njila, ifidege hofiidiya.
Imonga hailagala hena diwe, hahowa na ulongo mukefu. Chimwande hoikota kosoko ya ulongo mukefu.
Kamei dijuwa dikalawe, hailakala, na kosoko ichaka misisi hainyala.
Isimonga hosilagala ahena imiwa, imiwa iya yakula na kuikanhamisa, hoileka kweleka mhule.
Simonga hosilagala hena ulongo umuswanu hosikweleka, hasota na kukula, na kweleka: Imonga mhule makumi madatu, imonga makumi mutandatu, na mhule imonga igana dimwedu.
Yena singhutwi so kuhulika yahulike!”
Naye yakowe ye imwene awaya awanhu awamusungulute na waya ikumi na weli, howomusa difuso dye mbasi.
Yawagamba, “Anyeye mumotesigwa kumanya imbuli ifisigwe ya undewa we Mulungu, ninga kwa waya wowile kunje gose gakugolosigwa kifana mbasi,
uleke hata wanghalanga, walange wanghone,
‘Na wanghahulika, wahulike wanghamanye,
Wangheje wobiduka na kulekeleligwa.’”
Kahi yawagamba, “Musikuimanya imbasi ino? Simbasi simonga mosimanya nhani?
Imuhandi ayo yakuhanda imbuli.
Awano no wowile munghanda ye injila ichigele choikuhandigwa imbeyu; awene, wanghahulika imbuli, chimwande yakwija Luhoma na kuileusa aiya imbuli ihandigwe mufidoga fyawo.
Nheifo awa nawo nowaya wahandigwe mu mawe, awene wakuhulika iya imbuli. Chimwande waihokela kwa chinyemi.
Ninga wachaka misisi mugati yao, wakugendelela chipisi chiguhi. Kughalawanisa migogolo kosoko ya iya imbuli, wakuleka kuhuwila.
Na wano nowaya wakuhandigwa mumiwa. Ni wanhu wakuihulika imbuli,
na simbuli se chilunga, na udasi we mali, na kukwegigwa na finhu, sikukanhamisa iya imbuli mpaka imbuli iya isikudaha kweleka.
Na wano nowaya wahandigwe mu ulongo muswanu, no wanhu wakuihulika imbuli na kuihokela, na kweleka si mhule: Aino makumi madatu, aino makumi mutandatu, na aino igana dimwedu.”
Yawagamba, “Itaa ikwija igubikigwe? Si kwikigwa muchigwaso?
Kosoko kwechaka mbuli ifisigwe ninga kosoko ije imanyike, kahi kwechaka difisigwe ninga dije dyoneke pwi, pwi, pwi.
Imunhu nghona yena nghutwi sa kuhulika yahulike.”
Hakawagamba, “Mulangisise go mukuhulika, imhishi iya yo mukupima, noyo mukamupimiligwa na kahi mukongeseligwa.
Kosoko yena chinhu yakwenda yenghigwe, na ayuya yechaka chinhu, hata chiya choyenacho yakuhokigwa.”
Yagamba, “Undewa we Mulungu ukifana munhu yanyagile imbeyu musanga,
yakugona na kwinuka, chilo ne imisi, na imbeyu hoikota na kukula, fonghamanyile.
Kosoko iisi ikweleka iyecho, ikukonga dinyagala, kamei chida, kamei disanja dye ingano ikangale mwisanga.
Inghakangala, yakwingisa ihengo yakwe kosoko ugele wokududula ufika.”
Yagamba, “Chiliganise na choni undewa we Mulungu? Kahi chiugume mu mbasi yaki?
Ikifana imbeyu yo umheja, iyene foikuhandigwa mu ulongo ni ndodogi kusuma si mbeyu sose suwile mu chilunga;
ninga inghahandigwa, ikukula kusuma amabiki gose, ikuwa na matambi makulu mpaka amadege ga kulanga gakujenga amafulu gawo mwipeho dyakwe.”
Kwa mbasi nyingi sifanile ino, hakalonga nawo imbuli fowadahile kuhulika.
Ninga bila mbasi nghalongile nawo, kamei yawatamila awefusa wakwe we imwene.
Dijuwa diya ikowe hegulo, yawagamba, “Chiloke mpaka umwambu.”
Na fowadilekile ditewa dya wanhu kunyuma, hawamulonda imwene hamwedu nawo muchiya nheifiya foyowile. Na Ifiya fimonga, hafyua baho hamwedu naye.
Lwalawa luputa lukulu lwa imheho, amawingo hagatowa ichiya, na kukonga kumema meji.
Imwene hakowa kunyuma ye ichiya kagona mu muto. Hawamwinusa, wakumugamba, “Mwalimu, nghukona ubasi aseye fochikufa?”
Hakenuka, na kuigombela imheho, yakuigamba ibahali, “Nyamala twi!”
Hakawagamba, “Nhani mukogoha? Mwichaka ihuwi?”
Hawengiligwa na chogoho chikulu, na kukonga kulonga awecho kwa wecho, “Ayuno nani, imwene imheho ne bahali fikumuhulika?”
Hawaloka umwambu we bahali, mpaka muiisi ya Wagelasi.
Yakahulumuke mu chiya, chimwande, haketang'anyila ne munhu, yalawile kufilalo, yena imhepo ihile;
ukalo wakwe hauwa kufilalo; hahowa chaka munhu wowose yadahile kumoha kahi, hata kwa minyolo;
kosoko hakohigwa kengi na kengi kwa mhingu ne minyolo na kuidumula aiya iminyolo, na kusitulatula asiya simhingu; kahi hahowa chaka munhu wowose yadahile kumusuma.
Na majuwa gose, chilo ne misi hakowaga kufilalo na kumatunda, yakutula chowe na kitema tema na mawe.
Yakamone Yesu kwa hatali; yabilima na kumufugamila.
Yakujoja kwa dijwi dya muchanya, yekugamba, “Nina choni nagweye, Yesu, Mwana we Mulungu! Yowile kuchanhya? Nikutasa kwedisina dye Mulungu unghanidumangise!”
Kosoko hakadigamba digini diya, “Agwe go digini dihile mulawe imunhu yuno!”
Hakadyusa, “Disina dyako nani? Hodibidula Disina dyangu nene Legioni kosoko cha itewa!”
Hadimugongelesa yanghagegale kutali ne iisi iya.
Baho hetunda hahowa itewa dya nguluwe sikudima;
Kamei amagini gose hagamugongelesa, gakugamba, “Chigale kusinguluwe uleke chisingile isene.”
Naye hoyogengha luneka amagini gehile hogelawa, na kwingila musinguluwe siya. Ditewa dyose dyadulika chimwandemwande kwigenge, na kwingila mubahali, hasuwa figulu fili nhafi; hosikunywa munghabu.
Awadimi wew singuluwe hawatija, na kuwatamilisa simbuli so mukaya na kunje ye ikaya. Awanhu hawalawa uleke wone imbuli igoloseke.
Hawamulutila Yesu; hawamona yuya yowile na magini, kekala, kafala suke, kena misungu yakwe; naye noyowile na diya ditewa howokogoha.
Na waya awonile hawawatamila simbuli sagoloseke kwe munhu yuya wa magini, na simbuli se singuluwe.
Kamei wejawakonga kumutasa Yesu yaleuke muisi yawo.
Naye foyendeyokwingila muchiya, ayuya yowile na magini hakamutasa fina yowe hamwedu naye.
Ninga Yesu nghamufumile. Yamugamba, “Luta ukaya kuwambwiyasako, ukawahubili wa ukwenu kawatamile simbuli singhulu iMundewa soyakugolosele na ifene foyakonele ubasi.”
Hakaluta, na kukonga kuhubili mu isi ya Dekapoli simbuli singhulu isene Yesu soyamugolosele, wanhu wose hawakisina.
Yesu yakafuluse kuloka kuya umwambu muchiya, hawamwijila itewa ikulu, naye hakowa munghingi ye bahali.
Hakeja munhu yumonga mu wakulu wa disinagogi, disina dyakwe Yayilo; yakamone, yamufugamila.
Hakamugongelesa lugano, yakugamba, “I mwanangu we chike imudodo mutamu lugano kahabehi na kufa. Nikukutasa wije umwikile umukono wako muchanhya yakwe, uleke yahone, na yowe mumi.”
Yaluta hamwedu naye. Itewa ikulu dyeja dyamwandamila wakumufinhafinha.
Kamei mwanamuke yumonga yena utamu wa kulawa sakame kwa minyaka ikumi na mili,
hakaluta kuwaganga wengi lugano, na kupata magayo mengi. Hakamala imali yakwe yose, ninga kusamutasile hata hadodogi, inyuwa yakwe hoigendelele kwiha kusuma foyowile kunghonga.
Yakahulike simbuli sa Yesu, yagenda muchiligati che ditewa kwa kunyuma, na kukwafa isuke yakwe;
kosoko hakagamba, “Ninghasikwafa sisuke sakwe du, nikuhona.”
Chimwande inhyoko ye sakame yakwe yanyala; naye hakamanya mumutufi wakwe fina kahona utamu wakwe.
Kamei Yesu yakamanye fina udaha umulawa umwakwe, chimwande yabiduke mu ditewa, hoyogamba, “Nani yanikwafile?”
Awefusa wakwe hawamugamba, “Togola nghukona amatewa fowakukukanhamisa ulwandi lwose; nagwe ukugamba Nani yanikwafile?”
Yalanga ulwandi lwose uleke yamone iyagolose didyo.
Na yuya imwanamuke yengilwa na chogoho na kuchichima, yakamanye chigoloseke umwakwe, yeja na kumugwila na yakumutamila yose.
Yamugamba, “Mundele dihuwi dyako dikuhonya. Ugende mheho, uwe mumi, unghowe na utamu wako kahi.”
Ugele foyalongage, haweja wanhu kulawa kwa yuya imukulu wa disinagogi, wakugamba, “Imwanago we chike kafulusa kubanika. Nhani ugendelele kumwidasa imwalimu?”
Ninga Yesu yakahulike imbuli iyo ikulongigwa, yamugamba imukulu wa disinagogi, “Unghogohe, huwila du.”
Hakawalemesa awanhu wanghamwandamile, ninga Petulo, na Yakobo, na Yohana imunduguse wa Yakobo.
Fowengile kugati kwa yuya imukulu wa disinagogi, yona wanhu wengi wakulila, na kuhongesa lugano,
yakafuluse kwingila yagamba, “Nhani mukujoja na kulila? Imundele yuno nghafile, ninga kagona du!”
Hawamuseka lugano. Yakawalafe kunje wose, hakamulonda iBabakwe ne ing'ina wa yuya imundele, na waya awowile hamwedu na kwingila kugati koyowile imundele yuya.
Hakamukola umukono imundele yuya, na kumugamba, “Talita kumi,” no ng'amba, “Mundele nikukugamba Inuka!”
Chimwande imundele yuya yemanyima na kugenda, (kosoko hakowa mukulu wa minyaka ikumi na mili.) Chimwande weja wajuma ijumo ikulu.
Yawalemesa lugano, wanghatamile munhu imbuli iyo. Yawalonga, wamwinghe chakudiya.
Yaleuka uko na kuluta kuiisi ya ukwawo, awefusa wakwe wejawamwandamila.

Ikowe sabato, yakonga kufusa mwisinagogi. Matewa wakahulike wejawakisina, hawagamba, “Ayuno kapata hoki agano? Na misungu yaki ino yoyenghigwe yuno? Kahi yakugolosa amajumo gano goyakugolosa kwe mikono yakwe?
Ayuno si yuya muselemala imwana wa Maliamu na, mundugu sawo wa cha Yakobo, na Yose, na Yuda na Simoni na walumbuse wasibaha ahetu?” Hawamulema.
Yesu yagamba, “Imugonesi yakwinghigwa chogoho chila hanhu ninga kuisi yakwe ka imwecho na kuwanhu wo lukolo lwakwe na inyumba iyakwe.”
Nghagolose ijumo dyodyose uko, ninga hakeka imikono yakwe muwatamu wakefu, hakawahonya.
Hakajuma kosoko yo kuleka kuhuwila kwawo.
Yesu yasunguluta mufikaya fiya na kufusa.
Yawenanga awaya ikumi na weli, na kukonga kuwatuma weli weli, na kuwengha udaha muchanhya ya magini gehile.
Yawalemesa wanghalonde chinhu chochose cha munjila, ninga mhandodu; kefana mikate, mufuko wa nghingo, mapesa ga mumifuko.
Ninga wafale filwatu, kahi wanghalonde nghasu ya sigafu ninga mhando du.
Hakawagamba, “Kunyumba yomukwingila mwikale baho mpaka fomukuleuka.
Na hanhu hohose wanghaleka kumuhokelani ama kuwategelesa hona mukuleuka uko, mukung'unhe dinghundi dyuwile mumigulu yenu, yuwe chitangilo chokumulemani.”
Hawalawa kuhubili fina awanhu walambe.
Hawalafa magini mengi, na kuwabaka mafuta wanhu wengi na kuwahonya.

Mundewa Helode yakahulike simbuli so, kosoko disina dya Yesu hadimanyika kosekose, awamonga hawagamba, “Yohana Mubatisaji kenuligwa mu wanhu wafile; nochanghone uludole lwakwe lukiyonesa mumilimo yakwe.”
Wamonga weja wagamba, “Ayuno Eliya.” Na wamonga hawagamba, “Ayuno ni mugonesi fina yumwedu wa wagonesi wa katali.”
Ninga Helode yakahulike, yagamba, “Yohana, wonadumule ditwi, kenuka.”
Kosoko Helode imwecho yatuma wanhu, hawamukola Yohana, na kumoha mwigelesa, kosoko ya Helodia, imuke wa Filipo imunduguse, kosoko hakamutola.
Kosoko Yohana hakamulonga Helode fina, “Si fiswanu agweye kuwa ne muke we mukuluwo.”
Ihelodiya hakowa na finju na Yohana, na hakahananga kumukoma. Ninga nghapatile luneka,
kosoko Helode yendeyomwogoha Yohana; hakamanya fina ni munhu we chawelu na musunhile, na hakamwika hanhu haswanu. Foyamuhuwile hakakisina lugano, kahi hakenda kumuhulikisa kwa chinyemi.
Ichigele hachifika, ugele Helode yakagolose sikukuu ya dijuwa dyo kwelekigwa kwakwe, yawagolosela madiya, wakulu wa wasilikali ne filongosi, na wanhu awena undewa wa Galilaya.
Noho imwanagwe we chike wa Helodia, yengila na kufina, yamwendesa Helode na wose wowile naye hachakudiya chiya. iMundewa yamugamba imundele yuya, “Nitase chochose cho ukuhananga ani nikukwingha.”
Yamwilahila, “Chochose choukutasa nikukwingha, hata ulwandi lyo undewa wangu!”
Kamei hakaluta na kumusa ing'ina, “Nitase choni?” Naye yamugamba, “Ditwi dya Yohana Mubatisaji.”
Kamei yengila chimwandemwande kumwande ye Mundewa, hoyotasa, yakugamba, “Nikuhananga uninghe hambiya hano ditwi dya Yohana Mubatisaji mwisahani.”
iMundewa yona usungu lugano, ninga kosoko ye nyilaha yakwe na kosoko ya waya awowile hechakudiya, yasumwa kulema.
Chimwande yamutuma musilikali iyowile mu samu na kumugamba yegale ditwi dya Yohana. Kamei yaluta na kumudumula ditwi amuya mwigelesa;
Yegala ditwi dyakwe mwisahani na kumwingha imundele yuya, naye imundele hakamwingha ing'ina.
Awefusa wakwe wakahulike imbuli iyo haweja na kulonda umutufi wakwe na kumusika.
Awefusa hawoya kwa Yesu; na kumutamila agaya gose gowagolose, na kufusa.
Kamei hakawagamba, “Mwije anyeye mwikale hanhu haposike mukabwihile hadodo.” Kosoko hahowa na wanhu wengi, wakwija na kuleuka, awene howoswela luneka lwa kudiya.
Hawaluta awene muhala muchiya ahanhu howile chaka wanhu.
Awanhu hawawona wakuluta, na wengi hawamanya hawaluta uko kwa lumangho kulawa sikaya sose na kuwalongolela.
Yakahumuluke muchiya, hoyokona itewa ikulu, akawonela ubasi, kosoko hawowa kifana ngholo sichaka mudimi. Kamei hakakonga kuwafusa mbuli itewa.
Chikaloke chipisi chitali cha nemisi, awefusa wakwe hawamulutila wakugamba, “Ahanhu hano nyika muhala, dijuwa nadyo duswa;
uwelage awanhu wano, uleke walute kufikaya fya munghanda wakakigulile chakudiya.”
Ninga hakawagamba, “Wengheni nyeye chakudiya.” Wamugamba, “Togola chilute chikagule mikate ya dinali magana meli uleke chiwenghe chakudiya?”
Yawagamba, “Mwinayo mikate mingahi?”
Luteni mukalange.
Wakafuluse kumanya weja wagamba,
“Mishano na somba mbili.”
Yawatuma wawagambe awanhu wekale wose, fitewa tewa, mumbago injolo.
Howokwikala kwa misitali ahano igana, ahano makumi mashano.

Foyailondile aiya imikate mishano na siya sisomba si mbili, yenula meso kuchanya kulanga, na kuilugutisa na kuibendula imikate iya na kuwengha awefusa wakwe wawagawile wanhu na siya sisomba si mbili hawawagawila wose.
Awanhu wose hawadiya na kwiguta.
Hawalonda ifibendu fye mikate na sisomba sasigale na kumemesa fisege ikumi na fili.
Wadiile imikate yiyo hawowa wagosi figulu fishano.
Chimwande yawalonga awefusa wakwe wengile muchiya, wamulongelele kuluta Betisaida, umwambu we bahali, ugele imwene foyakilagage ditewa dya wanhu.
Yakamale kilaga na wanhu, hakakwila kwitunda kutasa.
Ikafike hegulo ichiya hachuwa muchiligati ye bahali, imwene hakowa yemwene kuiisi, kunje ye bahali.
Hokawona awefusa wakwe wakugaya na kuyusigwa muchiya chawo kosoko imheho yendeitowa kwa ludole kulawa kowakuluta. Habehi na kucha, yawejila yakugenda mubahali, na kuhananga kuwaloka,
Nawo wakamone yakugenda mumeji ge bahali; hawamanya nhagela ni isoki, hawatula chowe;
kosoko wose hawamona hawogoha. Chimwande yalonga nawo, “Sangalaleni noniye, munghogohe.”
Yengila muchiya chiya; imheho yanyamala na kisina; howokisina lugano mufidoga fyawo,
kosoko wasatangile simbuli se mikate iya, ninga fidoga fyawo hafyuwa fikugutu.
Wakafuluse kuloka, hawafika iisi ya Genesaleti, kamei hawemisa ichiya chawo baho.
Wakafuluse kulawa mu chiya, chimwande wanhu hawamutanga.
Hawabilima lumangho musikaya sose sihabehi na kukonga kuwegala awatamu mumasasi kuluta chila hanhu howahulike fina kauko.
Chila koyalutile yengila kufikaya na kusikaya ama kumigunda, haweka watamu mumagulilo, wakumutasa fina wakwafe hata dihepu du dye suke yakwe; na wose wamukwafile howahona.
Kamei Amafalisayo na wamonga wa watulumi kulawa Yelusalemu, fowejile ukwakwe.
Hawona awamonga wa wefusa wakwe wakudiya ne mikono ichuchile.
(Kosoko Amafalisayo na Wayahudi wose wanghaleka kunawa imikono ichiganja chose wasikudiya; wakolelesa amahokelo ga wasehe wawo;
Kahi wanghalawa kwigulilo, wanghaleka kusunha imigulu wasikudiya na gauko mengi gowakolile, fina kusunha ifikombe, na madumu, ne fiya fya shaba.)
Awaya Mafalisayo na Watulumi howomusa Yesu, “Nhani awefusa wako wasikwandamila amahokelo gawasehe ninga wakudiya ne mikono ichuchile?”
Kamei hakawagamba, “Mugonesi Isaya hakalonga fiswanu muchanya yenu! Anyeye mwine chimwefe! Fina foitulumwe:
‘Awanhu wano wakunitunya
kwa milomo yawo,
Amba fidoga fyawo fya kutali
na niye.
Nawo wakufuga chaka,
na kufusa amafuso ga malagiso
ga wanhu!’
Anye mukuleka amalagiso ge Mulungu na kukola amahokelo ga wanhu.”
Hakawagamba, “Fiswanu!” mukulema amalagiso ge Mulungu uleke mukole amahokelo genu!
Kosoko iMusa hakagamba, “Uwahulike iBabako ne ng'inako, na iyakumuliga iBabakwe ama ing'ina kufa na yafe.
Ninga anyeye mukugamba imunhu yanghamugamba iBabakwe ama ing'ina Ni kolibani, (nong'amba nikwika chinhu changu cha kulafa kwa Mulungu, ichikwenda chimutase hechaka mbuli.)
Kahi musikutuma hanyuma ya gago kumugolosela mbuli iBabakwe au ing'inakwe.
Ako ni kubesa imbuli ya Mulungu kwa mahokelo genu gomukuhokela; kahi mukugolosa mbuli nyingi kifana siso.”
Hakawenanga amatewa kahi yekuwagamba, “Mhulikeni mose na kumanya.”
Kwechaka chinhu chuwile kunje ye munhu ichikudaha kumugolosa yowe na wihi. Ninga afiya ifikulawa mugati ye munhu, nofikumuguma uwihi.
Imunhu ghona kena nghutwi sa kuhulika yahulike.
Yakengile kugati kadileka ditewa kunje, awefusa wakwe weja wamusa muchanya ye imbasi iya.
Yawagamba, “Hata nyeye mwechaka misungu? Musikumanya fina chila chinhu chuwile kunje ye munhu chinghamwingila, chisikudaha kumwingha uwihi;
Kosoko chisikumwingila muchidoga, ninga, munda du, kamei chikulawa kucholo?” (Kwa kulonga nhaifo kafitenda fyakudiya fyose fuwe fiswanu.)
Yagamba, “Ichikumulawa imunhu nochikumuguma uwihi.
Kosoko mufidoga fya wanhu mukulawa magelegela gehile, dihabwa,
uhiji, kukoma, ugoni, kusulumila kwihile, migogolo, udasi, chimwefe, chigiso, maligo, usisi, ubwalasi
Agano gose gehile gakulawa kugati, nago gakumuguma imunhu uwihi.”
Yakaleuke uko, yaluta umwambu kuisi ya Tilo na Sidoni. Yengila nyumba imonga, yahananga yanghamanye munhu wowose, ninga isadahike kifisa.
Ninga, chimwande, mwanamuke, imwene imwanagwe we chike hakowa na igini dihile, yahulika simbuli sakwe, yeja na kumugwila hamigulu yakwe.
Naye imwanamuke yuya hakowa Muyunani, dikabila dyakwe Musilofoinike. Yamutasa, yailafe imhepo mwe mwanagwe we chike.
Yamugamba, “Waleke awana wende kwiguta, kosoko siyo fiswanu kuchilonda ichakudiya cha wana na kugakubitila mabwa.”
Ninga yabidule, yakugamba, “Heye, Mundewa, Ninga hata amabwa gowile hasi ye imesa, gakudiya fowakulagasa awana.”
Hakemugamba, “Kosoko ye imbuli iyo, Luta, imhepo imulawa imwanago we chike.”
Yaluta ukaya ukwakwe, na kumufika ayuya imundele katambalala mwisasi; na digini diya difulusa kumuleuka.
Yaleuka mumihaka ya Tilo, yagenda mugatigati ya Sidoni, na kupulutila mpaka kubahali ya Galilaya, kupulutila Dekapoli.
Hawamwigalila munhu nghakuhulika chihuli, kahi nghakulonga, hawamugongelesa yamwikile mikono.
Hakamusegesa kunghanda ne ditewa yemwene, na kuguma ifidole fyakwe musinghutwi sakwe na kuguma mate, na kumukwafa mwilimi,
ghakalanga kuchanhya, na kugula, na kugamba, “Efata, nong'amba Kumuka!”
Chimwande singhutwi sakwe hasigubuka, ichifundo cha dilimi dyakwe, hachilegela na kulonga fiswanu.
Hakawalemesa wanghamutamile munhu; ninga foyagendelele kuwasigilila, nofowagendele kubwambwasa simbuli.
Howakisina lugano kusuma fowasowele, wakugamba, “Kagolosa finhu fyose fiswanu! Wasikuhulika kawagolosa wahulike, ne fimumu walonge.”
Mumajuwa gago, itewa dya wanhu wengi fowakitanganyile. Na hawowa wechaka chakudiya, yawenanga awefusa wakwe, yakuwagamba,
“Nikuwonela ubasi amatewa kosoko wekala hamwedu na niye, gafika majuwa madatu, na wechaka chinhu cha kudiya.
Ninghawelaga walute kusikwawo, wafungile, wakusilika munjila, na wamonga walawa kutali.”
Awefusa wakwe wamusa, wakugamba, “Togola kwina munhu yakudaha kuwegusa mikate awanhu ahano hanyika?”
Kawosa, “Mwina mikate mingahi?” Hawagamba, “Mufungate.”
Yawalonga wanhu wekale hasi, na kulonda imikate iya mufungate, yamulumba Mulungu, na kwibendula, na kuwengha awefusa wakwe wawagawile wanhu ditewa.
Hawowa na fisomba fikefu hakafilungutisa na kuwagamba wawagawile afyo nafyo.
Weja wadiya na kwiguta na kudondola ifibedu fye mikate fisigale, fisege mufungate fimemile.
Awanhu awadiyile wakufika figulu fine. Hakawelaga.
Chimwande hakakwila muchiya, hamwedu na wefusa wakwe, na kuluta ulwandi lwa Dalumanusa.
Howalawanisa Mafalisayo, na hawakonga kuwa na lukani naye, wakuhananga kulawa ukwakwe ijumo dikulawa kulanga, wakumugesa.
Hakona usungu muchidoga chakwe, “Nhani icheleko chino chikuhananga ijumo? Chawelu nikumutamilani! Chisikwinghigwa chitangilo icheleko chino!”
Hakawaleka, na kwingila kahi muchiya, hakaluta mpaka umwambu;
Hawasimilwa kulonda mikate, kahi muchiya hawowa chaka ninga mukate umwedu du.
Hakawajama, yakugamba, “Muwe meso ne inungo ya Mafalisayo na ya Helode.”
Hawowa na lukani wene kwa wene yagamba Chichaka mikate.
Yesu hakamanya, hoyowagamba, “Nhani mwina lukani kosoko mwechaka mukate? Musinati mumanye, kahi musikutanga? Togoleni! Fidoga fyenu fisito?
Mwina meso musikona. Mwina nghutwi musikuhulika; kahi musikugelegela.
Fonabendule haya imikate mishano na kuwengha awaya wanhu figulu fishano hamulonda fisege fingahi fimemile ifibendu?” Wamugamba, “Ikumi na fili.”
Na iya mufungate na kuwengha wanhu figulu fine, Hamulonda fisege fingahi fimemile fibesu? Howomugamba, “Mufungate.”
Yawagamba, “Musinati mumanye, mukali?”
Hawafika Betisaida, wamwigalila munhu nghakona, wamutasa yamukwafe.
Hakamukola mukono, hakamusegesa kunje ye chikaya na kumutwila mate kumeso, yamwikila mikono yakwe, yamusa, “Ukona chinhu?”
Hakalanga kuchanhya hoyogamba, “Nikona wanhu kifana mabiki gakugenda.”
Hakeka kahi mikono yakwe mumeso gakwe, na kulanga lugano; na kuwa mumi, hakona ifinhu fyose fiswanu.
Yesu hakamugamba yalute ukaya ukwakwe, na kumugamba, “Unghengile kahe mufijiji fya munjila.”
Yesu hakaleuke na wefusa wakwe, na kuluta ku fikaya fya Kaisalia, Filipi, munjila yawosa awefusa wakwe, yakugamba, “Awanhu wakunigamba niye nene nani?”
Hawamubidula wakugamba, “Yohana Mubatisaji, wamonga Eliya, wamonga, yumwedu wa wagonesi.”
Yawosa: “Anyeye mukugamba niye nene nani?” Petulo hakamubidula, yekumugamba, “Agweye no Kilisito.”
Hakawalemesa wanghamutamile munhu wowose simbuli sakwe.
Hakakonga kuwafusa fina: Imwagila iMwana we munhu yapate magayo mengi, na kulemigwa na wasehe, na wakulu wa watambiki, na watulumi. Na kukomigwa, na fogakuloka majuwa madatu yakwinuka muchilalo.
Yendeyolonga imbuli iyo bila chifiso. iPetulo hakamulonda na kukonga kumugombela.
Hakabiduka, yakuwalanga awefusa wakwe na kumugombela Petulo, yakugamba, “Luta kunyuma yangu Luhoma, Kosoko nghukudoga simbuli se Mulungu ninga sa wanhu!”
Hakawenanga ditewa hamwedu na wefusa wakwe, hakawagamba, “I munhu wowose iyekuhananga kunyandamila yakileme imwecho na yalonde umusalaba wakwe, yanyandamile.”
Kosoko imunhu iyakuhananga kuhonya ichidoga chakwe, yakuchagilisa, imunhu yakwagilisa chidoga chakwe kosoko yangu na kosoko ya imbuli iswanu, ayo yakuchihonya.
Kosoko ikwenda imutase nhani imunhu yanghapata ichilunga chose na kwagilisa ichidoga chakwe?
Kahe imunhu yalafe choni ahanhu hokulafa ichidoga chakwe.

Kosoko chila munhu yakunyonela chinyala, aniye na simbuli sangu mucheleko chino ichisikumuhuwila Mulungu na wihi, iMwana we Munhu yakwija yomonela chinyala imunhu yuyo nghona yakiyokwija mu ditunyo dye Babakwe, hamwedu na malaika wasunhile.
Hakawagamba, “Chawelu, nikuwatamilani, mu wanhu wemile hano hena wanhu awene wasikwenda wafe ugele wanghali kuwona undewa we Mulungu ukwija kwa ludole.”
Gakaloke majuwa mutandatu, Yesu hakawalonda Petulo, na Yakobo, na Yohana, yawegala kuditunda ditali wemwene, hakahiluka ifuta yakwe, kumwande yao,
sisuke sakwe hasikonga kwakaika, njelu swe, kwechaka munhu mu iisi yakudaha kusigolosa suwe njelu nheifo.
Kamei hawalawanisila Eliya, hamwedu na Musa, awene wawo wakusimulila na Yesu.
Petulo hakabidula, yakumugamba: “Mukulu, ni fiswamu aseye chuwe hano. Chijenge fibanda fidatu, chimwedu chako gweye, chimwedu cha Musa, na chimwedu cha Eliya.”
Kosoko, nghamanyile choyakulonga, kosoko hawengiligwa na itisi ikulu.
Hadilawanisa ifunde, hadiwagubika, dijwi hadilawa umuya mwifunde, “Ayuno no Mwanangu mwendigwa, mumuhulike imwene.”
Ugele uwo wakalange kuno na kuno wasonile munhu hamwedu nawo; ninga Yesu du yemwene.
Ugele fowadulikage kulawa kwitunda, hakawalemesa wanghamutamile munhu wowose gowonile, mpaka iMwana we Munhu ugele woyakuwa kafulusa kwinuka kulawa kuwanhu wafile.
Hawaikola imbuli iya, wakiyusa awecho kwa wecho, “Akuno kukwinuka kulawa kuwafile no choni?”
Hawamusa wakugamba, “Awatulumi wakugamba fina iwagila Eliya yakonge kwija?”

Hakawabidula, yawagamba, “Chawelu, Eliya yakulongola kwija, na kugolosa usha finhu fyose, ninga, hamwedu na gago, foyatulumigwe nhani Mwana we Munhu fina yakwende yadumangisigwe madumangiso mengi na kubesigwa?
Ninga nikumutamilani, fina Eliya kafulusa kwija, nawo wamugolosela gose gowendile fina foitulumigwe.”
Ugele fowejile kuwefusa wamonga hawona itewa ikulu diwasunguluta na watulumi wena lukani nawo.
Chimwande ditewa dyose wakamone hawakisina, hawamubilimila, kumulamusa.
Hakawosa, “Mwina lukani lwa choni nawano?”
Imunhu yumonga kulawa muditewa hakabidula, “Mwalimu nimwigala imwanangu ukwako, kena igini kahi chimumu.”
Chila ugele foikumwijila ikumukinya hasi, yakulawa ifulo kumulomo na kugwegwejula meno kahi yakugagamala. Nilonga na wefusa wako wadilafe digini, waduga.
Hakabidula yakuwagamba, “Anyeye cheleko chichaka dihuwi! Nikale nanyeye mpaka milaki? Nimulondeni fomuwile mpaka milaki? Mwigaleni ukwangu!”
Hawamwigala imujelelo ukwakwe. Kamei digini dikamone hadimuguma chisilisi na kugwa mpaka hasi, hakasambalagata na kulawa ifulo kumulomo.
Yesu hakamusa iBabakwe, “Kakongigwa milaki?” Hakagamba, “Kulawa udodo.”
Ugele mwingi dimuguma mumoto na mumeji uleke dimukome, ninga unghadaha mbuli yoyose, uchonele ubasi na uchitase!
Yesu yamugamba, “Unghadaha! Gose gakudahika ukwakwe yena dihuwi.”
Chimwande iBabakwe we mujelelo yuya yenula dijwi, yakugamba, “Nikuhuwila, nitase kusumigwa kuhuwila kwangu!”
Yesu yakone ditewa dikubilima dikwija, hakadigombela digini diya dihile, yakugamba, “Agwe go digini, chimumu na chihuli,” nikukugamba, “Mulawe yuno, kahi unghamuwile!”
Hakalapa, hadimuguma chisilisi lugano na kulawa. Naye hakowa kifana kafa, hata wengi hawagamba, “Kofa!”
Ninga Yesu hakamukola mukono na kumwinula, naye hakemanyima.
Yakengile munyumba, awefusa wakwe hawamusa wemwene, “Nhani seye chisadahile kuilafa?”
Hoyawagamba, “Digini difanile dino disikulawa kwa njila yoyose iya, ninga kwa mawombi du.”
Hawaleuka uko hawalokela mugatigati ya Galilaya. Nghahanange munhu wowose yamanye,
kosoko yendeyowafusa awefusa wakwe: Yakuwagamba, “Mwana we Munhu yakuluta kugumigwa mumikono ya wanhu. Nawo wakumukoma, yanghafulusa kukomigwa, ganghaloka majuwa madatu yakwinuka muchilalo.”
Ninga wasaimanyile imbuli iyo, hawogoha kumusa.
Hawaje Kapelinaumu, yakowe munyumba hakawosa, “Mwende mutowa lukani lwaki munjila?”
hawanyamala, kosoko munjila wendewotowa lukani awecho kwa wecho, imukulusi no nani.
Hoyokwikala hasi, na kuwenanga awaya ikumi na weli na kuwagamba, “I munhu yakuhananga kulongola yakuwa wa kunyuma kusuma wose, mutogomi wa wose.”
Hakalonda chana chidodogi, na kuchika muchiligati chawo. Hakachidinghula, na kukawagamba,
“I munhu yanghachihokela chana chimwedu fina chino kwi sina dyangu, kanihokela niye; na imunhu yanghanihokela niye, yakumuhokela, si niye du, ninga ayuya imwene yanitumile.”
Yohana kamubidula, yakugamba, “Mwalimu, chimona munhu yakulafa simhepo kwa disina dyako, hachimulemesa kosoko nghakiyandamila naseye.”
Yesu hakagamba, “Munghamulemese. Kosoko kwachaka munhu yakudaha kugolosa ijumo kwa disina dyangu kahi ugele uwo na kunilonga mbuli sihile.
Kosoko inghowile chinyume chetu ka ulwandi ulwetu.
Kosoko wowose iyakumwinghani ichikombe cha meji, kosoko nyeye mwina disina dya Kilisito, chawelu; nikumutamilani, nghakuswela digelo dyakwe.”
“Ne munhu yakwenda yamugolose yumwedu wa wadodogi wano awanihuwile yagolose wihi, kagiligwa yohigwe ulwala musingo yakwe na kukubitigwa mubahali.
Na umukono wako unghakugolosa ugolose wihi, udumule! Ibeka kwingila kuumi kwina mukono umwedu, kusuma kuwa na mikono yose mili na kuluta Jehanumu.
Namo umo sinhende sakwe sisikufa ninga umoto wakwe uusikusima
Na umugulu wako unghakugolosa ugolose wihi, udumule! Ibeka kwingila kuumi na kwina mugulu umwedu, kusuma kuwa na migulu mili na kutagigwa kwi jehanumu.
Namo sinhende sakwe sisikufa kahiumoto usikusima
Na digiso dyako dinghakutenda ugolose wihi, ding'ole uditage! Ibeka kwingila kuundewa wa Mulungu kwina igiso dimwedu, kusuma kuwa na meso meli na kutagigwa kwi jehanumu.
Amo umo Sinhende sakwe sisikufa, kahiumoto wakwe usikusima.
Kosoko chila munhu kokwikigwa digoya kwa munyu na kusunhigwa kwa moto.
“Umunyu muswanu; ninga umunyu unghasusuka, si munyu kahi wogumigwa choni ukolele? Muwe munyu mugati yenu, mukekale kwa digoya muwecho kwa wecho.”
Yesu yaleuka uko yaluta ulwandi lwa Uyahudi, yaloka ulwandi lwa Yolodani. Ditewa dya wanhu dyawandamila, kahi fina foyasowela yakonga kuwafusa.
Amafalisayo weja wamulutila, wakumusa, “Togola! Ni fiswanu imunhu kumuleka imuke? Wakumugesa.”
Naye yawabidula yekugamba, “I Musa hakawalagisa choni?”
Hawagamba fina, “Musa hakafumisa fina munhu yawandike kalatasi ya malekeni kumuleka.”
Yesu yawagamba, “Kosoko ya ukugutu we fidoga fyenu hakamwinghani dilagiso dino.
Ninga kulawa kukumba iisi Mulungu hakagolosa mugosi na mwanamuke.
‘Kosoko iyo imunhu yakumuleka iBabakwe ne ing'ina wakiyandamila ne imuke.
Nawo aweli wakuwa mutufi umwedu. Wagaluka si weli kahi, ninga mutufi umwedu.’
Choyahasile Mulungu, imunhu yanghachitemanule.”
Wakowe ukaya kahi awefusa wakwe hawomusa muchanhya ye simbuli siso.
Hakawagamba, “Chila munhu yakumuleka imuke na kutola mwanamuke yungi, basi yakugolosa ugoni na yuya.
Na imwanamuke yanghamuleka imulume na kutoligwa na mugosi yungi, yakugolosa ugoni naye.”
Kamei, hawamwigalila awana wadodogi uleke yawakwafe, awefusa wakwe hawawagombela.
Yesu yakone nheifo hakona nyono lugano, hakawagamba, “Walekeni awana wadodogi weje ukwangu, munghawalemese, kosoko awana fina wano undewa wa Mulungu ni wao.
Chawelu, nikumutamilani, imunhu inghakuhokela undewa wa Mulungu kifana mwana mudodogi, nghakuwingila ng'o.”
Hakawadinghula, na kwika mikono yakwe muchanhya yawo na kuwalugutisa.
Ugele foyalawage kuluta kunjila, munhu yumonga hakamwijila lumangho, na kumufugamila, yakumusa, “Mwalimu muswamu nigolose nhani uleke niuhokele uwumi wa majuwa gose?”
Yesu hakamugamba, “Nhani ukuninanga muswamu?” Kwachaka imunhu muswanu ninga yumwedu du ni Mulungu.
Kugamanya amalagiso: “Unghakome; unghagolose dihabwa; unghahije; unghamusigile munhu udasi, Wogohe iBabako ne ng'inako.”
Hoyomugamba, “Mwalimu! Aga gose nigakola kulawa udodo wangu.”
iYesu yamukumhulila meso, hakamwenda na, kumugamba, “Kuhungukiligwa na mbuli imwedu. Luta ukambase fyose fyowinafyo, uwenghe awakiwa imali yako, nagwe ukuwa na ugoli kulanga; kamei wije unyandamile.”
Ninga imwene hakakunyanghala ichihanga chakwe kosoko ye imbuli yo, hakaleuka kwa usungu kosoko hakowa na sawo nyingi.
Yesu hoyalanga kose kose, hakawagamba awefusa wakwe, “Foikuwa nghugutu ku wanhu wagoli kukwingila kuundewa we Mulungu!”
Awefusa hawakisina kosoko ya simbuli siso isakwe. Yesu hakawabidula kahi, yakugamba: “Mowana, fikugutu lugano kwingila ku undewa wa Mulungu!
Fihufu inhembo kwingila muchihengele che singano, kusuma imugoli kwingila mu undewa we Mulungu.”
Nawo hawakisina lugano, wakumugamba, “No nani yekudaha kuhona?”
Yesu yawakumhulila meso, yagamba, “Ku wanhu isikudahika, ninga kwa Mulungu si nhaifo; kosoko gose gakudahika kwa Mulungu.”
Petulo yakonga kumugamba, “Langa, aseye chileka fyose chikwandamila gweye.”

Yesu hakagamba, “Chawelu nikumutamilani Hechaka munhu yalekile nyumba, ama wanduguse wagosi, ama walumbu sakwe, ama ng'ina, ama Babakwe, ama wanagwe, ama migunda, kosoko yangu na kosoko ya imbuli swanu.
Inghakwinghigwa mikono igana muchigele chino cha hambiya; nyumba, na wandugu wagosi, na wechike, wang'ina munhu, na wana, na migunda hamwedu ne migogolo. Na muchilunga chikwija uwumi wa majuwa gose.
Ninga wengi wakunghonga wakuwa wakunyuma, na wakunyuma wakuwa wa wakunghonga.”

Nawo hawowa munjila wakukwila kuluta Yelusalemu, na Yesu, hakowa yawalongolele, hawakisina, awaya fowamwandamilage hawogoha. Hakawalonda kahi awaya ikumi na weli hakakonga kuwatamila agakwenda gamupate.
Hakagamba, “Langeni chikuluta Yelusalemu, iMwana we munhu yakwenda yagumigwe mumikono ya wakulu wa watambiki na watulumi, nawo wakulamula fina yakomigwe, wakumuguma mu mikono ya wamemb,
nawo, wakwenda wamuhowe na kumutwila mate, kumutowa na mikotya, na kumukoma; ganghaloka majuwa madatu yekwinuka muchilalo.”
Yakobo na Yohana, awana wa Sebedayo, hawamulutila, wakugamba, “Mwalimu! Chikuhananga uchigolosele dyo dyose dyochikukutasa.”
Yawagamba, “Mukuhananga niwagoloseleni choni?”
