Hawamugamba, “Uchinghe seye kwikala, yumonga kumukono wako wo kulume na yumonga kumukono wako wokumoso muditunyo dyako.”
Yesu hakawagamba, “Musimanyile chomukutasa. Mukudaha kunywila ichikombe chonikunywila niye? Kahe kubatisigwa ubatiso wonikubatisigwa niye?”
Hawamugamba, “Chikudaha.” Yesu hakawagamba, “Ichikombe chonikunywila niye mukuchunywila, na ubatiso wonikubatisigwa niye mobatiswa.
Ninga imbuli yo kwikala ku mukono wangu wo kulume ama wo kumoso, si dyangu kuwenghani, ninga wakwenda wenghigwe awafulusa kwikiligwa.”
Awaya ikumi wakahulike hawakonga kuwasuhila Yakobo na Yohana.
Yesu hakawenanga, na kuwagamba, “Mumanya fina awaya awakutaligwa kuwa wakulu wa Mataifa, wakutawala kwa ludole, na wakulu wawo wakuwatumagisa.
Ninga isikuwa nhaifo ukwenu;
ninga imunhu yakuhananga yowe mukulu kwenu, yakuwa munhu mutogomi wenu.
Kosoko iMwana we munhu naye nghejile kutogomeligwa; ninga kutogoma na kulafa uumi wakwe udahe kuhonya wengi.”
Wakafike Yeliko, yakowe yekuleuka kulawa Yeliko, hamwedu na wefusa wakwe, ditewa ikulu dya wanhu, imwana wa Timayo, Batolomayo, ayuya imutasaji imudula, hakekala hanghanda ye injila.
Naye yakahulike fina no Yesu Munasaleti, Hakakonga kutula chowe na kugamba, “Mwana wa Daudi, Yesu, Nyonele ubasi!”
Wengi hawamugombela uleke yanyamale. Ninga hakongesa kwinula dijwi, “Mwana wa Daudi nyonele ubasi!”
Yesu hakema, yokugamba, “Mwinangeni.” Hawamwinanga ayuya imudula, wakumugamba, “Kiinghe moyo! Inuka, yakukwinanga.”
Hakakubita dikasu dyakwe, na kujumha, na kumulutila Yesu.
Yesu yamubidula, yamugamba, “Ukuhananga nikugolosele choni?” Ayuya imudula yamugamba, “Mwalimu wangu! Nikuhananga nidahe kona.”
Yesu hakamugamba, “Luta, dihuwi dyako dikuhonya.” Chimwande hakona; hakamwandamila Yesu munjila.
Ichigele fowasegele habehi na Yelusalemu, Betifage na Betania, habehi ne ditunda dya Miseituni, baho hawatuma weli wa wefusa wakwe
hoyawagamba: “Luteni kuchikaya chiya chuwile kumwande yenu. Fomukwingila umo mofika mwana we dipunda, dyohigwe, idyene disinati dikwiligwe na munhu. Didoholeni munigalile.
Ne munhu yanghamusani Nhani mukutenda nheifo, gambeni, iMundewa yakudihananga yakwenda yadyuwise lulubaha.”
Kamei howoluta, na kudyona dipunda diya didodogi, dyohigwa hamulango, kunje, hawadidohola,
awanhu awemile uko weja wawagamba, “Mukugolosa choni kudidohola dipunda didodogi?”
Hawawatamila fina Yesu foyawasigilile, nawo howowengha.
Hawamwigalila Yesu dipunda diya didodogi, na kutandika sisuke sawo muchanhya yakwe.
Wanhu itewa hawatandalike sisuke sawo munjila, na wamonga amatambi gowabenile mumigunda.
Na awanhu awalongole na waya awandamile kunyuma howokwinula amajwi, “Hosana! Noyamotesigwe iyakwija kudisina dye Mundewa!
Umotesigwa na undewa ukwija we Baba yetu Daudi! Hosana kuchanhya kulanga!”
Naye hakengila Yelusalemu mpaka kugati ya dihekalu, yakafuluse kulanga kose kose. Kosoko hayuwa ugele wa hegulo, hakalawa, hakaluta Betania hamwedu nawaya ikumi na weli.
Dijuwa dyandamile fowalawile Betania, hakowa na njala.
Hakona kwa hatali musada wina manyagala, hoyoluta kosoko, nhegela kokona chinhu muchanhya yakwe. Yakafike bahaya nghonile chinhu ila manyagala; kosoko usowile ugele wo kwifa kwa masada.
Hakaugamba nhafi, “Kulawa diyelo na majuwa gose imunhu yanghadiye imudyo ukwako.” Awefusa wakwe hawahulika.

Hawafika Yelusalemu, naye foyengile kwihekalu, yakonga kuwawinga awaya awenda wokwambasa na wenda wogula kwihekalu kugati. Hakasibidula si mesa sawaya awende wobadili mapesa, na magoda gawo wambasage si njiwa,
ninga nghalekile munhu yalonde chinhu mwihekalu.
Hakawafusa, hakagamba: “Togoleni! Isitulumigwe, fina, ‘Inyumba yangu yokwinangigwa nyumba ya kutasila ku mataifa gose.’ Ninga anyeye muyigolosa kifana ipango dya wahiji!”
Awakulu wa watambiki na watulumi hawahulika, hawahananga njila ya kumukoma kosoko hawamogoha. Kosoko amatewa gose hawajuma ku mafuso gakwe.
Ikafike hegulo hakaleuka mukaya.
Nhosikusiku wakowe wakuloka howowona umusada uya unyala kulawa kwisina.
iPetulo hakagelegela, hakamugamba, “Labi, langa, dibiki dowaligitise dinyala nya.”
Yesu hakabidula, “Muhuwileni Mulungu.”
Chawelu nikumutamilani, wowose yakugamba ditunda dino Ng'oka ukakubitigwe kubahali yaleke kuwa na manhonge muchidoga chakwe ninga yahuwile gago goyalongile gogoloseka, gakuwa gakwe.
Kosoko iyo nikumutamilani: Gogose gomukutasa huwileni fina mukugahokela.
Nanye chila fomukwima na kufuga, lekeleleni hona mwina mbuli yoyose na munhu, uleke iBaba yenu yowile kulanga yawalekelele nanyeye kubana kwenu.
Ninga nghonaga nyeye musikulekelela, iBaba yenu yowile kulanga nghakumulekelelani na nyeye kubana kwenu.
Kahi haweja Yelusalemu. Kamei foyagendage mwihekalu, howomulutila awakulu wa watambiki na watulumi, na wasehe,
wakumugamba, “Kwa udaha waki ukugolosa gano? No nani yakwinghile udaha uwo ugolose gano?”
Yesu hakawagamba, “Nikumusani mbuli imwedu, munibidule, kamei nikwenda niwatamileni kwa udaha waki nikugolosa gano.
Ubatiso wa Yohana haulawa kulanga ama kuwanhu? Nhamileni.”
Howokonga kuwanga awecho kwa wecho wakugamba fina chinghagamba, “Haulawa kulanga,” yakwenda yachigambe, “Nhani musamuhuwile?”
Chinghagamba, “Haulawa kuwanhu,” (Hawogoha wanhu, kosoko awanhu wose hawona iYohana fina mugonesi we chawelu.)
Hawamubidula Yesu, wakugamba, “Chisimanyile.” Yesu hakawagamba, “Aniye nani sikuwatamilani nyeye ni kwa udaha waki nikugolosa gano.”

Hakakonga kulonga nawo kwa mbasi, “Munhu yumonga yahanda mugunda wakwe wa misabibu, hakasungulusila ikigo, na kukata ikolongo dya kukamila, hakajenga ilingo, hoyokwika wemilisi, hoyoluta ku iisi ya kutali.
Ugele wakwe ukafike hakatuma imutumwa wakwe kuwaya wakwimilisa umugunda wakwe, yamwigalile si sabibu.
Hawamulonda, hawamutowa, hawamutaga kunje, mikono muhala.
Hakatuma kahi ukwawo mutumwa yungi, ayu naye hawamubulaga na kumuguma malonda mwitwi na kumugolosela wihi.
Hakatuma yungi, ayo hawamukoma; na wamonga wengi hawawatowa, na wamonga kumukoma.
Hakowa na yumwedu yasigale, imwanagwe mwendigwa wakwe, ayuno naye hakamutuma ukwawo kundumiliso yakugamba, ‘Wakwenda wamogohe imwanangu,’
Ninga awaya awakwimilisa umugunda, hawakitamila wakugamba, ‘Ayuno no muhasi. Handikoni chimukome, na uhasi ukuwa wetu!’
Hawamukola na kumukoma, na kumutaga kunje yo mugunda we misabibu.
“Kamei yatende nhani ayuya iMundewa, imwenyemugunda we misabibu? Yakwija na kuwakoma awemilisi waya, na umugunda uya we misabibu yakwende yeke wemilisi wengi.
Diwandiko dino musinati mudisome?
‘Isumbi yalemigwe na wajengaji
iyo igalukagaluka no sumbi inghulu ya hagati.
Imbuli ino ilawa kwe Mundewa;
Nadyo ni ijumo mumeso getu!’”
Nawo hawahananga kumukola ninga hawogoha amatewa, kosoko hawamanya fina imbasi iya kawalonga awene. Hawamuleka na kuleuka.
Howotuma ukwakwe wamonga wa Mafalisayo na Mahelode, uleke wa mutegele kwa simbuli sakwe.

Baho fowamufikile, hawamugamba, “Mwalimu, chimanya fina agweye kwa munhu wa chawelu, kahi nghukogoha ukulu wa munhu, kosoko nghukulanga sifuta sa wanhu, ninga muchawelu ukuifusa injila ye Mulungu. Togola ni fiswanu kuliha kodi kwa Kaisali ama si nheifo?
Chimwinghe, chinghamwinghe?” Naye yakamanye ichimwefe chawo, hakawagamba, “Nhani mukunigesa? Nigalileni ifesa niilange.”
Hawegala. Kamei hakawagamba, “Isanamu ino lubonoto lunolwani?” Hawamugamba, “Lwa Kaisali,”
Yesu hakabidula yekugamba, “Mwingheni Kaisali aga Kaisali, na ge Mulungu mwingheni Mulungu.” Hawamwisina lugano.
Kamei amasadukayo, wanhu wakugamba fina kwachaka kwinuka awafile, hawamulutila, na kumusa wekugamba,
“Mwalimu, Musa hakachiwandikila, ‘Fina imunduguse we munhu yangafa yanghamuleka imuke kachaka mwana, imunduguse yamulonde imwanamuke yuya uleke yamwelekele imunduguse wana.’
Heja howa na wanhu mufungate we ndugu; imukulu hakatole mwanamuke, na kufa, ngheleke naye.
Iwakeli naye hakamulonda, hoyokufa, naye nghalekile mwana. Na wakadatu naye nheifia,
hata wose mufungate, wasalekile wana. Kundumo, ayuya imwanamuke naye hoyokufa.
Mukwinuka wafile kokuwa muke wa yehoki? Kosoko wose mufungate hawamutola.”
Yesu hakabidula, yekugamba, “Togoleni musikwagilila kosoko musimanyile amawandiko kahi udaha we Mulungu?
Kosoko awanhu ma wakwinuka kulawa kuwafile, wasikutola kahiwasikutoligwa, ninga wakuwa fina malaika wowile kulanga.
Na fina awafile wakwinuligwa: ‘Musisomile muchitabu cha Musa, sula ye chibiki?’ Fina iMulungu foyamutamile yakugamba, ‘Aniye na Mulungu wa Ibulahimu, na Mulungu wa Isaka, na Mulungu wa Yakobo.’
Si Mulungu wa wafile, ninga wa womi, kwa nheifo mukwagilila lugano.”
Yumonga wa watulumi hakeja na kuwahulika wakulonga naye. Hakona fina kawabidula fiswamu, hakamusa: “Mumalagiso gose dilagiso dihoki no dikumwande ya gose?”
Yesu hakamubidula yekumugamba, “Dye nghonga nodi ‘Hulika gweye Isilaeli! iMundewa Mulungu wetu ni Mundewa yumwedu.
Nagwe umwende iMundewa Mulungu wako, no umoyo wako wose, ne chidoga chako chose, ne misungu yako yose, no ludole lwako lwose.’
Na dyakeli no dino: ‘Umwende imiyago fina foukiyenda gomwecho.’ Hechaka ilagiso dingi dikulu kusuma gano.”
Ayuya imutulumi yamugamba “Chawelu, Mwalimu! Kulonga fiswanu fina iMulungu ni yumwedu, ninga kwachaka yungi, ninga imwene du.
Na kumwenda imwene kwa moyo wose, na umanyi wose, na kwa ludole lose; na kumwenda imiyago fina fyo ukiyenda gomwecho. Imbuli nghulu kusuma kumulafila iMulungu nhambiko yokusomigwa na kwingha kose.”
Naye Yesu yakone fina kabidula kwa misungu, yamugamba “Agweye ghwihatali na undewa wa Mulungu.” Kulawa baho hachaka munhu wowose yagesile kumusa mbuli kahi.
Ugele Yesu foyafusage mwihekalu, hakawagamba, “Awatulumi wakugamba Kilisito ni Mwana wa Daudi?
iDaudi imwecho kwa udaha wa Muhe wa Musunhile hakagamba: ‘Mundewa yamugamba iMundewa wangu: Ikala umukono wangu wo kulume, mpaka niweke awanghondo wako, wowe hasi ye migulu yako.’”
Daudi imwecho yakugamba, “Mundewa aho kagaluka mwanagwe nhani?” Na ditewa dyose wende womutegelesa kwa chinyemi.
Mumafuso gakwe hakawagamba, “Muwe meso na watulumi, awakwenda kugenda wafalile makasu matali na kulamusigwa mumagulilo,
na kwikala kumwande mumasinagogi, na magoda ga kumwande mufyakudiya fye si sikukuu.
Wakudiya kusinyumba sa wegane, na kwa chimwefe wakuwomba mawombi matali. Awano wakwija wapata iliganiso dikulu dijuwa dye ndumo.”
Naye yekale kulanga disanduku dyowakuguma fowakumulafila Mulungu, kalanga amatewa fowaguma amapesa musanduku. Wagoli wengi hawaguma mengi;
yeja mwanamuke yumwedu mwigane, mukiwa, yalafa sendi mbili, kifana nusu ya dipesa.
Yawenanga awefusa wakwe, yawagamba, “Chawelu nikumutamilani, Ayuno imwanamuke, imwigane imukiwa kaguma nyingi kusuma wose wakuguma musanduku.
Kosoko awo wose waguma sigafu; ninga yuno mu ukiwa wakwe, kaguma fyose foyenafyo ne chakudiya chakwe chose nacho.”
Ugele foyalawage mwihekalu, yumwedu wa wefusa wakwe, hakamugamba, “Mwalimu Langa, uswanu wa amawe na majengo gano!”
Yesu hoyobidula, yamugamba, “Ukugona amajengo gano amakulu? Disikwenda disigale iwe muchanhya ya diwe idyene disikwenda dije dimoligwe.”
Yakekale mwitunda dya miseituni, kumwande ye dihekalu, Petulo na Yakobo na Yohana na Andelea hawamusa wemwene.
Chitamile simbuli sino sikuwa milaki, nacho ichitangilo ni choni cha ugele wa ago gose kumemelesigwa?
Yesu yakonga kuwatamila, “Mulangisise imunhu yanghawadanhilise.”
Matewa gokwija mwisina dyangu, wakugamba, “Ani no niye!” nawo wakwenda wawadanhilise wengi
Nanye munghahulika simbuli sa inghondo, na minong'ono ye inghondo, munghogohe, ago gakwenda galawanise. Ninga indumo yecho ikali.
Kosoko ditaifa dikulewa nghondo na undewa ukulawa nghondo. Kukuwa na dimasingisa dye iyisi ako nako, kukuwa na njala. Ago no nghonga ya usungu fina wo kweleka chali.
Nanye mukilangisise muwenyecho. Kosoko wakwenda wamwigaleni kumabalasa. Na kumasinagogi mukutowigwa; nanye mukwende mwigaligwe ku majumbe na wandewa kosoko yangu, kuwa uhomelesi ukwawo.
Na imbuli swanu, ikwenda ihubiliigwe ku mataifa gose.
Na fowakuwalonda nyeye na kuwasongesa, munghadoge go mukwenda mulonge; ninga dyo dyose dyomukwinghigwa ugele uwo, dilongeni. Kosoko si nyeye mukulonga; ninga ni Muhe Musunhile.
Kahi indugu yakumusongesa imunduguse uleke yakomigwe na Baba yakumusongesa imwanagwe. Kahi awana wakuwenukila awaweleke na kuwakoma.
Nanye mukwenda musuligwe na wanhu wose kosoko ya disina dyangu. Ninga iyakugendelela mpaka kundumo, ayo noyakuhona.
“Munghona ludeso lwima ahanhu ahene lusikuhanangigwa lwima (iyakusoma yamanye).” Noho awowile, “Uyahudi watijile kumatunda.
Na imunhu yowile mukano yanghahumuluke, kahi yanghengile kulonda chinhu munyumba yakwe.
Naye yowile kumugunda yanghoye ukaya kulonda suke yakwe.
Usungu wawo awasokesi, na waya awakonghesa amajuwa gago!
Mutase unghowe ugele we inyota!
Kosoko amajuwa gago gakuwa na mugogolo, uwo usinati uwe kulawa inghonga ya kumba, foyombile iMulungu mpaka hambiya. Ninga isikuwa nheifo kahi.
Mhali iMundewa nghagadumukise amajuwa gago; hasowile hakuhona munhu wowose, ninga kosoko ya wasaguligwe woyawasagule. Kagadumukisa amajuwa go.”
Na ugele uwo imunhu yanghawagamba, “Langa, Kilisito!” kowa akuno ama akuya munghahuwile.
Kosoko wakwenda wenukile Makilisito ga udasi, na wagonesi wa udasi, wakonesa fitangilo na majumo, uleke wawadanhilise, kulonga chelu hata na wasaguligwe.
Ninga anyeye mukilangisise, nifulusa kuwatamila, ugele fisinati filawanise.
“Ninga amajuwa gago, unghaloka umugogolo uwo, dijuwa dikutukuwala, umwesi nao usikumulika,
sinyelesi sa kulanga solagala, na uludole lwa kuchanhya losingisika.”
Baho noho wakiyawomona iMwana we Munhu yakwija mumafunde kwa ludole mwingi na ditunyo.
Noho yakayotuma malaika na kuwakonghola awasagulwa wakwe kulawa si sandi sose ine, kulawa ulwandi lwa kundumo lwe yisi mpaka ulwandi lwe ndumo yo ulanga.
“Mukifuse difuso dyo musada. Amanhambi gakwe fogakuwa majolo jolo na kukonga kutuguta, mukutanga fina ugele wo kuhanda wahabehi;
Nanye nheifiya fomukona simbuli so sikukonga, manyeni fina kahabehi mumilango.
Chawelu, nikuwatamileni, Icheleko chino chisikuloka mpaka ago gamemelesigwe.
Ulanga na iisi fikuloka, ninga simbuli sangu sisikuloka ng'o.”
“Ninga imbuli ya ugele uya, ne chipisi chiya, hachaka yamanyile, hata malaika awowile kulanga, kahii Mwana; ninga Baba.
Mulangisise, Muwe meso, kosoko musimanyile ugele wuya wokuwa milaki.
Imbasi yakwe ni kifana imunhu yekuluta nhambo, kaileka inyumba yakwe, kawalekela awatumwa wakwe malagiso, na chila munhu no umulimo wakwe, naye kamulagisa imwimilisi wa hamulango yowe meso.
Muwe meso, kosoko, musimanyile imwenye nyumba yakwija ugele waki, yokuwa hegulo ama muchilo mugati, ama ugele wo kwika dijogolo, ama nhosikusiku.
Yangheje yolawanisa chimwande na kumufikani mugonile.
Na dyonikumutamilani nyeye, nikuwatamila wose: Muwe meso!”
Gakaloke majuwa meli hadyuwa ijuwa ikulu dye Pasaka, na dijuwa dikulu dye mikate isilungigwe. Awakulu wa watambiki na watulumi hawahananga njila ya kumukola kwa chifiso na kumukoma.
Kosoko hawagamba, “Inghowe ugele we sikukuu, ingheje ikuwa nghondo mu wanhu.”

Yakowe Betania munyumba ya Simoni mukoma, yakudiya chakudiya, hoyokwija mwanamuke yena chichupa cha mafuta ge mhungile gakwinangigwa nalido ge iliho ikulu. Hakachitula na kumwitilila Yesu mwitwi dyakwe.
Hahowa na wanhu awene wasuhile mufidoga fyawo wakugamba, “Nhani kwagilisa mafuta ge diliho nhaifino?
Kosoko mafuta ge diliho dino hagowa gakudaha kuguligwa kwa dinali magana madatu ama na musapu, na kugawiligwa awakiwa!” Hawamusuhila lugano imwanamuke yuya.
Yesu hakagamba, “Mulekeni! Nhani mukumwidasa? Kanigolosela chinhu chiswanu.
Kosoko majuwa gose mwenawo wakiwa hamwedu nanye, na chila fomukwenda mukudaha kuwagolosela maswanu. Ninga niye si hamwedu nanye majuwa gose.
Kagolosa foyadahile; kalongola kuubaka umutufi wangu malihamu kosoko ya kusikigwa kwangu.
Chawelu, nikumutamilani, chila koikuhubiliigwa imbuli swanu, muchilunga chose na dino doyagolose yuno dyotambuligwa kwa kumugelegela.”
Yuda Isikalioti, yumwedu wa waya ikumi na weli, yaluta kuwakulu wa watambiki, uleke yamusongese ukwawo.
Nawo wakahulike hawasekelela lugano, na kulagana naye wamwinghe mapesa. Hakahananga luneka lwa kumusongesa.
Dijuwa dye nghonga dye mikate isilungigwe, wakachinje ingholo ye iPasaka, awefusa wakwe wamugamba, “No hoki koukuhananga chikugolosele udiile iPasaka?”
Hawatuma weli mu wefusa wakwe, yakuwagamba, “Luteni ukaya, mokitang'anyila na mugosi yakitwikile ibiga dya meji. Mwandamileni
na hohose hoyakwingila, mumugambe imukaya: Mwalimu yakugamba, ‘Chuwa hoki ichibuha changu ichawageni, nidiye iPasaka umo hamwedu na wefusa wangu?’
Naye imwecho yakwenda yamoneseni chibuha chikulu che golofa, chifulusa kuhambigwa, muchitengele umo.”
Awefusa hawaleuka, hawaluta ukaya, hawona kifana fowasigililigwe; na kutenga chakudiya che sikukuu ye Pasaka.
Ikafike hegulo, iYesu hakeja hamwedu na waya ikumi na weli.
Wakekale hachakudiya wakudiya, Yesu hakagamba, “Chawelu, nikumutamilani yumwedu wenu iyakudiya hamwedu na niye yakunisongesa.”
Hawakonga kona usungu, na kulonga yumwe yumwe. Togola no niye?
Kawagamba, “Ni yumwedu wa anyeye ikumi na weli, iyakusanhisa hamwedu na niye mwibakuli.
Kosoko iMwana wa munhu yakuluta fina foyawandikiligwe; ninga usungu wakwe imunhu yuya iyakumusongesa iMwana wa munhu! Hayuwa ikuwa ibeka kwi munhu yuyo nhanga nghelekwe!”
Ugele fowadiyage, yalonda umukate, na kuulugutisa na kuumogola, kawengha, yakugamba, “Londeni mudiye, auno no mutufi wangu.”
Yalonda ichikombe, yakamale kulumba; hakawengha; na wose hawonywila.
Hakawagamba, “Aino no sakame yangu ya dilagano, iikwitika kosoko ya wengi.
Chawelu, nikumutamilani nyeye, Sikunywa kahi cheleko cho musabibu, mpaka dijuwa diya donikanikunywa umusha mu undewa wa Mulungu.”
Nawo wakamale kwimba, howolawa kuluta kuditunda dya Miseituni.
Yesu yawagamba, “Anye mose monileka ichilo cha diyelo,” Kosoko nofyo iwandikwe, “Nikumutowa imudimi, na singholo sikiyagala.
Ninga ninghafulusa kwinuka kulawa muchilalo, nikuwalongolela kuluta Galilaya.”
Petulo hakamugamba, “Hata wose wakuleke aniye sikukuleka!”
Yesu yamugamba, “Chawelu nikukutamila gweye, ichilo cha diyelo, ugele dijogolo disinati dike keli, ukuwa unikanile kadatu.”
Naye yagendelela kulonga, “Hata inghowa kufa hamwedu nagwe, sikwenda nikukane ng'o!” Wose hawalonga nheifo.
Kamei haweja kumululu iikwinangigwa Getisemane na kuwagamba awefusa wakwe, “Kaleni hano ugele fonikuwomba.”
Hoyamulonda Petulo, na Yohana, na Yakobo hamwedu naye. Yakonga kona usungu muchidoga chakwe na kugaya,
hoyowagamba, “Ichidoga changu china usungu mwingi habehi na kufa. Ikaleni hano mwikale meso.”
Yakalute kumwande chidodogi, hokogwa funama, yakuwomba, fina inghadahika ichipisi chicho chimuleukile.
Hakagamba, “Tate, go Babangu! Gose gakudahika ukwako. Unileusile ichikombe chino, si fina fonikwenda niye, ninga, foukwenda agweye.”
Yakwija yakuwafika wagona sinhongo, yamugamba Petulo, “Togola Simoni kugona? Kulemeligwa kwikala meso hata disaa dimwedu?”
Ikaleni meso muwombe, munghengile mumagesa. Chidoga chikudaha amba umutufi wachaka ludole.
Hakaluta kahi, kuwomba, yakulonga imbuli iya.
Hakeja kahi hakawafika wagona; kosoko ameso gawo hagowa masito. Kahi wasamanyile dya kumubidula.
Hakeja kahi lwakadatu, hakawagamba, “Mwikali timbula nhongo du na kubwihila? Ifuluka ugele nouuno! Langeni, iMwana we Munhu yakugumigwa mu mikono yawo awena uwihi.
Inukeni, chigendeni, langeni ayuya yakunisongesa kasegelela.”
Baho ugele yakulonga, Yuda hakeja, yumwedu wa waya ikumi na weli hamwedu naye itewa. Wena mapanga na mapulo, walawa ku wakulu wa watambiki, na watulumi, na wasehe.
Ayuya musongesi kawengha chitangilo: Yakugamba, “Wonikamunonela, no mwene. Mukoleni mumulonde kwa kumwimilisa.”
Kamei yakeje, chimwande hoyomulutila, hoyagamba, “Mukulu!” hoyomunonela.
Hawagolola imikono yawo na kumukola.
Yumwedu wawo yowile baho, hakakwega dipanga dyakwe hakamunghenya mutumwa wa mutambiki mukulu na kumudumula inghutwi.
Yesu hakabidula yekuwagamba, “Nhafo! Mwija mukola muhiji na mapanga na mapulo kunilonda niye?
Chila ijuwa hanuwa hamwedu na nyeye mwihekalu nikufusa, musanikolile. Ninga adino dilawanisa uleke amatulumo gamemelesigwe.”
Baho hawamuleka, na kutija wose.
Na mwanike yumonga hakamwandamila, kegubika suke ya bafuta. Hawamukola,
hakaleka aiya isuke yakwe ye bafuta hakatija mwasi.
Hawamulonda Yesu, hawamwigala kwa mutambiki mukulu, hawamumemelela wose, awakulu wa watambiki na wasehe na watulumi.
Petulo yamwandamila kwa kutali, mpaka kugati ku dikumbo dye mutambiki mukulu. Yekala hamwedu na wemilisi, yakotela moto.
Baho awakulu wa watambiki na dibalasa dyose hawahananga uhomelesi muchanhya ya Yesu uleke wamukome, ninga hawaswela.
Kosoko wengi hawahomelesa udasi, ninga hawaswela uhomelesi wawo usaligane.
Kamei wamonga hawema na kumuhomelela udasi wakugamba:
Aseye hachimuhulika yakugamba, “Aniye nikudimola dihekalu dino dijengigwe kwa mikono, na fogakuloka majuwa madatu nikujenga dingi idisikugolosigwa kwa mikono.
Hata nheifo, uhomelesi wawo usaliganile.”
Kamei imutambiki Mukulu hakema muchiligati, yokumusa Yesu yakugamba, “Nghukubidula mbuli? Awano wakukuhomelesa choni?”
Ninga hakanyamala kahe nghamubidule mbuli. Imutambiki Mukulu yamusa kahi, yekumugamba, “Agweye no Kilisito, Imwana we Yamotesigwe?”
Yesu yagamba, “Heye, noniye! Nanye mukamumona iMwana we Munhu, yekale ku mukono wo kulume wo ludole, yakwija mumafunde gakulanga!”
iMutambiki mukulu yadega si suke sakwe, yakugamba, “China soko yaki yakuhananga wahomelesi?
Muhulika ulubeso lwakwe. Mukona nhani nyeye?” Wose hawalamula fina iwagila yakomigwe:
Wamonga, hawakonga kumutwila mate, hawamugubika ichihanga, na kumutowa, na kumugamba, “Haya tanga!” Hata awasilikali nawo hwamuhokela kwa kumutowa makofi.
Petulo hakowa kwikumbo; hakamwijila mutogomi we chike we mutambiki mukulu.
Hakamona Petulo yakotela moto, hakamukumhulila meso yakumugamba, “Agwe nagwe hakuwa hamwedu na yuya iYesu Munasaleti.”
Hokakana na kugamba, “Simanyile kahi sikuhulika so ukulonga gweye, hoyolawa kunje mpaka kwilango.” Dijogolo hodikwika Yakana. Dijogolo hodikwika.
Na yuya imutumishi we chike hoyomona kahi, hoyokonga kuwatamila awemile bahaya, “Ayuno yumwedu wawo!”
Hoyokana kahi. Chipisi chidodogi kahi awaya awemile bahaya howomugamba Petulo, “Chawelu agweye kwa yumwedu wawo, kosoko kwa Mugalilaya gweye.”
Hoyokonga kuligitisa na kilaha, “Simumanyile imunhu yuno yo mukumulonga!”
Chimwande dijogolo dyeka keli. Petulo hoyogelegela aiya imbuli iyalongigwe na Yesu, “Ugele dijogolo disinati dike lwakeli ukuwa unikanile kadatu.” Na yakakonge kudoga hoyolila.
Chimwande nhosikusiku awakulu wa watambiki hawekala hebalasa hamwedu na wasehe wa watulumi na dibalasa dyose, hawamoha Yesu, hawamulonda, hawamwigala kwa Pilato.
Pilato yamusa, “Agweye no gwegwe go, Mundewa wa Wayahudi?” Yabidula yakumugamba, “Agwe kuilonga.”
Awakulu wa watambiki wende womuhomelela mbuli nyingi.
Pilato kamusa kahi yakugamba, “Nghukubidula? Langa ni mbuli nyingahi sowakukuhomelesa.”
Ninga Yesu nghabidule mbuli kahi, Pilato hakakisina!
Ugele we sikukuu yakowadoholela mufungwa yumwedu, wowakumutasa.
Hahowa na munhu yakwinangigwa Balaba, kohigwa hamwedu na wanhu awagolose finju na kukoma mufinju iyo.
Amatewa howokwija hawakonga kutasa yawatendele fina foyasowele,
Pilato yawabidula, yakugamba, “Togoleni mukuhanaga niwadoholeleni iMundewa wa Wayahudi?”
Kosoko hakamanya fina awakulu wa watambiki hawamulafa kwa chimwefe.
Ninga awakulu wa watambiki howowasonghesa amatewa fina ibeka yawadoholele Balaba.
Pilato yawabidula kahi yakuwagamba, “Nimutende nhani ayuno yo mukumugamba Mundewa wa Wayahudi?”
Hawatula chowe kahi wakugamba, “Mudumangise!”
Pilato yawagamba, “Kwina wihi waki woyagolose?” Weja wagendelele kutula chowe, “Musambase!”
Pilato yakende kuwendesa matewa, hakewadoholela Balaba; yakafuluse kumujola ne mikotya hakemulafa Yesu yadumangiswe.
Awasilikali hawamulonda hawamwigala kwi kumbo dikwinangwa Plaitolia.
Hawamufasa isuke idunghundunghu, hawaluka nghofia ya miwa, hawamufasa mwitwi dyakwe.
Hawakonga kumulamusa: “Baho hako Go Mundewa wa Wayahudi!”
Hawamutowa ne chigwami mwitwi, hawamutwila mate, hawafugama, wakumufunamila.
Wakamale kumuseyigila, hawamuhambula dikasu diya didunghudunghu, hawamufasa sisuke sakwe imwecho. Hawamulafa kunje uleke wamudumangise.
Kamei hawamudindilisa imunhu yalokage kulawa kumugunda, Simoni Mukilene, Baba yawo cha Isikanda na Lufo, uleke yaudinghule musalaba wakwe.
Hawamwigala ahanhu hakwinangigwa Goligota, nong'amba, Ahanhu he diguha dye ditwi.
Hawamwingha difai ihanganisigwe manemane, ninga ghayunywile.
Hawamutungika, na kugawa si suke sakwe, hawatowa kula chila munhu yapate choni.
Hayuwa chipisi cha saa ya kadatu, hawamutungika mumusalaba.
Hahowa na anuwani muchanhya yakwe, “MUNDEWA WA WAYAHUDI.”
Hamwedu naye hawatungikigwa wahiji weli, yumonga kumukono wakwe wokulume, na yumonga kumukono wakwe wokumoso.
Uleke diwandiko dimemelekele idikugamba, “Yasambaswa hamwedu na wehi.”
Wagendage munjila howomuliga, hawafumila kwa kusingisasingisa amatwi gawo wakugamba, “Ahaa! Agweye ukudaha kudimola dihekalu na kudijenga kwa majuwa madatu!
Kihonye gomwecho, uhumuluke mumusalaba!”
Awakulu wa Watambiki nawo hawamuseyigila awecho kwa wecho, hamwedu na watulumi wakugamba, “Hakahonya wamonga,” nghakudaha kihonya imwecho!
Kilisito iMundewa wa Isilaeli na hayahulumuka hambiya mumusalaba uleke chone, chimuhuwile! Awaya nawo awatungikigwe hamwedu naye howomuliga.
Ikowe saa ya mutandatu hokukuwa chisa, iisi yose mpaka saa ya dikenda,
Ikafike saa ya dikenda, Yesu yekwinula dijwi dyakwe kwa ludole, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” No kugamba, “Mulungu wangu Mulungu wangu nhani unilekile?”
Awamonga awemile baho awahulika na kugamba, “Langa, yakumwinanga Eliya!”
Yumonga hayabilima lumangho, na kutubwisa didodoki na kudifabika musiki. Hakamwingha yonywe, yakugamba, “Lekeni! Chilange nghonaga Eliya kokwija kumuhulumusa!”
Naye Yesu yalafa ijwi ikulu, kamei na kufa.
Dipasiya dya hekalu dyadegeka fibemhe fili, kulawa kuchanya mpaka hasi.
Yuya iyakida, iyemile baho yakumulanga, yakone kafa kwanjila iyo. Hoyagamba, “Chawelu ayuno hakowa Mwana wa Mulungu!”
Hahowa na wanawake wakulanga kwa hatali. Mugati yawo hakowa Maliamu Magidalene, na Maliam ing'ina yawo cha Yakobo imudodo na Yose, na Salome.
Awo nowakiyandamile naye ako Galilaya, na kumutogomela. Na wamonga wengi awejile naye mpaka Yelusalemu.
Ikowe hegulo, kosoko ni Matandilo, nadyo ijuwa dikulongolela isabato.
Hakaluta Yusufu munhu wa Alimataya, munhu mukulu, munhu wa dibalasa dya mahonge. Imwene imwecho yakugojela undewa we Mulungu, yagolosa chigosi, yekwingila kwa Pilato, na kumutasa umutufi wakwe Yesu.
Pilato yekisina lugano kosoko fina kafulusa kufa. Hakamwinanga iyakida yuya, na kumusa fina kufa kafulusa katali.
Yakafuluse kupata ichawelu kwi Akida yuya, na kumwingha Yusufu umutufi wa Yesu.
Naye hakagula sanda ya bafuta, hakamuhulumusa, na kumufasa isanda iya, yamwika muchilalo chisongoligwe mudiwe. Hakafingilisa diwe kumulango we chilalo.
Naye Maliamu Magidalene na Maliamu ng'inakwe wa Yose, hawalanga ahaya hoyekigwe.
Isabato ikaloke Maliamu Magidalene, na Maliamu ing'ina wa Yakobo, na Salome, hawagula mafuta gena mhungile swanu wakamubake.
Kwikali lwisalwisa, dijuwa dye inghonga dye dijuma, hawaluta kuchilalo ugele dijuwa fodyakongage kutonhomoka.
Hawakonga kulonga awecho kwa wecho, “Nani yakuchifingilisila diwe diya hamulango we chilalo?”
Wakalange na kona diwe diya difulusa kufingilisigwa; nadyo hadyuwa ikulu lugano.
Hawengila kuchilalo, na kona mwanike yekale ulwandi lo kulume kafala suke njelu, hawakisina.
Yawagamba, “Munghakisine! Mukumuhananga Yesu Munasaleti, iyatungikigwe. Kenuka muchilalo! Kahechaka hano, halangeni howamwikile.
Ninga luteni mukawatamile awefusa wakwe, na Petulo: Fina kawalongolela kuluta Galilaya, mukamona uko fina foyamutamileni.”
Hawalawa kunje, hawabilima kulawa hachilalo, kosoko wakutetema na kisina. Kahi wasamutamile munhu mbuli kosoko hawogoha.
Naye yakenuke nhosikusiku dijuwa dye inghonga dye kukonga dye dijuma, hoyokiyonesa kunghonga kwa Maliamu Magidalene, imwene wo yamulafa simhepo mufungate.
Aye hoyoluta hoyowatamila awaya awowile hamwedu naye. Nawo wakali hongesa na kulila;
Ninga awene fowahulike fina mumi, naye kawona, wasahuwile.
Kahi hakakiyonesa na weli wawo na kena futa ingi; nawo wende wagenda wakuluta kumugunda.
Awa nawo hawaluta hawawatamila awaya wamonga, awene nawo hawaleka kuhuwila.
Hanyuma, hakoneka na waya ikumi na yumwedu fowende wodiya. Hokawagombela kosoko ya kuswela dihuwi kwawo na ukugutu we fidoga fyawo, kosoko wasawahuwile awaya awamwonile foyenuke muchilalo.
Hakawagamba, “Luteni kuchilunga chose mukahubili imbuli swanu kwa chila munhu.
Iyakuhuwila na kubatisigwa yakuhona; inghakuhuwila yakulamuliligwa.
Fitangilo fino fikwende fikiyandamile na awaya awakuhuwila. Kwi sina dyangu wolafa si mhepo; wolonga kwa nonga nyisha;
wokola majoka, hata wanghadiya chinhu cha kukoma chisikuwabulaga ng'o; wokwika imikono yawo muwatamu, nawo wakuhona.”
Basi Mundewa Yesu yakamale kulonga nawo, hakenuligwa kulanga na kwikala umukono wo kulume we Mulungu
Nawo awaya hawalawa hawaluta kuhubili kosekose, iMundewa yakugolosa milimo hamwedu nawo na kumemelesa aiya imbuli kwa fitangilo ifyakiyandamile nayo. Hano.]
Kosoko wanhu wengi waguma mikono kwika hamwedu simbuli sigoloseke ukwetu,
fina fowachisimulila awaya wowile watogomi we imbuli kulawa kunghonga,
nyona fiswanu kwandika kusoko aniye nani nyandamila simbuli sose kwa habehi, sa ugele ulokile, kwandika hamwedu fina fosilawanise Mutunyigwa Teofilo;
udahe kumanya chawelu simbuli so utamiligwe.
Ugele wo undewa wa Helode, Mundewa wa Uyahudi heja howa na mutambiki yumwedu disina dyakwe Sakalia wo ugele wa Abiya, na imukagwe yowa Elisabeti wo ulukolo lwa Haluni.
Na wose foniweli hawowa wachawelu mumeso ge Mulungu, hawekala fiswanu, hawagendelela kuikola misigililo ye Mundewa bila kubana chochose.
Nawo weja wowa wechaka mwana, kosoko Elisabeti yowa mugumba hawowa wasehe lugano.
Hambiya foyatogomage mumulimo wo utambiki hamwande ye Mulungu, foyowile muugele wakwe,
kwa kwandamila sinhenda se chitambiki, ikula haimugwila imwene kwingila mwihekalu dye Mundewa kufunghisa ufumba.
Ugele wo kufunghisa amatewa gose ga wanhu hagowa kunje gekutasa.
Baho Sakalia hakalawiligwa na Malaika we Mundewa, Kema nyima ulwandi lo kulume lwa Hefugilo dyo kufunghisa.
Kamei Sakalia hakedasika na kogoha lugano foyamonile Malaika.
Ninga, “Malaika kamutamila Sakalia, ughogohe kusoko kutasa kwako kuhulikigwa na imukago Elisabeti kokweleka mwana we chigosi, nagwe komwinanga disina dyakwe Yohana.
Nagwe kokuwa na chinyemi na kubwedelela na matewa wonyemuka ugele wo kwelekwa kwakwe.
Kosoko kokuwa mukulu mumeso ge Mundewa, na imwene nghekunghwa difai kahigimbi mukali, naye komemeswa Muhe Musunhile kulawa munda mwe ng'ina.
Kawowisa matewa ga wana wa Isilaeli kwe Mundewa Mulungu wawo,

na komulongolela Mundewa, kolongosigwa ne Muhe na ludole lwa Eliya. Kubidula imimoyo ya waBabamunhu ku wana, kowagolosa awechaka chogoho wowe na madoga ga uchawelu, kuwatandila awanhu kusoko ye Mundewa.”
Sakalia kamusa Malaika yakugamba, “Nomanya nhani? Aniye namusehe ne mukangu mudaha lugano.”
Na Malaika kamugamba, “Aniye na Gabilieli, nikwima ahanhu he Mulungu, nhumigwa kulonga na gweye na kukwigalila mbuli swanu fina ino.
Langa nghudaha kulonga mpaka dijuwa diya gogekwija gelawanisa agano gonikutamile, kusoko nghusifumile simbuli sangu sikwija silawanisa mu ugele wakwe.”
Wanhu wenda wemugojela Sakalia na hawesina kusoko hakekalisa kwi hekalu.
Na foyalawile kunje nghadaha kulonga nawo, howemutanga fina kona majumo kugati ye dihekalu; kawengha chitangilo na kugendelela kuwa chimumu.
Foyafuluse amajuwa go mulimo wakwe, hakoya ukaya ukwakwe.
Kulawa ugele uwo imuke Elisabeti hakeyoha. Hakefisa kugati kwa chigele cha minyesi mishano, yakugamba,
“Nhafi no Mundewa foyanigolosele muchigele choyanyonile, kanilegusila chinyala changu mumeso ga wanhu.”
Mumwesi wa mutandatu kulawa kwiyoha kwa Elisabeti; Malaika Gabilieli hakatumigwa ne Mulungu mukaya ya Galilaya disina dyakwe Nasaleti.
Kwa bikila yatumisigwe na munhu disina dyakwe Yusufu, wa lukolo lwa Daudi, na disina dya bikila yuyo ni Maliamu.
Gabilieli kengila munyumba yakwe yakugamba, “Bahoni gowinghigwe dihewa, iMundewa kahamwedu nagwe.”
Maliamu foyahulike galongigwe na Malaika, hakedasika lugano, na hakesina na kiyusa umulamuso uno wa aina yaki?
Malaika kamugamba, “Unghogohe Maliamu, kusoko kwinghiwa Dihewa na Mulungu.
Nagwe kokiyoha na kweleka Mwana we chigosi, na disina dyakwe kokwinangigwa Yesu.
Kokuwa Mukulu na kokwinangigwa Mwana wa yowile Kuchanhyasi. iMundewa Mulungu komwingha idigoda dyo undewa we Babakwe Daudi.
Naye kodima awanhu wa Yakobo majuwa gose na undewa wakwe ukuwa wichaka ndumo.”
Maliamu kamubidula Malaika yakugamba, “Yokuwa nhani mbona simanyile mugosi?”
Malaika kamubidula kamugamba, “Muhe Musunhile kokwijila muchanhya yako na ludole wa yowile kuchanhyasi wokugubika kosoko yo imwana yekwelekigwa kokwinangigwa musunhile, Mwana we Mulungu.
Kahi langa imunduguso Elisabeti muudala wakwe Kakiyoha mwana wa chigosi, na auno mwesi wa mutandatu ukwakwe ayuya yowile mugumba.
Kosoko chila chinhu chikudahika kwe Mulungu.”
Maliamu kabidula yakugamba, “Langa niye na mutumwa we Mundewa, leka yuwe ukwangu fina foulongile.” Malaika kamuleka, kaluta.
Ichigele chicho Maliamu hoyekinuka hoyeluta kwa chimwande mpaka isi ya fitunda, mukaya ya Yuda.
Kengila kugati munyumba ya Sakalia na kumulamusa Elisabeti.
Na Elisabeti yakahulike umulamuso wa Maliamu, ichali hachijumha munda mwa Elisabeti kwa chinyemi. Na Elisabeti hoyememeswa Muye Musunhile.
Elisabeti hakalonga kwa dijwi ikulu yakugamba, “Agweye kupata mboto kusuma wanawake wose na cheleko chako chipata mboto!
Aniye na nani mpaka ingina we Mundewa yeje kunilamusa?
Kosoko dijwi dyo mulamuso wako fodyengile munghutwi sangu, ichali chidodogi hachijumha kwa chinyemi mugati ye sinda sangu.
Nagwe Ibeka gouhuwile, kosoko gakwenda gomemelesigwe gago galongigwe ne Mundewa.”
Maliamu kagamba,
“Umoyo wangu ukumutunya Mundewa.
Na muhe wangu wonela
kosoko ye Mulungu mwihula wangu.
Kosoko kamulanga kwa ubasi mutumwa wakwe muholo,
na langa kulawa hambiya awanhu wose woninanga mumoti.
Imulungu kanigolosela makulu
na disina dyakwe disunhile.
Usungu wakwe kwa wanhu wakumwogoha
kwa cheleko mpaka cheleko.
Konesa makulu kwa mukono wakwe;
kawachakula awowile weyoni mufidoga fyawo.
Kawakinya awakulu kulawa Muundewa wawo
na wakiwa kawenula,
Kawegutisa awene injala kwa maswanu,
na wagoli kawaleka chaka,
Kamutasa Isilaeli imutogomi wakwe,
kagelegela usungu wakwe,
Fina foyawatamila awakulu setu, hakalonga
Abulahamu na weleko wakwe majuwa gose.
Maliamu yekala chigele cha minyesi midatu,
kamei hoyekuya ukaya ukwakwe.”
Ichigele cho kidohola kwakwe Elisababeti chafika, yeleka mwana mugosi.
Awanhu wowile habehi naye na wanduguse fowahulike fina Mundewa kamonela ubasi, howonyemula hamwedu na Elisabeti.
Mwijuwa dya munana howikwija kumufina imwana, howehananga kumwingha disina dye Babakwe Sakalia.
Ing'inakwe kabidula kagamba, “Ng'oo! Sinheifo; ayuno kokwinangwa Yohana.”
Wamugamba, “Nhani hechaka wowose yakwinangwa disina dyo mulukolo lwako?”
Kamei hawamonesa chitangilo iBabakwe kumusa imwanagwe komwinanga nani?
Katasa chibao cha kwandika, hoyokwandika fina, “Disina dyakwe Yohana.” Wose howekisina.
No baho ni baho du mulomo wakwe hougubuligwa, hamwedu na dilimi dyakwe, hoyokonga kulonga na kumutunya Mulungu.
Weja wengilwa na itisi wose awekalage hamwedu nawo, na simbuli siya hosikwenela muchilunga chose che fitunda fya Yudea.
Na wose awahulike howegeka mufidoga fyawo wekugamba, “Imwana yuno kokuwa mwana wa nhani? kosoko umukono we Mundewa hawuwa naye.”
Na iBabakwe Sakalia hoyomemeswa Muhe Musunhile yekugamba,
“Yatunyigwe Mundewa Mulungu wa Isilaeli,
kusoko kawejila wanhu wakwe, na kuwahonya.
Kachingha ihembe dya uhonya
mwelekwa wa Daudi mutogomo wakwe.
Fina foyalonga kulawa kunghonga
kwa njila ya wagonesi wakwe wasunhile.
Uleke chihonyigwe kulawa ku wanghondo wetu.
Na kulawa mumikono ya awekuchisuhila.
Kuwonela ubasi awaBaba setu,
na kudigelegela dilagano dyakwe disunhile.
Inyilaha yoyamwilahila iBaba yetu Ibulahimu
Chihonyigwe kulawa mumukono wa wanghondo wetu,
chitogome chichaka kogoha.
Kwa usunhile ne chawelu
mumeso gakwe majuwa getu gose.
Nagwe gomwana kokwinangwa mugonesi wa iyowile kulanga.
Kusoko kulongola kumwande ye Mundewa
kumugolosela sinjila sakwe.
Kuwatamila awanhu wose fina wahonyigwa,
kwa kulekeligwa uwihi wawo.
Kwa njila ya ubasi we Mulungu wetu,
ujelu fina wo mugingu wochijila kulawa kulanga.
Awaya wakwikala muchisa,
awagubikigwe na dipeho dye difa,
kuchilongosa mu njila ye digoya.”
Kamei, imwana hakakula, hoyopata ludole lwe chimuhe, hoyokwikala kunyika mpaka dijuwa dyo kwiyonesa kwakwe ku Isilaeli.
Muchigele chicho dilagiso dyalawa kwa Kayisali Agosito ikugamba, “Awanhu wose muchilunga wandikwe masina gawo.”
Aino yowa nyandikwa ya bosi yalawanise ugele wo undewa wa Kilenio yowile Mundewa wa Silia.
Kosoko yo wanhu wose hawaluta kwandikigwa, chila munhu ukaya ukwawo.
Yusufu naye hakakwila kulawa Galilaya, Mukaya ya Nasaleti kaluta Yudea mukaya ya Daudi ikwinangigwa Betelehemu, kosoko imwene ni wa lukolo lwa Daudi.
Hakaluta kiandikisha hamwedu na Maliamu mutumisigwa wakwe naye hakeyoha.
Ichigele chicho fowowile uko, majuwa gakwe gokidohola geja gafika.
Kamei hakedohola nhula hanju naye hakowa mugosi, kamufasa sisuke se mwana, kamugonesa ahanhu hokudiila sing'ombe, kwasoko wasapata luneka musinyumba sa wageni.
Na muisi iiya kweja kowa na wadimi wekwikala kwidimo ne isawo yawo hechilo.
Malaika we Mundewa hoyowalawila, kema hagati yawo, utunyi we Mundewa houwamulikila, nawo howokwingilwa na itisi ikulu.
Malaika kawagamba, “Munghogohe nikumwigalilani mbuli swamu, mbuli ya chinyemi chikulu, awanhu wose wokonela.
Kosoko diyelo mukaya ya Daudi kelekigwa muhonyi wenu, no Kilisito Mundewa.
Achino no chitangilo chenu, mokona mwana mudodogi kafasigwa suke sa chali, kagoneswa hanhu hakudiila sing'ombe.”
Kamei baho itewa dya Malaika kulawa kulanga, howetunya Mulungu na kwimba,
“Utunyi ulute kuchanhya kwe Mulungu,
na Muchilunga chuwe digoya
kwa wanhu woyasagule.”
Malaika fowaleuke na kuluta kulanga wadimi wetamila wakugamba, “Hambiya chilute Betelehemu chikone adiya dochitamiligwe ne Mundewa.”
Howoluta chimwandemwande, wamufika Maliamu na Yusufu na yuya imwana mudodogi kagona ahakudiila sing'ombe.
Howomona imwana na kuwatamila gose gowahulike soko ye imwana.
Wose wahulike simbuli salongigwe na wadimi hawesina lugano.
Ninga Maliamu hoyogeka na kugadoga gose mumoyo wakwe.
Awaya wadimi weja woya, akuno wekumutunya Mulungu, kosoko ya gose gowahulike na kona, ifyene fyowatamiligwe.
Majuwa munana gakaloke, na ugele wo kumufina haufika, howomwinanga Yesu disina dyakwe, ifene foyenangwa na Malaika kabla ya kwifunga kwe ing'ina.
Ugele wo kuhojoligwa kwawo ukafike, Yusufu ne Maliamu hawamulonda Yesu ne kuluta naye Yelusalemu kumwika kumwande ye Mundewa fina imisigililo ya Musa foyikulonga.
(Fina foyandikwe muchitabu che malagiso ge Mundewa, “Mwana nhula hanju we chigosi kokwinangigwa musunhile kwe Mundewa).”
Kahi hawaluta kulafa filafwa ifene dilagiso dye Mundewa fodilongile, “Huwa mbili hagela makinda ge njiwa.”
Ugele wuwo akuya Yelusalemu hakuwa na munhu wa chelu na yekumogoha Mulungu, disina dyakwe Simioni. Yendeyogojela kwa nghwina uhonya wa Isilaeli. Hakalongosigwa ne Muhe Musunhile.
Imuhe Musunhile hakamugubulila fina nghodaha kufa mpaka yamone Kilisito we Mundewa.
Kamei yamemesigwe no uMuhe Musunhile yamulongosa kwija kwi hekalu iBaba na ng'ina wa Yesu wamwigala kugati, kosoko wamugolosele ifina fowalagisigwe ne Mundewa;
Simioni yamudinghula imwana, hoyomutunya Mulungu yakugamba,
“Hambiya Mundewa kumulekela imutumwa wako,
Yaleguke digoya ifene diwandiko dyako fodilongile.
Kosoko ameso gangu
gona uhonya wako.
Ninga awanhu wose wowona
uhonya wako woutandile mumeso ga wanhu wose.
Ujelu wa magubulo kuwamembe,
na we ditunyo ku wanhu wako Isilaeli.”
iBabakwe ne ing'ina weja wakisina kosoko ya simbuli salongigwe soko ye imwana.
Simioni kuwamotesa na kumutamila Maliamu ing'ina fina, “Imwana yu kekigwa kwa kugwa na kwinuka wengi wowile Isilaeli, na chitangilo che wanhu womulema.
Nagwe gomwecho idipanga dyokwingila mumoyo wako uleke gagubuligwe madoga ga mimoyo itewa.”
Kweja kowa na Mugonesi yumwedu we chike disina dyakwe Ana mwana wa Fanueli wa lukolo lwa Asheli. Hakekala na mugosi minyaka mufunghate kulawa munhole yakwe.
Kahi hakasigala mwigane mpaka ugele wuwo foyowile mudala wa miyaka makumi munana na mine, nghekuleuka mihekalu ye Mulungu yekutasa kuleka kudia chigele chose.
Ugele wuwo hoyolawanisa, hoyomutunya Mulungu na kulonga simbuli se mwana ku wanhu wose wagojelage uhonya wa Yelusalemu.
iBabakwe ne ing'ina fowamalile kugolosa gose fina fodyendage dilagiso, hawoya ukwawo Nasaleti mumukoa wa Galilaya.
Imwana hoyokula, hoyokongeseka ludole, kamema misungu, na Dihewa dya Mulungu hadyuwa umwakwe.
Chila mwaka iBabakwe ne ing'ina wenda weluta Yelusalemu fina fowasowele ugele we sikukuu ya Pasaka.
Imwana foyafika miyaka ikumi na mili, howolutanya Yelusalemu fina fowasowele.
Fowafulusa isikukuu, isikukuu ye Pasaka wejawakonga inhambo ya kuya ukwawo, amba Iyesu hoyosigala Yelusalemu, na iBabakwe ne ing'ina wasamanyile;
Awene wamanya kaumo mwitewa, howogenda mpaka dijuwa duswa, wakonga kumuhananga kuwambwiya sawo na wayawo.
Kosoko wasamonile, howokuya Yelusalemu kumuhananga.
Dijuwa dya kadatu howomufika mwihekalu kekala hagatigati ya wafusaji yakuwategelesa na kuwosa.
Wose wamuhulike hawesina lugano kwasoko ye misungu na mbidula yakwe swamu.
iBabakwe ne ing'ina fowamonile hawesina, ing'inakwe kamusa yakugamba, “Gomwana kuchitenda nhani? iBabako na niye chenda chikukongha kwa usungu.”
Imwene hakabidula yekugamba, “Nhani mukunihananga? Musamanyile fina inyagila kwikala munyumba ye Babangu?”
iBabakwe ne ing'ina wasamanyile simbuli sowatamiligwe.
Hoyokuya hamwedu nawo mpaka Nasaleti, hoyogendelela kuwahulika. Ing'ina hoyofundika gose mumoyo wakwe.
Na iYesu hoyogendelela kukula kwa misungu na chimo, hoyowendesa wanhu ne Mulungu.

Hawuwa mwaka wa kumi na shano wa undewa wakwe Kaisali Tibelio. Pondio Pilato hakowa Mundewa wa Uyahudi, Helode Mundewa mudodo wa Galilaya na imunduguse Filipo hakowa Mundewa mudodo wa mikoa ya Itulea na Tilakoniti; na Lusania Mundewa mudodo wa Abilene,
Anasi na Kayafa hawowa Makuhani wakulu. Imbuli ye Mulungu hoimwijila Yohana mwana wa Sakalia uko kunyika.
Kamei Yohana hoyeluta mumhelo ya ulwanda wa Yolodani. Hoyohubili ubatiso wo kulamba kosoko yo kulekeleligwa uwihi.
Fina foyandikwe muchitabu cha Mugonesi Isaya:
“Dijwi dya munhu dihulikika kunyika,
‘Igoloseni injila ye Mundewa;
gololeni injila yakwe!
Chila ilolo difukiswe,
chila itunda na kitongo iduliswe.
ahagonjile hagoloke,
sinjila sihile sigoloswe
na kuwa swamu.
Na chila munhu kowona uhonya we Mulungu.’”
Wanhu matewa haweja kubatisigwa na Yohana, kawosa yakugamba, “Anyeye cheleko cha majoka nani yawafundile muitije inyono ye Mulungu?
Mweleke mamudyo gakonesa fina mulamba, kahi munghakonge kugamba: ‘Chinaye Baba Ibulahimu,’ kosoko nikuwatamila Imulungu yakudaha kumwinulila Ibulahimu wana kulawa mumawe gano.
Muchigele chino inhemo ikigwa mumasina ga mabiki, idibiki disikweleka mamudyo maswamu, dikung'enyigwa na kusomigwa.”
Awanhu wamusa wakugamba, “Chigolose nhani seye?”
Hoyowabidula yakugamba, “Iyena makoti meli na yamwinghe iyechaka; na iyena chakudiya yagolose nhaifo.”
Awakonghosa we ikodi nawo howokwija kubatisigwa, howomusa, “Mwalimu chigolose nhani seye?”
Kawagamba, “Munghakongose chinhu kujumha fomusigililigwe.”
Awasilikali nawo howomusa wekugamba, “Ase nase chigolose nhani? Kawagamba Munghapujile munhu, kahi munghamubalalile munhu, na mwigutiswe na maliho genu.”
Awanhu fowowile mukugoja agelawanisa, wose wakudoga mufidoga fyawo isimbuli sa Yohana, nhegela imwene no Kilisito.

Yohana kawabidula yekugamba, “Aniye nikubatisa kwa meji, ninga yekwija munhu iyena ludole kujumha niye, kai aniye sagilwe kohola sisigi sa filwatu fyakwe. Ayo kowabatisa kwa Muhe Musunhile na kwa moto.
Diselo dyakwe dya mumukono yakwe, naye koshagila uluga lwakwe, na kukunjagisa ngano mukano yakwe, ninga amakohelele kogasoma mumoto usikusima.”
Kahi kwa mbuli nyingi hoyowahubilia wanhu mbuli swanu.
Ninga iMundewa Helode yagombelwa na Yohana kosoko yamulonda Helodia imuke we munduguse na kumutenda mukagwe, kahi no uwihi wose woyagolose.
Kahi Helode yongesa uwihi wakwe kwa kumoha Yohana.
Ninga awanhu wose wakamale kubatisigwa, na Yesu yakafuluse kubatisigwa yendeyotasa, ulanga wagubuka,
Kamei Muhe Musunhile yadulika muchanhya yakwe kefana njiwa, dijwi dyalawa kulanga, “Agweye no mwanangu mwendigwa wangu nyendesigwe nagwe.”
iYesu foyakonga umulimo wa kufusa, yowa fina minyaka makumi madatu nhafia hakamanyika fina mwana wa Yusufu wa Heli,
mwana Matati, mwana wa Lawi, mwana wa Meliki, mwana wa Janai, mwana wa Yusufu,
mwana wa Matatiya, mwana wa Amosi, mwana wa Nahumu, mwana wa Esili, mwana wa Nagai,
mwana wa Maati, mwana wa Matatia, mwana wa Semei, mwana wa Yoseki, mwana wa Joda.
Joda hakowa mwana wa Yohanani, mwana wa Lesa, mwana wa Selubabeli, mwana wa Shealitieli, mwana wa Neli,
Neli hakowa mwana wa Meliki, mwana wa Adi, mwana wa Kosamu yowile mwana wa Elimodamu, mwana wa Eli.
Eli hakowa mwana wa Yoshua, mwana wa Elieseli, mwana wa Yolamu, mwana wa Matati, mwana wa Lawi.
Lawi hakowa mwana wa Simoni, mwana wa Yuda, mwana wa Yosefu, mwana wa Yonamu, mwana wa Eliakimu,
Eliakimu hakowa mwana Melea, mwana wa Mena, mwana wa Matasa, mwana wa Nasani, mwana wa Daudi,
Daudi hakowa mwana wa Yese, mwana wa Obedi, mwana wa Boasi, mwana wa Sala, mwana wa Nashoni,
Nashoni yowa mwana wa Aminadabu, mwana wa Adimini, mwana wa Alini, mwana wa Hesiloni, mwana wa Pelesi, mwana wa Yuda.
Yuda yowa mwana wa Yakobo, mwana wa Isaka, mwana wa Ibulahimu, mwana wa Tela, mwana wa Naholi,
Naholi hakowa mwana wa Selugi, mwana wa Lewu, mwana wa Pelegi, mwana wa Ebeli, mwana wa Shela.
Shela hakowa mwana wa Kainani, mwana wa Alifokisadi, mwana wa Shemu, mwana wa Nuhu, mwana wa Lameki,
Lameki yowa mwana wa Mesusela, mwana wa Henoki, mwana wa Yaledi, mwana wa Mahalale, mwana wa Kainani,
Kainani hakowa mwana wa Enoki, mwana wa Seti, mwana wa Adamu yowile mwana wa Mulungu.
Foyamema Muhe Musunhile hoyokuya kulawa Yolodani, kalongoswa na Muhe
chigele cha majuwa makumi mane kunyika, yagesigwa na Luhoma. Na majuwa gose ngadiya chinhu, gakahele hakowa na njala.
Luhoma kalonga naye yakugamba, “Nghona gweye ni Mwana we Mulungu, dilonge idiwe adi dyuwe mukate.”
Yesu hakamubidula, “Yandikigwa fina, ‘Munhu nghakuhuwila mukate wimwene.’”
Na iluhoma hoyomukwisa kuchanhya na kumunesa undewa wa muchilunga kwa chipisi chiguhi,
na kumugamba, “Nokwingha gweye Undewa na Ukulu wakwe ne ditunyo kosoko galafigwa ukwangu, nani nikumwingha wowose ifene fonikwenda.
Ninga gweye unghanifugamila, ai yose ikuwa yako.”
Na iYesu kamubidula yakugamba, “Yandikigwa Komufugamila, Mundewa Mulungu wako na imwene du komutogomela!”
Na iLuhoma hakamulonda mpaka Yelusalemu na hakamwika muchisusu che dihekalu na kumugamba, “Inghowa gweye kwa mwana we Mulungu, lagala hasi kulawa hano.
Fina yandikigwa, ‘Kokwingha malaika wakwe wakwimilise,
na mumikono yawo wokudinghula ungheje utowa mugulu wako nghwalo mwiwe.’”
Na iYesu kamubidula yakugamba, “Ilongigwa unghamugese Mulungu Mundewa wako.”
Na iLuhoma yakamale chila igesa, hoyomuleka kwa chipisi.
Na iYesu hakowa Galilaya yamemesigwe ne ludole lwa Muhe Musunhile, simbuli sakwe seja senela muchilunga chose cha munghanda ya Galilaya.
Hoyofusa mumasinagogi gawo, yatunyigwa na awanhu wose.
Na iYesu hoyokwija Nasaleti ahanhu hoyakulila, mwijuwa dye Sabato hakaluta kwisinagogi fina foyasowela. Hakema kosoko.
Na bahaya hakenghigwa chitabu cha Mugonesi Isaya. Hoyogubula ichitabu, hoyopata hanhu handikigwe,
“Muhe wo Mundewa kamuchanhya yangu,
kosoko kanibaka mafuta
kuwahubilia awakiwa mbuli swanu.
Kanituma kutamila kulekeleligwa kwa amateka,
kona kwa waya wasikona,
kuwengha kulekeleligwa awaya awakoneligwa,
na kutamilisa umwaka we Mundewa ufumiligwe.”
Na hakagubika ichitabu, hoyomuwisila imutumishi na hoyokwikala hasi, na awanhu wose wowile mwisinagogi howomung'olela meso.
Hoyokonga kulonga nawo, “Diyelo ditulumo dino dimemelesigwa musinghutwi senu.”
Na wose hawalonga fiswanu kosoko yakwe na kwisina simbuli swanu silawile mumulomo wakwe; nawo hawagamba, “Ayu si mwana wa Yusufu?”
Kawatamila, “Hechaka manhonge fina molonga nonga ayi, ‘Gomuganga kihonye gomweecho, gose gochihulike kugolosa Kapelinaumu, golosa hano naho haisi yako gomweecho.’”
Na iYesu hakawagamba, “Chawelu nikumutamilani, hechaka Mugonesi iyekufumiligwa muisi yakwe.

Ninga, chawelu nikumutamilani, hakuwa na wegane wengi Muislaeli ugele wa Eliya, ugele ulanga fowohigwa miyaka midatu na miyesi mutandatu bila kutonya fula. Muchigele chicho njala nghulu haingila muisi,
na Eliya nghatumigwa kwa yoyose, amba kwa Seleputa, muisi ya Sidoni, kwe mwanamuke yowa mwigane.
Na hahowa na awena ukoma matewa Muislaeli ugele we Mugonesi Elisha, na hechaka yoyose yasunhigwa, ila Naamani wa Siliya.”
Ninga fowahulike gago, hawadeseka wose wowile mwisinagogi.
Nawo howekwinuka na kumulafa kunje ye ikaya, na kumulongosa ditwi kung'enge ye chitunda chajengigwe ikaya yawo, kosoko wamukubite hasi,
Ninga imwene kapuluta mugatigati yawo hoyoleuka.
iYesu hoyohulumuka Kapelinaumu, kaya yuwile Galilaya. Na yenda yewafusa mwijuwa dye Sabato.
Nawo hawesina kosoko ye mafusa gakwe, simbuli sakwe hasuwa na udaha.
Na mwisinagogi mowa na munhu yena magini, hoyolila kwa ijwi ikulu,
“Koo! China choni na gweye Yesu Munasaleti? Kwija kuchimalagisa? Nikumanya kwa nani gweye, Musunhile we Mulungu.”
Yesu kaigombela imhepo yekugamba, “Nyamala na umulawe. Na yakakinyigwe hasi ne imhepo mugatigati ya wanhu, imhepo hoilawa, ninga isimugolose dihile.”
Na wose hawesina wakilongelesa wakugamba, “Aino mbuli yaki? Kosoko kwa udaha na ludole yakugombela simhepo sihile naso sikulawa.”
Simbuli sakwe seja senela chila hanhu munghandanghanda ye iisi iya.
Hakenuka na kuleuka mwisinagogi, hoyokwingila munyumba ya Simoni. Ninga imukwewe Simoni hakowa mutamu, yakoligwa na ipwipwi ikali, na howomutasa kosoko yakwe.
Hoyokwima hanghanda yakwe, hoyedigombela dipwipwi, na hodimuleka, na chimwande hoyokwinuka na kuwatogomela.
Ninga dijuwa dikoswe, awanhu wose wowile na watamu, howomwigalila awanhu wose awakutamwa sinhamu mbalimbali; naye hoyokwika mikono yakwe muchanhya ya chila mutamu hoyowahonya.
Na simhepo naso hasiwalawa matewa, hositowa chowe, “Agweye kwa mwana we Mulungu!”
Ninga hoyosigombela na nghasifumise kulonga, kosoko hasimumanya fina no Kilisito.
Housiku yakwe dijuwa dikalawe, hoyoleuka na kuluta ahanhu hachinyele. Awanhu howomuhananga na kwija ukwakwe, howokwenda kumulemesa kuleuka ukwawo.
Ninga hayowagamba, “Inyagila kuhubili imbuli swanu ya undewa we Mulungu musikaya singi kahi, kosoko iyo hanitumigwa.”
Na yenda yefusa mumasinagogi ga Yudea.
Ugele awanhu wakelunde na kumumemelela kutegelesa imbuli ye Mulungu, hakowa yemile munghanda ya dilamba dya Genesaleti.
Na hakona minhumbwi mili habehi na dilamba, ninga awalowa somba hawalawa muminhumbwi na wenda wesunha sinyafu sawo.
Hakakwila mumunhumbwi umwedu no wakwe Simoni, hakamutasa yawile mumeji kidogo kulawa kunghingi. Na hakekala na kuwafusa wanhu kulawa mumunhumbwi.
Yakafuluse kulonga, hoyomugamba Simoni, “Guma kuchiligati, na ulafe sinyafu sako ulowe somba.”
Simoni hoyobidula, “Mundewa chigolosa kasi yo kusokesa chilo chose chinghapate chinhu. Ninga kwa imbuli yako nohulumusa sinyafu.”
Ninga wakahulumuse sinyafu, hawapata somba nyingi lugano, sinyafu sawo hosikonga kudumuka.
Hawawenanga awayawo wowile mumunhumbwi wa keli weje kuwatasa. Haweja na kumemesa minhumbwi yose mili, ninga haikonga kusama.
Ninga Simoni Petulo yakone nhaifo, hakogwa mumigulu ya Yesu yakugamba, “Leuka ukwangu go Mundewa, kosoko aniye na munhu wa wihi.”
Kosoko hakesina imwene hamwedu na waya wowile naye kosoko ya uwingi we sisomba sowapatile;
na baho kahi weja wowa Yakobo na Yohana, wana wa Sebedayo, wowile wayagwe wa Simoni Petulo. Na iYesu hoyomutamila Simoni, “Unghogohe kulawa hambiya kokuwa mulowa wanhu.”
Nawo fowafuluse kwigala minhumbwi yawo kunghingi, howoleka fyose na kumwandamila.
Ugele foyowile mukaya imonga, baho keja munhu iyena ukoma, na foyamonile Yesu yogwa funama kededela yakugamba, “Mundewa nghona ukuhananga ukudaha kunihonya.”
Naye yagolola umukono wakwe hoyomukwafa yakugamba, “Nikuhanga, hona baho ni baho ukoma houhona.”
Na hakamulemesa yanghamutamila munhu, ninga, “Luta gomweecho ukeyonese kwa mutambiki, na ukalafe digelo fina foyalongile Musa uwe uhomelesi ukwawo.”
Ninga simbuli so seja senela lugano kola hanhu na matewa mengi hawetang'anyila kutegelesa na kuhonyigwa sinhamu sawo.
Imwene hoyoleuka hoyoluta kunyika kutasa.

Mwijuwa dimonga dya majuwa gago, foyendeyefusa, heja howa na Mafalisayo na walimu we malagiso wekale naye, awo nowejile kulawa chila kaya ya Galilaya, na Yudea na kulawa Yelusalemu, na uludole lwe iMundewa hauwa naye kuhonya.
Langa, wanhu hawegala munhu yaholole mwisasi, wahananga wamwingise kugati na kumwika kumwande ya Yesu.
Ninga fowonile hechaka njila ya kumwingisa kosoko ya matewa, howokwila munyumba muchanhya howotobola na kumwingisa na disasi dyakwe kupulutila mukano mpaka kugati kumwande ya Yesu.
Yakone dihuwi dyawo hakagamba, “Mwanangu uwihi wako ulekeleligwa.”
Na Watulumi na Mafalisayo howakonga kiyusa, wakugamba, “Ayuno nani yakulonga lubeso? Nani yakudaha kulekelela uwihi ninga Mulungu yemwene!”
Ninga Yesu hakatanga amahweso gawo hakawagamba, “Nhani mukihwesa mumimoyo yenu?”
Imhufu no ihoki? Kugamba, “Kulekeleligwa uwihi wako ama kugamba leuka ulute?”
Ninga uleke mumanye fina mwana we munhu kena udaha muchilunga wa kulekelela uwihi. Hakalonga ne munhu yaholole, Nikukugamba, “Inuka winule disasi dyako ulute ukaya.”
Baho ni baho kenuka kumwande yawo, na hakalonda achiya choyagonele, na kuluta ukaya akuno yakumutunya Mulungu.
Na itisi ikulu hadiwengila wose, na hawamutunya Mulungu na hawamema lutwitwi wakugamba, “Diyelo chona mbuli ya ijumo.”
Hoyoleuka na kumona mukonghosa kodi yakwinangigwa Lawi, kekala ahanhu ho kulihila kodi, hoyomugamba, “Nyandamile.”
Na hoyoleka fyose, na kumwandamila.
Na Lawi hoyomugolosela chakudiya chikulu ukaya ukwakwe, na heja howa na mulundo mukulu wa wakonghosa kodi na wamonga wekale mumesa na wene.
Amafalisayo na Watulumi wawo hawawakalalilaga awefusa wakwe wakugamba, “Nhani mukudiya na kunywa hamwedu na wakonghosa kodi na wena uwihi?”
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Awomi wasikumuhananga Muganga, ninga awaya iwatamu.”
Sijile kuwenanga awaswanu ninga awena uwihi wadahe kulamba.
Na hawamugamba, “Awefusa wa Yohana wakufunga mikangha mingi na wakutasa, nheifo awefusa wa Mafalisayo, ninga awako wakudiya na kunywa.”
Na iYesu hakawagamba, “Mukudaha kuwagolosa awageni we halusi wohe ugele imwenye halusi kahamwedu nawo?
Amajuwa gokwija, hona imwenye halusi yekuleusigwa ukwawo, noho wakwenda wafunge mumajuwa gago.”
Kawatamila mbasi yakugamba, “Hechaka munhu iyekudega ndame ya suke nyisha na kuguma musuke ing'ono, yanghagolosa nhaifo, yakudega inyisha, na indame kulawa inyisha fisikiyagila na ing'ono.
Kahi hechaka munhu yakuguma difai nyisha mufiliba filalile, yanghagamba yagume idifai nyisha, yotula ifiliba na difai yokitika na ifiliba fyobanika.
Ninga idifai nyisha ikuhanangigwa igumigwe mufiliba fisha.
Kosoko hechaka munhu yakunywa difai yakatali hoyosulumila difai nyisha, kosoko yakugamba, ‘Chakatali kiswanu.’”
Mwijuwa dye Sabato Yesu foyendayogenda mumigunda ye ngano, awefusa wakwe wadudula masamhu, wafigisa mumikono yawo wa kudiya.
Ninga awamonga wa Mafalisayo wagamba, “Nhani mukugolosa chinhu chene chilemesigwe mwijuwa dye Sabato?”
Yesu hoyobidula, “Musisomile adiya dyo yagolose Daudi foyowile na njala, imwene hamwedu na waya awowile naye.
Foyengile munyuma ye Mulungu hoyolonda imikate ya konesa na kudiya, yene si fiswamu kudiigwa na wowose ninga Makuhani, kahi hoyowengha awaya woyowile nawo.”
Hoyowagamba, “Imwana we munhu no Mundewa we Sabato.”
Mwijuwa dingi dye Sabato, foyendae kwingila Mwisinagogi na kufusa, heja howa na munhu yaholole umukono wakwe wo kulume.
Na Watulumi na Mafalisayo weja wamunyembela, kona fina komuhonya mwijuwa dye Sabato, kosoko wapate mbuli ya kumusongesa.
Ninga hoyotanga madoga gawo, hakamugamba ayuya iyena umukono uholole, “Wije wime hano.” Hakenuka na kwima haya.
Na Yesu hakawagamba, “Nikuwosani togoleni! Ikuhanangigwa dijuwa dye Sabato kugolosa maswamu ama gehile? Kuhonya ugima ama kuubana?”
Hakawakongholela meso wose, na kumugamba ayuya imunhu, “Golola umukono wako. Hakagolosa nheifiya na umukono wakwe hauhona.”
Ninga weja wamemwa na nyono na kiyusa wene kwa wene wamugolose nhani Yesu.
Mumajuwa gago hakakwila kufitunda kutasa; hakatasa kwe Mulungu chilo chose.
Hosiku yakwe hakawenanga wefusa wakwe, na kuwasagula ikumi na weli kulawa mwiwefusa wawo, hakawenanga watumigwa;
Simoni, yamwinanga disina dya keli Petulo, na Andelea imunduguse, na Yakobo na Yohana, na Filipo na Batolomayo,
na Matayo, na Tomasi na Yakobo imwana wa Alufayo, na Simoni yenangigwe Selote,
Na Yuda mwana wa Yakobo, na Yuda Isikalioti yabiduke kuwa musongesi.

Hoyohulumuka nawo na kwima hanhu hatindimale, hamwedu na itewa dya wefusa wakwe na matewa ga wanhu walawile Yudea yose na Yelusalemu na mhwani ya Tilo na Sidoni, awejile kumutegelesa na kuhonyigwa sinhamu sawo,
na wose wedasigwagwe na simhepo sihile weja wahonyigwa.
Na amatewa wose hawahananga kumukwafa, kosoko uludole wenda umulawa kuwahonya wose.
Yesu hakenula meso gakwe hoyowalanga awefusa wakwe na kugamba,
“Ibeka nyeye muwakiwa; kosoko undewa wa Mulungu ni wenu!
Ibeka nyeye mufungile hambiya;
kosoko mokigutisigwa! Ibeka nyeye gomukulila hambiya; kosoko moseka!
Ibeka nyeye awanhu wanghawasula, kahi wanghawabagula, na kuwaliga na kuwabanila disina dyenu fina mbuli ihile kosoko ye Mwana we Munhu!
Sekeleleni dijuwa diya na kujumhajumha kosoko digelo dyenu ikulu kulanga, kosoko awaBaba sawo weja wawagolosa nhaifo awagonesi.
Ninga usungu wenu anyeye muwagoli;
kosoko mufulusa kupata imhoso yenu!
Usungu wenu gomwigute hambiya;
kosoko mokona njala!
Usungu wenu anyeye gomukuseka hambiya;
kosoko molombola na kulila!
Usungu wenu awanhu wose wanghawatogola;
kosoko awaBaba sawo hawawagolosela
nhaifo awagonesi wa udasi.”
“Ninga nikumutamilani anyeye mukunitegelesa, wendeni wanghondo wenu, muwagolosele maswamu awaya wakumusulani,
muwamotese awaya wakuwaligita, mutase kosoko ya waya wakuwabesa.
Kwa yuya yakukutowa munjeje mubidulile na ya keli, na yuya iyakulonda dikoti dyako unghamulemese inghasu nhaifiya.
Mwinghe chila munhu iyakukutasa, na iyakupokola finhu fyako unghahanange yakuwisile.
Na fina fomukuhananga wanhu wawagolosele anyeye, muwagolosele nhaifo.
“Nghona mukuwenda awaya awakuwenda nyeye, mukonesa uswamu waki? Kosoko hata awena uwihi wakugolosa nhaifo.
Na nghona mukuwagolosela uswamu awaya wakuwagolosela maswamu, mukupata igelo dyaki? Kosoko hata awena uwihi wakugolosa nhaifo.
Na nghona mukuwakopesha awaya wene womumanyile fina mohokela, mukugolosa uswamu waki? Hata awena uwihi wakuwakopesha awena uwihi kuhokela kahi.

Ninga wendeni awanghondo wenu, goloseleni fiswamu, kopesheni bila kugojela chochose kulawa ukwawo, na digelo dyenu dyokuwa ikulu na mokuwa wana wa ye kuchanhyasi, kosoko imwene muswanu kwa awasikumulumba na awakiyenda wenyecho.
Muwe na ubasi, ninga fina iBaba yenu foyena ubasi.”
Munghalamule; nanye musilamuligwa, munghatofule; nanye musitofuligwa, mulekelele; nanye molekeleligwa.
Wengheni; nanye mokwinghigwa chipimo chiswamu cha kumema na kukandisa na kusingisigwa hata kwitika chokwikigwa muchifa chenu. Kosoko ichipimo chomukulafa no chicho chomukupimiligwa.
Kahi hoyowatamila mbasi, “Togoleni! Imudula kodaha kumulongosa Mudula? Wasihubugila wose mwikolongo?
Imwifusa nghakumusuma imwalimu wakwe, ninga kila munhu yanghafusigwa fiswanu yakuwa fina imwalimu wakwe.
Nhani ukuchona ichibasi chuwile mwigiso dye munduguso, ninga nghukutanga dibiki dyuwile mwigiso dyako gomwecho?

Ama kodahaje kumugamba imunduguso, sekulu, leka nileuse ichibasi chuwile mwigiso dyako, nagwe gomwenecho nghukudyona dibiki duwile mwigiso dyako? Agwe wechimwefe! Konga kuleusa dibiki mwigiso dyako, baho kokona fiswamu kuleusa ichibasi chuwile mwigiso dye imunduguso.”
“Kosoko hechaka ibiki iswamu dikweleka mamudyo gehile, kahi kwichaka ibiki dihile dikweleka mamudyo maswamu.
Kosoko chila ibiki dikumanyika kwa mamudyo gakwe, kosoko amasada sigakubawigwa mumiwa, kahi sisabibu sisikubawigwa kulawa mumisega.
Imunhu muswamu kulawa musigafu ya umoyo wakwe yakulafa maswamu, na imunhu yehile kulawa musigafu ya uwihi wakwe yakulafa gehile; kosoko kulawa gaya agemile mumoyo wakwe umulomo wakwe ukulonga.”
“Nhani mukuninanga, ‘Mundewa,’ Mundewa, na musikugolosa agaya gonikumutamilani?
Chila munhu yekwija ukwangu na kuhulika simbuli sangu na kusigolosa nomutamilani foyakuliganiswa:
Yakuliganiswa na munhu yakujenga nyumba, iyakukata mpaka kusi, na kwika inghindiso mwiwe. Amafaluko gangheja, ameji gakutowa munyumba na gasikudaha kuisingisa kosoko ijengigwa fiswanu.
Ninga ayuya yakuhulika na kuleka kusigolosa kakifana munhu yakujenga nyumba mwisanga bila nghindiso, ameji gakuitowa na kuibena, na baho ni baho ikugwa, na inyugwa yakwe ikuwa nghulu.”
Foyafuluse kuwatamila gaya goyendage wanhu wahulike, hakengila Kapelinaumu.
Ninga Chilongosi wa wasilikali igana hakowa na mutumwa yowile mwendigwa wakwe, hakowa mutamu habehi na kufa.
Foyahulike simbuli sa Yesu, hakawatamila wasehe we Chiyahudi kumutasa yeje na kumuhonya imutogomi.
Nawo fowejile kwa Yesu howokidedela wakugamba, “Yendesigwa umugolosele dino.
Kosoko yakuwenda wanhu wetu na kachijengela disinagogi dyetu.”

Na Yesu hakaluta nawo. Foyowile habehi ne inyumba, “Ichilongosi wa wasilikali igana hakatuma wambwiya ukwakwe wakugamba Mundewa unghakiidase, kosoko aniye sagiligwe agweye wingile hasi he ikano yangu,
kosoko iyo hanikiyona sagiligwe nimwenecho kwija ukwako. Ninga longa mbuli du na imutumwa wangu yakuhananga yahone.
Kosoko ani nani na munhu mukulu nina wasilikali hasi yangu, na nighamulonga yumwedu, ‘Luta na yakuluta,’ na kwa yumonga, ‘Nyagula na yakwija,’ na kwa mutumwa wangu, ‘Golosa dino na yakugolosa.’”
Foyahulike nhaifo, Yesu hoyekisina lugano kosoko yakwe, hoyobiduka na kuwatamila matewa wamwandamilage, “Nikumutamilani hata Muisilaeli singhati nyone ihuwi fina dino.”
Na waya watumigwe fowowile ukaya, hawamufika imutumwa yuya mumi togi.
Chigele chiguhi hakaluta mukaya imonga ikwinangigwa Naini, hamwedu na wefusa wakwe na itewa ikulu hadikilongosa naye.
Foyeja yasegelela mumulango umukulu we ikaya iya, langa munhu yafile yenda yelafigwa kunje, ni mwana ye imwene we ing'inakwe yowile mwigane, na itewa ikulu kulawa kukaya iya hawowa naye.
Na iMundewa yakamone, hoyomonela ubasi hakamugamba, “Unghalile.”
Hoyokwija na kudikwafa dijenesa na waya wadipikile howokwima, hoyogamba, “Gomujelelo nikulonga na gweye, inuka.”
Na yuya yofile hoyekwinuka na kukonga kulonga, Yesu hoyomwingha ing'ina we imujelelo.
Itisi hadiwengila wose, na hawamutunya Mulungu wakugamba, “Mugonesi mukulu kalawanisa mugati yetu na Mulungu kawejila wanhu wakwe.”
Imbuli ayo hoyikwenela muisi yose ya Uyahudi na muisi sose sa munghanda yakwe.
Awefusa wa Yohana hawamutamila gose gano.
Yohana hakawenanga wefusa wakwe weli, hakawatuma kwa Mundewa wamuse, “Agweye no yuya iyekwija hegu chimugoje yungi?”
Kamei awanhu waya fowejile ukwakwe hawagamba, “Yohana Mubatisaji kachituma ukwako yakugamba, ‘Agweye noyuya yakwija hegu chimugoje yungi?’”
Muugele uya hoyowahonya wanhu matewa na sinhamu sawo, na sinhato sawo, na magini gehile, na wengi wowile wasikona hakawowisila kona kwawo.

Yesu hakagamba, “Luteni mukamutamile Yohana agene gomukona na kuhulika: Mudula wakona, fiwete wakugenda, wakoma wakusunhigwa, na fihuli wakuhulika, wafile wakwinuligwa, awakiwa wahubiligwa mbuli swamu.
Ibeka imunhu iyechaka manhonge kosoko yangu.”
Awatumigwe na Yohana wakaleuke, hakakonga kulonga na amatewa muchanhya ya Yohana. “Hamulawa kuluta kunyika kulanga choni?” Chibwade chikusingiswa ne imheho?
Ninga hamuluta kulanga choni? Munhu yafasigwe suke swamu? Langa, awaya wakufala sisuke se ditunyo na kwikala kwa kubwedelela wowa musinyumba sa undewa.
Ninga hamuluta kwija langa choni? Mugonesi? Heye! Nikumutamilani mukulu kusuma mugonesi.
Ayo yoyaandikiligwa gano, langa nikumwigala mutumigwa wangu kumwande yako yakugolosele injila.
Nikumutamilani mu wanhu wose welekigwe na wanawake hechaka mukulu kusuma Yohana, hata nheifo ayuya imudodogi mu undewa wa Mulungu ni mukulu kujumha Yohana.
(Fowahulike gago awanhu wose na wakonghosa kodi hawamufumila Mulungu, na kutunya kubatisigwa ubatiso wa Yohana;
Ninga Mafalisayo na walamusi we malagiso weja walema inyenda ye Mulungu ukwawo, kosoko wasabatisigwe na Yohana.)
“Nowaliganisa na choni awanhu wa cheleko chino? Nawo wakifana choni?
Wakifana wana awekale kwigulilo na kiinanga,
‘Hachiwatowela filimbi, nanye musafinile!
Chiwembila nyimbo sa usungu, nanye musililile!’
Kosoko Yohana Mubatisaji keja nghakudiya mukate na kunywa difai, hamugamba, ‘Kena magini!’
Mwana we munhu keja yakudiya na kunywa, na mukugamba Langeni muhongho yuno na mulefi! Mbwiya yawo wakonghosa kodi na wena uwihi!
Ninga imisungu ikufumiligwa na wanagwe wose.”
Mufalisayo yumonga hoyomugoneka kudiya hamwedu naye, hoyoluta kunyumba ye Mufalisayo, na kwikala hamesa.
Kahi imwanamuke we ikaya iya iyeja yowa na uwihi, foyahulike fina hakekala mumesa munyumba ye Mufalisayo, hoyokwigala chichupa cha mafuta ge imhungile.

Kamei foyemile hanyuma yakwe hamigulu ya Yesu, hakalila, hakakonga kumutwinhesela imigulu yakwe na masosi, na kuihamusa na sinjwili sa muditwi dyakwe, na kuinonela migulu yakwe na kuibaka agaya mafuta ge mhungile swanu.

Hambiya Imufalisayo yuya yamugoneke yakone nhaifo, yalonga mumoyo wakwe, “Imunhu ayu mhali ni Mugonesi hakowa yakutanga fina imwanamuke yuno no nani kahi kanhani! Ayuya yakumukwafa, fina ni munhu wa uwihi.”
Kamei iYesu kamubidula kamugamba, “Simoni, nina chinhu cha kulonga na gweye.” Naye hoyomubidula, “Chinhu chaki Mwalimu?”
Yesu hakawagamba, “Mukopeshaji wa mapesa yumwedu yeja yowa na wanghokwa wakwe weli, yumwedu yakopa magana mashano, na wakeli makumi mashano.
Fowadugile kuliha hoyowalekelela wose. Hambiya yehoki yemwendesa yuya imukopeshaji?”
Simoni kamugamba, “Nikudoga fina ayuya yalekeleligwe inghokwa inghulu.” Hoyomugamba, “Kulamula fiswamnu.”

Baho hakamubidukila imwanamuke, yakumugamba, “Simoni ukumona imwanamuke yono? Ningila munyumba yako, nghuninghile meji ga kunawa migulu yangu, ninga yuno kanidonhesa migulu yangu na masosi na kuihamusa na sinjwili sakwe.
Nghuninonele, ninga ayuno kulawa fonengile nghalekile kuninonela migulu yangu.
Nghunibakile mafuta ditwi dyangu, ninga imwene kanibaka migulu yangu na mafuta ge mhungile swanu.
Kosoko iyo nikumutamilani, kalekeleligwa uwihi wakwe wowile mwingi, kosoko hakenda lugano, ninga iyakulekeleligwa chidodogi yakwenda chidodogi.”
Hoyomugamba, “Uwihi wako ulekeleligwa.”
Kahi awaya wowile naye hamesa hawakonga kihwesa, “Ayuno no nani yakulekelela hata uwihi?”
Na hakamugamba imwanamuke, “Dihuwi dyako dikuhonya. Genda mheho.”
Kulawa baho hoyoleuka kugendela mumakaya ne fijiji, yekuhubili na kwigala mbuli swanu ya undewa we Mulungu. Na waya ikumi na weli hawowa hamwedu naye.
Kahi wanawake wamonga awahonyigwe kwa kulafigwa simhepo na sinhamu. Maliamu yanangigwe Magidalena, yalafigwe simhepo mufungate,
na Yoane imuke wa Chusa mutumwa wa Helode, na Susana, na wamonga wengi wawatogomele kwa isawo yawo.
Amatewa wakeje hamwedu na wanhu kulawa kaya kwa kaya, hakalonga kwa mbasi.
“I muhandi hakaleuka kuhanda imbeyu, kamei foyahandage, simonga hasilagala munjila, na wagendanjila hawasijata, na fidege hofisidiya.
Na simonga hosilagala mwikangalawe, na fosakulile, hasinyala kosoko hasiswela ujolo.
Na simonga hasilagala mumiwa, na imiwa haikulanaso na kusikanhamisa.
Na kamei simonga hasilagala muulongo muswamu na kukula na kweleka kocho! Iyena singhutwi sa kuhulika na yahulike.”
Kamei wefusa wakwe wakamuse difuso dye imbasi,
hakawagamba, “Anyeye mwinghigwa udaha wa kumanya ififiso fye undewa we Mulungu, ninga kwa wamonga ukutamiligwa kwa mbasi, kosoko wanghalanga wanghone na wanghahulika wanghamanye.”
“Difuso dye imbasi nodi: Imbeyu no imbuli ye Mulungu.
Awaya we habehi ne injila no waya waihulike imbuli, ninga Iluhoma yakwija na kuilonda imbuli kulawa mumimoyo yawo, kosoko wangheje wehuwila na kuhona.
Awaya wowile mwikangalawe no waya wene fowakuhulika imbuli, wakuihokela kwa chinyemi, ninga wano wechaka misisi, wakuhuwila kwa chigele chiguhi na ugele wa magesa wakugwa.
Asiya salagale mumiwa, no waya wakuihulika imbuli, ninga fowakugendelela wakukanhamisigwa na ugoli we chilunga, na mamudyo gawo gasikukangala.
Na kwa siya silagale muulongo muswamu, awo no waya waihulike imbuli, na kuikola mumimoyo yawo miswamu na kweleka mamudyo kwa ufinyilisi wawo.”
“Hechaka munhu yekwasa taa na kuigubika ama kuigubika na idebe, ninga yakuika muchigwaso, kosoko awekwingila wadahe kona ujelu wakwe.
Hechaka mbuli ifisigwe uleke ikakiyonese, kahi chinhu che chifiso chisimanyika na koneka hajelu.
Mulangisise gomukuhulika, kosoko iyenacho kokwinghigwa, na iyechaka hata chiya choyekudoga kenacho kohokigwa.”
Kahi ing'inakwe Yesu ne wanduguse howomwijila, ninga wasafikile ukwakwe kosoko ye ditewa.
Hakatamiligwa, “Ing'inako ne wanduguso wema kunje, wakuhananga kukona.”
Hoyowabidula, “Ing'inangu na wandugu sangu no waya awakuhulika mbuli ye Mulungu na kuigolosa.”
Ijuwa dimonga Yesu na wefusa wakwe hawakwila mumunhumbwi, hakawagamba, “Lekeni chiloke umwambu ye dilamba.” Howoleuka.
Na ifene fowalutage Yesu hakakoligwa na nhongo na kugona. Na imheho yo luputa hoitowa mwilamba, ameji hagakonga kumema mumunhumbwi, na hawowa habehi kudidimila.
Hawaluta na kumwinusa wakugamba, “Mundewa, Mundewa! Chikufa!”
Kamei hakenuka na kuigombela imheho na mawingo gajojage, hofinyamala na kuposika posi.
Hoyowagamba, “Dihuwi dyenu dyuwahi?”
Hawogoha, na kisina wekulonga chila munhu na miyagwe, ninga yuno munhu waki? Iyakugombela hata imheho na meji, nafyo fikumuhulika!
Kahi howofika muisi ya Wagelasi yuwile umwambu wa Galilaya.
Foyajatile hasi kulawa mumumhumbwi, hakatang'anyila na munhu kulawa kwikaya yowile na mhepo, kwa chigele chitali nghafalile suke, nghekalage munyumba ninga mufilalo.
Foyamonile Yesu, hakatula chowe na kugwa kumwande yakwe, na kutowa lwangi, “Choni choukuhananga unigolose, Yesu Mwana we Mulungu iyekuchanhyasi? Nikukutasa unghanisambase.”
Kosoko Yesu yasidindilisa si mhepo kumulawa imunhu yuya. Ugele mwingi hasimukola, hakemilisigwa, na kohigwa kwa minyolo na simhingu, ninga hakedumula minyolo ne simhingu na kulongoswa na magini.
“Ninga Yesu hayamusa Disina dyako nani?” Hoyogamba, “Itewa,” kosoko mhepo itewa hasimwingila.
Kahi hasikinenela yanghasilafe na kuluta kwikolongo.
Baho heja howa na itewa dya nguluwe dikudima muluduli, simhepo hasikinenela yasileke singile musinguluwe. Hoyofumila.
Simhepo hosilawa kwe imunhu na kwingila kusinguluwe, kamei ditewa hodikulumhuka kuluduli lwe inghingi ye dilamba na kunywa munghabu.
Awadimi wakone dyalawanise, hawatija, na kutamilisa mwikaya na mufijiji.
Awanhu watamiligwe hawaleuka kulanga dyalawanise, na kwija kwa Yesu, howomufika ayuya yalafigwe simhepo yekale mumigulu ya Yesu, kafala suke na mahala gakwe maswamu, na howokogoha.
Awaya wonile hawawatamila foyowile ayuya yakoligwe ne simhepo na fene foyahonyigwe.
Na wanhu wose wa si isi sa munghanda ya Genesaleti hawamutasa yaleuke ukwawo kosoko hawengiligwa na itisi ikulu, baho hakengile mumunhumbwi na kuya.
Imunhu yalafigwe simhepo hakakinenela fina yamwandamile Yesu, ninga Yesu nghamufumise ila kamugamba,
“Yuya ukaya ukwako, ukatamilise fina Imulungu foyakugolosele.” Hoyoluta na kwanjasa mwikaya dyose fina foyagoloseligwe na Yesu.
Ninga iYesu yakoye, awanhu wose hawamuhokela kosoko wose wenda womugojela.
Baho hakeja munhu disina dyakwe Yailo, yowile mukulu we disinagogi, hoyofugama hamigulu ya Yesu, hoyomutasa kwija ukaya ukwakwe,
kosoko hakowa na mwanagwe yemwene we chike, yena minyaka ikumi na mili nhafi, naye hakowa mutamusi.
Foyaluta awanhu hawelunda kumusunguluta.
Na imwanamuke yowile na utamu wo kulawa sakame kwa minyaka ikumi na mili na hechaka munhu yadahile kumuhonya.
Hoyokwija kulawa kunyuma ya Yesu na kukwafa dihepu dye isuke yakwe, na baho ni baho inhamu yakwe hoihona.
Yesu hoyogamba, “Nani yanikwafile?” Wose fowakanile Petulo hakagamba, “Mundewa, amatewa wakusunguluta na kukuumbilila.”
Ninga Yesu hoyogamba, “Yumonga kanikwafa, kosoko nyona fina ludole lunilawa.”
Na imwanamuke yakone fina nghodaha kifisa hakeja yakutetema na kugwa kumwande yakwe na kumutamila mumeso ga wanhu wose ichilekile yomukwafa na ifyene fyoyahonile baho ni baho.
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Mudala dihuwi dyako dikuhonya, genda mhepo.”
Foyalongage gago, munhu kulawa kwe mukulu we disinagogi keja na kugamba, “Imundele wako kafulusa kufa, unghamwidase Mwalimu.”
Ninga Yesu foyahulike gago hakamubidula, “Unghogohe, huwila du, naye kokuwa muswamu.”
Foyafika ukaya nghamufumile munhu wowose kwingila naye kugati, ninga Petulo na Yohana na Yakobo na iBabakwe ne ing'ina we imwana.
Na wose wendewolila na kuhongesa, ninga hoyogamba, “Munghalile; kosoko nghafile ila kagona.”
Howomuseka, kosoko hawamanya fina kofa.
Ninga hakamukola na umukono wakwe, na kumwinanga yakugamba, “Gomwana inuka.”
Umuhe wakwe howumuwila, na kwimanyima chimwande, Yesu hakalagisa yenghigwe chakudiya.
iBabakwe ne ing'ina hawakisina lugano; ninga hakawalemesa wanghamutamile munhu wowose agalawanise.
Yesu hakawenanga awefusa ikumi na weli na kuwengha ludole na udaha muchanhya ya simhepo na kuhonya sinhamu.
Hakawatuma awefusa kuhubili undewa we Mulungu na kuhonya.
Hakawagamba, “Munghalonde chochose kosoko ya inhambo yenu, si mhando kahimukoba kahimukate kahidipesa,” na munghowe na makasu meli.
Munyumba yoyose yomukwingila, mwikale baho, na kulawa baho mugendelele ne inhambo.
Na ikaya yoyose yene ina wanhu wasikuwahokela, fomukuleuka mukaya iyo kunghunheni amanghundi gowile mumigulu yenu chuwe chitangilo ukwawo.
Howoleuka na kugendela mufijiji, wakutamilisa mbuli swamu na kuhonya chila hanhu howagendile.
Kahi iMundewa Helode hakahulika gose gagoloseke, hakedasika kosoko hailongigwa na wamonga fina, “Yohana kenuligwa kulawa mudifa.”
na wamonga, “Eliya hakeyonesa, na wamonga yumwedu wa Wagonesi wakatali kenuka.”
Helode hoyagamba, “I Yohana hanimudumula ditwi, ninga ayuno nani yene ifinhu fya itisi?” Hoyohananga kumona.
Munyuya yawo awatumigwa hawamutamila gowagolose. Yesu hoyowalonda awefusa ikumi na weli na kuluta kukaya yenangigwe Betisaida.
Amatewa wakahulike howomwandamila, hoyowahokela na kulonga nawo simbuli sa undewa we Mulungu, na kuwahonya awaya wendage kuhonyigwa.
Ninga dijuwa hadikonga kuswa, na waya ikumi na weli howokwija na kulonga naye,
“Uwelage amatewa walute kufijiji na sikaya sa munghanda, wakagone na kupata chakudiya kosoko ayi nyika isikwikaligwa na wanhu.”
Hawagamba, “Wengheni nyeye chakudiya.” Howogamba, “Chichaka chinhu kujumha ino mikate mishano na somba mbili, nghona chisilutile na kugula chakudiya kosoko ye ditewa dino!”
Kosoko hahowa na wanhu fina figulu fishano nhafi. Hoyowatamila awefusa wakwe, “Wagambeni wanhu wekale hasi mufilundolundo fya wanhu makumi mashano nhafi.”
Awefusa hawagolosa nhaifo, awanhu wose hawekwikala hasi.
Hakailonda aiya imikate mishano na siya sisomba simbili, hakenula meso kuchanhya kulanga, na kulumba. Hakaibendula aiya imikate na sisomba na kuwengha awefusa wawagawile wanhu.
Na wanhu wose hawadiya na kwiguta. Na kudondola ifyasigale, fisege ikumi na fili fya fibendu.
Ugele foyejayowa yakutasa ye imwene, awefusa wakwe hawowa hamwedu naye, hakawosa, “Awanhu wakunigamba niye nene nani?”
Hawamubidula, “Yohana Mubatisaji, wamonga Eliya, Wamonga Yumwedu wa Wagonesi.”
Hakamosa yakugamba, “Anyeye nanye mukugamba niye nene nani?” Petulo hakamubidula yakugamba, “Agweye no Kilisito we Mulungu.”
Hakawalemesa wanghamutamile munhu wowose imbuli iyo;
yakugamba, “Imwagila Mwana we Munhu kitang'anyila na magayo mengi na kulemigwa ne wasehe na wakulu wa watambiki na Watulumi na kukomigwa, na mwijuwa dya kadatu kwinuka.”
Kamei hoyowatamila wose Nghona munhu wowose yakuhananga kunyandamila, yakileme imwenyecho na kulonda umusalaba wakwe chila ijuwa na kunyandamila.
Kosoko wowose yakuhananga kuhonya uumi wakwe yakuwagilisa, na ulomo yakuhananga kwagilisa uumi wakwe kosoko yangu, kouhonya.
Kosoko imunhu kopata chambusi chaki yanghapata ichilunga chose na kiyagilisa imwenecho?
Kosoko chila yakunyonela chinyala aniye na imbuli yangu, imwana we imunhu naye komonela chinyala ugele wayakwija mwitunyo dyakwe, mwitunyo dye Babakwe na dya Malaika Wasunhile.
Ninga chawelu nikumutamilani, wabaha wamonga wemile hano awene wasidyona difa mpaka wawone undewa we Mulungu.
Gakaloke majuwa munana, kufulusa kulonga gago, hoyowalonda Petulo na Yohana na Yakobo hamwedu naye na kuluta kwitunda kutasa.
Ugele woyatasage inyoneka ye chihanga chakwe haibiduka na sisuke sakwe hosikwakaika swee!
Langa wanhu weli wendewolonga naye, hawowa awagonesi Musa na Eliya.
Woneka mwitunyo ikulu na kulonga soko ye difa dyakwe dikuhananga dilawanise Yelusalemu.
Petulo na wayagwe wowile naye hawowa na nhongo, ninga howokwinuka na kona ditunyo dyakwe na wanhu weli wemile hamwedu naye.

Na wanhu waya fowamulekage Yesu, Petulo hoyomugamba Yesu, Mundewa, ni fiswamu fina cha hano, leka chigolose fibanda fidatu, chimwedu chako, chimwedu cha Musa, chimwedu cha Eliya. Nghamanyile choyalongage.
Foyalongage nhaifo, ifunde hodikwija na kuwagubika, nawo hawogoha fowengile mwifunde.
Na dijwi hadilawa mwifunde dikugamba, “Ayuno no mwanangu wonimusagule; mutegeleseni!”
Na dijwi diya dikahulikike, Yesu hoyokoneka yemwene. Nawo howonyamala na wasamutamile yoyose gowonile mumajuwa gago.
Mwijuwa dya keli, fowadulike kulawa kwitunda, itewa ikulu hodikitang'anyila naye.
Langa munhu kulawa mwitewa yenula dijwi yakugamba, “Mwalimu nikukutasa umulange imwanangu, kosoko no yuyuno yumwedu.
Langa imhepo imukinya, na baho ni baho hoyotowa chowe, dimuguma chisilisi mpaka kalawa ifulo, na disikumulekela chimwande.
Haniwatasa wefusa wako wadilafe, ninga hawaduga.”
Yesu hoyobidula, “Anye icheleko kichaka dihuwi, chagilile nokikala na nyeye, na kuwafinyilisa mpaka milaki? Mwigale imwanago ahano.”
Kamai foyendeyokwija dipepo hodimukinya na kumuguma chisilisi. Ninga iYesu hoyodigombela dipepo dihile na kumuhonya imujelelo na kumwingha keli iBabakwe.
Na wose howokisina kosoko ya udaha ukulu we Mulungu.
Ninga wose fowesinage soko ya kila chinhu choyagolose, hoyolonga na wefusa wakwe,
“Lekeni simbuli sino singile musinghutwi senu, kosoko imwana we munhu kolafigwa kumikono ya wanhu.”
Ninga wasaimanyile inonga iyo, na hoifisigwa ukwawo, wanghaitange, nawo wende wokogoha kumusa Yesu soko ye inonga iyo.
Na howokwingila mumawango mugati yawo, nani imukulu kusuma wose?
Ninga iYesu foyatanga amadoga ge mimoyo yawo, hoyolonda mwana mudodogi na kumwika habehi naye,
na hoyowagamba, “Wowose yakumuhokela imwana yuno kwisina dyangu, yakunihokela niye, na wowose yakunihokela niye, yakumuhokela ayuya yanitumile, kosoko ayuya imudodogi mugati yenu wose ayo no mukulu.”
Yohana hakabidula, “Mundewa hachona munhu yakuwinga magini kwa disina dyako, na hachimulemesa kosoko nghakiyandamila na seye.”
Ninga Yesu hoyomugamba, “Munghamulemese, kosoko inghowile chinyume chetu kaulwandi lwetu.”
Amajuwa gakasegelele kwe imwene kwinuligwa kulawa muchilunga, hoyohananga kuluta Yelusalemu.
Na hoyotuma watumigwa kumulongolela, awo hawaluta na kwingila muchijiji cha Wasamalia kosoko wamugolosele hanhu.
Ninga awakaya wasamuhokela kosoko hakalongosa injila kuluta Yelusalemu.
Kamei awefusa wakwe Yakobo na Yohana fowonile imbuli iyo hawagamba, “Mundewa ukuhananga chilagise moto kulawa kulanga uwalakase?”
Ninga iYesu hakabiduka na kuwagombela.
Kamei hakawagombela na kugamba, “Musimanyile mwina chidoga chaki chihile kosoko imwana we Munhu nghejile kukoma uumi wa wanhu ninga kuwahonya. Kamei hawaluta mukaya ingi.”
Ninga fowendowogenda munjila, munhu yumwedu hoyomugamba, “Nokwandamila hohose howukuluta.”
Na iYesu hoyomugamba, “Amabwasiko gena makolongo na fidege fya mulanga fina mafulu, ninga imwana we munhu kechaka hanhu hokugona.”
Kwa yumonga kagamba, “Nyandamile,” ninga imwene kagamba, “Mundewa leka nghonge kumusika iBabangu.”
Ninga Yesu hoyomugamba, “Waleke wofile wawasike wayawo wofile; amba gweye leuka ukatamilise undewa we Mulungu.”
