Yumonga kamugamba, “Mundewa nokwandamila, ninga leka nghonge kuwelaga awanhu wa ukaya ukwangu.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Munhu iyagumile umukono wakwe kulima, kayi yekulanga kunyuma, nghagiligwe kuundewa we Mulungu.”
Kulawa baho iMundewa hoyosagula makumi Mufungate na weli, na kuwegala wamulongolele weli weli musikaya na hanhu hoyendoyohananga kuluta.
Hakawagamba, “Uludyo kumugunda mwingi, ninga awagolaji wakefu; mutase iMundewa wa uludyo yegale awagolaji mumugunda wakwe.
Sanghanyeni, mulangisise nikumutumani nyeye fina ngholo mugati ya mausi.
Munghalonde mufuko kahi mukoba, kahifilwatu, na munjila munghamulamuse munhu.
Munyumba yoyose yo mukwingila kunghonga gambeni dihewa dyuwe hamwedu ne inyumba ayino!
Inghowa mwana wa uswamu kabaho, dihewa dyenu dyokwikala hamwedu naye, ninga nghona kechaka, dihewa dyenu dyomuwilani.
Musigale munyumba imwedu, mudiye na kunywa fowakumwinghani, kosoko imutogomi kagiligwa maliho gakwe; munghasungulute kulawa inyumba imwedu kuluta ingi.
“Mukaya yoyose yomukwingila na wanghawahokela, diyeni fikwikigwa kumwande yenu.
Honyeni watamu wawo na kuwagamba, ‘Undewa we Mulungu wija habehi yenu.’
Ninga mukaya yoyose yomukwingila wanghaleka kuwahokela, mulute musinjila sawo na kugamba,
‘Hata dinghundi dye ikaya yenu idinamatile mumigulu yetu chikudikunghuna chuwe chitangilo ukwenu; ninga manyeni fina undewa we Mulungu usegelela.’
Nikumutamilani yokuwa fihufu ku Sodoma kufinyilisa mwijuwa diya kujumha ikaya iya.”
“Usungu wako Kolasini! Usungu wako Betisaida! Kosoko mhali majumo ago agagoloseke ukwenu, gagoloseke Tilo na Sidoni, hawowa wekulamba katali, no kufala suke sa magunia na kwikala mudifu.
Ninga yokuwa fihufu kufinyilisa diliganiso, kosoko ya Tilo na Sidoni kusuma nyeye.
Na gweye Kapelinaumu, togola! Kokwisigwa mpaka kulanga? Koduliswa mpaka kusimu.
Iyakuwahulika nyeye, yakunihulika niye, na yuya yakuwalema nyeye, yakunilema niye, na iyakunilema niye, yakumulema ayuya yanitumile.”
Awaya makumi mufungate na weli howokuya kwa chinyemi, wakugamba, “Mundewa, hata simhepo sikuchogoha seye ku disina dyako.”
Hoyowagamba, “Hanimona Shetani yakulagala fina lumwemwe kulawa kulanga.
Langeni, niwengha udaha wa kujata majoka na fisuswe, ne udaha wose muchanhya ye imunghondo, na hechaka chinhu chidaha kuwabulaga.
Hata nheifo munghasekelele kosoko simhepo sikuwogoha, ninga musekelele kosoko amasina genu gawandikigwa kulanga.”

Ugele uwo Yesu hakonela mwi Muhe Musunhile, hoyosekelela na kugamba, “Nikukulumba, Baba, Mundewa we iisi na Ulanga, kosoko simbuli sino kuwafisa awena misungu na umanyi na kuwagubulila wana wadodogi. Heye Baba, kosoko nofowendile.”
Kawatamila wanhu yakugamba, “Ninghigwa finhu fyose na Babangu, kahi hechaka yamumanyile Mwana ila Baba, kahi hechaka yamumanyile Baba ila Mwana, na wowose imwana yoyakuhananga kumugubulila.”
Kahi hakawabidukila awefusa wakwe na kulonga nawo kwa chinyele, “Ibeka ameso agekona gomukona nyeye!
Kosoko nikumutamilani nhafi, wagonesi na Wandewa wengi hawasulumila kona gomukona nyeye, wanghagone na kugahulika.”
Langa! Mulamusi yumwedu hoyokwima kumugesa, yakugamba, “Mwalimu, nigolose nhani niuhale uumi wa majuwa gose?”
Hakamugamba, “Iwandikigwa choni mwilagiso? Ukusoma nhani?”
Kamei hakamubidula, “Umwende iMundewa Mulungu wako kwa umoyo wako wose, na ichidoga chako chose, na uludole lwako lwose, na imisungu yako yose, na iyehabehi nagwe fina gomwenecho.”
Naye kamugamba, “Kubidula fiswamu, Golosa nhaifo, nagwe kokuwa mumi majuwa gose.”
Ninga imwene hakahananga kiyonesa muswamu, hakamusa Yesu, “Na iyehabehi na niye noyehoki?”
Yesu hakamubidula, “Munhu yumwedu yeja yadulikaga kulawa Yelusalemu kuluta Yeliko, hoyokoligwa na wahiji hawamuhambula na kumutowa, na kumuleka habehi na kufa.
Ninga kwa bahati, Kuhani yumwedu yendoyedulika kupulutila injila iiya, na foyamonile hoyogenda kunghanda.
Kahi ne Mulawi nheifiya, foyafikile baho na kumona hoyogenda kunghanda.
Ninga Musamalia yumwedu munghenda yakwe, yafika baho hoyowile, na foyamonile, hakamonela ubasi,
hakamulutila, kamubaka mafuta na miti na kumoha filonda fyakwe, kahi hoyomukwisa mwipunda dyakwe na kumwigala kunyumba ya wageni, na hoyomulagula.
Na dijuwa dya keli yalafa dinali mbili na kumwingha imwenye nyumba yakugamba, ‘Mulangisise yuno, na chochose chowukwenda ulafe kusuma ino, nokuwisila nghona nikuya.’
“Togola! Yehoki mudatu wawo, yeyonese fina kahabehi na yuya yatowigwe na wahiji?”
Hoyogamba, “Ayuya yamonele ubasi.”
Na Yesu hoyomugamba, “Luta nagwe ukagolose nhaifo.”
Ninga Yesu na wefusa wakwe, fowowile munhambo, Yesu hoyokwingila muchikaya chimonga, na imwanamuke disina dyakwe Malita hoyomuhokela munyumba yakwe.
Malita hakowa na mufunakwe yenangagwe Maliamu, imwene yekala mumigulu ya Yesu na kutegelesa amafuso gakwe.
Ninga Malita hakedasika na utogomi mwingi, hoyomulutila na kumugamba, “Mundewa, ukona fiswanu fonikidasika niimwene, imufunangu kanileka nikutogoma niimwene? Mugambe ninga yanitase.”
iMundewa hoyomubidula, “Agwe Malita, ukugaya na kiidasika na finhu fingi,
chinhu chimwedu chikuhanangigwa. Imaliamu kasagula chinhu ichiswamu, nacho chisileusigwa ukwakwe.”
Yesu yeja yowa hanhu hamonga yakutasa, foyamalile kutasa yumwedu wa wefusa wakwe hoyomugamba, “Mundewa, chifuse kutasa fina Yohana foyawafusile awefusa wakwe.”
Hakawagamba, “Nghona mukutasa gambeni:
Baba,
Disisina dyako ditunyigwe;
Undewa wako wije.
Uchinghe chila ijuwa chakudiya chetu,
na uchilekelele uwihi wetu,
kosoko seye nase chikuwalekelela awachigolosele uwihi.
Na unghachigume mumagesa.”
Kamei hakawagamba, “No nani ukwenu yena mbwiyakwe yomulutila muchilo gati na kulonga naye, mbwiyangu ninghe mikate midatu,
‘Kosoko nijiligwa na mbwiyangu yekulawa nhambo, nani nichaka chinhu cha kumwingha yadiye,’
naye komubidula kulawa kugati, ‘Unghanidase, dibanhi difulusa kuhindigwa, aniye ne wanangu chifulusa kugona, sidaha kwinuka na kukwingha chochose.’
Nikumutamilani, hata nghona nghekwinuka na kumwingha chochose kosoko ni mbwiyakwe, ninga kosoko yakugendelela kumutasa kokwinuka na kumwingha chochose choyakuhananga.
“Nikumutamilani, Taseni, mokwingigwa, hanangeni; mopata, gong'ondeni; nanye mokumuliligwa.
Kosoko chila yakutasa yakuhokela, na kwa yuya yakugong'onda yakukumuliligwa.
Hena Baba yehoki ukwenu imwanagwe yanghamutasa somba komwingha ijoka?
Ama yanghatasa ditagi komwingha chisuswe?
Nghona nyeye gomwina uwihi mumanya kuwengha awana wenu finhu fiswamu, iBaba yenu wa kulanga kamanya mikangha mingahi kuwengha Muye Musunhile awaya awekumutasa!”
Baho yendoyolafa imhepo yowile imutendile imunhu chimumu, imhepo foyalawile ichimumu hoyolonga, na awanhu howokisina lugano.
Ninga wamonga hawagamba, “Yekulafa simhepo kwa udaha wa Belisebuli, imukulu wa simhepo.”
Baho awamonga wakumugesa wakuhananga chitangilo kulawa kulanga.
Ninga imwene yamanya amadoga gawo, hoyowatamila yakugamba, “Chila undewa ukigawa uwecho kwa uwecho usikwima na nhaifo ulukolo kwa ulukolo.
Nghona Shetani yakigawa imwenecho, undewa wakwe wokwima nhani? Kosoko mukugamba nikulafa simhepo kwa ludole lwa Belisebuli.
Kahi nghona nikulafa simhepo kwa ludole lwa Belisebuli, togoleni awana wenu wakulafa kwa ludole lwani? Kosoko yo, awene nowowoliganisa.
Ninga inghowa kwe ludole lwa Mulungu, nikulafa simhepo, ninga mutange fina undewa we Mulungu ufulusa kuwejila.
Ugele munhu yena uludola yakiyohile ifilama fyakwe na kwimilisa ikaya yakwe, ifinhu fyakwe fikala digoya.
Ninga imunhu iyena ludole kusuma imwene yanghamulutila na kumutowa, yakumuhoka ifilama fyakwe foyahuwile na kufigawa ku wayagwe.
Wowose nghowile na niye nghehamwedu nami; na wowose nghakukunjagisa na niye yakwanjasa.”
“Imhepo ihile foikumulawa munhu, ikugenda muluwala kuhananga hanhu hakubwihila, na inghaleka kona ahanhu hokwikala, ikugamba Nokuya kukaya yangu, akuya konilawile.
Na inghoya ikuifika ikaya yakwe ishagiligwe na kuhambigwa fiswanu.
Baho yakuluta na kwigala simhepo singi mufungate sihile kusuma iyene, na sikwingila na kwikala umo, na imunhu yuya nyuwa yakwe ya kundumo ikuwa iha kujumha ya nghonga.”
Foyalongage nhaifo, mwanamuke yumonga mwitewa yatowa ikenje na kugamba, “Ibeka imwanamuke yakweleke, na matombo gowonghile.”
Imwene hakagamba, “Heye, ninga ibeka awekuihulika imbuli ye Mulungu na kuikola.”
Na amatewa fowongesekage, hoyokonga kugamba, “Icheleko chino ni cheleko cha wihi, chikuhananga chitangilo, ninga hechaka chitangilo chochikwinghigwa ninga achiya cha Yona.
Kosoko fina Yona foyowile chitangilo kwe wanhu wa Ninawi, nhaifo nofoyekuwa imwana we munhu kucheleko chino.

Malikiya wa kwekulu kokwinuka mwijuwa dya kuliganisigwa hamwedu na wanhu we cheleko chino na kuwaliganisa, kosoko imwene yeja kulawa ulwandi lwe ndumo ye chilunga, uleke yahulike ubala wa Sulemani, na hano hena munhu mukulu kusuma Sulemani.
Awanhu wa Ninawi wokwinuka mwijuwa dya kuliganiswa hamwedu na cheleko chino na kuchiliganisa, kosoko awene hawalamba kwa mahubili ga Yona, langa ahano hena mukulu kusuma Yona.”
“Hechaka munhu iyakwasa taa na kuifisa ama kuigubika ne isege, ninga yakuika muchigwaso, kosoko awekwingila wone ujelu wakwe.
Digiso dyako no taa yo umutufi wako, digiso dyako dinghowa dikona, umutufi wose winawo ujelu, ninga nghona disikona umutufi wako wina chisa.
Ninga langisisa ujelu uwile umwako ungheje ukuwa chisa.
Ninga inghowa umutufi wako wose umema ujelu, hechaka hanhu hena chisa, wokuwa na ujelu muhala, fina itaa foikumulika na ujelu wakwe.”
Ugele wuwo woyalongage, Mufalisayo yumwedu hakamugoneka kudiya naye ukwakwe, hakaluta na kwikala hamesa.
Imufalisayo hakesina kumona kakonga kudiya chakudiya cha nhegulo nghenati yanawe.
Kamei iMundewa hakamugamba, “Hambiya anyeye Mafalisayo mukusunha kunje ye fikombe na sisahani, ninga kugati mumema upujilaji na wihi.
Anye mubwalate! Iyombile fya kunje soyombile fya kugati?
Ninga lafeni ku wakiwa fyose fuwile kugati na kila chinhu chokuwa chiswanu ukwenu.
“Usungu ukwenu Mafalisayo! Kosoko mukutosa wanhu saka hata musunga na munafu na mabago gengi, na kuno mukuleka ichawelu na uwendo we Mulungu; agano hayagila mugakole kahi munghaleke agamonga.
Usungu wenu Mafalisayo! Kosoko mukwenda amadoga ga kumwande Mumasinagogi na kulamusigwa mumagulilo.
Usungu wenu! Kosoko mukifana filalo ifisikoneka, na awanhu wakugenda muchanhya yawo bila ya kutanga.
Yumwedu wa walimu wa shelia hoyomubidula, Mwalimu kwa kulonga nhafi kuchiliga na seye nheifiya.”
Hoyogamba, “Usungu wenu nanye muwalamusi we isheliya! Kosoko mukuwengha wanhu misigo misito, nanye muweecho musikukwafa ga makanda na chimwedu che fidole fyenu.
Usungu wenu! Kosoko mukushagila fiswanu mifilalo fya wagonesi wakomigwe ne waBaba senu.
Mukuhomelela na kuifumila imilimo ya wasehe wenu; Kosoko hawawakoma, nanye mukujengela ifilalo fyawo.
Na kosoko ubala we Mulungu ukugamba, ‘Nowatumila Wagonesi na watumigwa, awamonga wowakoma na kuwasambasa,’
na sakame ye Wagonesi itike kulawa kunghonga ye chilunga, yohanangigwa kucheleko chino.
Kulawa isakame ya Habili mpaka isakame ya Sakalia, iyakomigwe hagati ye hanhu hasunhile na hakulafila filafwa. Heye nikumutamilani yohanangigwa mucheleko chino!”
“Usungu wenu! Wanhu we malagiso, kosoko muleusa chikumulilo ye misungu; anye muweecho musingile na muwalemesa awaya wendowekwingila!”
Foyaleukage kulawa haya, Watulumi na Mafalisayo hawakonga kumwidasa na kumwanda yalonge mbuli nyingi,
Kumugojela wamukole muchinhu choyedaha kulonga.
Muchigele chicho, wanhu matewa kwa matewa hawakilunda hamwedu mpaka wendewokijata, hakakonga kulonga ne wefusa wakwe kunghonga, “Muwe meso na inungo ya Mafalisayo, nayo no chimwefe.
Hechaka chigubikwe chisigubuligwa, kahi chifisigwe ichene chisikamanyika.
Chochose chomulongile muchisa, chohulikika kuujelu, na chomulongile chinyele kuchumba kugati chotamiliswa munyumba muchanhya.”
“Nikumutamilani wambwiya sangu, munghogohe awaya wakukoma umutufi, kulawa baho wechaka dyowokudaha kugolosa.
Ninga nomutamilani nonani wokumwogoha: Mumogohe ayuya, yanghafulusa kukoma, kena udaha wa kuguma munhu kujehanamu, heye! Nikumutamilani mogoheni!
Togoleni ifindewa fishano fisikuguligwa kwa sendi mbili? Na hechaka chimwedu chikusimiligwa kumwande ye Mulungu.
Nhani, hata sinjwili sa matwi genu sitaligwa sose. Munghogohe anyeye mukwendigwa lugano kusuma findebwa fingi.”
“Na nikumutamilani wowose yekunifumila kumwande ya wanhu, imwana we munhu nheifiya komufumila kumwande ya Malaika we Mulungu.
Amba yuya yekunilema kumwande ya wanhu, kolemigwa kumwande ya Malaika we Mulungu.
Na chila munhu iyekumutofula Mwana we Munhu ngholekeleligwa, amba iyekumutofula Muhe Musunhile nghelekeleligwa.
Na wanghawegala anyeye kumwande ya masinagogi na wandewa na wena udaha munghowe na manhonge ifene fomubidula, hegu fomulonga;
Kosoko Muhe Musunhile kowafusa nyeye muchigele chicho agawagile kulonga.”
Munhu yumwedu mwitewa diya hoyomugamba, “Mwalimu mutamile mundugu sangu yanigawile ichipe changu.”
Ninga hakamugamba, “Gomunhu gwe! Nani yanigolose niye kuwa mulamusi hegu mugawaji wenu?”
Na hakawatamila, “Muhulikise na muwe meso na usulumisi; kosoko uwumi wa munhu usuwile muwingi we finhu foyenafyo.”
Hakawatamila mbasi yakugamba, “Umugunda wa Munhu yumwedu mugoli haweleka lugano.
Hakadoga mumoyo wakwe, ‘Nogolosa nhani kosoko hechaka hanhu hokwika uludyo wangu.’
Hakagamba, ‘Nogolosa chino: Nosimola sikano sangu, na kujenga singi nghulu lugano, na umo nokwika uludyo lwangu na ifinhu fyangu fyose.
Nani nogoga ne chidoga changu nikugamba agwe gochidoga changu kwina finhu fingi foukiikile sigafu kwa miyaka mingi, bwihila, udiye, unywe, ubwede!’
Ninga Imulungu hakamugamba, ‘Agwe kubwalata! Ichilo achi cha diyelo wekuhananga ichidoga chako; na ifinhu foukiikile fokuwa fyani?’
Nofoyowile munhu yakilundila ugoli kosoko yakwe, ninga si mugoli kwe Mulungu.”
Yesu hakawatamila wefusa wakwe, “Kosoko iyo nikumutamilani munghakiidase kosoko yo uumi wenu, modiya choni, hegu kosoko yo umutufi mofala choni?
Kosoko uumi ni muswamu kusuma chakudiya, na umutufi ni muswamu kujumha kwifasa.
Langeni amahowe gasikuhanda kahi kugola, gechaka chilindo kahi kano, na hata nheifo Mulungu yekugegutisa. Anyeye ibeka mikangha mingahi kusuma amadege!
No nani ukwenu kosoko ye chogoho kodaha kongesa majuwa ku wumi wakwe?
Ninga nghona musikudaha kugolosa chinhu chidodogi finacho, nhani mukiidasa kosoko ya gamonga?
“Langeni ga amaluwa, fogekukula; gasikugolosa milimo hegu kubota; hata nhaifo nikumutamilani, hata Sulemani muditunyo dyakwe dyose nghafasigwe fina dimwedu dya gano.
Ninga nghona Imulungu yakudifasa dinyagala dibaho diyelo mumugunda na hosiku dikukubitigwa mumoto, mikangha mingahi kuwafasa anyeye, anye mowanhu we dihuwi dikefu!
Na munghahanange chomudiya choni kahi chomukunywa choni, kahi munghowe na manhonge.
Kosoko amataifa gose ge chiluga gakuhananga ifinhu afi; na iBaba yenu kamanya fina mukufihananga.
Ahanhu hakwe, muhanange undewa wakwe, na finhu fyose fyokuwa fyenu nheifiya.”
“Munghogohe, itewa didodogi, kosoko iBaba yenu kona fiswanu kuwengha undewa.
Yambaseni fyose fyomwinafyo, muwatase awakiwa; kigoloseleni mikoba isikulala, na isigafu ya kulanga isikuhunguka, ahanhu muhiji nghakusegelela na hechaka nondo ikudiya.
Kosoko hena isigafu yako, baho noho ukuwa umoyo wako.”
“Mukiyohe kwa dyodyose dilawanisa, na sitaa senu suwe sikwaka,
na muwe fina wanhu awakumugojela Mundewa wawo kwija ukaya kulawa kuhalusi, soko wodaha kumukumulila chimwande foyakwija na kugong'onda.
Ibeka ku watumwa waya awene wakufikigwa meso iMundewa wawo foyakwija; huwileni nikumutamilani, kokiyoha, kowaleka wekale hamesa na kuwengha chakudiya.
Kahi yangheja habehi chilogati ama habehi na kucha na kuwafika nhaifo ibeka awatumwa wo!
Ninga mutange nhafi, woile imwenye nyumba yamanyile ugele woyakwija muhiji, hakowa yekuwa meso na nghowile yakuleka inyumba yakwe imoligwe.
Nanye nheifiya muwe meso, kosoko imwana we munhu yakwija muchigele chomusimanyile.”
“Petulo hakagamba Mundewa, ukuchitamila aseye du imbasi ayi hegu ukuwatamila wose?”
Na iMundewa hakagamba, “No nani imutogomi musindamafu na iyena misungu, imwene Mundewa wakwe komwika muchanhya ya watogomi wakwe wose, yawenghe ifuka yawo kwa ugele wakwe?
Ibeka imutogomi yuya, imwene iMundewa wakwe yangheja kumufika yakugolosa nhaifo.
Chawelu nikumutamilani, komwika muchanhya ye isawo yakwe yose.
Ninga imutogomi yuya mumoyo wakwe yanghagamba, ‘iMundewa wangu yekwikalisa kwija,’ na yanghakonga kuwatowa awatogomi we chike ne wechigosi, na kudiya na kunywa na kulewa,
iMundewa we imutumwa yuya kokwija mwijuwa dyonghamugonele, na chigele chonghamanyile, kumutosa na kumwika hamwedu na wasikuhuwila.
Na imutogomi ayuya yamanyile inyenda ye Mundewa wakwe, ninga nghekale meso hegu kugolosa fina foikuhananga inyenda yakwe, kotoigwa lugano.

Ninga ayuya inghamanyile, yanghagolosa wihi yagiligwa kujoligwa, kojoligwa hadodogi. Kahi chila yenghigwe fingi, fyohanangwa fingi kulawa ukwakwe; naye yenghigwe fingi na wanhu wohananga fingi lugano.”
“Nija kwasa moto muchilunga, nani hanyendaga uwe ufulusa kwaka.
Ninawo ubatiso unyagile kubatiswa, langa fonikugaya mpaka umemeleke.
Mukudoga fina nija niwengha idigoya muchilunga? Ka! Nikumutamilani, ninga matemanuko.
Kosoko kulawa hambiya munyumba imwedu mokuwa wanhu washano wakitemanule, wadatu kwa weli, na weli kwa wadatu.
Wokitemanhula iBaba munhu ne imwanagwe, na imwana ne iBabakwe; ing'ina ne imwanagwe we chike, na imwana we chike ne ing'ina; ng'ina fyala ne muke mwana, kahi muke mwana ne ingina fyala.”
Kahi hakawatamila amatewa, “Fomukona ifunde dikwinuka kuchanhya mukulonga hamwedu fina ifula ikwija; na ikulawanisa nhaifo.
Na fomukona imheho yo kulume ikupumhuna, mukugamba, ‘Kokuwa na ifuke ikali, na nofoikuwa.’
Anye we chimwefe! Mumanya kutanga ichihanga che isi na ulanga; ninga nhani musikudaha kutanga ugele wa hambiya?”
“Kahi nhani musikulamula muwecho amaswanu?
Nghona ukuluta ne musongesi wako kwe mulamusi, golosa ludole kifumilisa naye munjila, yangheje yekwigala mumikono ya musilikali na imusilikali yakugume muchifungo.
Nikukutamila nghukulawa mo mpaka ulihe isendi ye ndumo.”
Hahowa na wamonga wowile baho muchigele chicho, awamutamile imbuli ya Wagalilaya awakomigwe na Pilato ne sakame yawo kuhasigwa na iya ye filafwa fyawo.
Na hoyowabidula, “Mukudoga fina Awagalilaya awo hawowa na uwihi mwingi kusuma Awagalilaya wose, kosoko hawapatigwa nago gehile?
Nikumutamilani, si nheifo; ninga munghaleka kulamba anye mose nheifiya mukwangilila.
Mukugelegela awaya ikumi na munana awakomigwe kosoko hawogwiligwa na umunala akuya Siloamu, mukudoga fina waya hawowa wehile kusuma wose wekalage Yelusalemu?
Nikumutamilani, wasowile nheifo, ninga munghaleka kulamba anye mose mukwagilila.”
Yesu hoyowatamila kwa mbasi: “Munhu yumonga hakowa na musada uhandigwe mumugunda wakwe; hoyokwija kuhananga mamudyo mumusada na nghagapatile.
Hakalonga ne imwimilisi wo umugunda, ‘Langa, miyaka ino midatu nija kuhananga mamudyo mumusada awu, na sipatile chinhu, ung'enye; nhani ukongha chaka isanga?’
Hakamubidula, ‘Dileke dikule Mundewa, umwaka uno nawo; mpaka nidifukisile na kudigumila mboleya.
Na ungheleka mamudyo umwaka ukwija ni fiswamu, ninga nghona si nheifo, ukudaha kung'enya.’”
Kahi Yesu yendeyofusa Mwisinagogi dimwedu mwijuwa dye Sabato.
Na baho hahowa na mwanamuke yowile mutamu kwa miyaka ikumi na munana kosoko ya kwingiligwa na mhepo ihile, hakatendigwa kagongomana na nghadahage kigolola imwecho.
Na Yesu foyamonile, hoyomwinanga na kumugamba, “Mudala, kuhonyigwa utamu wako.”
Hakamwikila mikono muchanhya yakwe, na baho ni baho hoyogoloka, na kumutunya Mulungu.

Ninga imukulu we disinagogi kadeseka kosoko Yesu kamuhonya munhu mwijuwa dye Sabato, hakawatamila wanhu, “Hena majuwa mutandatu aganogele kugolosa milimo, mwija muhonyigwe majuwa gago, na siyo mwijuwa dye Sabato.”
Kahi iMundewa yamubidula, “Agwe wechimwefe! Chila munhu mwijuwa dye Sabato nghekudohola inghambaku yakwe hegu dipunda dyakwe kulawa mwidewa na kuigala kulwanda?
Na isimwagile imwanamuke ayuno, biti Ibulahimu yowile yohigwe ne chifungo che Shetani kwa miyaka ikumi na munana, yoholigwe kulawa muchifungo mwijuwa dye Sabato?”
Foyalongile nheifo, awanghondo wakwe hawengila chinyala, na wanhu wose weja wonela kosoko ye matunyo gose gagoloseke ne imwene.
Kahi hakagamba, “Undewa wa kulanga ukifana choni? Nouliganisa na choni?
Ukifana mbeyu yo umheja yoyalondile munhu na kuihanda mumugunda wakwe, hayota na kukula na kuwa ibiki ikulu, na fidege hofigolosa mafulu mumanhambi gakwe.”
Kahi keli hakagamba, “Nouliganisa na choni undewa wa Mulungu?
Ukifana nungo yalondigwe ne mwanamuke na kuiguma mu simhishi ndatu sa usage, mpaka usage wose usasa.”
Hakagendelela ne inhambo yakwe kuluta Yelusalemu na munjila hakalokela musikaya na fijiji, na kufusa umo.
Na munhu yumwedu hakamusa, “Mundewa, awakuhonyigwa wokuwa wakefu?” Hoyowagamba,
“Mugangamale kwinjila ko umulongo umusisili; kosoko wengi nikumutamilani wohananga kwingila wanghadahe.
Ugele wokwija imwenye nyumba kokwinuka na kuhinda umulango; mokonga kwima kunje na kugong'onda hamulango, mukugamba, ‘Mundewa, chikumhulile!’ Kowabidula, ‘Simumanyile komukulawa.’
Kahi mokonga kugamba, ‘Hachidiya na kunywa hamwedu na gweye, na hakafusa mukaya setu!’
Ninga kogamba, ‘Nikumutamilani, simanyile komukulawa; leukeni, anye mose muwagolosaji wa wihi!’
“Baho molila na kugwegwejula meno, fomukamona Ibulahimu na Isaka na Yakobo na wagonesi wose mu Undewa we Mulungu nanye muwecho kutagigwa kunje.
Na wanhu wokwija kulawa kundawilo ye dijuwa na kuuswilo, na kulawa kutwe na kwikulu, na kwikala muchakudiya mu undewa we Mulungu.
Langa! Wamonga wakundumo wokuwa kunghonga, na wamonga wakunghonga wokuwa wa indumo.”
Muchigele chicho Mafalisayo wamonga weja, na kulonga naye, Leuka hano kosoko Helode yakuhananga yakukome.
Hakawagamba, “Gendeni kamutamileni ayuya dibwasiko: Langa, nikulafa mhepo na kugolosa uhonyaji diyelo na nhousiku na mwijuwa dya kadatu nikufulusa milimo yangu.
Hata nheifo, inyagila kuluta munjila yangu diyelo na nhosiku na chisindo, kosoko isikudahika Mugonesi yakomigwe kunghanda ya Yelusalemu.

Agwe Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu, goukukoma wagonesi na kuwatowa na mawe awaya awatumigwe ukwako! Mikangha mingahi hanihananga kuwakunjagisa kifana inghuku foikukunyagisa ifyali fyakwe hasi ye mabawa gakwe, kahi musifumile!
Langa inyumba yenu ilekigwa. Nikumutamilani, musinyona mpaka mulonge, Ibeka ayuya iyakwija mwisina dye Mundewa!”
Musabato imwedu Yesu foyaluta kudiya munyumba ya chilongosi yowile Mufalisayo, wenda wemunyembela.
Langa! Hawowa na Munhu kumwande yakwe yowile na utamu wa kufimba mutufi,
na Yesu hakalonga na walamusi na Mafalisayo yakugamba, “Ni fiswanu kuhonya mwijuwa dye Sabato hegu si fiswam?”
Ninga, awene weja wanyamala, kamei hoyomulonda na kumuhonya, na kumuleka yalute.
Hakawagamba, “No nani ukwenu yena dipunda hegu dikambaku idilagale mwikolongo, inghekudilafa chimwande mwijuwa dye Sabato?”
Howonyamala twi.
Kahi hakawatamila mbasi awaya wagonekigwe, foyonile fina fowasagule magoda ga kumwande hakawagamba,
“Unghagonekigwa na munhu kuhalusi, unghekale a hanhu ha kumwande, ingheje ikuwa kagonekigwa munhu mukulu kusuma gweye,
na yuya yawagoneke wose kokwija na kukugamba, ‘Mwinghe luneka munhu ayu,’ baho kokonga kwa chinyala kwikala mwigoda dya hasi.

Ninga, unghagonekigwa, luta na kwikala mumagoda ga kunyuma, kahi imukaya wako yangeja kodaha kugamba, ‘Mbwiyangu, nyagula kuno kumwande, no houkuwa na itunyo kumwande ya wose awekale hamesa hamwedu na gweye.
Kosoko wowose yakiinula kodulisigwa na yakidulisa kokwisigwa.’”

Kahi hakamutamila ayuya yumugoneke, “Unghatogoma chakudiya cha nhemisi ama cha ijuwa ikulu, unghagoneke wambwiya sako, ama wanduguso ama wanhu wa lukolo lwako hegu awagoli we habehi nagwe, wangheje nawo wekugoneka na kuhokela maliho gako.
Ninga foukugolosa sikukuu wagoneke awakiwa, awesikidaha, awechete na womudula;
yokuwa ibeka ukwako kosoko awo wasikudaha kukuliha. Kolihigwa ugele wa kwinuligwa awaya awachawelu.”
Yumwedu wa waya wowekalanye mumesa foyahulike gago, hakamugamba, “Ibeka imunhu iyakiyodiya chakudiya kuundewa we Mulungu!”
Ninga Yesu hakamugamba, “Munhu yumonga hakagolosa sikukuu nghulu, na kugoneka wanhu matewa.
Ugele we chakudiya ukasegelele, hakatuma mutogomi wakwe kuwatamila awaya awagonekigwe, mwije kosoko fyose fifuluka!
Ninga wose wakonga kikojela kwa moyo umwedu. Iwabosi kamugamba, ‘Nigula mugunda, na nikuhanangigwa nilute na kuwona; nghulambila dedede unilekelele.’
Yumonga kagamba, ‘Nigula makambaku ikumi ga ng'ombe, nikwija gagesa, nikukutasa dedede nilekelele.’
Na yumonga kagamba, ‘Nimutola Mwanamuke na kosoko iyo sidaha kwija.’

Imutumwa yuya hoyokwija na kumutamila iMundewa wakwe. Kahi imwenye nyumba kwa nyono hakamutamila imutumwa wakwe, ‘Leuka chimwande ulute kunjila inghulu na kufijila fya kumbago fye ikaya, na uwengise awakiwa, awesikudaha, awechete na wasikona.’
Imutumwa hakagamba, ‘Mundewa, ago goulagise gafulusa kugoloseka na kunghali na luneka.’
iMundewa hakamutamila imutumwa wakwe, ‘Leuka ulute kusinjila singhulu na mumihaka uwadindilise wanhu kwingila kugati soko inyumba yangu imeme.
Kosoko nikukutamila, hechaka yumwedu wa awaya wagonekigwe iyodiya ichakudiya chonikugolose.’”
Baho amatewa makulu ga wanhu gendogamwandamila, hakabiduka na kuwagamba,
“Nghona munhu wowose yakwija ukwangu na nghakumusula iBabakwe, ing'inakwe na imuke na wanagwe, na wanduguse we chigosi ne walumbuse, heye! Na hata uumi wakwe imwecho, nghedaha kuwa mwifusa wangu.
Munhu wowose ingholonda umusalaba wakwe na kunyandamila, nghodaha kuwa mwifusa wangu.
Kosoko no nani ukwenu, yanghahananga kujenga munala, nghakwikala kunghonga na kutala digelo, nghona yenafyo fya kudaha kumala umunala.
Nghona nheifo, foyakumala inghindiso, na nghekudaha kuimala, wose wakona wokonga kumutowa,
wakugamba, ‘Imunhu ayu hakakonga kujenga, kalemeligwa kumalagisa!’
“Kahi kwina Mundewa waki, yanghahananga kitowa nghondo, inghakwikala hasi kunghonga na kudoga fina kodaha na wanhu ifigulu ikumi kwitang'anyila na yuya yakwija kitowa na wanhu figulu makumi meli?
Yanghona fina nghodaha, imiyagwe yekali kutali, yakumutuma munhu na kutasa kilamula.
No nheifo, wowose ukwenu nghakulekelela foyenafyo, nghakudaha kuwa mwifusa wangu.”
“Munyu ni muswanu, amba unghasusuka wogumigwa choni unogelekele?
Usidaha kuwa muswanu kuuisi ama kwikusisi; wanhu wakuutaga. Iyena singhutwi sa kuhulika yahulike.”
Ijuwa dimonga awakong'osa kodi na wena uwihi wose weja wamwijila na kumutegelesa.
Mafalisayo na Watulumi wang'ung'ulika wakugamba, “Imunhu ayu yakuwahokela awena uwihi kahi yakudiya nawo!”
Yesu hoyowatamila imbasi ayi:
“Munhu waki ukwenu yena singholo igana, yanghagililigwa na imwedu, nghakuleka asiya makumi ikenda na ikenda munyika na kuluta kuihananga iyagilile, mpaka yayone?
Na yanghayona, yakuipika mumayega kwa chinyemi.
Na foyekuya ukaya, yakuwenanga hamwedu awambwiya sakwe na wehabehi naye yakugamba, ‘Muwe na chinyemi hamwedu na niye kosoko niyona ingholo yangu yagilile!’
No nheifo nikumutamilani, kokuwa na chinyemi chikulu kulanga kosoko yo kulamba kwa yumwedu yena uwihi kujumha makumi ikenda na ikenda awakoneka fina wechaka nghwina ya kulamba.”
“Mwanamuke waki yena shilingi ikumi, yanghagilisa imwedu, nghakwasa taa na kushagila inyumba na kuhananga digoya mpaka yayone?
Na yanghayona yakwinanga wambwiya sakwe na wehabehi naye, yakugamba, ‘Bwedeleleni hamwedu na niye, kosoko niyona ishilingi yonyagilise.
No nheifo nikumutamilani, kwina chinyemi kumwande ye Malaika we Mulungu kosoko ye munhu yumwedu yakulamba.’”
Hakagamba, “Hahowa na munhu yowile na wana weli.
Na imudodogi hakamugamba, ‘iBabakwe, Baba ninghe ichipe changu ichinyagile, hakawagawila awanagwe aweli ichipe chakwe.’
Majuwa mengi gasilokile, imwana mudodogi hakausa isawo yakwe yose na kuleuka ukaya na kuluta kuisi ya kutali, na uko hakadiya isawo yakwe ku mikalile ihile.
Foyafuluse kudiya fose foyowile nafyo, njala nghulu hoikwingila muisi iya, hoyokonga kuhananga.
Noho yaluta na kutasa Mulimo kwe mukaya yumwedu we isi iya, iyamwigale kumugunda wakwe kulisha singuluwe.
Naye yasulumila kudiya imhumba yadiyagwe na singubi na hechaka munhu yamwinghile chinhu.
Ninga foyagelegele hakagamba, ‘Nhafo watogomi wengahe we iBabangu iwakudiya na kusigasa, ninga niye nikufa ne injala ahano!
Noleuka na kuluta kwe iBabangu na kumugamba, Baba nimugolosela wihi Mulungu na gweye.
Sagile kahi kwinangigwa mwanago, nilonde kifana yumwedu wa watogomi wako.’
Hakaleuka na kwija kwe iBabakwe, ninga foyowile yekali kutali, iBabakwe yamona na kumonela ubasi, hakamubilimila kamukunyatila na kumunonela.
“Ne imwana hakamugamba, ‘Baba, nigolosa uwihi kwe Mulungu na ukwako; sagigwe kahi kwinangigwa mwanago.’
Ninga iBabakwe hakawagamba iwatumwa, ‘Leteni chimwande isuke iswamu, mumufase, kahi mufaseni nyamwidole mumukono wakwe na filwatu mumigulu yakwe;
leteni indama iginile na muichinje, lekeni chidiye na kubwedelela.
Kosoko ayuno imwanangu hakofa, naye mumi kahi; hakagilila naye koneka.’ Na howokonga kubwedelela.
“Ugele uwo imwanagwe imukulu hakowa kumugunda; na foyafikile habehi ne hakaya, hakahulika majwi ga ng'oma na miseigo.
Hakamwinanga yumwedu wa watumwa na kumusa, ‘Ichikugendelela choni?’
Hakamugamba, ‘Imunduguso keja, ne iBabako kamuchinjila ndama inonile, kosoko kamupata mumi na muswamu.’
“Ninga imwana mukulu hakasuha na kulema kwingila; iBabakwe hakaluta na kumugongelesa,

ninga imwana mukulu hakamubidula iBabakwe, ‘Langa minyaka ayi mingi nikala kukutogomela milimo, na sinhati nileke kugolosa agaya gounilagise; kahi nghwinati uninghe hata chipene, soko nyonele ne wambwiya sangu.
Ninga, ayuno imwanago foyejile, yadiile isawo yako hamwedu na we dihabwa, kumuchinjila ndama inonile!’
“iBabakwe hakamugamba, ‘Mwanangu, ugele wose kwahamwedu na niye, na fyose fyoninafyo ni fyako.
Hayagila kunyemuka na konela, kosoko ayu imunduguso hakowa yafile, hambiya mumi, hakagilila, kahi koneka.’”
Kahi hakalonga na wefusa, “Hahowa na munhu mugoli yowile na mwimilisi, usongesi hawija ukwakwe fina, imunhu ayu yendeyoboshola ifinhu fyakwe.
Hakamwinanga na kumutamila, ‘Choni chino chonikuhulika muchanhya yako?’ Lafa inhala yako yo kuhokela na kulafa, kosoko nghukudaha kahi kuwa kalani.
Ayuya ikalani hakadoga, ‘Notea nhani, kosoko iMundewa wangu yakunihoka ukalani? Uludole lo kulima nichaka, na nikona chinyala kutasa.
Hambiya, nimanya dyonigolosa, uleke wanhu wanihokele ukwawo fonikulafigwa mu ukalani.’
“Baho, hakawenanga awasinghokwa we Mundewa wakwe chila yumwedu, hoyamutamila ayuya we nghonga, ‘Ukupigiligwa choni ne Mundewa wangu?’
Hakagamba, ‘Mafuta mapipa igana.’ Hakagamba, ‘Londa ikalatasi ye dideni, ikala chimwande na utulume makumi mashano.’
Kahi hakalonga ne yumonga, ‘Nagwe ukupigiligwa choni?’ Hakagamba, ‘Makanda igana ge ngano.’ Hakamugamba, ‘Londa ikalatasi ye dideni tuluma makumi munana.’
“iMundewa hakamutunya ikalani inghahuwilika kosoko ya ubala wakwe, kosoko awana we chilunga chino wena misungu mucheleko chawo kusuma awana wo ujelu.
Yesu hakagamba Nani nikuwatamila kigoloseleni mbwiya kosoko ye ugoli wihile, kosoko foikwija ihela wodaha kuwahokela muwikalo wa majuwa gose.
Imuchawelu muchidodogi lugano ni muchawelu kahi mudikulu; na yuya imupujili muchidodogi lugano ni mupujili kahi mudikulu.
Ninga nghona musuwile wachawelu mu ugoli uwihile, no nani yewengha ugoli we chawelu?
Na nghona musuwile wachawelu mufinhu fya wanhu wengi, no nani yewengha afiya ifyenu?
“Hechaka mutogomi yedaha kuwatogomela wandewa weli; kosoko ama komusula yumwedu na kumwenda yumonga, ama komwandamila yumwedu na kumubesa yumonga. Musikudaha kumutogomela Mulungu na ugoli.”
Amafalisayo wowile wendaji wa sendi, hawahulika ago gose, na weja wamubesa.
Ninga hakawagamba, “Anye nomukiyonesa kumwande ya wanhu, amba Imulungu kamanya imimoyo yenu, kosoko ikwinuligwa mugati ya wanhu ni lubeso kwe Mulungu.
“Itolati ne wagonesi hafyuwa baho mpaka ugele wa Yohana; kulawa ugele wuwo mbuli swamu yo undewa wa Mulungu ikuhubiliigwa, na chila munhu yakuwingila kwa ludole.
Ninga ni fihufu ku ulanga ne iisi kwagilila, kusuma ichipisi chidodogi che itolati kuhunguka
Chila munhu yakumuleka imuke na kutola yungi yakugolosa ugoni, na iyekutola imuke yalekigwe ne imulume wakwe yakugolosa ugoni.”
“Hahowa na munhu mugoli, yafalage suke sa ibei inghulu na kudiya fina sikukuu chila ijuwa.
Na hamulango wakwe ayuya imugoli yendeyetambalisigwa munhu mukiwa disina dyakwe Lasalo, yena filonda fingi,
yenda yehosa injala yakwe na simhonamhona salagalage kulawa mumesa ye mugoli; kahi amabwa hageja na kumunamha ifilonda fyakwe.
Imukiwa hakafa, malaika hawamwinula mpaka muchifa cha Ibulahimu. Imugoli naye hakafa na kusikigwa,
imugoli foyowa ukusimu, foyowile mumagayo hoyokwinula meso gakwe na kumona Ibulahimu kwa kutali na Lasalo muchifa chakwe.
“Hoyokwinanga kwa dijwi ikulu, ‘Baba Ibulahimu unyonele ubasi, umwigale Lasalo kuchanghisa ichidole chakwe mumeji na kuhosa dilimi dyangu, kusoko nikugaya mwililimba dino.’

“Ninga, Ibulahimu hakamugamba, ‘Mwanangu gelegela fina munyikala yako kuchilunga hakuhokela finhu fiswanu, na iLasalo nheifiya hakahokela finhu fihile; ninga hambiya imwene kowa hano yakuhosigwa, na gweye kwa mumagayo.
Na hamwedu na gago gose, hagati yetu aseye na nyeye hena ikolongo ikulu, kosoko awaya wakwenda kuloka kulawa hano kwija ukwenu wanghadahe, na hechaka yeloka kulawa ko kwija ukwetu.’
“Iyowile mugoli hakagamba, ‘Ninga nikukutasa Baba, umwigale kunyumba ye Babangu,
kosoko nina wandugu sangu washano, naye yawatamile wanghagolose fyene fyonigolose, wangheje nawo wokwija ahanhu hano ha magayo.’
“Ninga Ibulahimu hakagamba, ‘Wenawo Musa na Wagonesi, wawahulike awene.’
Imwene hakagamba, ‘Hata Baba Ibulahimu, amba yanghawalutila yumonga kulawa kwe wafile, wolamba.’
Hakamugamba, ‘Nghona wasiwahulike Musa ne wagonesi, kahi hechaka yewahuisa hata yanghenuka kulawa kwe wafile.’”
Yesu hakawatamila awefusa wakwe, “Amagesa ku uwihi chawelu gokwija, ninga usungu wakwe iyakugagolosa geje!
Haimwagila imunhu yuya nhanga yohigwe diwe dyo kusagila musingo yakwe na kugumigwa mubahali, kusuma kumwagilisa yumwedu wa wano wadodogi ku uwihi.
Kilangisiseni, Nghona imunduguso kagolosa wihi mugombele, na yanghalamba mulekelele.
Na iyakugolosela uwihi mikangha mufungate kwa ijuwa na kuya ukwako mikangha mufungate, na kugamba Nilamba, mulekelele.”
Awefusa hawamutamila iMundewa, “Chongesele dihuwi.”
Na iMundewa kagamba, “Nhanga mowile na ihuwi ikefu fina imhule ye umheja, hamuwa mukudaha kuutamila umukuyu, ‘Uno ng'oka, ukahandwe mubahali,’ nawo hauwa ukufumila.”
“No nani ukwenu yena imutogomi yekulima ama kudima ngholo, yakumugamba foyekuya kumugunda, ‘Wija chimwande, ikala udiye chakudiya?’
Togola! Nghemugamba, ‘Nyambikile chakudiya, ukiyohe unitogomele, mpaka nidiye na kunywa; noho nagwe udiye na kunywa.’
Togola, komugamba kwimage imutumwa yuya kosoko kagolosa goyalagisigwe?
No nheifo na nyeye fomukufulusa kugolosa gose gomulagiswe, gambeni, ‘Aseye cha watogomi wechaka chambusi; chigolosa du yowile milimo yetu.’”
Foyejayowa munjila kuluta Yelusalemu, yeja yapulutila Samalia na Galilaya.
Na foyengilage muchijiji hakatang'anyila na wakoma ikumi, wemile hatali,
hawenula majwi gawo na kugamba, “Yesu, Mundewa, uchonele ubasi.”
Foyawonile yawagamba, “Mulute mukayonese kwa watambiki.” Na fowalutage hawahona.
Kahi yumwedu wawo yakone fina kahona, hakoya kunyuma, yakumutunya Mulungu kwa dijwi ikulu,
na hakakubita hamigulu ya Yesu, na kumwingha ilumbo. Naye hakowa Musamalia.
Ninga Yesu hakagamba, “Siwahonyile ikumi? Awaya ikenda wowahe?
Nghoneke yungi yowile na kumutunya Mulungu ninga imugeni ayu?”
Hoyomugamba, “Inuka ulute, dihuwi dyako dikuhonya.”
Foyosigwe na Mafalisayo, “Undewa we Mulungu ukwija milaki?” hakawabidula, “Undewa we Mulungu usikwija ne fitangilo fikiyonesa.
Na hechaka munhu yegamba, ‘Langa auno hano,’ ama, ‘Auya.’ Kosoko langa, undewa wa Mulungu uwa mugati yenu.”
Na kawatamila wefusa wakwe, “Majuwa gokwija, ugele womukamusulumila kona ijuwa dimwedu dye mwana we munhu, na musidyona.”
Nawo wowatamila, “Langa kuya, ama langa kuno, munghalute,” kahi munghawandamile.
Kosoko fina ulumwemwe foukumulika na kwasa ulanga kulawa ulwandi umwedu mpaka umonga, no nheifo Imwana we Munhu foyekuwa mwijuwa didyo.
Ninga, kunghonga ikuhanangigwa yapate magayo mengi na kulemigwa ne wanhu wo ugele uwo.
Fina foyowile mumajuwa ga Nuhu, no foikwija ikuwa mumajuwa ge Mwana we munhu
Wanhu wendawodiya, wendawokunywa, wendawetola, wendawetoligwa mpaka dijuwa diya Nuhu dyoyengila musafina, na mafaluko hogekwija na kuwakoma wose.
Kahi fina foyowa mumajuwa ga Lutu, wendawodiya, wendawekunywa, wendawogula na kwambasa finhu, wendawohanda, wendawojenga,
ninga mwijuwa diya Lutu foyaleuke kulawa Sodoma homutonya moto kulawa kulanga na kuwalakasa wose.
No nheifo foikwija ikuwa mwijuwa diya iMwana we munhu foyekwija yekiyonesa.
“Mwijuwa didyo, iyowile munyumba muchanhya ne finhu fyakwe kugati yanghahulumuke na kufilonda; na nheifiya, yowile kumugunda yanghoye kunyuma.
Gelegeleni dyalawanise kwe muke wa Lutu.
Wowose yakuhananga kuchihonya ichidoga chakwe yakuchagilisa; na yoyose yakuchagilisa chidoga chakwe yakuchihonya.
Nikumutamilani, muchilo chiya hokuwa na wanhu weli wagonile mwisasi, dimwedu, yumwedu kalondigwa na yumwedu kolekigwa.
Wanawake weli wokuwa wakusaga hamwedu; yumwedu kolondigwa na yumonga kolekigwa.
Wanhu weli wokuwa kumugunda; yumwedu kolondigwa na yumonga kolekigwa.”
Baho howomwusa, Hoki Mundewa? Hakagamba, “Howuwile umufimba noho sikitang'anyila sinumba.”
Hakawatamila mbasi kuwafusa fina iwagila kumutasa Mulungu majuwa gose na wanghasoke.
Hakagamba, “Mukaya imonga hahowa na mulamusi yowile nghakumogoha Mulungu kahi kutunya wanhu.”
Kahi hahowa na mwanamuke mwigane mukaya iyo yamwijilage bila kusoka na kumugamba, “Nigolose muchawelu kumwande ye munghondo wangu.”
Kwa chipisi hakalema; ninga hanyuma hakalonga mumoyo wakwe, “Hata nghona sikumogoha Mulungu ama kogoha wanhu,
ninga kosoko yuno mwanamuke mwigane yakunidasa, nomugolosela foyakuhanga ama konisokesa kwa kwija kwakwe chila ugele.”
iMundewa kagamba, “Hulikeni foyakulonga ayuya imulamusi yechaka chawelu.
Ne Mulungu nonghamba inghowalongela awaya wayasagule, awakulila ukwakwe chilo ne misi? Togoleni! Kokwikalisa kuwategelesa?
Nikumutamilani kowateteya chimwande. Hata nheifo ugele wo yakwija iMwana we munhu muchilunga kodyona dihuwi?”
Kahi hakawatamila mbasi ino, kwa wamonga awekiyona fina hawowa wachawelu na kubesa wayawo.
Wanhu weli hawakwila kwihekalu kutasa, yumwedu Mufalisayo na yumonga mukonghosa kodi.
iMufalisayo hakema na kutasa chiyomoyo, go Mulungu, nikukulumba kosoko aniye si kifane wanhu wamonga, wahokali, wabani, wa dihabwa, ama kifana ayu imukonghosa kodi.
Nikufunga majuwa meli kwa majuwa mufungate, nikulafa saka ya imwedu kwa chila ikumi kwa fyose fyonikupata.
Ninga imukonghosa kodi, yemile kutali, nghendile hata kulanga kuchanhya, ninga haketowa muchifa chakwe, yakugamba, “Mulungu, unyonele ubasi aniye nimugolosaji wo wihi.
Nikumutamilani, imunhu ayu hakoya ukaya ukwakwe yataliligwe muchawelu kusuma yumonga; kosoko chila iyakiinula yakudulisigwa ninga chila iyekidulisa yakwinuligwa.”
Awanhu hawamwigalila Yesu hata awana uleke yawamotese, na awefusa wakone hawalemesa.
Ninga Yesu hakawenanga ukwakwe yakugamba, “Walekeni awana weje ukwangu, munghawalemese, kosoko undewa we Mulungu ni wawo.
Chawelu, nikumutamilani, wowose nghakuuhokela undewa wa Mulungu fina mwana mudodogi nghekwingila mu undewa uwo.”
Na mukulu yumonga wa Chiyahudi hakamusa Yesu, Mwalimu muswamu, nigolose choni uleke niuhokele uwumi wa majuwa gose?
Yesu hakamugamba, “Nhani ukuninanga muswamu? Hechaka munhu muswamu ninga Mulungu yemwene.”
Kugamanya amalagiso: “Unghagolose dihabwa; unghakome; unghadanhe, wogohe iBabako ne ing'inako.”
Hakagamba, “Aga gose nigakola kulawa udodo wangu.”
Yesu yakahulike nheifo, hakamugamba, “Kuhungukiligwa chinhu chimwedu. Yambasa fyose fyowinafyo na ufigawe kwe wakiwa, nagwe kokuwa na sigafu kulanga, kamei wije unyandamile.”
Ninga, foyahulike gago, hakowa na usungu, kosoko hakowa mugoli lugano.
Yesu foyamonile foyasuhile hakatamila Foikuwa nghugutu ku wagoli kwingila kuundewa wa Mulungu!
Kosoko ni fihufu kwe ingamiya kwingila mwihengele dye sing'ano kusuma imugoli kwingila mu undewa we Mulungu.
Awaya wahulike hawagamba, “Ninga no nani yedaha kuhona?”
Ninga hakagamba, “Ichisikudahika ku wanhu, kwe Mulungu chikudahika.”
Petulo hakamugamba, “Langa aseye chileka fyose na kumwandamila.”
Hakawagamba, “Chawelu, nikumutamilani, hechaka munhu yalekile nyumba, ama muke, ama wanduguse we chigosi, ama iBabakwe ne ing'ina, ama wanagwe, kosoko yo undewa wa Mulungu,
inghehokela mikangha mingi hambiya, na muchilunga chikwija, uumi wa majuwa gose.”
Foyawalondile awaya ikumi na weli, hakawagamba, “Langa chikukwila kuluta Yelusalemu, na chila chinhu chandikigwe soko ye Mwana we munhu ne wagonesi chomemelesigwa.
Kosoko kogumigwa mumikono ya wanhu wa Mumataifa, kokogeleligwa na kogoloseligwa kwa chinyala na kutwiligwa mate;
womutowa mikotya na kumukoma, na mwijuwa dya kadatu kekwinuka.”
Amba imene wasatangile dyodyose dya gago, inonga yo, haifisigwa ukwawo, na wasatangile chalongigwe.
Foyafikile habehi na Yeliko, imunhu inghakona hakekalaga hanghanda ye injila na kutasa;
Foyahulika ditewa dyalogage, hakawosa wowile habehi naye, “Kwina choni?”
Hawamugamba, “Yesu wa Nasaleti yakuloka.”
Hakatula chowe, “Yesu, Mwana wa Daudi, unyonele ubasi.”
Na waya wowile kumwande yakwe hawamulemesa, wakumugamba yanyamale; ninga imwene hakongesa kujoja, “Mwana wa Daudi, unyonele ubasi!”
Yesu hakema, na kulagisa yegaliligwe imunhu yuya;
na foyejile habehi, hoyomusa, “Ukuhananga nikugolosele choni?” Hakagamba, “Mundewa, nikuhananga unigubule ameso gangu.”
Yesu hakamugamba, “Ameso gako gagubuke, wone! Dihuwi dyako dikuhonya.”
Baho ni baho ameso gakwe hogegubuka na hakamwandamila, yamutunya Mulungu na wanhu wose wakone gago howomutunya Mulungu.
Yesu hakengila Yeliko na hakapulutila mukaya iyo.
Na hahowa na munhu disina dyakwe Sakayo; hakowa mukulu wa wakonghosa kodi, na munhu mugoli.
Hakagesa kumona Yesu ni munhu wa namuna yaki, ninga nghadahile kosoko ye ditewa dya wanhu naye hakowa munhu muguhi.
Ninga, hakabilima kumwande na kukwila mumukuyu kumona, kosoko hayuwa yapulutile baho.
Na Yesu yakafike ahanhu haya, hakalanga kuchanhya na kumugamba, “Sakayo, hulumuka hasi chimwande, kosoko na mugeni wako diyelo.”
Sakayo hakahulumuka hasi chimwande, na kumuhokela kwa chinyemi.
Awanhu fowonile nheifo, hawang'ung'ulika, Kaluta kuwa mugeni wa munhu yena uwihi.
iSakayo hakema na kumutamila Mundewa, Lnga, Mundewa inusu ye Sawo yangu nikuwengha iwakiwa, na nghona nimudanhilise munhu chinhu chochose, nikumuwisila (nikumuliha) mikangha mine.
Yesu hakagamba, “Diyelo uhonya wingila munyumba ayi, kosoko ayu naye ni mwana wa Ibulahimu.
Kosoko Mwana we Munhu keja kuhananga na kuwokowa ichagilile.”
Fina fowahulikage simbuli siso, hakagendelela kuwatamila mbasi, kosoko hakowa habehi na Yelusalemu, na kosoko wenda wofumila fina undewa we Mulungu wokiyonesa chimwande.
Kosoko yo hakagamba, “Munhu wa lukolo lwa undewa hakaluta ku isi ya kutali kuhokela uludole lwo undewa yanghafulusa kuhokela kuya.
Hakenanga watumwa wakwe ikumi hoyowegha maliho ga minyesi midatu chila munhu na kuwagamba, ‘Goloseni uchulusi ne isendi yo mpaka nomanikwija.’
Ninga, iwanhu we isi iya wasamwendile, na hawatuma wajumbe kunyuma yakwe, wakugamba, ‘Chisikwenda imunhu ayu yachidime.’
“Foyagolosigwe Mundewa hoyokuya na kulagisa awatogomi woyawenghile sisendi wenangigwe na kuluta ukwakwe uleke yadahe kumanya chowapatile.
Iwanghonga keja hameso gakwe yakugamba, ‘Mundewa ifesa yako yeleka mikangha ikumi.’
Hakamugamba, ‘Nitunya lugano, agwe kwa mutogomi muswanmu! Kosoko hakuwa musindamafu muchinhu chidodogi, kokuwa na udaha wa kudima kaya ikumi!’
Na wa keli keja yakugamba, ‘Mundewa, ifesa yako yeleka mikangha mishano.’
Naye hakamugamba, ‘Agwe nagwe kodima kaya shano.’
“Kahi yumonga hakeja yakugamba, ‘Mundewa, aino no fesa yako, haniyoha na kuifisa fiswanu mumusipi.
Hanyogoha kosoko gweye kwa munhu mukugutu, agweye kwa kifana munhu yakulonda ifinhu si fyakwe, na kugola honghuhandile.’
iMundewa hakagamba, ‘Nikukuliganisa kosoko ye simbuli sako gomwecho agwe gomutogomi wihile! Hakumanya fina na munhu mukugutu, nikulonda finhu si fyangu, na nikugola fosihandile.
Ninga nhani nghwaikile kubengi, na kunyija yangu hanuwa nikuihokela ne chambusi yakwe?’
Hakawatamila awaya watogomi wakwe, ‘Londeni ipesa kulawa ukwakwe na mwingheni ayuya iyenaso ikumi.’
Nawo hawamugamba, ‘Mundewa, kenaso ikumi tayali!’
Nikumutamilani, fina chila yena chinhu kokongeseligwa, ninga iyechaka chinhu hata choyenacho kohokigwa.
Ninga, kosoko ya wao wanghondo wangu, wasikuhananga niwadime, wegaleni hano na kuwachinja mumeso gangu!”
Na foyafuluse kulonga nheifo, hakagendelela kumwande, munhambo yakwe kuluta Yelusalemu.
Foyafikile habehi na Betifage na Betania, hatunda dyenangigwagwe Itunda dya Olifeti, hakatuma wefusa wakwe weli
yakugamba, “Gendeni kuchijiji chihamwande yenu, baho mukwingila kwenu modyona ipunda dyohigwe, disinati ditumiigwe na munhu, didoholeni na kudigala hano.
Nghona munhu wowose yangawosa, ‘Nhani mukudidohola? Mugambeni Mundewa yekudihananga.’”
Ninga, awaya watumigwe hawaluta na kona fina foyawatamile.
Fowadidoholage dipunda imwenyecho hakawagamba, “Nhani mukudohola dipunda?”
Hawagamba, “Mundewa yakudihananga.”
Hawadigala kwa Yesu, na hawatandika sisuke sawo mwipunda na kumukwisa Yesu muchanhya yakwe.
Na foyagendelelage ne inhambo, na wanhu hawatandika sisuke sawo munjila.
Yakafike habehi na Yelusalemu, muluduli lwa ditunda dya miseituni, ditewa dyose dye wefusa wakwe hawakonga konela na kumutunya Mulungu kwa dijwi ikulu kosoko ya makulu gowonile yakugolosa,
wakugamba, “Yamotesigwe, imukulu iyakwija mwisina dye iMundewa! Dihewa kulanga na ditunyo kuchanhyasi kulanga!”
Na Amafalisayo wowile mwitewa diya howomugamba, “Mwalimu, wagombele awefusa wako!”
Hakawabidula, Nikumutamilani, awano nhanga wanyamale, amawe gano hagowa gakutowa chowe.
Foyafikile habehi na kuyona ikaya, hakaililila,
na hakagamba, “Hayuwa ikuwa ibeka nhanga nagwe wamanyile imbuli ya dihewa! Amba hambiya ifisigwa mumeso gako.
Kosoko ugele ukwija ukwako, we wanghondo wako wokwikila ikigo, wokusunguluta na kukwingilila kulawa sisandi sose.
Wokubana lugano agweye ne wanago hamwedu, na wasileka diwe muchanhya ye diwe ukwako kosoko nghwamanyile ugele wo kwija kwe Mulungu.”
Na Yesu hakengila kwihekalu na kukonga kuwawinga awaya awambasage,
na hakawagamba, “Itulumigwa, Nyumba yangu yokuwa hanhu ha nhasa, ‘Ninga muigolosa fina mhango ya wahiji.’”
Naye yendeyofusa chila ijuwa mwihekalu. Makohani wakulu, watulumi na wakulu wa wanhu filongosi hawahananga kumukoma,
ninga wasonile njila ya kugolosa, kosoko wanhu wose wasendage hata mbuli yakwe imwedu iwaloke.
Ijuwa dimonga Yesu foyafusage wanhu mwihekalu na kuhubili mbuli swamu, awatambiki wakulu, watulumi na wasehe haweja
na hawamugamba, “Chitamile kwa udaha uhoki ukugolosa gano, ama no nani yakwinghile udaha uno?”
Hakawabidula, “Ani nani nikuwosa mbuli; haya nhamileni,
ubatiso wa Yohana haulawa kulanga ama kuwanhu?”
Ninga awene hawalonga iwecho kwa wecho wakugamba, “Ghona chinghagamba, haulawa kulanga, kochigamba, nhani musamuhuwile?
Ninga chinghagamba, haulawa kuwanhu, awanhu wose wochikubitila mawe na kuchikoma, kosoko wose wamanya mumimoyo yawo fina Yohana hakowa mugonesi.”
Hawabidula fina wasimanyile haulawa hoki.
Na Yesu hakawagamba, “Ani nani sikuwatamila fina kwa udaha wa nani nikugolosa gano.”
Hakakonga kuwatamila wanhu imbasi ayi, “Imunhu hakahanda mugunda wakwe wa misabibu na hakaweka wemilisi na hakaluta kuisi kwa chisele chitali.
Ugele wo kugola, hakegala watogomi ku wemilisi soko yawenghe digelo dyo ugolaji idimwagile, ninga awemilisi hawamutowa na kumuwisa yechaka chinhu.
Hakamutuma mutumwa yungi; imwene naye hawamutowa na kumugolosela fihile, na kumuwisa yechaka chinhu.
Na hakamwigala kahi wa kadatu; ayuno hawamubulaga na kumuwinga.
Kahi ayuya imwenye mugunda hakagamba, ‘Notea nhani?’ Nomwigala imwanangu mwendigwa wangu; nhagela womwogoha.
“Ninga awaya awemilisi wo mugunda wakamone, hawekitamila wakugamba, ‘Ayuno no muhasi; lekeni chimukome ne ichipe chino chuwe chetu.’
Hawamulafa kunje yo mugunda we misabibu na kumukoma.
“Choni choyawagolosela imwenye mugunda awaya awemilisi?
Kokwija na kuwakoma awaya awemilisi, na kuwengha wengi umugunda we misabibu.” Fowahulike imbuli ayo, hawagamba, “Mulungu uchilekelele.”
Ninga Yesu hakawakumhulila meso na kugamba, “Mukudigamba nhani ditulumo dino: ‘Isumbi yowalemile wajengaji igaluka no sumbi ya hagati.’
Imunhu wowose yakugwiligwaa ne isumbi iyo ikumubulaga, ninga inghogwa mwe munhu wowose ikumutiginha.”
Awatulumi na watambikii wakulu hawahananga kumukola muchigele chichiya, ninga hawawogola iwanhu; hawahananga kugolosa nheifo kosoko hawatanga fina hakatowa imbasi ayi kosoko yawo.
Hawahananga luneka lwa kumukola, howotuma wasakulaji, wegolose fina wanhu wachawelu uleke wamutegele kwa simbuli sakwe na kosoko yo wamukole na kumwigala kuwasilikali.
Hawamusa, Mwalimu, chimanya finan ukulonga na kufusa kwa chawelu, na nghukuwalanga wanhu kufihanga, ninga ukufusa chawelu injila ye Mulungu amalagiso.
Ni fiswanu kumwingha Kaisali kodi ama si fiswanu?
Ninga hakatanga ichimwefe chawo, na hakawagamba,
“Nyoneseni isendi, yacholigwe muno nani? Amatulumo gamutaja nani?” Hawagamba, “Kaisali.”
Hakawagamba, “Ninga ifinhu fya Kaisali mwingheni Kaisali, na ifinhu fye Mulungu mwingheni Mulungu.”
Wasadahile kumukola kwa simbuli soyalongile hamwande ya wanhu; hawanyamala twi na hawakisina imbidula yakwe.
Baho haweja ukwakwe Masadukayo, awaya wakugamba fina kwechaka kwinuka awafile, hawamusa,
Mwalimu, Musa hakachandikila fina imunduguse we munhu yatolile yanghafa bila mwana, imunduguse yamuhale imwanamuke na yamwelekele imunduguse wana.
Kweja kowa na wanhu mufungate we nyumba imwedu; wa nghonga hakatola muke na hakatagika bila cheleko.
Kahi wa keli hakamuhala ayuya mwanamuke na kutagika,
na wakadatu hakamuhala, na nheifiya wose mufungate hawatagika bila kuleka mwana.
Kundumo ayuya imwanamuke naye hakatagika.
Togola! Mwijuwa dya kwinuka wafile yakuwa muke wani? Kosoko hakatoligwa na wose mufungate.
Yesu hakawagamba, “Awana we chigele chino, wakutola na kutoligwa;
ninga awaya awagiligwe kuhokela ugele ukwija na kukwinuka kwa wafile wasikutola kahikutoligwa.
Kosoko wasikufa keli, wakifana Malaika na ni wana we Mulungu, kosoko wenuligwa kulawa kudifa.
Ninga fina awafile wekwinuligwa, hata Musa hakonesa fiswanu mu sula ya ichihulo chikwaka hoyamwinange Mundewa ni Mulungu wa Ibulahimu na Mulungu wa Isaka na Mulungu wa Yakobo.
Kahi imwene si Mulungu wa wafile, ninga wa womi, kosoko wose wakwikala naye.”
Na Watulumi wamonga hawagamba, “Mwalimu kulonga fiswamu.”
Nawo wasagesile keli kumusa mbuli ingi.
Ninga hakawagamba, “Ikudahika nhani wagambe fina Kilisito ni mwana wa Daudi?
Kosoko Daudi imwenecho yakulonga muchitabu che Isabuli,
Mundewa kalonga ne Mundewa wangu:
‘Ikala ukulume kwangu
mpaka niwagolose wanghondo wako
fina chibao cha kulwatila migulu yako.’
iDaudi kamwinanga Masiya; ninga kokuwa nhani mwanagwe?”
Awanhu wose fowategelesage, Yesu hakawatamila wefusa wakwe;
Muwe meso na watulumi, awakwenda kugenda wafalile makasu matali na kulamusigwa mumasoko na kwikala mumagoda ga kumwande Mumasinagogina mufyakudiya fye si kukuu.
Wakudiya kunyumba se wegane, na kwa chimwefe wakutasa nhasa nhali. Awano wehokela itoso ikulu mwijuwa dyo uliganiso.
Yesu hakenula meso na kona awagoli fowakuguma filafwa fyawo mwisanduku dyo kulafila,
na hakamona mwigane yumwedu yakuguma mwisanduku sendi mbili.
Hakawagamba, “Chawelu nikumutamilani, imwigane ayu mukiwa kalafa kujumha wose.
Kosoko awa wose walafa sadaka isigafu ye isao yawo, ninga ayu mu ukiwa wakwe kalafa fyose foyenafyo hata chiya choyahuwile.”
Na wamonga fowejawasimulilaga isoko ye dihekalu ifene fodihambigwe na mawe maswamu na finhu fiswamu fowalafile wanhu kumwingha Mulungu, hakagamba,
“Amba kosoko ye finhu fino fomukona amajuwa gokwija disilekigwa diwe muchanhya ye diwe ambadyo disimoligwa.”
Hawamusa, “Mwalimu, agano gokuwa milaki, na chitangilo chokuwa choni ugele wa gano gehabehi kwija?”
Hakawagamba, “Kilangisiseni mungheje mudanhilisigwa, kosoko wengi wokwija kwa disina dyangu, wakugamba, ‘Aniye no mwene, Ugele usegelela!’ Munghawandamile.
Na munghahulika imbuli ye inghondo na chiyunguyungu, munghogohe; kosoko ago gakuhananga galawanise kunghonga, amba indumo isikwija chimwande.”
Kahi hakawagamba, “Wanhu we isi ayi wokitowa na wanhu we isi aiya, na undewa wokitowa na uundewa.
Kokuwa na musingisiko mukulu, na hanhu hengi hokuwa na njala na matamu, na kokuwa na chogoho kikulu na fitangilo fingi.
Ninga ugele ago gose gasinati galawanise wowakola na kuwasambasa, wowegala kumasinagogi na kuchifungo, na wowegala kumwande ya wandewa na Majumbe, kosoko ye disina dyangu.
Achino chokuwa chigele ukwenu cha kutamilisa dihuwi dyenu.
Mumadoga genu muwe na mbuli ayi munghadoge ugele usinati wije mobidula nhani,
kosoko aniye nomweghani misungu, hechaka munghondo yedaha kuwasuma ama kuwahilula.
Waweleke, wandugu senu, wewahabehi nanye na wambwiya senu wowasongesa na wamonga wenu wokomigwa;
Mosuligwa na wanhu wose kosoko ye disina dyangu.
Musikwagilisa hata ulujwili lumwedu lwa matwi genu.
Kwa kugugumila kwenu mouhokela uumi we chawelu.”
“Ninga munghona ikaya ya Yelusalemu ikusungulutigwa na wasilikali, baho mutange fina ugele wo kutikimisa ikaya usegelela.
Baho lekeni awowile Uyahudi watijile kumatunda, na awowile mukaya waleuke, na awowile kumigunda wanghengile mukaya,
kosoko amajuwa gago ni ge Mulungu kuwatosa awanhu wakwe, kamemelesa gose agatulumigwe.
Usungu wawo awanawake wakiyohe na wakonghesa mumajuwa gago! Kosoko mokuwa na magayo makulu muisi na nyono muchanhya ye wanhu.
Wakomigwa kwa ukali we dipanga, na wogolosigwa mateka ku mataifa gose, na Yelusalemu yolwatigwa na wamataifa mpaka ugele wawo umemelekele.”
“Fitangilo fokoneka mwijuwa, mumwesi na musinyelesi, na muchilunga mokuwa na magayo kosoko ya ichowe che bahali ne inghundali ya mawimbi gakwe.
Wanhu wosimia kwa chogoho, fina fowakugoja agekwija muchilunga, kosoko ifinhu fyo kulanga fyosingisika.
Baho wakiyawomona imwana we Munhu yakwija mumafunde kwa ludole na itunyo ikulu.
Na baho simbuli so singhakonga kulawanisa, sangalaleni na kwinula matwi genu, kosoko uhonya wenu ufulusa kwija.”
Na hakawatamila kwa mbasi: “Langeni umutini na mabiki gose;
chimwande fogakukonga kutuguta mukona muweecho na kumanya fina ichilangasi chahabehi.
No nheifo munghona simbuli aso sikulawanisa, mumanye undewa we Mulungu wa habehi:
Cawelu, nikumutamilani, icheleko chino chisiloka mpaka gose gagoloseke.
Ulanga ne iisi foloka, amba si mbuli sangu sisikuloka ng'o.
Ninga kilangisiseni, imimoyo yenu ingheje isumigwa na anasa na unywaji na magayo ga ugima uno, na dijuwa diya hodiwajila kwa kusinhukisa fina umutego foukugwisa.
kosoko yowejila wose wakwikala muchilunga chose.
Ninga muwe meso na mutase majuwa gose, soko muwe na ludole lwa kuhona na ago gose gelawanisa, na kwima kumwande ye Mwana wa Munhu.”
Chila ijuwa yendeyofusa mwihekalu, nina hechilo yendeyoluta kwitunda dye miseituni na kwikala uko.
Na nhousikusiku wanhu wengi hawamwijila mwihekalu na kumutegelesa.
Kahi dijuwa dikulu dye imikate isigumigwe nungo dyenangwa Pasaka hadyuwa habehi.
Na awatambiki wakulu ne watulumi weja wahanangaga njila ya kumukoma; ninga wenda wewogoha awanhu.
Ishetani hakamwingila Yuda yenangigwagwe Isikalioti, yowile yumwedu wa waya ikumi na weli;
Hakaluta na kusimulila na awakulu wa watambiki na filongosi we dihekalu fina foyemulafa ukwawo.
Hawonela lugano na hawalagana fina womuliha mapesa.
Yuda hakafumila, na hakahananga luneka lwa kumusongesa ukwawo, ugele amatewa gehechaka.
Kahi hosikwija dijuwa dye imikate isigumigwe nungo, adyo no dijuwa dyo kuchinja ingholo ye Pasaka.
Yesu hakawatuma Petulo na Yohana yakugamba: Luteni na kuigolosa iPasaka kosoko yetu chidiye.
Hawamugamba, “Hoki houkuhananga chikugolosele?”
Hakawagamba, “Langa, fomukwingila mukaya motangana na munhu mugosi yetwike ibiga dya meji, mwandamileni na mwingile munyumba yoyekwingila;
mutamileni imwenye nyumba, ‘Mwalimu yakusa chuwa hoki ichibuha che wageni, honidiya iPasaka hamwedu na wefusa wangu?’
Naye komonesani chibuha chikulu che golofa chihambigwe, muchitengele umo.”
Hawaluta na kona fina foyawasigilile nawo hawailenga iPasaka.
Na ugele ukafike hoyokwikala mumesa hamwedu ne watumigwa wakwe.
Hakawagamba, “Nyenda lugano kudiya iPasaka ino hamwedu na nyeye akuno sinati nigaye.
Kosoko nikumutamilani, siidiya keli iPasaka mpaka imemelesigwe mu undewa we Mulungu.”
Hakalonda chikombe, na foyamulumbile Imulungu hakagamba, “Londeni chino na munywe hamweu;
Kosoko nikumutamilani kulawa diyelo sikunywa keli difai mpaka undewa we Mulungu foukwija.”
Hakalonda umukate, na yakalumbe hakaubendula na kuwengha, yakugamba, “Awuno no umutufi wangu ukulafigwa kosoko yenu. Goloseni dino kwa kunigelegela niye.”
Hakagolosa nheifiya na kuchikombe, fowafuluse kudiya ichakudiya che hegulo hakagamba, “Chikombe chino ni ilagano disha mu sakame yangu iikwitika kosoko yenu.
Ninga, langeni ayuya yenisongesa kahamwedu na niye mumesa!
Kosoko imwana we Munhu yakufa fina foiandikigwe, ninga usungu wakwe imunhu yuya yemusongesa!”
Hawakonga kiyusa awecho kwa wecho, ni nani mugati yawo yegolosa dino.
Hahowa na lukani mugati yawo, fina no nani iyekutaligwa kuwa mukulu kujumha wose.
Yesu hakawagamba, “Awandewa wa Mataifa wakuwadima wanhu kwa ludole, na waya wena udaha muchanhya yawo wekwinangigwa Watasi wa wanhu.
Ninga inghowe nhaifo ukwenu; amba imukulusi ukwenu yowe fina mudodogisi, na ichilongosi yowe yakuwatogomela.
Kosoko imukulu no yehoki, ayuya yakwikala mumesa, ama ayuya yakutenga chakudiya? So yuya yakwikala mumesa? Ninga aniye na mugati yenu fina yumwedu yakutogoma.
Anyeye nomugendelele kuwa hamwedu na niye mumagesa gangu;
fina iBabangu foyaninghile niye undewa, no nheifo nikuwenghani nyeye.
Mudahe kudiya na kunywa mumesa yangu mu undewa wangu, na kwikala mwigoda dyo undewa na kuwaliganisa amakabila ikumi na meli ga Isilaeli.”
Simoni, Simoni, tegelesa Shetani hakakuhananga uleke yadahe kukusunga fina ngano.
Ninga nitasa kosoko yako idihuwi dyako dinghahunguke; nagwe foukwija unyuwila keli wagume ludole awanduguso.
Petulo hakagamba, “Mundewa, aniye nifumila kuluta na gweye kwigelesa na hata kukomigwa.”
Hakagamba, “Nikukutamila Petulo, dijogolo disikwika diyelo, mpaka gweye ukuwa unikanile mikangha midatu fina nghunimanyile.”
Hakawagamba, “Togoleni, baho fonawegale bila mufuko ama mukoba ama filwatu, hamuhungukiligwa na choni?” Hawagamba, “Chisahungukiligwe na chinhu.”
Yesu kawagamba, “Amba hambiya, leka imunhu yena mufuko yaulonde, na yena umukoba nheifiya. Ninga imunhu nghona yechaka ipanga yause dikasu dyakwe yagule dimwedu.
Iwandikigwa fina hakataligwa hamwedu na wena uwihi Amatulumo gano mpaka gamemelesigwe ukwangu; kosoko iwandikigwe muchanhya yangu ina umemeleso wakwe.”
Nawo hawagamba, “Mundewa, Langa hano hena mapanga meli;” Hakagamba, “Fiswamu.”
Hakaleuka, na kuluta kwitunda dye miseituni fina foyasowele, na wefusa wakwe hawamwandamila.
Na yakafike uko hakawagamba, “Taseni, mungheje mukwingila mumagesa.”
Na imwene hohonitemanula nawo chipisi cha kukubita diwe, hakafugama na kutasa.
Baba, unghahananga unileusile ichikombe achi, hata nhaifo, si nyenda yangu, amba iyako igoloseke.
Na baho imalaika hakoneka ukwakwe kulawa kulanga na kumwingha ludole.
Na foyowile mu usungu mukulu hakatisa lugano; na difuke dyakwe digaluka fina matwene ga sakame gakulagala hasi.
Na foyafuluse kutasa, hakeja kuwefusa wakwe na hakawona fina wagona kosoko yo usungu,
na hakawagamba, “Nhani mukugona? Inukeni mutase mungheje mukwingila mumagesa.”
Na foyalongage nhaifo, hodikwija itewa dya wanhu dikulongosigwa na munhu yenangigwagwe Yuda, yumwedu wa wefusa ikumi na weli. Hakamusegelela Yesu uleke yamunonele.
Ninga Yesu hakamugamba, “Yuda ukumosongesa Mwana we Munhu kwa kumunonela?”
Na wowile habehi naye fowonile gakuhananga galawanise, hawagamba, “Mundewa, chiwateme na mapanga?”
Na yumwedu wawo hakamutowa imutumwa Kuhani mukulu na kumudumula inghutwi yakwe yo kulume.
Ninga Yesu hakagamba, “Lekeni, munghagolose keli!” Hakamukwafa inghutwi yakwe na kumuhonya.
Kahi Yesu hakalonga na wakulu wa watambiki na filongosi we dihekalu na wasehe, awejile kumukola, “Mwija na mapanga na mapulo fina kukola muhiji?
Fonyowile hamwedu na nyeye majuwa gose mwihekalu musanikolile. Ninga auno no ugele wenu, na ugele wa ludole lwa chisa.”
Baho hawamukola na kumulongosa kumwigala kunyumba ye Kohani mukulu. Petulo hakamwandamila kwa kutali.
Na fowasile moto hagati ye dikumbo, hawakala hasi na kotela, Petulo hakekala hamwedu nawo.
Imutumishi yumonga we chike yakamone Petulo kekala mu ujelu na kumulanga fiswanu, hakagamba, “Imunhu ayu naye hakowa naye.”
Ninga hakakana, yakugamba, “Gomwanamuke, simumanyile.”
Hanyuma chidogo munhu yungi yamona na kumugamba, “Agwe nagwe kwa yumwedu wa wawo.” Ninga Petulo hakagamba, “Gomunhu gwe, si yumwedu wawo.”
Na chikaloke chigele cha isaa dimwedu kahi munhu yungi hakalonga kwa mukaso, yakugamba, “Chawelu imunhu ayu naye hakowa naye; kosoko ni Mugalilaya.”
Ninga Petulo hakagamba, “Go munhu, simumanyile choukulonga.” Na baho ni baho foyowile yekali longa dijogolo hadika.
Na iMundewa hakabiduka na kumulanga Petulo. Na Petulo hakagelegela imbuli ye Mundewa fina foyamutamile, “Dijogolo disinati dike diyelo, ukunilema mikangha midatu.”
Hakalawa kunje na kulila lugano.
Na awanhu wamwilisage Yesu hawamwogelela na kkumutowa;
na hawamugubika chitambala muchihanga na kumusa, “Tanga no nani yakutowile?”
Hawalonga mbuli nyingi ukwakwe na kumuliga.
Kukoche, wasehe wa wanhu, watambiki wakulu na watulumi, hawatang'anyila na hawamulongosa kwi balasa dyawo, na hawagamba,
“Nghona gweye no Kilisito chitamile.” Ninga hakawagamba, “Ninghamutamilani, musihuwila;
na ninghawosa, musinibidula.
Ninga kulawa hambiya na kugendelela, Imwana we Munhu yakwikala kumukono wo kulume lwa uludole lwe Mulungu.”
Na wose hawagamba, “Ninga gweye kwa Mwana we Mulungu?” Naye hakawagamba, “Anye muilonga, fina na mwana we Mulungu.”
Nawo hawagamba, “China nghwina kahi ya uhomelesi ungi? Chihulika chiwecho kulawa mumulomo wakwe.”
Kahi ditewa dyose hodikwinuka na kumwigala Yesu kwa Pilato.
Hawakonga kumusongesela wakugamba, “Chimona imunhu ayu yakukubuganisa ditaifa dyetu na kuwalemesa wanhu kuliha kodi kwa Kaisali na kugamba imwene no Mundewa Kilisito.”
Pilato hakamusa, “Agweye no Mundewa wa Wayahudi?” Na hakamubidula, “Agwe kuilonga.”
Ne Pilato hakalonga na Makohani wakulu na matewa, “Sonile uwihi we munhu yuno.”
Ninga awene wadindilisa wakugamba, “Yakuwasongesa wanhu kwa kufusa ku Yudea yose, kulawa Galilaya mpaka kuno.”
Pilato yakahulike gago, hakosa nghona Yesu ni Mugalilaya.
Foyamanyile fina kowa mu undewa wa Helode, hakamwigala kwa Helode, yowile Yelusalemu muchigele chicho.
Foyamonile Yesu iHelode hakonele lugano kosoko hakahanangaga kumona, kosoko hakahulika mbuli nyingi muchanhya yakwe, na hakahuwila kona majumo gamonga gekugolosigwa ne mwene.
Naye Helode hakamusa mbuli nyingi; ninga Yesu nghamubidula.
Amakohani wakulu na watulumi hawalawa kumwande na kulafa uhomelesi wawo kwa ludole.
Na Helode ne wasilikali wakwe hawamugolosela kwa chinyala na kumogelela, kahi hawamufasa ikasu iswamu lugano, hakamuwisa kwa Pilato.
Helode na Pilato hawowa mbuya kulawa dijuwa diya, kosoko weseyendage ugele adino disinati dilawanise.
Kahi Pilato hakenanga hamwedu Amakohani wakulu na filongosi wa wanhu,
na hakawagamba, “Mumwigala ukwangu imunhu ayu fina kabuganisa wanhu, nani langa nilamula simbuli sakwe mumeso genu, kahi sonile dyodyose dihile muuhomelesi wenu wose ukwakwe;
nheifiya Helode naye kosoko kamuwisa ukwetu. Langa! Nghagolose chochose chimwagilile yakomigwe;
kosoko yo nomutowa na kumudohola.”
Pilato hakahanangigwa yawadoholele munhu yumwedu mwijuwa dikulu.
Ninga awanhu wose howojoja hamwedu, Chileusile imunhu ayu na uchidoholele Balaba.
Munhu yagumigwe kugati kosoko ye finju yalawanise mwikaya, na kwa ukomaji.
Pilato hakahananga kumohola Yesu, hakalonga nawo keli;
ninga hawatowa chowe Yasambasigwe, musambase!
Kahi lwakadatu hoyolonga nawo, “Nhani, kagolosa choni chihile? Sonile umwakwe mbuli yoyose ihile imwagile kufa; kosoko yiyo nomujola na kumudohola.”
Ninga hawakonya kuhananga kwa majwi makulu fina yasambasigwe. Na majwi gawo hagasuma.
Pilato yalamula fina ingwina yawo igoloseka.
Hakamoholela imunhu yagumigwe kugati kosoko ye ulefi na ukomaji, wowamuhanange, ninga iYesu hakamulafa yakomigwe fina fowendile.
Fene fowamulongose kulawa kwa Pilato, hawamukola munhu disina dyakwe Simoni wa Kilene yalawage kumugunda, na kumutwika umusalaba yaupike kunyuma ya Yesu.
Na baho hadimwandamila itewa ikulu dya wanhu, hamwedu na wanawake walilage na kuhongesa.
Ninga Yesu yayabidukila na kuwagamba, “Muwanawake wa Yelusalemu, munghanililile niye ninga mukililile muweecho na mulile kosoko ye iwana wenu.
Kosoko langeni! Amajuwa gekwija nawo wekwija welonga, Ibeka awechaka cheleko, na sinda siseleke, na matombo gasonghese!
Nawo wakonga kulonga na matunda, Chugwileni na fitongo Chigubikeni.
Nghona wagolose dino mwibiki dideke yokuwa nhani mwibiki dinyalile?”
Kahi hawawalonda wanhu weli wowile wabanaji, hawawalongosa wawakome hamwedu na Yesu.
Na fowejile ahanhu hekinangigwa Iguha dya ditwi, baho howomusambasa na waya wabanaji, yumwedu kulume na yumonga kumoso kwakwe.
Na Yesu hakagamba, “Baba uwonele ubasi kosoko wasimanyile chowakugolosa. Na hawegawila sisuke sakwe kwa kutowa kula.”
Na wanhu hawema baho na kulanga, ninga, ifilongosi hawamujowa wakugamba, “Hakahonya wamonga; lekeni yakihonye imwenecho, nghona imwene no mubakigwa we Mulungu yasaguligwe!”
Wasilikali nawo hawamogelela, haweja na kumwingha siki,
wakugamba, “Nghona gweye uMundewa wa Wayahudi kihonye gomwecho!”
Muchanhya yo musalaba hahowa na matulumo AYUNO NO MUNDEWA WA WAYAHUDI.
Yumwedu wa waya wabani watungikigwe hakamuliga yakugamba, “Agweye so Kilisito? Kihonye gomwecho na seye.”
Ninga iyumonga hakamugombela yakugamba, “Nghukumogoha Imulungu, nagwe kuwa munamulwa iyo?
Naseye ichagila, kosoko chikuhokela amaliho ge sinhenda setu, amba imunhu ayu nghagolose dyodyose dihile.”
Na hakagamba, “Yesu unigelegele no maa ukwingila muundewa wako.”
Na Yesu hakamugamba, “Chawelu, nikukutamila, diyelo ukuwa na niye kulanga.”
Hachuwa chigele cha saa mutandatu, hakuwa na chisa muisi yose mpaka saa ikenda;
dijuwa fyodyadugile kwalika; na dipasia dye dihekalu dyadegeka fipande fili.
Baho Yesu hakalila kwa ijwi ikulu yakugamba, “Baba mumikono yako nikwika ichidoga changu! Na foyalongile nhaifo hakatajika.”
Ayuya imukulu wa wasilikali yakone galwanise, hakamutunya Mulungu na kugamba, “Chawelu, imunhu ayu hakowa muswamu.”
Na amatewa wose watang'anyile kosoko yo kona imbuli ayo yo usungu, fowonile chagoloseke, hawoya ukaya wakwitowatowa mumhambaga.
Wengi wamumanyile, na awanawake wamwandamile kulawa Galilaya hawema hatali na kona fiswamu imbuli ayo.
Hahowa na munhu disina dyakwe Yusufu kulawa mukaya ye Chiyahudi ya Alimataya. Hakowa yumwedu wa wasehe we dibalasa, munhu muswanu na muchawelu,
imwene nghefumilise ne weyagwe soko ya diya dyowalamule na kugolosa, na yendeyongojela undewa we Mulungu.
Imunhu ayu hakaluta kwa Pilato na kuutasa umutufi wa Yesu.
Hoyouhumulusa na kuwoha musanda na kuwika muchilalo chowile mwiwe, nacho chisinghati chisikigwe munhu.
Hadyuwa ijuwa dya maandaliwo, ne sabato hayuwa habehi na kukonga.
Awanawake walawile Galilaya hamwedu naye hawamwandamila Yusufu na kuchona ichilalo na fowamusikile;
kahi howokuya, na hawagolosa mafuta ge mhungileu.
Mwijuwa dye sabato hawabwihila fina foyalagisigwe.
Ninga dijuwa dye inghonga ye dijuma, hawaluta kuchilalo, na kulonda amafuta ge imhungile swamu gowagolose.
Hawona idewe dyo kuhindila difingilisigwa kulawa muchilalo.
Ninga fowengile kugati, wasawonile umutufi wa Yesu.
Fowedasikage kosoko ye imbuli ayo, langa! Wanhu weli wema habehi nawo wena suke njelu swee;
na fowowile na chogoho na kukinya ameso gawo hasi, awanhu waya hawawagamba, “Nhani mukumulangisa imumi kuwanhu wafile?
Kahechaka hano, ninga kenuka. Gelegeleni fina foyawatamile foyowile yekali Galilaya,
fina, Imwana we munhu, kolafigwa mumikono ye wanhu wena uwihi, nawo womusambasa, na mwijuwa dya kadatu kokwinuka.”
Baho hawagelegela simbuli sakwe,
na wakoye kulawa kuchilalo, hawawatamila gose go awaya ikumi na yumwedu na wose wasigale.
Awanawake wo, hawowa Maliamu Magidalene na Yoane na Maliamu ing'ina wa Yakobo na wanawake wamonga wowowile nawo, hawawatamila awatumigwa;
ninga simbuli asi hasoneka ni sa ubwalasi ukwawo na wasasihuwile.
Ninga Petulo hakenuka na kubilima ku chilalo, hakenama na kulanga kugati hakona isanda iimwene, na hakoya ukaya yakwisina kwa soko ya dilawanise.
Mwijuwa didyo weli wa wefusawakwe wenda weluta muchijiji chikwinangigwa Emau, utali wa isaa dimwedu nhafi kwa migulu kulawa Yelusalemu,
na wenda wesimulila awecho soko ye simbuli sose silawanise.
Fowasimulilage na kuwanga hamwedu, Yesu imwecho hakawejila na kwilongosa nawo.
Ninga ameso gawo hagahindigwa wanghamutange.
Hakawagamba, “Mbuli saki sino somukugenda mulonga?” Hawema, wakunyahala ifihanga fyawo.
Yumwedu wawo yekinangigwa Kileopa, hoyomubidula, “Agweye kwa mugeni we mwene ku Yelusalemu nghumanyile imbuli ilawanise kuya mumajuwa gano?”
Kawagamba, “Mbuli yaki?” Hawamugamba, “Imbuli ikumuhusu Yesu wa Nasaleti, yowile mugonesi yena udaha mu go yakulonga na kugolosa kumwande ye Mulungu na wanhu,
na ifyene wakulu wa Makuhani na wakulu wetu fowamulafile yahokele indamulwa ye difa, kahi yasambasigwe.
Ninga hachihuwila fina imwene hakowa yakuwakombola Isilaeli. Heye, na kuleka gago gose, diyelo ni ijuwa dija kadatu kulawa gano galawanise.
Hamwedu na gago, awanawake wamonga wamwandamilage fina seye, wachitinhusa; hawaluta kuchilalo nhousikusiku.
Na wasawonile umutufi wakwe, na woya wakugamba fina hawalawiligwa na malaika, wawatamile fina ni mumi.
Awamonga wowile na seye hawaluta kuchilalo na kona fina awanawake fowalongile, ninga imwene wasamonile.”
Hakawagamba, “Anye mu wanhu muwabwalasi! Na wakugutu wa kuhuwila gose galongigwe na wagonesi?
Togoleni, isamwagile imubakigwa, yapate magayo gano na kwingila ku undewa wakwe?”
Yakonga kulawa Musa na wagonesi wose, kawagubulila mumatulumo masunhile simbuli sose simwagile imwene.
Kahi hawachisegelela ichijiji chowalutage. Imwene hakakigolosa fina yakuhananga kugendelela kumwande;
ninga hawamulemesa wakugamba, “Ikala na seye, kosoko dijuwa diswa.” Baho hakaluta na kwikala nawo.
Foyowile muchakudiya hamwedu nawo, hakalonda umukate kuumotesa, na kaubendula na kuwengha.
Na ameso gawo hagagubuka na hawamutanga; naye hakaleuka mumeso gawo.
Hawakiyusa, Imimoyo yetu isakile mugati yetu foyalongage na seye munjila, foyachigubulilage amatulumo masunhile?
Kamei hawenuka muchigele chichiya na kuya Yelusalemu; na hawawafika awaya ikumi na weli wetang'anyile hamwedu na waya wose wowile nawo,
wagambile, iMundewa kenuka chawelu na keyonesa kwa Simoni!
Baho, awatumigwa aweli hawawatamila galawanise munjila na fyene fowamutangile mu kuubendula umukate.
Fowalongage gago, Yesu imwecho hakema mugati yawo na kuwagamba, “Digoya dyuwe ukwenu.”
Ninga hawatinhuka na kwingilwa na manhonge, na hawamanya fina wona isoki.
Na hakawagamba, “Nhani mukiidasika, na nhani mukiyusa mumimoyo yenu?
Langeni imikono ne migulu yangu, fina no niye nimwenecho, nyalabaseni munilange, kosoko umusikule wechaka nyama na maguha fina fomukona ninafo.”
Na yakalonge gago, hakawonesa imikono ne imigulu.
Na fowowile wenghali kuhuwila kosoko ye inyemo na kukisina, hakawagamba, “Mwina chochose hano chakudiya?”
Hawamwingha chibendu cha somba ibanikigwe,
na hakakilonda na kudiya mumeso gawo.
Kahi hakawagamba, “Asi no simbuli sonalongile na nyeye, fonowile nikali na nyeye, fina chila chinhu chitulumigwe muchanhya yangu mutolati ya Musa na wagonesi na Musabuli ikuhanangigwa chimemelekele.”
Noho yawagubulila imisungu yawo wadahe kugatanga amatulumo,
hakawagamba, “Nofo itulumigwe fina iKilisito kogaligwa, na mwijuwa dya kadatu kokwinuka kulawa kuwanhu wafile,
na fina kulamba na kulekeleligwa uwihi fikuhanangigwa fihubiliigwe mudisina dyakwe kuMataifa gose kukongela Yelusalemu.
Anyeye mwa wahomelesi wa simbuli asi.
Langeni, nomwigalilani ayuya iBaba woyalongile; ninga mwikale mukaya mpaka mufasigwe uludole kulawa kuchanhya.”
Kahi hakawalongosa kuluta mpaka Betania, hakenula mikono yakwe na kuwamotesa.
Foyeja yowa mukuwamotesa, hoyokwitemanula nawo na hakenuligwa kulanga kuchanhya.
Awene hawamufugamila na hawoya Yelusalemu kwa chinyemi chikulu,
Hawekala chigele chose mwihekalu wakumutunya Mulungu.
Uko kunghonga hakuwa na Mbuli, naye Mbuli hakowa ne Mulungu.
Imwene kunghonga hakowa na Mulungu;
ifinhu fyose hafigoloseka kwa njila ya imwene, na kuswela imwene kwichaka chochose chene chagolosigwe chowile chikugoloseka.
Mugati yakwe no mowile na uwumi; na uwumi uya hawuwa ujelu wa wanhu.
Ujelu ukumulika muchisa, na ichisa chisikudaha kuwusima.
Kweja kowa munhu yatumigwe kulawa kwe Mulungu, disina dyakwe Yohana.
Hakeja kosoko yo uhomelesi, kuuhomelela ujelu, uleke wose wahuwile kwa njila yakwe.
Imwene nghowile ujelu uya, ninga hakeja yauhomelele ujelu.
Ujelu we chawelu uwukumulikila chila munhu wokwija muchilunga.
Hakowa muchilunga, ne chilunga hachigolosigwa kwa njila yakwe, ninga ichilunga chisamumanyile.
Hakeja kukaya yakwe imwenyecho, ninga awanhu wakwe wasamuhokele.
Ninga ku wose awamuhokele, awahuwile disina dyakwe hakawengha udaha wogoloseke wana we Mulungu.
Awelekigwe, si kwa sakame hegu kwenda kwa munhu kwa chimutufi, ninga kwa Mulungu.
Imbuli hoikuwa mutufi, hoyokwikala muchilagati yetu, kamema dihewa ne chawelu; chidilanga ditunyo dyakwe, ditunyo fina dye imwana yemwene kulawa kwe Baba.
Yohana hakowa na uhomelesi muchanhya yakwe, na kujoja, “Ayuno no yuyuya wonagambile fina, ‘Iyakwenda yeje kunyuma yangu, imukulu kusuma niye, kosoko hakowa kumwande yangu.’”
Kulawa mukumema kwake ase wose chohokela dihewa muchanhya ya dihewa.
Kosoko dilagiso hadija kwe njila ya Musa; dihewa ne chawelu fija kwa njila ya Yesu Kilisito.
Hechaka yamonile Mulungu, ugele wowose uya; iMwana muhala, yowile mu chifa cha Baba, noyamugolose yamanyigwe.
Na uno no uhomelesi wa Yohana, ugele Wayahudi fowatumile awatambiki na Walawi kulawa Yelusalemu wamuse, “Agweye no nani?”
Hakafumila kahi ngalemile, ninga hakalonga fina, “Aniye siyo no ni Kilisito.”
Howomusa, “Aho gwegwe nani gweye? Aho gwe no Eliya? Hoyobidula Siniye ka. Agweye no yuya imugonesi? Hoyobidula, ka.”
Hawamusa, “Aho gwegwe nani? Chitamile uleke chiwabidule awaya awachitumile ukugambaki muchanhya yako?”
Hakagamba, “Aniye no dijwi dye iyakujoja munyika: Igololeni injila ye Mundewa, fina foyalongile imugonesi Isaya.”
Wawo awatumigwe hawalawa kumafalisayo.
Hawamusa, “Aho nhani ukubatisa, nghonaga nghu Kilisito, kahi nghu Eliya, nghwi mugonesi?”
Yohana hakawabidula, “Nikubatisa na meji; muchiligati chenu kema imwene anyeye musimumanyile.
Ayuya iyakwija kunyuma yangu, aniye sikudaha kudohola isigi ye chilwatu chakwe.”
Agano hagogoloseka Betania umwambu wa Yolodani, hoyabatisilage Yohana.
Dijuwa dya keli yakwe hakamona Yesu yakwija ukwakwe; hakagamba, “Langeni iMwana Ngholo we Mulungu, iyakulewusa uwihi we chilunga!
Ayuno noyonalongile nikugamba, ‘Kunyuma yangu yakwija munhu imwene yowile kumwande yangu, kosoko hakuwa uko ugele aniye sinati nyuwe.’
Aniye nimwenyecho samumanyile, ninga kosoko yiyo hanija nikubatisa kwa meji, uleke yoneke ku Waisilaeli.”
Na Yohana hakahomela, “Hanyona Muhe yakuhulumuka kulawa kulanga kifana huwa, hoyosigala umwakwe.
Aniye nimwecho samumanyile; ninga ayuya iyanitumile kubatisa kwa meji kanigamba, ‘Ayo yo ukona Muhe yakudulika muchanhya yakwe na kusigala u mwakwe no yakubatisa kwa Muye Musunhile.’
Aniye nyona kahi nikuhomelela fina ayuno no Mwana we Mulungu.”
Dijuwa dyandamile Yohana hakema na weli wa wefusa wakwe;
Kamulanga iYesu foyagendage hoyogamba, “Langeni iMwana Ngholo we Mulungu!”
Awefusa aweli wamuhulika yakulonga nheifo, hawamwandamila iYesu.
Yesu kabiduka, kawona wakumwandamila, kawagamba, “Mukuhananga choni?” Homugamba, “Labi” (nong'amba Mwalimu) “Ukwikala hoki?”
Hakawagamba, “Mwije mulange Howoluta hawona hoyekalage,” howokwikala naye dijuwa dyo kosoko hayuwa kifana saa kumi ya hegulo.
Yumwedu wa wefusa waya weli awamuhulike Yohana yakulonga hakowa hawamwandamila, hakowa Andelea imunduguse wa Simoni Petulo.
Andelea hakakonga kumona imukuluwe Simoni, kamugamba, “Chimona Masiya” (nong'amba Kilisito)
Hakamwigala kwa Yesu, Yesu hakamulanga, hakagamba, “Agweye no Simoni mwana wa Yohana? Ukwende winangigwe Kefa” (nong'amba Petulo)
Dijuwa dyandamile Yesu hakasagula kuluta Galilaya. Hoyomona Filipo hoyomugamba, “Nyandamile.”
Hambiya Filipo hakalawa Betania ikaya ya cha Andelea na Petulo.
Filipo hoyomona Nataneli, hoyomugamba, “Chimona imwene yatulumigwe na Musa simbuli sakwe muchitabu na mumalagiso kahi iyatulumigwe na wagonesi Yesu wa Nasaleti iMwana wa Yusufu.”
Natanaeli hoyomugamba, “Chodaha kulawa chinhu chochose chiswanu Nasaleti?” Filipo hoyamugamba, “Wije ulange.”
Yesu kamona Nataneli yakwija ukwakwe kamugamba, “Langa, iMuislaeli tubwi, mugati yakwe mwichaka kidanhilisa!”
Nataneli kagamba, “Kunimanya nhani?” Yesu kamubidula, “Ugele Filipo nghenati yakwinange fowekale hasi yo musada, hanikona.”
Nataneli kamubidula, “Labi agweye kwa Mwana we Mulungu! Agweye no Mundewa wa Waislaeli.”
iYesu kamubidula kagamba, “Kosoko nikugambile, hanikona wikale hasi yo musada, ukuhuwila? Ukwenda wone majuma makulu kusuma gano.”
Kamugamba, “Chawelu nikukutamila, ukwenda wone ulanga ugubuka na malaika we Mulungu wakukwila na kuhumuluka muchanhya ye Mwana we munhu.”
Dijuwa dya kadatu hakuwa halusi Kana ya Galilaya, na ing'ina wa Yesu hakowa uko;
Yesu naye hakagonekigwa na wefusa wakwe, kuhalusi.
Idifai ikahele, ing'ina wa Yesu hoyomugamba, “Wechaka difai.”
Yesu hoyogamba, “Go mwanamuke china choni aniye na gweye? Ichigele changu chisinati chije.”
Ing'ina hakawagamba awatogomi, “Goloseni chochose choyakutamilani.”
Baho hahowa mabiga mutandatu ga mawe, kosoko ya ijadi ya Wayahudi yo kunawa na kisunha, chila ibiga dikwingila madebe mane mpaka mtandatu nhafi.
Yesu hakawagamba, “Memeseni amabiga meji. Wamemesa topu.”
Kawagamba, “Negeni gamonga mumwigalile imukulu we halusi.” Kameyi howolonda.
Imukulu we halusi yakanomole ameji agagaluke difai, nghamanyile fina ilawahi (ninga awatogomi awanegile ameji gaya hawamanya), imukulu we halusi hakamwinanga imutolaji
hakamugamba, “Chila munhu yakulafa difai swanu kunghonga, kamei awanhu wanghowa wonywile lugano, yakulafa difai ihile, ninga agweye kwika difai swanu mpaka hambiya.”
Achino, no chitangilo che inghonga, iYesu choyagolose mu Kana ya Galilaya, hoyokonesa ditunyo dyakwe; awefusa wakwe howomuhuwila.
Ago gakahele, yadulika Kapelinaumu, ne ing'ina na wanduguse na wefusa wakwe; howokwikala uko kwa majuwa makefu.
iPasaka ya Wayahudi hayuwa habehi, Yesu hoyokwila mupaka Yelusalemu.
Mwihekalu hakona wanhu wakwambasa nghambaku sa sing'ombe, ngholo, na sinjiwa, na wakwasakanya mapesa wowile mumilimo yawo.
Kagolosa chiboko cha sigi, hakawalafa wose, hamwedu na singholo na sing'ombe, kunje ye dihekalu, hoyokwitila amapesa ga waya awende wokwasakanya, na kubidula di mesa sawo.
Hakawagamba waya awambasage si njiwa, Galeuseni gano ahano, musikudaha kuigolosa inyumba ye Babangu kuwa igulilo.
Awefusa wakwe howogelegela fina itulumigwa, Uwendo we nyumba yako wombulaga.
Awayahudi howomugamba; Chitangilo chaki cho ukuchonesa kwa kugolosa nhafi?
Yesu hakawabidula, Moleni Dihekalu dino, aniye kwa majuwa madatu nikudinula.
Wayahudi wagamba, “Dihekalu dino dijengigwa kwa minyaka makumi mane na mutandatu, agwe ukudaha kudinula kwa majuwa madatu?”
Ninga imwene hakalonga dihekalu dyo umutufi wakwe.
Kosoko iyo yakenuke muchilalo, awefusa wakwe hawagelegela fina foyalongile; hawagahuwila matulumo na imbuli yoyalongile Yesu.
Ugele foyowile Yelusalemu mwijuwa dikulu dye Pasaka matewa hagahuwila mwisina dyakwe wakone ifitangilo foyagolose,
ninga imwene nghakihuwilisa ukwawo; kosoko imwene hakawamanya wose,
kosoko hakawamanya wanhu wose nghahanange munhu wowose kuhomelela simbuli sa munhu; kosoko imwene imwecho hakamanya isuwile mugati ye munhu.
Hambiya, heja howa na munhu yumonga wa Mafalisayo, yakwinangwa Nikodemo, mukulu wa Wayahudi.

Munhu yuno yamwijila Yesu nechilo na kugamba, “Labi, chimanya gweye fina kwa mwalimu na kulawa kwa Mulungu, kosoko hechaka munhu yakudaha kugolosa fitangilo fina fino foukugoloa gweye, inghowa iMulungu nghehamwedu naye.”
