Yesu hoyomubidula, “Chawelu chawelu nikukutamila, imunhu yanghaleka kwelekwa kwa usha, nghodaha kuwona undewa we Mulungu.”
Nikodemo yamugamba, “I munhu yakudaha kwelekigwa nhani yanghowa musehe? Yakudaha kwingila kahi munda mwe ing'ina na kwelekigwa?”
Yesu hakamubidula, “Chawelu, chawelu nikumutamilani imunhu yanghaleka kwelekigwa kwa meji na Muhe, ghodaha kwingila ku undewa we Mulungu.
Achiya chelekigwe kwa mutufi ni mutufi, na chiya chelekigwe kwa Muhe ni muhe.
Unghakisine kosoko nikugambile fina, yagila kwelekigwa kwa usha.
Imheho ikutowa foikwenda iyecho, mukuhulika dibumo dyakwe, ninga musikumanya ikulawa hoki kahi ikuluta hoki; nheifo nofoyuwile ku chila muunhu yelekigwe kwa Muhe.”
Nikodemo hakamugamba, “Yodahika nhani kuwa nheifo?”
Yesu yabidula yakugamba, “Agweye kwa mwalimu wa Isilaeli na simbuli sino nghusimanyile.
Chawelu, chawelu nikukutamila fina, chikulonga adiya dyo chimanyile, na kukuhomelela kugaya gochonile, ninga nyeye musikuhokela uhomelesi wetu.
Nghonaga nimutamileni simbuli sa muisi nanye musikuhuwila, mohuwila nhani ninghamutamilani simbuli si kulanga.
Kwechaka munhu wowose yakwilile kulanga ninga ayuya do yadululike kulawa kulanga iMwana wa Munhu.
“Kahi fina iMusa foyenula dijoka diya munyika, nheifo iMwana we Munhu kokwinuligwa.
Uleke chila munhu iyakumuhuwila yowe na uwumi wa majuwa gose.
Mulungu kachenda ichilunga lugano, hoyomulafa iMwanagwe iyumwedu du uleke chila munhu iyakumuhuwila yang'hagilile ninga yowe na uwumi wa majuwa gose.
Kosoko Mulungu nghamwigale iMwanagwe amuno muchilunga, uleke yachilamule ichilunga, ninga ichilunga chihonyigwe ne imwene.
Iyakumuhuwila imwene nghakuliganisigwa; inghakumuhuwila imwene kafulusa kuliganisigwa, kosoko nghadihuwile disina dye iMwana yumwedu we Mulungu.
“Auno no ulamusi, fina ujelu wija muchilunga awanhu howokwenda ichisa kusuma ujelu, kosoko sinhenda sawo hasuwa sihile.
Kosoko chila munhu yakugolosa gehile yakuudesekela ujelu, kahi nghakwija ku ujelu sinhenda sakwe singhonigwe.
Ninga ayuya iyakugolosa ichawelu yakwija kuujelu, uleke yoneke hajelu fina kagolosa kwa Mulungu.”
Kulawa baho Yesu na wefusa wakwe hawaluta kuisi ya Uyahudi, hakasinda uko hamwedu nawo na kubatisa.
Yohana naye yendeyobatisa, ako Ayinoni, habehi na Salimu kosoko uko hakuwa na meji mengi, awanhu wendewomulutila na kubatisigwa.
Kosoko Yohana hakowa nghenati yagumigwe kuchifungo.
Howolawanisa nyikusha mugati ya wefusa wa Yohana na Muyahudi yumonga kosoko ya usunhaji.
Howomulutila Yohana na kumugamba, “Labi ayuya yowile nagwe umwambu wa Yolodani, wowahomelele, kabahano, yakubatisa, na wose wakumulutila imwene.”
Yohana hakabidula, “I munhu ng'hakudaha kuwa na chinhu chochose ichene chonghenghigwe kulawa kulanga.
Anye muwecho mukudaha kuhamelela, fina hanigamba, ‘Aniye siyo no Kilisito, ninga nigaligwa nimulongolele!’
Iyenaye mutoligwa, no mutolaji. Imbwi yakwe we mutolaji, iyakwima na kumutegelesa, yakusekelela lugano foyakuhulika dijwi dye mutolaji. Kosoko iyo ichinyemi changu hambiya chimemelesigwa.
Imwene yongeseke ninga aniye nihunguke.”
“Imwene iyekwija kulawa kulanga ni mukulu kusuma wose. Ayuya wa hachilunga ni munhu wa hachilunga na yakulonga simbuli sa hachilunga, ayuya yakulawa kuchanhya, kamuchanhya ya gose.
Yakuhomelela agaya goyonile na kugamelela na kugahulika, ninga hechaka iyakuhokela uhomelesi wakwe.
Iyakuhokela uhomelesi wakwe yakufumilisa fina Mulungu ni chawelu.
Kosoko iyatumigwe na Mulungu yakulonga simbuli sa Mulungu; kosoko Mulungu ng'hakulafa Muhe kwa chiliganiso;
iBaba yakumwenda iMwana, naye kamulekela finhu fyose mumikono yakwe.
Iyakumuhuwila iMwana kena uwumi wa majuwa gose; inghekwandamila simbuli sakwe nghakwenda yawone uwumi, ninga inyono ye Mulungu ikumwikalila.”
Hambiya iMundewa yakamanye fina Mafalisayo hawahulika fina Yesu yakugolosa wefusa wengi na kuwabatisa kusuma Yohana. (ninga
Yesu mwecho nghabatise nanga awefusa wakwe.)
Hakaleuka Samalia hoyoluta kahi Galilaya.
Haimwagila yalokele Samalia.
Hakafika ku kaya imonga ya Samalia ikwinangwa Sikali, habehibehi no mugunda Yakobo wo yamwingha imwanagwe Yusufu.
Chisima cha Yakobo hachuwa baho, Yesu kosoko hakasoka ne inhambo hakekala hasi baho hachisima. Hachuwa chigele cha saa ya mutandatu nhafi.
Hakeja mwanamuke Musamalia kunega meji, Yesu hoyomugamba, “Ninghe meji nunywe.”
Kosoko awefusa wakwe hawaluta ku ikaya kugula chakudiya.
Imwanamuke Musamalia yamugamba, “Yanhani agweye go Muyahudi, utase ameji ukwangu, ni mwanamuke we Chisamalia? Kosoko Wayahudi wasikuhanga na Wasamalia.”
Yesu hakamubidula, Nhanga umanyile ichinghwa che Mulungu no nani iyakukugamba, “Ninghe meji nunywe, hakuwa ukumutasa, imwene hakowa yakukwingha ameji ga uwumi.”
Imwanamuke hoyomugamba, “Mukulu, kwechaka chinhu cha kunegela, ne chisima ni chitali, ukupatahi ago ameji ga uwumi?
Agweye kwa mukulu kusuma iBaba yetu Yakobo, iyachighile ichima chino, na imwene imwecho hakonywa meji ge chisima chino, na wanagwe, na sawo sakwe?”
Yesu yamugamba Chila munhu yakunywa ameji gano yakwenda yone nghilu kahi,
ninga chila munhu iyakunywa ameji gonikumwingha nghakwenda yone nghilu ka! Ameji gaya gonikumwingha gakuwa kugati yakwe nhyoko ya meji gakubwiluka ku wumi wa majuwa gose.
Imwanamuke yamugamba, “Mukulu, ninghe niye ameji gano, uleke ninghone nghilu, kahi kwija hano kunega meji.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Luta kamwinange imulumako, mwije hano.”
Imwanamuke hakabidula nechaka mugosi, Yesu kamugamba, “kulonga ichawelu fougambile, Nechaka mugosi;
Kosoko hakuwa na wagosi washano, na ayuno yowinaye hambiya, si mulumako; aho nanga kulonga ichawelu.”
Imwanamuke yamugamba, “Mukulu nikona agweye kwa mugonesi.
Awababa setu wafungaga mwitunda adino; amba nyeye mukugamba Yelusalemu no kunhu kokufugila.”
Mundewa Yesu yamugamba, “Go mwanamuke unihuwile niye, ichigele chikwija ichene awakufuga wasikufugila mwitunda dino kahi si Yelusalemu, mukwende mumufuge iBaba.
Anyeye mukufuga cho musimanyile, aseye chikufuga cho chimanyile, kosoko uhonya ukulawa kuWayahudi.
Ninga ichigele chikwija, na hambiya chabahano, awakumufuga Mulungu chawelu wakumufuga iBaba mu muhe na chawelu, awo iBaba nowoyakuhananga wamufuge.
Mulungu ni Muhe, nawo awakumufuga inogela wamufuge kwa Muhe na kwa chawelu.”
Ayuya imwanamuke hakamugamba, “Nimanya fina Imasiya yakwija; (iyakwinangwa Kilisito); ma yakwija, yakayochones simbuli sose.”
Yesu kamugamba, “Aniye nikulonga nagwe no nene.”
Chimwande awefusa wakwe howokwija. Hawakisina kosoko yendeyosimulila ne mwanamuke, ninga hechaka yamusile Ukuhananga choni? Nhani ukulonga naye?
Kamei imwanamuke hakaleka dibiga dyakwe, hakaluta kwikaya, yawagamba awanhu,
Mwije, mulange munhu yanitamile ifinhu fyose fonigolose. Ayuno yakudaha kuwa no Kilisito?
Hawalawa kunje ye kaya na wende womwijila imwene.
Ugele uwo awefusa wakwe wakuhananga yadiye, wakugamba, “Labi udiye!”
Ninga kawagamba, “Nina chakudiya ichene anyeye msichimanyile.”
Kameyi awefusa wakiyusa wecho kwa wecho, Hena yumonga yamwigalile chakudiya?
Yesu kawagamba, “I chakudiya changu ni kugolosa ifyene foyakwenda ayuya yanitumile, na kumalagisa ikasi yakwe.
Mwina ulosi, ukugamba Ikali minyesi mine ukuwa ugele wokugola, ninga nikumutamilani, langisiseni imigunda; simhule sikangala ugele wokugola ufika!
iyekugola yakuhokela digelo dyakwe, yakulunda figoligwe fiya ku uwumi wa majuwa gose; kwa neifo imunhu yahandile na yuya yakugola wakusekelela wose.
Inonga ino ni chawelu, ‘Munhu yumwedu yakuhanda, munhu yumonga yakugola.’
Hanimutumani kugola afiya ifyene fomusagolosele milimo; wamonga hawagolosa, anye mwingila mu milimo yawo.”
Matewa ga Wasamalia mukaya iya wamuhuwila Yesu kosoko imwanamuke hakagamba, “Mwije mulange imunhu yanitamile ifinhu fyose fonigolose.”
Kamei Awasamalia wakeje ukwakwe, howomutasa yekale nawo; hoyokwikala uko majuwa meli.
Na wengi lugano hawamwihuwila kosoko ya imbuli yakwe,
hakamugamba imwanamuke, Sikosoko ya simbuli sako du ilekile chihuwila, kosoko aseye chiwecho chimuhulika, na chimanya fina ayuno chawelu nao Mwihula we chilunga.
Yakamale kwikala majuwa meli hoyoluta Galilaya.
Kosoko Yesu mwecho hakalonga fina imugonesi nghakupata itunyo muisi yakwe imwecho.
Nheifo yakeje Galilaya, awanhu wa Galilaya, howomuhokela, kosoko wonile gose agene goyagolose Yelusalemu ugele we dijuwa dikulu kosoko awene nawo hawaluta kusikukuu.
Kahi Yesu hoyoluta ku Kana ya Galilaya, koyagaluse meji kuwa difai. Baho Kapelanaumu hahowa mukulu yumonga wa Selekali, imwene hakowa na mwanagwe mutamu.
Hakahulike fina Yesu keja kulawa Uyahudi hata Galilaya, hoyaluta na kumutasa walutanye yakamuhonye mwanagwe, kosoko hakowa mutamu lugano, habehi na kufa.
Yesu kosoko iyo hoyomugamba, “Munghaleka kona fitangilo na majumo muisi kuhuwila.”
Imukulu yuya hoyogamba, “Mundewa wije imwanangu nghenati yafe.”
Yesu hakamugamba, “Luta imwanago yakuhona!”
Imunhu yuya hoyohuwila imbuli yoyalongile Yesu ukwake hoyaluta.
Foyalutage, imutogomi wakwe hakakitanganyila na kumutamila fina imwanagwe kahona.
Hakosa ichigele choyakongile kuwa mumi, howomugamba, “Digulo chigele cha saa mufungate, imhungo imuleuka.”
iBabamunhu hoyogelegela fina ichigele chiya no chigele Yesu choyagambile, Imwanago yakuhona. Imwene imwecho hoyohuwila, we inyumba yakwe yose.
Achino hachuwa chitangilo chakeli choyagolose Yesu yakoye kulawa Uyahudi na kuya Galilaya.
Hanyuma yakwe kweja kowa ihuwa ikulu dye Wayahudi. Yesu hakakwila Yelusalemu.
Uko Yelusalemu habehi na dilango dya Singholo hahowa ne ilamba dikwinangwa munonga ye Chiyebulaniya Betisasa, dina deha shano.
Mugati ya siso sideha mwina awesikidaha, mudula, fiwete na watamu wokuholola, wakugojela ameji gatibuke;
(kosoko imalaika we Mundewa yendeyohumuluka ugele umonga na kwingila mwilamba, na kugatibula ameji; iyekukonga kwingila mwilamba, ameji ghonagatibuke yakuhona utamu wakwe wowose woyowile nawo.)
Munhu yumonga hakowa baho, yowile mutamu kwa minyaka makumi madatu na munane.
Yesu yakamone na kukumanya hakowa na utamu na kugona bahaya kwa ugele mwingi hoyomugamba, “Ukuhananga kuhonywa?”
Imunhu mutamu yuya hoyomubidula, Mukulu; nachaka munhu wa kuniguma mwilamba ameji fogakutibuligwa, ghona nikugesa kuluta munhu yungi yakulongola kwilamba kumwande yangu.
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Inuka, kitwike disasi dyako, na ugende.”
Chimwande imunhu yuya hakonywa, hoyolonda disasi dyakwe na kugenda.
Dijuwa didyo hadyuwa ijuwa dye sabato,
awakulu wa Wayahudi howomulonga imunhu yahonyigwe, Diyelo ni sabato sifiswamu agweye kwinula disasi dyako.
Ninga hoyobidula, munhu iyanihonyile kanigamba, “Inula disasi dyako, ulute!”
Howomusa, Imunhu yakugambile ukitwike disasi dyako ulute nani?
Hambiya imunhu yuya yahonyigwe nghamumanyile Yesu, kosoko Yesu hakaleuka anhu baya, kosoko hahowa itewa dya wanhu ahanhu baho.
Hanyuma yakwe Yesu hoyomufika kwihekalu hoyomugamba, “Hulika, kwa mumi mambiya; unghagolose wihi kahi; dinghakwijile dihile lugano kusuma dino.”
Imunhu yuya hoyoluta kuwatamila aWayahudi fina Yesu noyonihonyile.
Aino nochileka Awayahudi wamwidasage Yesu, kosoko yagolose didyodijuwa dye sabato.
Yesu hoyowabidula, iBabangu yakugolosa milimo ugele wose, aniye nani inyagila nigolose.
Aino haiwagolosa Wayahudi wagendelele kuhananga kumukoma, si kosoko yo kubana isabato du, kahi na kumwinanga Mulungu fina Babakwe, yakigolosa fina kaligana ne Mulungu.
Yesu hakawagamba nikumutamilani ichawelu; iMwana nghakudaha kugolosa chochose yemwene; yakugolosa agaya do goyakona iBabakwe yakugolosa. Goyakugolosa iBaamunhu, iMwana naye nogoyakugolosa.
Kosoko iBaba yakumwenda iMwana na yakumonesa gose agene goyakugolosa imwene, yakumonesa na milimo mikulu kusuma aino, nanye mose mukwenda mukisine.
Fina iBaba foyakuwenula wafile na kuwengha uwumi, no nheifo iMwana naye yakuwengha uwumi awaya woyakwenda kuwengha.
Kahi iBaba nghakulamula munhu wowose, kamwingha iMwana udaha wose wo kulamul.
Wose wamogohe iMwana, fina fowakumogoha iBabamunhu. Wowose inghakumogoha iMwana nghakumogoha Baba iyamwigale.
Nikumutamilani ichawelu; imunhu wowose iyakuhulika simbuli sangu na kumuhuwila yanitumile kena uwumi wa majuwa gose; nghakwingila kukulamuligwa, ninga kaloka kulawa kudifa na kwingila kuuwumi.
Chawelu, chawelu, nikumutamilani, ichigele chikwija, na hambiya chabaha, ugele uwene awafile wakuhulika dijwi dye iMwana we Mulungu na awaya awakuhulika wakwenda wenuke mudifa.
Kosoko fina iBaba foyena uwumi mugati yakwe no nheifo kamwingha iMwana naye kuwa na uwumi mugati yakwe,
na kamwingha udaha wokogolosa ulamusi, kosoko ni Mwana we munhu.
Munghakisine kosoko yadino, ichigele chikwija awene wose wowile mufilalo wakawohulika dijwi dyakwe
na kulawa kunje, awagolose maswanu kukwinukila mu uwumi, awagolose gehile kukwinukila mukulamulwa.
Sikudaha kugolosa chinhu chochose kwa udaha wangu nimwecho; fonikuhulika, nofonikulamula; na ulamusi wangu uliganila, kosoko sikuhananga kugolosa fonikwenda niye, ninga kwenda kwakwe iyanitumile.
Hona nikihomelela nimwenecho uhomelesi wangu si wachawelu;
kwina yungi iyakuhomelela muchanhya yangu na nimanya fina uhomelesi wakwe woyakuhomelela muchanhya yangi ni wachawelu.
Hamutuma wanhu kwa Yohana, na hoyolafa uhomelesi kuchawelu.
Si kosoko niye nikuhokela uhomelesi ukulawa kuwanhu; ninga nikulonga sino uleke mohone.
Hakowa taa ikwaka na kumulika, nanye hamudaha kusekelela kwa chipisi chiguhi mu ujelu wakwe.
Ninga uhomelesi wo ninawo ni mukulu kusuma awuya wa Yohana; kosoko imilimo iBaba yoyagambile niigose na kumale, imilimo iyino yonikugolosa, ikunihomela fina iBaba kanituma.
Ne Baba imwecho yanitumile kalafa uhomelesi muchanhya yangu. Dijwi dyakwe musinati mudihulike, ifuta yakwe musinati muyone;
na mwachaka imbuli yakwe ikwikala kugati yenu, kosoko mudikumuhuwila ayuya iyagaligwe ne mwene.
Mukugahena hena matulumo kosoko mukudoga fina mugati yakwe mwina uwumi wa majuwa gose, nogo agene ga kuhomelela;
ninga mukulema kwija ukwangu uleke muwe na uwumi.
Aniye sikuhokela ditunyo kulawa kuwanhu.
Ninga nimanya anyeye mwechaka uwendo wao kumwenda Mulungu mufidoga fyenu.
Aniye nija mwisina dye iBabangu; anyeye musikuhihokela, ninga, yumonga yangheja kwa disina dyakwe imwecho, mukwenda mumuhokele.
Mohuwila nhani anyeye mukihokelesa ditunyo muwecho kwa wecho, ninga musikuhananga ditunyo dikulawa kwe Mulungu?
Munghagambe fina nikwenda niwasongese kwa Baba, iMusa noyakuwasongesa, imwene womumwikile dihuwi dyenu.
Nanga mwamuhuwile Musa hamuwa mukunihuwila na niye kosoko hakatuluma muchanya yangu.
Ninga ghonanga musikuhuwila goyatulume, mohuwila nhani sonikulonga?
Hanyuma yakwe Yesu hakaloka umwambu we bahali ya Galilaya no ya Tibelia.
Itewa ikulu dya wanhu howomwandamila, kosoko hawona amajumo gakwe gokuhonya watamu.
Yesu hoyokwila kwitunda, hoyokwikala hasi hamwedu na wefusa wakwe.
Na ugele we juwa dikulu dye Pasaka haduwa habehi.
Yesu hakenula meso hakalanga ako nako, hakona itewa dya wanhu wakumwijila, hakamusa Filipo, Chikudaha kugula hoki chadiya chakuwegusa awanhu wose wano?
Hakalonga neifo kumugesa Filipo; ichawelu iyecho imwecho hakamanya choyakwenda yagolose.
Filipo hakamubidula, Uleke chila munhu yapate chidodogi du ikunangigwa chuwe na mikate ya mapesa dinali magana meli nhafi.
Yumwedu wa wefusa wakwe, Andulea, munduguse wa Simon Petulo hoyogamba,
“Hena mwana bahano yene mikate mishano ye shaili na fisomba fili. Ninga chawelu fisikudaha kwigusa awanhu wose wano.”
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Walongeni awanhu wekale hasi. Hanhu baho hahowa na mbago nyingi.” Kosoko iyo awanhu wose howokwikala hasi, hawowa wanhu wafikile figulu fishano awagosi.
Yesu hoyoilonda imikate, hoyomulumba Mulungu, howogawiligwa wanhu awekale baho. Hakalumba kosoko ya sisomba, na wose howokwiguta.
Awanhu wose wakegute, hakawagamba awefusa wakwe Dondoleni ifibendu fyose ifisigale, chinghagilele hata chimwedu.
Hawamemesafikonghola fyose, howomemesa fisege ikumi na fili kulawa kumikate iya mishano ye shaili iyadiyigwe na wanhu.
Wakone dijumo dino doyagolose Yesu, awanhu weja wagamba howogamba Chawelu ayuno no Mugonesi yagambigwe yakwija muchilunga.
Yesu yakamanye fina wanhu wendewohananga weje wamukole uleke wamugolose kuwa Mundewa kwa ludole; hoyoleuka hoyoluta kwitunda kahi yemwene.
Ikowe hegulo, awefusa wakwe hawadulika kubahali,
howokwingila mu ngalawa hawakonga kuloka ibahali kuluta Kapelanaumu. Hachuwa chisa chingile, na Yesu hakowa nghenati yeje kuwa hamwedu nawo.
Ameji hogokonga kutunhumuka kosoko imheho nghulu yapumunhage.
Awefusa wakwe hawakwega makasia utali wa maili ine au shano nafi howomona Yesu kukugenda mumeji, yakusegelela ingalawa, howokogoha.
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Munghogohe, no niye!”
Kameyi kwa chinyemi howomwingisa mungalawa, na baho ingalawa hoifika muisi bahaya howalutage.

Dijuwa dya keli yakwe amatewa ulwandi lwa keli lwe bahali hawamanya fina kwina ngalawa imwedu du ulwandi lowowowile. Hawamanya fina Yesu nghengile mungalawa iya hamwedu na wefusa wakwe, ninga hawaleuka awene du wenumwene.
Minhumbwi imonga, kulawa Tibelia, haija mhwani habehi na bahaya ahene awanhu hawadiya imikate yongeseke yakamale kulumba Mundewa Yesu.
Amatewa wawakone Yesu kahechaka, hamwedu na wefusa wakwe, howokwingila musingalawa, howoluta Kapelinaumu, wakumuhananga.
Awanhu wakamone Yesu ulwandi lwa keli lwa bahali, hawamugamba, “Mwalimu kwija milaki kuno?”
Yesu hoyowabidula yakugamba, “Nikumutamilani ichawelu; mukunihananga kosoko hamudia mikate muwecho fomwahanange, homukwiguta, sikosoko hamona amajumo gangu.

Munghakiidase ne chakudiya ichene chikubanika; ninga mchigolosele milimo ichakudiya cha ugele wose ku uwumi wa majuwa gose. Achino no chakudiya ichene imwana we Munhu yakumwinghani, kosoko Mulungu, iBaba, kaguma chitangilo chakwe cha kumufumila.”
Kosoko iyo wejawamusa, “Chitende choni noho chigolose imilimo ye Mulungu yoyakuhananga chigolose?”
Yesu yawabidula, iMulungu choyakuchanga mugolose ni kumuhuwila ayuya yatumigwe ne mwene.
Yesu kawagamba, “Nikuwafamilani chawelu. iMusa choyamwinghileni usowile mukate kulawa kulanga; iBabangu noyakumwinghani umukate we chawelu kulawa kulanga.
Awagono wetu hawadiya mana munyika, fina amatulumo fogakulonga, Hakawengha mukate kulawa kulanga wadiye.”
Yesu kawagamba, “Nikuwatamilani chawelu, iMusa choyamwinghileni usowile mukate kulawa kulanga; iBabangu no yakumwinghani umukate we chawelu kulawa kulanga.
Kosoko umukate, iMulungu woyakulafa ni yuya yakudulika hasi kulawa kulanga na kuchigalila ichilunga uwumi.”
Hawamutasa, “Mukulu, Chinghe aseye umukate wuwuno majuwa gose.”
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Aniye no ni mukate wa uwumi; iyakwija ukwangu ifi nghakona njala; iyakunihuwila niye ifinghakona nghilu.
Ninga nimutamilani fina munyona nanyi musikuhuwila.
Wose woyakuningha iBaba wakwija ukwangu sikumutaga kunje ng'oo,
kosoko nidulika muyisi kulawa kulanga, si kugolosa fina fonikwenda niye, ninga kwenda kwakwe ayuya iyanitumile;
na kuno nokwenda kwake ayuya yanitumile, ninghamwagilise wowose mu waya woyaninghile, ninga nimwinule (muchilalu) dijuwa dye indumo.
Akuno no kwenda kwake iBabangu, fina chila munhu iyakumona iMwana na kumuhuwila yowe na uwumi wa majuwa gose; nani nikwenda nimwinule dijuwa dye indumo.”
Awayahudi hawakonga kumung'ung'unikila, kosoko yagambile, Aniye no ni mukate ulawile kulanga.
Howogamba, “Ayuno si Yesu, mwana wa Yusufu, iBabakwe ne ing'ina si chiwamanya. Yakudaha nhani kugamba, ‘Hambiya nihulumuka kulawa kulanga?’”
Yesu yawagamba Muleke kung'ung'ulika nyenye kwa nyenye.
Hechaka munhu yekudaha kwija ukwangu honaga nghakwegigwe ne Baba yanitumile niye; nani nikanimwinula mudijuwa dye ndumo.
Itulumigwa muchitabu cha wagonesi Na wose wakawawafusigwa ne Mulungu! Chila munhu yafusigwe na kuhulika kulawa kwa Baba yakwija ukwangu.
Kwechaka munhu wowose yamonile Baba, ninga ayuya yalawile kwa Mulungu, noyamonile Baba.
Chawelu, chawelu, nikuwatamilani, iyakuhuwila kwna uwumi wa majuwa gose.
Aniye no ni mukate wa uwumi.
Awababa senu hawadiya imana munyika, howokufa.
Auno no mukate ukudulika kulawa kulanga, uleke imunhu yandiye yanghafe.
Aniye no ni mukate wo uwumi, mudulike kulawa kulanga, wowose iyakudiya mukate uno, nghakufa ng'oo; na mukate wonikulafa kosoko yo uwumi we chilunga ni umutufi wangu.
Awayahudi, baho, wejawakonga kuwanga awenyecho, wakugamba, “I munhu yuno kodaha nhani kuchingha aseye umutufi wakwe chidiye?”
Kamei Yesu hoyowagamba, “Chawelu, chawelu nikuwatamila, Munghalekadiya umutufi we Mwana we munhu na kunywa isakame yakwe mwachaka uwumi kugati yenu.
Ayuya imwene yakudiya umutufi wangu na kunywa isakame yangu kena uwumi wa majuwa gose. Nani nikwija nimwinula dijuwa dye ndumo.
Kosoko umutufi wangu ni chakudiya cha chawelu, na isakame ni chinywaji chachawelu.
Iyakudiya umutufi wangu na kunywa sakame yangu yakwikala umwangu ani nani umwakwe.
Fina iBaba imumi foyanitumile niye, nani na mumi kosoko ya Baba. No neifo ayuya yakunidiya niya yakuwa mumi kosoko ya niye.
Awuno no mukate wadulike kulawa kulanga, siyo fina yowadiyile waBaba senu hawakufa, ayuya yakudiya mukate uno yakwikala majuwa gose.”
Hakalonga sino yowile mwisinagogi, ugele foyafundishage Kapelanaumu.
Wengi wa wefusa wakwe, wakahulike nheifo, howogamba, “Aino mbuli nghugutu nani yakwenda yaihulike?”
Ninga Yesu yakamanye fina awefusa wakwe wakuing'ong'olekela inonga iyo, yawagamba, “Musuha kosoko ya ino?”
Togoleni yokuwa nhani munghamona Mwana we munhu yakukwila koyowile ugele nghenati yeje?
iMunye noyakwingha uwumi, umutufu wechaka chinhu; simbuli sonilongile nanyi ni muhe kahi ni wumi.
Ninga wamonga wenu wasikuhuwila. Kosoko Yesu hakamanya kulawa kunghonga awaya awene wasahuwile, chenani awakwenda wamusongese.
Hoyowagamba, “Kosoko ino no chileka namutamileni kwechaka yakwija ukwangu nanga ayuya yekwihigwa udaha wokwija ne Babangu.”
Kulawa baho wengi wa wefusa wakwe howokuya kunyuma wasamwandamile kahi.
Yesu hoyowalonga awaya awefusa wakwe ikumi na weli, “Anye nanye molewuka?”
Simoni Petulo hakamubidula, “Mukulu, chilute kwani? Agweye kwina simbuli sa uwumi wa majuwa gose;
na chihuwila, na chifulusa kumanya, fina agweye no u Imusunhile yumwedu we Mulungu.”
Yesu hakawabidula, “Sawasaguleni ikumi na weli, na yumwedu wenu ni luhoma?”
Hakalonga muchanhya ya Yuda imwana wa Simoni Isikalioti, kosoko, imwene yumwedu wa waya ikumi na weli, noyowile wo kumusongesa.
Hanyuma yakwe Yesu hoyuluta ako nako Mufalilaya, nghadahile kugendagenda ako nako mu Uyahudi, kosoko Wayahudi wendewohananga kumukoma.
Hambiya, isikukuu ya Wayahudi ye Fibanda hayuwa habehi.
Awanduguse howomugamba, “Leuka hano ulute Uyahudi, uleke awefusa wako wone imilimo yo ukugolosa.”
Hechaka munhu yakugolosa kwa chifiso hona yakuhananga yamanyike kwa wose. Hona ukugolosa simbuli sino kiyonese kuchilunga.
Kahi na awanduguse nawo wasamuhuwile.
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Ichigele changu chisinati chifike, ugele uwenu wabaha majuwa gose.
Ichilunga chisikudaha kuwasula nyeye, ninga chikunisula niye kosoko nichihomelela kuwa sinhenda sakwe sa wihi.
Luteni nyeye kusikukuu, aniye sikuluta kusikukuu, kosoko ugele wangu wokuluta usinati umemelekele.”
Yakalonge nheifo, hoyosigala Galilaya.
Awanduguse wakafuluse kuluta kusikukuu, kame naye hoyoluta, ninga si kwa konigwa na wanhu nanga kwa chinyele.
Awayahudi wende womuhananga hasikukuu, wakugamba, “Kowahi?”
Hakuwa na mang'ung'uliko mengi muwanhu kosoko yakwe ugele wamonga wakugamba, “Ni munhu muswamu,” wamonga wakugamba, “Hata, yakwagilisa wanhu.”
Ninga kosoko yo kuwogoha Wayahudi hechaka munhu yadahile kulonga achawelu muchanhya yakwe nonga kufumbafumba.
Mugatigati ya majuwa ge sikukuu Yesu hoyokwingila mudihekalu na kufusa.
Awayahudi howokisina, wakugamba, “Yanhani, imunhu yuno kena umanyi, naye nghapatile mafuso?”
Yesu hoyawabidula, amafuso gangu si gangu niye, ninga gakwe iyanitumile;
inghowa inyenda ye munhu ni kugolosa inyenda yakwe, yakwenda yamanye fina mafuso gano gakulawa kwa Mulungu hegu nikulonga kwa udaha wangu nimwecho.
Iyakulanga mu udaha wakwe imwecho yakuhananga kutunyigwa imwene, ninga ayuya iyakuhananga ditunyo dya yuya yamutumile, mugati yakwe mwechaka udasi.
iMusa nghamwinghileni Malagiso? Hata nheifo hechaka yakugakola. Nhani mukuhananga kunikoma?
Awanhu hawamubidula, Kwina ipepo! Nani yakuhananga kuukoma?
Yesu hayawabidula Nigolosa nhenda imwedu, mose mukisina kosoko ya iyo.
Musa hakamwing'hani dikumbi (si kugamba dilawa kwa Musa ninga kulawa kuwa Baba senu) nanyi mukwigala munhu kikumbi dijuwa dye sabato.
Hona dijuwa dye sabato imunhu yakwigaligwa kikumbi, uleke dilagiso dya Musa dinghabenigwe, musuha na niye kosoko yo mumuhonya munhu umutufi wakwe wose kuwa mumi mudijuwa dye sabato?
Munghalamule kugaya gomukulanga na meso, ninga mulamule kwa kuliganisa ha kwa chawelu.
Wanhu wamonga wa Yelusalemu wejawagamba, “Ayuno so imunhu wowakuhanga kukoma?
Ayuno hano, yakulonga chila munhu yakutuhulika, na wasikulonga dyodyose ukwakwe, ikudaha kuwa fina awakulu wamanya chawelu fina yuno no Kilisito?
Ninga ichimanya ayuno koyalawile; ninga; iKilisito ma yakwija yakoneka kwechaka munhu yakiyomanya woyalawile.”
Kwa nheifo Yesu hayalonga, ugele foyendeyofundisha mudihekalu, Aniye munimanya, na mumanya konikulawa? Aniye sijile kwa kusagula kwangu nimwecho; iyanitumile ni wachawelu, naye musimumanyile.
Aniye nimumanya, kosoko nilawa ukwake, na noyanitumile.
Hawahananga kumukola, ninga hachaka munhu yagolole mikono yakwe kumukola; kosoko ichigele chakwe hachuwa chisinati chifike.
Ninga wengi wa wanhu howomwihuwila, howogamba, “Hona Kilisito yakayokoneka, kogolosa majumo mengi kusuma goyagolose imunhu yuno?”
Mafalisayo wakahulike amatewa gakulongalonga muchanhya yakwe, awatambiki wakulu na Mafalisayo, howotuma wasilikali wamukole,
Yesu, baho yagamba, “Nikwenda nuwe nayi chipisi chitali chidodogi, kameyi nikuluta kwa yuya iyatumile;
monihananga ninga musinyona, honuwile musikudaha kwija.”
Imunhu yuno yakula hoki uko kochisikudaha kumona? Yakuhananga yalute kumugawanyiko wa Wayunani mugatigati ya Wayunani na kuwafusa Wayunani?
Kena mana yaki ma yakugamba, “Monihananga ninga musinyona, na, Honyuwile niye musikudaha kwija?”
Dijuwa diya dye indumiliso dye isikukuu, dijuwa dikulu, iYesu hakema na kutula chowe yakugamba, “Imunhu yanghona nghilu yeje ukwangu
Iyakunihuwila aniye fina amatulumo fogakulonga, sisanda sa meji ga uwumi sikwende sidulike kulawa mumoyo wakwe.”
Hambiya hakalonga sino muchanhya ya Muhe, imwene awaya awakumuhuwila wakuhokela; kosoko Muhe hakowa nghenati yalafigwa kwa fiya Yesu hakowa nghenati yatunyigwe.
Wakahulike simbuli siso, wanhu wamonga wakugamba, “Ayuno chawelu no mugonesi.”
Wamonga wagamba, “Ayuno no Kilisito!” Ninga wamonga wakugamba, “iKilisito yakulawa Galilaya?”
Togoleni matulumo gasigambile fina fina iKilisito yakulawa mulukolo lwa Daudi, na kulawa Betelehemu, ikaya oyowile Daudi?
Kosoko iyo hokukuwa na mutemanuko mugati ya wanhu muchanhya yakwe.
Wamonga hawahananga kumukola ninga hechaka yagolole mikono yakwe yamukole.
Awasilikali howokuya kuwakulu wa makuhani na Mafalisayo awawagambile, Nhani musijile naye?
Awasilikali howobidula, Nghenati yalonge munhu fina yuno foyakulonga.
Mafalisayo howawabidula, Anye nanye mwagilila nheifia?
Kwina wowose mu filongosi na Mafalisayo yakumuhuwila?
Ninga ditewa dino dya wanhu awasimanyile amalagiso, waligitigwa.
Nikodemo, iyamulutile ugele ulokile, yowile yumwedu wawo, hoyowagamba,
“Togoleni, dilagiso dyetu, dikuchituma chimulamule munhu ugele chisinati chimuhulike na kifusa goni goyakugosa?”
Wejawabidula, “Agwe nagwe kulawa Galilaya? Hananga ulange mumatulumo ukwenda wowe fina mwichaka mugonesi yakwenda yalawe Galilaya.”
Chila munhu hakaluta ukaya ukwakwe.
Ninga Yesu hoyoluta kwitunda dya Miseituni.
Kukoche nhosikusiku hoyokwija kahi kudihekalu; wanhu wose hawamwijila hakakonga kuwafusa.
Awatulumi na Mafalisayo hawekwigala mwanamuke yafikililigwe muchitendo cha ugoni, hawamwika muchiligati.
Hawamugamba, “Mwalimu, imwanamuke yuno kakoligwa ugoni.”
Mumalagiso Musa kachigamba munhu wa fina yuno yatowigwe mawe, ukugambaki agweye muchanhya yakwe?
Hawalonga imbuli yo kumugesa, uleke wapate mbuli ya kumusongesela, Yesu hakafunama hakandika hasi ne chidole.
Fowagendelele kumusa maswali, hakenuka na kuwagamba, “Mugati yenu, ayuya yechaka wihi no yakonge kumukubitila diwe.”
Hakafunama kahi na kwandika hasi.
Ninga wakahulike, hawaleuka, yumweyumwe, kukongela imukulu kusuma wose, Yesu hoyosigala yemwene nayuya imwanamuke yemile kumwande yakwe.
Yesu yenula meso yamugamba, “Mwanamuke, wahoki, hachaka yakulamule?”
Hakagamba, “Hachaka mukulu.” Na Yesu yagamba, “Ani nani sikukulamula; luta, na unghagolose wihi kahi.”
Yesu hakalonga nawo kahi yakugamba Aniye no no ujelu we chilunga, wowose yanyandamila yakuwa na ujelu wo uwumi na nghakwenda yagende muchisa kahi.
Mafalisayo yamugamba, “Hambiya ukihomelela gomwecho; go ukulonga si chawelu.”
Hata, Yesu hoyobidula, Aniye nikihomelela nimwecho, uhomelesi wangu ni wa chawelu, kosoko nimanya konilawile na nimanya konikuluta ninga anyeye musimanyile kunilawile kahi konikuluta.
Mukulamula kwa kwandamila umutufi, aniye sikulamula munhu wowose.
Aniye ninghalamula, ulamusi wangu ni wachawelu, kosoko siniye nimwene nikulamula, ninga aniye na yuya yanitumile.
Mu malagiso genu itulumigwa, uhomelesi wa wanhu weli ni chawelu;
Aniye nikihomelela nimwecho, na iBaba yanitumile yakunihomelela.
Kameyi hawamugamba, “Aniye musinimanyile na Baba musimumanyile, nanga mwanimanyile niye, hamuwa mukumumanya ne Baba naye.”
Simbuli sino hakasilonge yowile mu chumba cho wakwika ifilafywa mudihekalu, ugele foyendeyofusa, hechaka munhu yamukolile, kosoko ugele wakwe hauwa ukali.
Kahi Yesu hoyowagamba, “Nikuleuka; monihananga, ninga mukufa mu uwihi wenu. Musikudaha kwija konikuluta niye.”
Kameyi Wayahudi hoyogamba Togoleni kokikoma, kosoko yakugamba, “Konikuluta musikudaha kwija?”
Hoyowagamba, “Anyeye mulawa hasi, aniyenilawa kuchanhya, anye ni we chilunga chino, aniye si chilunga chino.
Nimutamilani fina mukufa mu uwihi wenu, kosoko mukufa mu uwihi wenu munghaleka kuhuwila fina aniye no yeye.”
Howomugamba, “Agwe no nani?” Yesu hoyowagamba, “Nheifia fonimutamileni kulawa kunghonga.”
Nina mengi ga kulonga muchanhya yenu na mengi gakulamula, ninga ayuya yanitumile no wachawelu, na nikutamila kuchilunga asiya sonihulike ukwakwe.
Wasamanyile fina yakulonga nawo muchanhya ya Baba.
Baho Yesu yagamba, “Fomukwija mumwinula Mwana we munhu, noho mukamutanga fina noniye, na kahi sikugolosa mbuli yoyose kwa kwenda kwangu aniye nimwecho ninga ifene iBaba foyakufusa nofonikulonga.
Na imwene yanitumile kahamwedu nani; nghanilekile nimwene, kosoko majuwa gose nikugolosa agakumwendesa.”
Foyalongile nheifo wengi hawamuhuwila.
Kameyi Yesu hoyowalonga awaya Awayahudi awamuhuila, Munghekala mumbuli yangu, mukuwa wefusa wangu chelu,
mukwenda muimanye ichawelu nayo ikumwikani kuwa walekeligwe.
Hawamubidula, Aseye cha cheleko cha Ibulahimu, chisinati chuwe watumwa kwa munhu wowose. Ukagamba, “Nhani gweye fina mukwende mukuwa walekeleligwe?”
Yesu yawagamba, “Chawelu, chawelu, nikumutamilani chila munhu yakugolosa uwihi ni mutumwa wa wihi.
Mutumwa nghakwikala munyumba majuwa gose; imwana yakwikala majuwa gose.
Kwa nheifo imwana yanghakulekelela, ukuwa kulekeleligwa chawelu.
Nimanye fina anyeye mwa cheleko cha Ibulahimu; ninga mukuhananga kunikoma, kosoko simbuli sonikulonga sachaka luneka mugati yenu.
Nikulonga fonyonile kwa Baba, anye nanye mukugolosa fina fomuhulike kwi Baba yenu.”
Howomubidula, Ibulahimu no Baba yetu. Yesu hoyowagamba, “Nanga mu wana wa Ibulahimu, hamuwa mukugolosa foyagolose Ibulahimu,
ninga niwatamileni ichawelu chonihulike kwa Baba, achino sochonghagolose Ibulahimu.
Anye mukugolosa foyagose iBaba yenu.” Howomugamba, “Aseye chiselekigwa kwa ihabwa; china Baba yumwedu, naye ni Mulungu.”
Yesu yawagamba, “Mulungu nanga ni Baba yenu, hamuwa mukunyenda niye, kosoko nilawa uko na kwija kuno kulawa kwa Mulungu; sijile kwa kwenda kwangu nimwecho, ninga hakanituma.
Nhani musikumanya sonikulonga? Kosoko musikudaha kutegelesa na kuhokela imbuli yangu.

Anyeye ni we Baba yenu luhoma, na kwenda kwenu ni kugolosa fina foyakwenda imwene. Hakowa mukomaji kulwa kung'honga, kachaka chawelu, kosoko umwakwe mwachaka chawelu. Mayakudanha yakulonga fina foyowile imwene imwecho, kosoko imwene mudasi na Baba wa udasi.
Ninga, aniye kosoko nikulonga ichawelu, musikunihuwila.
No nani muchiligati yenu yekudaha konesa fina ni wihi? Hona nikulonga ichawelu nhani musikunihuwila?
Ayuya imwene wa Mulungu yakuhulika simbuli sa Mulungu; isoko ikuleka anyeye musikuhulika ni kosoko anyeye musi wa Mulungu.”
Wayahudi howomubidula, Togola chisikulonga sawa ma chigumba fina agweye kwa Musamalia kahi kwina mhepo?
Yesu hoyowabidula, Nachaka mhepo; nikumogoha Baba anyeye musikunyogoha niye.
Aniye sikuhananga itunyo dyangu nimwecho, kwina yumwedu iyakudihananga, noyakuwa imulamusi.
Chawelu, chawelu, nikuwatamilani, imunhu yanghaikola imbuli yangu, nghakwenda yone difa.
Kameyi Awayahudi howomugamba, “Hambiya chimanya fina kwina ipepo. Ibulahimu kafa, na wagonesi, nagwe ukugamba Imunhu yanghaikola imbuli yangu, ngahakwenda yanomole difa.
Agweye kwa mukulu kusuma iBaba yetu Ibulahimu, iyafa? Na wagonesi wafile! Ukugamba gweye fina no nani?”
Yesu yabidula, Ninghakifuna nimwecho kitunya kwangu, kwechaka dyodyose; iBabangu noyakunitunya, womukugamba fina Mulungu wenu.
Ninga musimumanyile; aniye nimumanya. Nanganigambile, simumanyile, hanuwa nikuwa mudasi fina nyeye; ninga niye nimumanya na niikola imbuli yakwe.
iBaba yenu Ibulahimu hakasekelela kosoko yokudyona dijuwa dyangu; hakadyona hoyosekelela.
Awayahudi hawamugamba, “Nghwinati ufike minyaka makumi mashano, kumona Ibulahimu?”
Yesu yawagamba, “Chawelu, chawelu, nikuwatamilani, ugele Ibulahimu nghenatiyowe, ani noniye.”
Hawadondola mawe mamukubitile; ninga Yesu hoyokifisa, hoyolawa kunje ye dihekalu.
Foyagendage, hoyomona munhu mudula kulawa kwelekigwa kwakwe.
Awefusa wakwe howomusa, Mwalimu, yatendile uwihi nani, imunhu yuno hegu awamweleke, ilekile yakwelekigwa mudula?
Yesu yawabidula, Si kosoko imunhu yuno kagola wihi, kahi si awamweleke, ninga imilimo ya Mulungu na udaha wa Mulungu woneke umwakwe.
Ichagila chigolosa imilimo yakwe iyanitumile, ugele kukali misi; ichilo chikwija, ugole uwene hachaka yakudaha kugolosa milimo.
Ugele uno wonuwile muchilunga, aniye no ujelu we chilunga.
Yakalonge nheifo hakotwa mate hasi, hakagolosa itope dya mate na kumubaka imunhu yuya mumeso na ditope,
na kumugamba, “Luta kanawe mwibwawa dya Siloamu” (nong'amba yatumigwe). Hakaluta, hakanawa hakoya yakona.
Awanhu wa habahi behi, na waya awamonage yakutasa, hawagamba, “Ayuno so munhu yakalage haya na kutasa?”
Wamonga hawagamba, “No yeye.” Wamonga hawagamba, “Hata, ninga kakifana ne imwene.” Yawagamba, “No niye.”
Hawamusa, “Ameso gako gakumukakumuka nhani?”
Yawabidula, “Imunhu yakugambigwa Yesu kagolosa itope na kunibaka mumeso na kunigamba, ‘Luta Siloamu na ukanawe.’ Ninga imunhu yuno, honiluta, honinawa honikonga kona.”
Howomugamba, “Kahoki Hoyogamba Ani simanyile.”
Howomwigala Kumafalisayo imunhu yowile mudula.
Hadyuwa ijuwa dya Sabato Yesu doyagolose ditope na kumugubula meso gakwe.
Mafalisayo howomusa kahi ifyene foyadahile kona. Yawagamba, “Kaguma itope mumeso gangu, kamei honinawa, na nikona.”

Wamonga wa Mafalisayo hawagamba, “I munhu yuno nghalawile kwa Mulungu, kosoko nghakolile Isabato.” Ninga wamonga hawagamba, “Ikudahika nhani imunhu yakugolosa wihi yagolose ijumo fina dino?” Hokuwa mutemanuko mugati yawo.
Baho Amafalisayo hawamusa kahi imunhu yuya, “Ukugambaki kosoko kakuhonya udula?” Ni mugonesi.
Awayahudi wasafumile kuwa hakowa chipofu na kuwa hakadaha kona, mpaka fowawenanga awamweleke yuya yowile mudula hambiya yakona,
na kuwosa, Ayuno ni mwana wenu, womukugamba hakelekigwa mudula? Yanhani kuwa yakona hambiya?
Awaya wamweleke hawagamba, “Chimanya seye, ayuno ni mwana wetu na fina hakelekigwa chipofu,
ninga foyakona hambiya hata seye chisimanyile, no nani yamugubule meso. Mudeni mwecho; imwene ni mukulu mugima, kokilongela imwecho.”
Awamweleke wajawalonga nheifo kosoko wejawawogoha Wayahudi, kosoko Wayahudi hawakifumilisa fina munhu yanghamufimila fina Kilisito yekuleusigwa mudisinagogi.
Kosoko iyo awaya wemeleke hawagamba, “Imwene ni mukulu mugima musene mwecho.”
Hawamwinanga kahi lwakeli ayuya imunhu yahonyigwe upofu, hawamugamba, “Mwinghe Mulungu ditunyo; ase chimanya imunhu yuno kena wihi.”
Hakabidula, “Hona yena wihi, ani simanyile, chinhu chimwedu chonimanyile, aniye hanuwa chipofu ninga hambiya nikona.”
Hawamugamba, “Hakakutendela nhani Hakagubula nhani ameso gako?”
Hoyowabidula, “Nifulusa kuwatamilani, musendile kutegelesa, Nhani mukuhananga kuhulika kahi? Anye nanyi mukuhananga kuwa wefusa wakwe?”
Howomuliga wakugamba, “Agwe no umwifusa wakwe, aseye cha wefusa wa Musa.
Chimany fina Mulungu kalonga na Musa, ninga yuno chisimanyile kayalawile!”
Imunhu hakabidula, “Nhani, Adino ni ijumo! Anyesi musimanyile koyalawile naye kanigubula meso gangu.
Chimanya fina Mulungu nghekuwahulika awena uwihi ninga imunhu iyakumwenda na kumufuga Mulungu na kugolosa foyakwenda Mulungu, Mulungu yakumuhuwila.
Hata nheifo kulawa ichilunga fochanga ilihulikigwa fina munhu wowose kagubula ameso ge munhu yelekigwe chipofu.
Hona imunhu yuno nghalawile kwa Mulungu, nghowile yakudaha chochose.”
Howomubidula, “Agwe kwelekigwa muwihi muhala, ukudaha kuchifusa seye?” Howomulafa kunje.
Yesu yakahulike fina wamulafa kunje, na yakamone yagamba, “Togola ukumuhuwila Mwana we munhu?”
Yabidula, “Naye no nani, Mukulu, uleke nimuhuwile?”
Yesu yamugamba, “Kumona, noniye nikulonga nagwe.”
Hoyogamba, “Mundewa nikuhuwila, hoyomufuga.”
Yesu yagamba, “Kosoko ya kulamula hija kuchilungu chino awaya awasikona wone na awa awakona wowe fipofu.”
Wamonga wa Mafalisayo wowile habehi hawamuhulika howomugamba, “Ase nase chafidula?”
Yesu hakawagamba, “Nanga mowile mudula musowile mukuwa na wihi;” ninga hambiya mukugamba, “Chikona uwihi wenu ukwikala.”
Chawelu, chawelu, nikuwatamilani, imunhu inghakulokela kumulango kukwingila mwidewa dye singholo, ninga yakukwilila kwingi, imunhu yo muhiji kahi muhokaji
Ninga ayuya iyakwingilila kumulango no mudimi we singholo.
Ayo mwimilisi yakumukumulila umulango; singholo sikuhulika dijwi dyakwe, na yekusinanga singholo sakwe kwa masina na yekusilafa na kusilongosa kunje.
Yanghafulusa kusilafa kunje sose isakwe, yakusilongolela, na singholo sikumwandamila, kosoko sidimanya dijwi dyakwe.
Imugeni sisikumwandamila, kahi sikumutija, kosoko sisimanyile amajwi ga wageni.
Yesu hakalonga imbasi ino, ninga wasatangile choyalongage nawo.
Yesu kahi hakawagamba, “Chawelu, chawelu, nikuwatamilani, aniye no nimulango we singholo.
Wose awanilongolele ni wahiji na wahokaji, ninga singholo sisawahulikise.
Aniye no ni mulango; wowose iyakwila kulokela ukwangu, yakwenda yahone, yakwingila na kulawa na kupata madimilo.
Imuhiji yakwija kuhija na kukoma na kubana; aniye nija uleke wowe na uwumi na wowe nawo telele.
“Aniye no nimudimi muswanu. Mudimi muswanu yakulafa uwumi wakwe kosoko ya singholo.
Munhu yakudimu kosoko yo maliho, siyo mudimi, singholo si sakwe, yakona diwusi dikwija, yakusileka singholo yakudija, diwusi dikusikola na kusagalisa.
Yakutija kosoko ni munhu wa iliho na kechaka usungu ne singholo.
Aniye no nimudimu muswanu, nisimanya singholo sangu naso sinimanya,
fina Baba foyanimanyile naniye, fonimumanyile Baba; na nikulafa uwuni wangu kosoko ya singholo.
Ninga nina ngholo singi, aso si sa ditewa dino; aso naso inyagila nisigale, naso sohulika dijwi dyangu. Kosoko yiyo kukuwa na itewa dimwedu, na mudimi yumwedu.
“Kosoko iyo iBaba yakunyenda niye, kosoko nikulafa uwumi wangu, uleke ni ulonde kahi.
Hachaka munhu yekudaha kunihoka, ninga nina udaha wa kuulafa, na kuulonda hahi; dilagiso dino nidihokela kulawa kwa Baba.”
Hagalawanisa matemanuko mugati ya Wayahudi kosoko ya simbuli siso.
Matewa hawagamba, “Kena igini, na kena chilalu; waki womukumutegelesa.”
Wamonga hawagamba, “Asino siyo nonga sa munhu yena digini, digini dikudaha kugubula meso gemudula?”
Hayuwa ijuwa nikulu dya kukumula ako Yelusalemu;
ichigele che inyota, na Yesu yendeyogenda Mwihekalu, mwikumbo dya Sulemani.
Awayahudi hawamusunguluta na kumugamba, “Kogendelela kuchidasa mpaka milaki? Nghonaga agweye no ni Kilisito chitamile unghachifisefise.”
Yesu hakawabidula, “Nimutamilani ninga musikuhuwila. Imilimo yonikugolosa mu disina dya Baba, ayo no ikunihomelela;
ninga musikuhuwila, kosoko nyeye musuwile musingholo sangu.
Singholo sangu sikuhulika dijwi dyangu, na nisimanya, isene naso sinimanya;
nani nikusingha uwumi wa majuwa gose; na sisikudaha kwagilila, na kwechaka munhu yakudaha kunihoka kulawa mumukono wangu.
iBabangu iyaninghile siso ni mukulu kusuma wose, na hachaka yakudaha kumuhoka, kulawa mumikono yakwe.
Aniye na Baba ni chinhu chimwedu.”
Awayahudi hawadondola mawe kahi uleke wamutowele nago.
Yesu hoyowabidula, “Nimonesani milimo mingi miswanu kulawa kwa Baba; kosoko ya ihoki mu yiyo yomukunitowela mawe?”
Awayahudi hawamubidula wakugamba, “Si kosoko ye milimo miswanu ikuleka chikutowa na mawe, ninga kosoko yo kutofula
Yesu yawabidula, “Isitulumigwe mu malagiso genu, Hanigamba, ‘Anye mwa milungu?’
Ghonaga yawenange milungu awaya awejiligwe ne imbuli ya Mulungu na matulumo gasukudaha kubenigwa,
Mukumugamba, ‘Ayuya imwene iBaba kamusagula na kumulafa na kumutuma kuchilunga. Agweye ukutofula kosoko nigambile Aniye no ni Mwana we Mulungu?’
Nghonaga niye sikugolosa imilimo ya Baba, munghanihuwile;
Ninga hona nikuigolosa, inghowa musikunihuwila niye, ihuwileni imilimo iyecho, uleke mutange na kumanya fina, iBaba kamugati yangu na niye nuwa mugati ya Baba.”
Kahi howogesa kumukola, ninga hoyochulupuka kulawa mumikono yawo.
Hakaleuka kahi yaluta umwambu wa Yolodani ahanhu ahene Yohana Mubatisaji hakakongela kubatisa, hoyokuwa baho.
Wengi hawamwijila; hawagamba, “Yohana chawelu nghagolose ijumo dyodyose, ninga chila mbuli yoyalongile muchanhya ye munhu yuno ayuwa ya chawelu.”
Na wengi howomuhuwila.
Hambiya munhu yumonga yowa mutamu, Lasalo wa Betania, ikaya Maliamu ne dada yakwe Malita.
Ayuno no Maliamu yeja yamubaka iMundewa mafuta maswanu na kumuhamusa migulu yakwe na sinjwili sakwe, awene mukulu wawo Lasalo yowile mutamu.
Na kosoko iyo awalumbuse howokwigala mbuli, wakugamba, “Mundewa, ayuya wo ukumwenda mutamu.”
Ninga Yesu yakahulike hakagamba, “Utamu uno si wakufa; ninga ni kwa ditunyo dye Mulungu, uleke Mwana we Mulungu yatunyigwe kosoko ya uwo.”
Hambiya, Yesu hakamwenda Malita na idada yakwe na Lasalo.
Foyahulike fina hakowa mutamu, yejayekala majuwa meli ahanu bahaya hoyowile.
Hanyuma yakwe kawagamba awefusa wakwe, “Chigendeni Uyahudi kahi.”
Awefusa wakwe hawagamba, “Labi.”
Yesu hakabidula, “Sisaa sa nhemisi si kumi na mbili? Na imunhu yanghagenda nemisi ghakukobadika, kosoko yakuwona ujelu we yisi ino.
Ninga munhu wowose honayakugenda muchisa yakukobadika, kosoko ujelu umwakwe mwachaka.”
Yalonga nheifo, kameyi hakawagamba, “Imbwiyayetu Lasalo kagona, nikuluta nikamwinuse musinhongo.”
Awefusa wakwe howomugamba, “Mundewa, honayagonile nhongo kokwinuka.”
Ninga Yesu hakalonga muchanhya yo kufa kwakwe, awene hawamanya yakulonga kugona kwa kibwihisa du musinhongo.
Kamei Yesu hoyowatamila chawelu, “Lasalo kafa,
kosoko yenu nikonela fina sowile baho, uleke muchuwile. Ninga chigendeni ukwakwe.”
Tomasi iyakwinangwa ipasa, kagamba kuwefusa wayagwe, “Chigendeni naseye uleke chikafe hamwedu naye.”
Ugele foyafikile Yesu, Lasalo hakowe yasikigwe muchilalo majuwa mane.
Betania hayuwa habehi na Yelusalemu, utali wa maili mbili,
na Wayahudi wengi haweja kwa Malita na Maliamu kuwahongesa kosoko ye difa dye mundugu sawo.
Malita yakahulike fina Yesu yakwija, hoyolawa kwija muhokela, ugele Maliamu hakasigala mu nyumba.
Malita hakamugamba Yesu, “Mundewa nanga wowile baha, mundugusangu nghowile yakufa.
Ninga hata hambiya nimanya chochose choumutasa Mulungu, Mulungu yakukwingha.”
Yesu yamugamba, “I mundugusa yakwenda yenuke kahi.”
Malita hakamugamba, “Nimanya yakwenda yenuke dijuwa dyo kwina awanhu wose dyo indumo ye chilunga.”
Yesu hakamugamba, “Aniye nokwinuka wafile kahi no ni uwumi, iyakunihuwila niye yanghafa kokuwa na uwumi;
na imumi iyakunihuwila aniye nghakufa ng'oo. Ukuhuwila gonikulonga.”
Hakamugamba, “Heye, Mundewa, nikukuhuwila fina agweye no Kilisito, Mwana we Mulungu, iyakwija kuchilunga.”
Yakamale kulonga siso hoyemwinanga Maliamu chinyenele, “Mwalimu kabahano kahi yakukwinanga.”
Yakahulike nheifo hakenuka chimwandemwande hakemulutila.
Yesu hakowa nghenati yengile mukaya yawo, hakowa yenghali bahaya Malita hoyamufikile.
Awayahudi waya wowile hamwedu naye kugati, wakumuhongesa wakone Maliamu kenuka chimwandemwande, na kulawa kunje hawamwandamila, wagamba nhagela yakuluta kuchilalo yikalile ukuya.
Maliamu yakeje hoyowile Yesu yakamwone hakogwa hamigulu yakwe, yakumugamba, “Mundewa, nanga wowile baha mundugu sangu nghowile yakufa.”
Yesu yakamone yakulila na Wayahuhi wajile naye nawo wakulila, hakona usungu muchidoga chakwe na kwidasika;
Hakawagamba, “Mumwika hoki?” Hawamugamba, “Mundewa wije ulange.”
Yesu hakakonga kulila.
Awayahudi hawagamba, “Langeni, foyamwendile!”
Ninga awamonga hawagamba, “Ayuno yagubule ameso ge mudula kalemeligwa kumugolosa yuno yanghafe?”
Noho Yesu, hoyokuwa na usungu lugano kahi, hoyofika kuchilalo; hachuwa cha mhango, hachigubikigwa na diwe.
Yesu hoyogamba, “Dileuseni diwe,” Malita ilumbudye wa yuya yafile, hoyumugamba, “Mundewa kwa ugele uno kwina ibofu, kosoko kafa majuwa mane galokile.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Sikugambile fina unghahuwila kokona ditunyo dye Mulungu?”
Kamei howoleusa diwe, Yesu hoyokwinula meso gakwe kuchanhya hoyogamba, “Baba nikukulumba kusoko ukunihulika.
Hanimanya fina agweye ukunihulika majuwa gose, ninga nilonga sino kosoko ya wanhu wano awemile hano, uleke wahuwile fina agweye no unitumile.”
Yakamale kulonga nheifo, hakalonga kwa ijwi dikulu, “Lasalo lawa kunje!”
Imunhu yafile hakenuka imikono yakwe ne migulu yakwe yohigwe sisanda chihaga chakwe chigubikigwa na sisanda, Yesu hoyowagamba, “Mudoholeni mulekeni yalute.”
Kosoko yiyo wengi wa Wayahudi awejile hamwedu na Maliamu na wonile doyagolose, hawamuhuwila;
Ninga wamonga howoluta ku Mafalisayo, na kuwatamila foyagolose Yesu,
Baho makuhani wakulu na Mafalisayo hawakikonghola na kitang'anyila, hawagamba, “Chochikugolosa choni? Yakugolosa majumo mengi!
Chinghamuleka yagendelele nheifino, chila munhu yakwenda yamuhuwile, na Walumi wakwenda weje kuchibanila ahanhu hetu hasunhile na ditaifa dyetu!”
Ninga yumwedu wawo Kayafa yowile kuhani mukulu umwaka uya, hoyowagamba, “Anye musimanyile chochose;
musimanyile fina inogela kosoko yenu munhu yumwedu yafe kosoko ya wanhu, uleke ditaifa dyose dinghagilile.”
Nghalongile didyo kosoko ya misungu yakwe imwecho, ninga kosoko yowile mutambiki mukulu umwaka uya hakonesigwa na Mulungu fina Yesu yafe kosoko ya ditaifa,
na si kosoko ya ditaifa du lakini kuwakonghola hamwedu awana wa Mulungu awenele ako nako.
Kukongela dijuwa didyo wendewohananga njila ya kumukoma.

Kosoko iyo Yesu nghadahile kugenda yakonigwa na wanhu mugati ya Wayahudi, ninga hoyoluta kulawa iyisi iyo mpaka kubehi behi na kunyika, ku ikaya ikwinangwa Efulaimu; na hakekala uko hamwedu na wefusa wakwe.
Idijuwa dikulu dya Wayahudi dye Pasaka hadyuwa habehi, na wengi hawakwila Yelusalemu kulawa kufilunga wasunhe fidoga fyawo ugele dijuwa dye Pasaka disinati difike.
Wenda womuhananga Yesu na wakiyusa awecho kwa wecho ugele wemile mudihekalu, “Mukona nhani? Nghokwija ku sikukuu?”
Hambiya, amekuhani wakulu na Mafalisayo hawalafa malagiso hona munhu wowose yamanyile koyowile, yawatamile wamanye, uleke wamukole.
Fogasigale majuwa mutandatu kufika dijuwa dya Pasaka, Yesu hoyokwija Betania, ahowile Lasalo, imwene yenuligwe na Yesu kulawa mu difa.
Baho hawamugolosela chakudiya; Malita yendeyotogoma, na Lasalo hakuwa yumwedu wawo awekale hamesa hamwedu naye.
Maliamu hoyolonda chichupa cha mafuta ge mhungile swanu hakamubaka mumigulu ya Yesu na hamusa imigulu yakwe kwa sinjwili sakwe, na inyumba hoimema mhungile swanu ya mafuta.
Ninga, Yuda Isikalioti yumwedu wa wefusa wakwe ayuya yowile wo kumusongesa, hoyogamba,
“Nhani amafuta gano gasambasigwe kwa dinali magana madatu na kuwegha awakiwa?”
Hakalonga nhaifo, sikosoko hakowa na ubasi na wakiwa, ninga kosoko hakowa muhiji, kosoko noyowile ne chisanduku cha mapesayendeyolonda amapesa gagumagwe umo.
Yesu yagamba, “Mulekeni, yageke kosoko ya dijuwa dya masiko gangu.
Awakiwa mwenawo majuwa gose hamwedu nanye, ninga aniye musihamwedu nani majuwa gose.”
Ditewa dikulu dya Wayahudi wakamanye fina kabaho, howoluta uko, si kosoko ya Yesu du ninga wendewahanana kumona na Lasalo, yenulinuligwe na Yesu kulawa mudifa.
Kosoko awatambiki wakulu hawahananga njila ya kumukoma Lasalo,
kosoko matewa ga Wayahudi wendewoleuka ukwawo na kumulutila Yesu na kumuhuwila.
Dijuwa dya keli itewa ikulu dya wanhu awejile kusikukuu hawahulika fina Yesu yakwija Yelusalemu.
Howobena matambi ge mitende howoluta kumuhokela wakujoja, “Hosana! Kamotesigwa ayuya iyakwija mudisina dye Mundewa wa Isilaeli!”
Na Yesu iMundewa hoyolangisa dipunda didodogi, na kwikala muchanhya yakwe; fina foitulumwe,
“Unghogohe biti Sayuni;
Langa; iMundewa yakwija
kekala mwi mwana we dipunda.”
Awefusa wakwe wasatangile chino kunghonga; ninga Yesu yakatunyigwe, Kamei howogelegela fina haitulumigwa nheifo kosoko yakwe, fina imemelesigwa ukwakwe.
Ditewa dyowile hamwedu naye ugele foyamwinange Lasalo kulawa kuchilalo na kumwinula kulawa kuwafile howolafa uhomelesi.
Chileka amatewa galutile kumuhokela ni kosoko hawahulika fina hakagolosa ichitangilo chicho.
Amafalisayo howokigamba awecho kwa wecho, “Mukona fina anyeye musikudaha dyodyose; langeni, ichilunga chikumwandamila.”
Mu wanhu walutile Yelusalemu kufuga ugele wa sikukuu hawowa Wayunani.
Awene wawo howomulutila Filipo yalawile Betisaida ya Galilaya, wagamba, “Mukulu aseye chikuhanga kumwona Yesu.”
Filipo kejamutamila Andelea; Andelea na Filipo wejamutamila Yesu,
Yesu kawabidula kagamba, “Ugele ufika we Mwana we Munhu kutunyigwa.
Chawelu, chawelu nikumutamilani imhule ye ngano inghaleka kulagala hasi musanga na kufa, ikusigala imwene, ninga inghafa ikweleka singi nyingi.
Iyakwenda uwumi wakwe yakuwagilisa, na yuya iyekulema uwumi wakwe muchilunga chino yakuupata ku uwumi wa majuwa gose,
munhu wowose yanghanitogomela, imwagila yanyandamile; na honuwile niye, baho noho yakwenda yowe imutogomi wangu, imunhu yanghanitogemela, iBabangu yakwenda yalumbe kosoko yakwe.”
“Hambiya ichidoga changu chikwidasika nani nigambeki? ‘Baba, unihonye ne chipisi chino?’ Hata, ni kosoko iino nija kuchipisi chino.
Baba, uditunye disina dyako. Baho hodikwija dijwi kulawa kulanga, Niditunya, na nikwenda niditunye kahi.”
Matewa awemile baho hawahulika howogamba fina ididima. Wamonga howogamba, “Malaika kalonga naye.”
Yesu yabidula, “Dijwi dino dija kosoko yenu, si kosoko yangu.
Hambiya no chigele cho kulamuligwa ichilunga chino, hambiya imukulu we chilunga chino yakutagigwa kunje;
na niye ninghafulusa kwinuligwa muchanhya kulawa hasi, nikuwakwega wanhu wose ukwangu.”
Hakalonga sino konesa ni ifa dyaki dyoyakufa.
Amatewa weja wamubidula kugamba, “Chihulika mumalagiso fina Kilisito yakwikala majuwa gose. Kodaha nhani kugamba Mwana we munhu yakwenda yenuligwe kuchanhya? Ayo Mwana we munhu no nani?”
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Ujelu wa hamwedu nanye kwa chipisi chitali chidodogi. Mugende ugele mwenawo ujelu, ichisa chingheje chiwasumani, iyakugenda muchisa nghamanyile hoki koyakuluta.
Ugele mwenawo ujelu, huwileni mu ujelu, uleke muwe wana wa ujelu.”
Baho Yesu yakalonge nheifo, hakaleuka hakakifisa kulawa ukwawo.
Hamwedu na majuwa gose goyagolose kumwande ya meso gawo, ninga wasamuhuwile;
hayuwa uleke imbuli yalongigwe ne mugonesi Isaya imemelesigwe:
“Mundewa, nani yahuwile imbuli yetu
na kwa chinani ugubuligwa
umukono we Mundewa?”
Kosoko iyo wasadahile kuhuwila
kosoko Isaya hakalonga kahi,
“Kawatula ameso gawo
na kaigolosa imiyoyo yawo kuwa mikugutu,
uleke wanghone kwa meso gawo na kona kwa miyoyo yawo,
na kunibidukila niwahonye.”
Isaya hakalonga siso kosoko hanona ditunyo dyakwe hoyolonga kosoko yakwe.
Hata nheifo, wengi wa wakulu howomwihuwila, ninga kosoko ya kuwogoha Mafalisayo, wasadahile kulonga chimesomeso, uleke wanhalafigwe mumasinagogi.
Kosoko hawenda ditunyo dya wanhu kusuma ditunyo dye Mulungu.
Yesu yenula dijwi yekugamba, “Wowose yakunihuwila niya, nghakunihuwila niye du, ninga ayuya iyanitumile.
Na yakunyona niye yakumona na yuya yanitumile.
Nija kuwa ujelu we chilunga, uleke ayuya iyakunihuwila yanghasigale muchisa.
Hona kwina wowose yakuhulika simbuli sangu, na nghakusikola, aniye sikumuliganisa; kosoko sijile kuliganisa ichilunga ninga kuchihonya ichulunga.
Imwene iyakunilema niye na nghakuhokela simbuli sangu, kena mulamusi, simbuli sonilongile no sikasimuliganisa mudijuwa dye indumo.
Kosoko niye silongile kwa udaha wangu nimwecho; Baba iyanitumile kanigha dilagiso, nilonge choni na nisimulile choni.
Na nimanya fina dilagiso dyakwe ni uwumi wa majuwa gose. Kosoko iyo chonikulonga, nikulonga ifyene Baba foyanitumile.”
Hambiya dijuwa dikulu dye Pasaka fodowile disinati difike Yesu hakamanya fina ichigele chokuleuka muchilunga na kuluta kwe Baba chifika. Hakawenda awakwe wowile muchilunga, hakawenda mpaka ndumo.
Ichigele chokudiya, Ishetani yakowe kaguma muchidoga cha Yuda Isikalioti, mwana wa Simoni, kumusongesa.
Yesu yakamanye fina Baba kamwingha ifinhu fyose mumikono yakwe, na fina kalawa kwe Mulungu,
hoyokwinuka hoyekale, hakeka sisuke sakwe hanghanda, hoyokiyoha na chitambala.
Kameyi hoyogida ameji mwibakuli, hakakonga kusunha imigulu ya wefusa wakwe, na kuwahamusa ne chitambala chakwe choyakiyohile muchuno.
Hakeja kwa Simon Petulo, iPetulo hoyomugamba, “Mundewa agweye ukunisunha migulu?”
Yesu hakamubidula, “Chonikugolosa nghukudaha kumanya hambiya, ninga hanyuma ukaumanya.”
Petulo hoyomugamba, “Agweye ukwija uninashe migulu yangu nghukunasha ng'oo.” Yesu hoyomubidula, “Ninghaleka kukunasha nghumuhangi naniye.”
Simoni Petulo hoyomugamba, “Mundewa si imigulu yangu du ninga ne mikono yangu ne ditwi dyangu.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Iyafuluse kiyoga kechaka soko ya kiyoga kahi nanga kunawa migulu ninga musafi umutufi wose; nanye mwa wasafi, ninga si nyeye mose.”
Kosoko hakamanya no nani yakwende yamusongese; nochileka yagambile, “Anye mose musi safi.”
Yakafuluse kusunha migulu yawo, na kulonda si suke sakwe, na kwikala haukalo wakwe, hoyowagamba, “Mumanya chonigolose ukwenu?
Mukuninanga, ‘Mwalimu’ na ‘Mundewa,’ na mukulonga chelu, nofo nuwile.
Honaga aniye ni Mundewa ne Mwalimu wenu, niwanashani migulu yenu, anye nanye imwagilani kinasha migulu nyeye kwa nyeye.
Kosoko nifulusa kumonesani nanye mugolose fonimoneseni.
Chawelu lugano, nikumutamilani imutumwa si mukulu kusuma iMundewa wakwe, kahi ayuya yatumigwe si mukulu kusuma iyamutumile.
Hona munghamanya, ifinhu fino, ibeka ukwenu hona mukufigolosa.
“Sikulonga kosoko yanyeye mose; niwamanya woniwasaguleni; uleke simbuli sa Mulungu simemelesigwe, ‘Ayuya yadiyile umukate wangu kanyinulila ichisinyagilo chakwe.’
Nikumutamilani ino hambiya, ugele isinati ilawanise, uleke hona ikulawanisa, muhuwile fina aniye no nene.
Chawelu, chawelu, nikumutamilani, iyakumuhokela wowose wonikumutuma yakunihokela niye; naye yakunihokela niya yakuhokela iyanitumile niye.”
Yesu yakalonge nheifo, hoyokuwa na lwidaso muchidoga chakwe hoyohomelela, “Chawelu, chawelu nikuwatamilani, yumwedu wenu yakwenda yanisongese.”
Awefusa wakwe howokilanga, wasatangile chawelu fina yakulonga nani.
Mwifusa wakwe yumwedu, yendigwe na Yesu, hakegemila muchifa cha Yesu.
Baho Simon Petulo hoyomukonyesa, na kugamba, “Chitamile no yehoki imwene woyakulonga.”
Iyegamile muchifa cha Yesu hoyomugamba, “Mundewa, no yehoki?”
Yesu hoyobidula, “No yuya yonikwenda nimwinghe ichibendu cho mukate chonichanise mwibakuli.” Kamei yakachanise ichibendu chiya, hoyomwingha Yuda, mwana wa Simon Isikalioti.
Yakalonde ichibendu chiya, Shetani hoyomwingila, Yesu hoyomugamba, “Dyo ukuhanga kugolosa, golosa chimwande.”
Hamesa hachaka yatangile nhani yalongile nheifo ukwakwe.
Wamonga hawana nhagela kosoko Yuda noyowile ne chisanduku cha mapesa, Yesu yendeyomutuma, Kagule fyene fyochikuhananga kosoko ye sikukuu ino; Nhagela chinhu cha kuwengha wakiwa.
Kwa nheifo yakahokele ichibendu chiya, chimwande hoyolawa kunje; hachuwa chilo.
Yakaleuka, Yesu hoyogamba, “Hambiya Mwana we Mulungu yakutunyigwa, na mugati yakwe Mulungu yakutunyigwa.
Mulungu yanghatunyigwa u mwakwe, Mulungu naye yakwenda ya mutunye umwakwe imwecho, na kumutunya chimwande.
Wana wadodogi, kwa chipisi chiguhi na hamwedu nanye. Mwonihananga; fina fonalongile kuwayahudi nikulonga ukwenu nako, Konikuluta misikudaha kunyandamila.
Dilagiso disha nikumwinghani, mukiyende, fina fonimwendileni niye anye nanye mukiyende nheifo.
Munghakiyenda awanhu wose womanya fina anyeye mwa wefusa wangu.”
Simoni Petulo hoyomugamba, “Mundewa, ukwijahe?” Yesu hoyomubidula, “Konikuluta nghukudaha kunyandamila hambiya; ninga ukudaha kunyandamila hanyuma.”
Petulo hoyomugamba, “Nhani nileke kukwandamila hambiya? Nikuulafa uumi wangu kosoko yako.”
Yesu hoyomubidula, “Kolafa uumi wako kosoko yangu? Chawelu chawelu, nikukutamila, ugele dijogolo disinati dike, ukuwa unikanile kadatu.”
“Mughadasike mufidoga fyenu; muhuwileni Mulungu, nihuwileni na niye.
Munyumba ya Baba mwina fibuha fingi; nanga si nheifo hanuwa nikumutamilani fina nikamwikilani ukalo?
Ninghaluta na kumwikilani ukalo, nokwija niwalondeni chilutanye ukwangu, uleke honuwile niye anye nanye muwe baho.
Na muimanya injila yonikulutila.”
Tomasi hoyomugamba, “Mundewa chisimanyile koukuluta choimanya nhani injila?”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Aniye no ni njila, ne chawelu no uwumi; kwachaka munhu yakwija kwa Baba inghakulokela ukwangu.
Nanga unimanyile niye hakuwa u kumumanya ne Babangu nheifiya; hambiya mumumanya na mufulusa kumona.”
Filipo hoyomugamba, “Mundewa, chonese iBaba noyochikuhananga du chokwiguta.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Nikala nagwe majuwa gose gano, ninga agwe hunimanyile Filipo? Iyanyonile niye kamona ne Baba; ukudaha nhani kugamba, chonese Baba
Nghukuhuwila fina aniye na mugati ya Baba na Baba kamugati yangu? Simbuli sonikulonga ukwenu sikulonga kwa udaha wangu; ninga iBaba yowile mugati yakugolosa milimo yakwe.
Huwileni, aniye na mugati ya Baba na Baba kamugati iyangu; hona si nheifo munihuwile kosoko ye milimo iyeecho.
Huwileni, huwileni nikumutamilani, imunhu iyakunihuwila imilimo yonikugolosa, niye yakwenda yagolose kahi yakudaha kugolosa mikulu kusuma ino, kosoko nikuluta kwa Baba.
Chochose chomukutasa kwe disina dyangu, nigolose, uleke iBaba yatunywigwe mu iMwana;
Munghatasa chinhu chochose mu disina dyangu nikwenda nigolose.”
“Mughanyenda, mukukola malagiso gangu.
Na nikumutasa Baba, yakwenda yamwigheni mutasi yungi, yekale nanyi majuwa gose.
No Muhe we chawelu, imwene ichilunga chino chisikudaha kumuhokela; anye mukumumanya, kosoko yakwikala hamwedu nanye na yakuwa kugati yenu.
Sikumulekani mwi wemwene; mukumwijilani.
Ninga chipisi chiguhi ichilunga chisikwenda chinyone kahi, ninga anyeye mukweda munyone; kosoko niye ni mumi, anye nanye mukuwa womi.
Dijuwa dyo, mukamumanya fina aniye nuwa mugati ya Baba ne Baba na nyeye muwa mugati yangu, na niye muwa mugati yangu, na niye mugati yenu.
Iyena malagiso gangu na kugagolosa, aye no yakunyenda, na iyakunyenda yakwenda yendigwe ne Babangu nami nikwenda nimwende na kigubula ukwakwe.”
Yuda, (si Isikalioti) hoyomugamba, “Mundewa yanhani fina ukuhananga kigubula ukwetu ninga si kuchilunga?”
Yesu hoyomubidula, na kumugamba, “Awakunyenda wakukola imbuli yangu, na iBaba yakwenda yawende, nase chikwija ukwakwo na kugolosa ukalo wetu umwawo.
Ayuya imwene inghakunyenda nghakukola simbuli sangu, na imbuli yomukuhulika si yangu ninga ni ya Baba iyanitumile.
Simbuli sino nilonga nanye, ugele nikali hamwedu nanyi.
Ninga, Imutasi, Muhe Musunhile iyekwenda yegaligwe na Baba ku disina dyangu, yakwenda yawafuse finhu fyose, na kuwagelegesa gose goniwafusile.
“Digoya nikumulekelani; digoya dyangu nikumwinghani; sifina ichilunga fochikulafa; aniye nikumwinghani fidoga fyenu finghedasike, kahi finghogohe.
Hamunihulika nikumugambani, ‘Nikuleuka, ninga nikwenda nimwijileni!’ Hona mukunyenda, nanga mukunyenda hamuwa mukusekelela, kosoko iBaba ni mukulu kusuma niye.
Na hambiya nimutamilani ugele unghali kufika, uleke maukufika muhuwile.
“Sikulonga mbuli nyingi kahi nanyeye, kosoko imukulu we chilunga chino yakwija. Kachaka udaha wowose ukwangu;
ninga nikugolosa fina iBaba foyanilagise, uleke ichilunga chimanye fina nikumwenda iBaba. Inukeni, chigendeni kuya.”
“Aniye no ni musabibu wa chawelu, na iBabangu no mulimi.
Chila inhambi idisikweleka, yakudileusa, na chila inhambi idikweleka mamudyo yakudihungulila uleke digendelele kweleka lugano.
Anyeye mufulusa kwela kosoko ye imbuli yonilongile ukwenu.
Ikaleni mugati iyangu, na niye mugani yenu. Fina dinhambi fodisikudaha kweleka diimwene, ikuhanangigwa dikale mumusabibu, anye nanye nheifo musikudaha kweleka munghaleka kwikala u mwangu.
“Aniye no ni musabibu, anyeye no mumanhambi. Iyakwikala mugati yangu, na niye mugati yakwe, no yuyo iyakweleka mamudyo mengi, kosoko munghaniswela musikudaha kugolosa chochose.
Imunhu nghona ngakwikala umwangu, yakutagigwa kunje kifana itambi na kunyala; na matambi gakulundigwa, na kukubititigwa mumoto na kusomigwa.
Munghekala umwangu, na simbuli sangu singhekala mugati yenu, taseni chochose chomukuhananga, na mukwenda mugoloseligwe.
Kwa nheifo iBaba yakutunyigwa, kosoko mukweleka mamudyo mengi, mukiyonesa chawelu fina mwa wefusa wangu.
Fina iBaba foyanyendile ani, nani nofonimwendileni; mugendelele kwikala mu wendo wangu.
Munghagakola amalagiso gangu, mwukwenda mugendelele kwikala mu wendo wangu, fina niye fonikolile amalagiso ga Baba na kwikala mu wendo wakwe.
“Simbuli sino nisilonga ukwenu uleke ichinyemi changu chuwe ukwenu, uleke ichinyemi chenu chimemelekele.
Adino no dilagiso dyangu, mukiyende fina aniye fonimwendileni anyeye.
Kwechaka wendo mukulu kusuma uno, we imunhu kulafa uwumi wakwe kosoko ya wambwiya sakwe.
Anyeye mwawambwiya sangu honaga mukugolosa fonimulagiseni.
Sikuwenanga kahi imutogomi kosoko imutogomi nghamanyile imukulu wakwe yakugolosa choni, ninga nimwinangani nyeye wambwiya sangu, kosoko gose gokunihulike kulawa kwa Baba niwatamilani.
Sinyeye mwanisagule, ninga aniye nonawasaguleni na kuwegala mulute mukeleke mamudyo na mamudyo genu gagendelele, uleke chochose chomukumutasa iBaba mudisina dyangu yamwingheni.
Dilagiso dyangu nodino, mukiyende.”
“Ichilunga chinghamusulani, mugelegele fina hachikonga kunisula niye.
Munghowa wanhu we chilunga, ichilunga chikumwendani kosoko mwawanhu wakwe. Ninga hanimusagulani kulawa muchilunga chino, anye mu si wanhu we chilunga; nochileka ichilunga chikuwasula.
Mugelegele, imbuli yonamutamileni, ‘Imutumishi si mukulu kusuma imukulu wakwe, nghonaga niye hawanisambase, womusambasani na nyeye, nghona waikolile imbuli yangu,’ wakola iyenu nayo.
Ninga wowagolosela gose gano kosoko yangu, kosoko wasimumanyile ayuya iyanitumile.
Nanga sejile nakulonga nawo, hawowa wakuwa chaka wihi; ninga hambiya wechaka chinhu cha kuwalongela, kosoko yo uwihi wawo.
Ayuya iyakunisula niye yakumusula na Baba neifia.
Nhanga gagolose muchiligati yawo imilimo yene hechaka wowose yakudaha kugolosa, wasowile wakuwa na wihi, ninga hambiya wona na wanisula niye hamwedu na Baba.
Kukumemelesa imbuli itulumigwe mwilagiso dyawo, ‘Wanisula chaka.’
“Ninga, nghona Imulolesi yakwija, wonikwenda nimwigale kulawa kwa Baba, Muhe we chawelu, iyakulawa kwa Baba, yakwenda yowe muhomelesi wangu;
anye nanye mwa wahomelesi, kosoko hamuwa hamwedu na niye kulawa kunghonga.”
“Nimutamilani sose sino uleke munghaleke dihuwi dyenu.
Wakumuwingani mumasinagogi chawelu, ichigele chikwija ichene wowose yuya yakumukomani yakona fina yakumutogomela Mulungu itunyo.
Na wakwenda wagolose nheifo kosoko wasimumanyile iBaba na niye nheifia.
Ninga nilonga sino ukwenu, ugele nomoo ukwija mugelegele fina hanimutamutamilani.”
“Salongile simbuli sino kulawa kunghonga kosoko hanyuwa hamwedu nanye.
Ninga hambiya nikuluta ukwakwe iyanitumile; hechaka munhu yekunyusa, ukwijahe?
Ninga kosoko nilongile simbuli sino ukwenu, usungu umema mufidoga fyenu.
No nheifo, nikumutamilani ichawelu: Ni fiswanu kwa ulwandi ulwenu fina nikuleuka, kosoko ninghaleka kuleuka, Imulolesi nghakwija ukwenu; ninga ninghaluta nikwenda nimwigale.
Ugele woyekwija, yakuchonesa ichilunga muchanhya ya uwihi, ichawelu, na kuliganiswa.
Muchanhya ya uwihi kosoko wasanihuwile;
muchanhya ya chawelu kosoko nikuluta kwa Baba, na musikwenda munyone kahi;
muchanhya yo kuliganiswa kosoko, imukulu we chilunga chino kaliganiswa.
“Nina finhu fingi fya kulonga ukwenu, ninga musikudaha kufihokela hambiya.

Nghona iMuhe we chawelu yakwija, yakayomulongosani kuchawelu chose; nghakwenda yalonga kwa udaha wakwe imwecho, ninga sose soyakuhulika nosoyakulonga, na yakumutamilani ifinhu fikwija ugele fisinati fije.
Kanitunya niye, kosoko yakulonga ifyangu na kumutamilani nyeye.
Fose foyenafyo iBaba ni fyangu, kosoko iyo nigamba yakulonda ifyangu, na kumutamilani anyeye.”
“Chipisi chidodogi musinyona, kahi chipisi chidodogi, monyona.”
Wefusa wakwe wamonga hawakiyusa, “Choni chichi cho yakulonga ukwetu, ‘Chipisi chiguhi, monyona; na kosoko nikuluta kwa Baba?’
Hawagamba, ‘Yakulonga choni foyakugamba, chipisi chiguhi?’ Chisikumanya choyakulonga.”
Yesu hakamanya fina wakwenda wamuse; yawagamba, “Achino nochomukiyusa, fina chonikulonga choni ma nigamba chipisi chiguhi musinyona na kahi chipisi chiguhi monyona?
Chawelu chawelu nikumutamilani, molila na kuhongesa, ninga ichilunga chosekelela; mokuwa na usungu, ninga usungu wenu wobiduka kuwa chinyemi,
Imwanamuke nghonaga yakweleka, kena usungu, kosoko ichigele chakwe chifika, ninga yanghamala kweleka ichali, nghakugelegela kahi usungu uya kosoko ye chinyemi fina ichali chelekigwa muchilunga.
Kosoko mwina usungu hambiya, ninga namonani hanyuma na fidoga fyenu fokuwa na chinyemi, hachaka yakudaha kuleusa ichinyemi chenu.
Dijuwa didyo musikuwa na soko ya kusa chinhu ukwangu. Chawelu chawelu nikumutamilani munghamutasa Baba chinhu chochose mwisina dyangu komwinghani.
Mupaka hambiya musitasile chinhu chochose mudisina dyangu; taseni, mohokela, ichinyemi chenu chimeme.”
“Nilonga sino ukwenu kwa mbasi; Ichipisi chikwija, ugele uwene sikulonga nanye kwa mbasi kahi, ninga kumutamilani chimesomeso muchanhya ya Baba.
Dijuwa dyo mukamutasa mudisina dyangu na sikugamba fina nikanimutasilani kwa Baba;
kosoko iBaba imwecho yekumwendani, kosoko nyeye munyenda niye na muhuwila fina nija kulawa kwa Baba.
Hanija kulawa kwa Baba, na nija kuchilunga; kahi, nikuchileka ichilunga; na kuluta kwa Baba.”
Awefusa wakwe hawagamba, “Haa, hambiya ukulonga chimeso meso si kwa mbasi.
Hambiya chimanya fina kumanya finhu fyose, kwechaka soko ya munhu wowose kukusa, kwa nheifino chikuhuwila fina hakulawa kwe Mulungu.”
Yesu yawabidula, “Hambiya nohomukuhuwila?
Ichipisi chikwija, chawelu, chija, ugele womukwenda mukiyagale, chila munhu ukaya ukwakwe, na monileka niye nimwene; ninga, si imwene; kosoko iBaba kahamwedu nani.
Nilonga sino ukwenu, uleke umwangu muwe na digoya. Muchilunga mwina magayo; ninga musangalale aniye nichisuma ichilunga.”
Yesu yakamale kulonga simbuli siso, hoyokwinula ameso gakwe kulanga na kugamba, “Baba, ugele ufika umutunye iMwanago uleke iMwana naye yakutunye gweye,
kosoko gweye ukumwingha udaha muchanhya ya wose wene mutufi, yawenghe uwumi wa majuwa gose awaya wo umwinghile.
Na uno no uwumi wa majuwa gose, fina wakumanye gweye go Mulungu yumwedu we chawelu ne Yesu Kilisito imwene wo umutumile.
Nikutunya muchilunga, nikamale umulimo wa wanitumile nigolose;
hambiya Baba, unitunye kumwande yako na ditunyo dyonowile nadyo hamwande yako na didunyo dyonowile hamwedu nagweye ugele ichilunga chisinati chumbigwe.
“Nidigolosa disina dyako dimanyigwe wowaninghile kulawa kuchilunga. Hawowa wako, houningha niye. Wagolosa fina imbuli yako foikulonga,
na hambiya wamanya fina chila chinhu chowaninghile chikulawa ukwako.
Niwengha imbuli iya yowaninghile niye, na waihokela; wamanya chawelu nilawa ukwako, na wakuhuwila fina hakunituma.
“Nikuwatasila; sikuchitasila ichilunga ninga awaya awene wouninghile, kosoko ni wako;
awangu wose wako, na awako wangu, na nikutunyigwa mugati yawo.
Na hambiya si umuno kahi muchilunga, ninga awene wamuno muchilunga, aniye nikwija ukwako. Baba musunhile, uwakole mudisina dyako, dyouninghile uleke wowe na umwedu, kifana seye fochimwedu.
Fonowile hamwedu du nawo, haniwakola mudisina dyako dyo waninghile, niwemilila hachaka yagilile hata yumwedu nanga imwana wo kwagilila, uleke matulumo gamemelesigwe.
Ninga hambiya nikwija ukwako; na simbuli sino nikusilonga muchilunga, uleke ichinyemi changu chimemelesigwe mugati yako.
“Niwengha imbuli yako; ichilunga chiwasula kosoko awene si we chilunga, fina niye fo si we chilunga.
Sikutasa fina uwaleuse muchilunga, ninga uwemilile na yuya iyehile.
Awene si wechilunga fina niye fo si wechilunga.
Uwasunhe ne chawelu, imbuli yako no chawelu.
Fina agweye fowanitumile muchilunga, ani nani nheifiya niwatuma muchilunga.
Na kosoko yawo nikilafa nimwecho, uleke nawo wowe wakilafile muchawelu.
“Sikuwatasila awano du, ninga na awakwenda wahuwile kosoko ye imbuli yawo,
uleke wowe na umwedu, fina agweye, Baba, fowuwile mugati yangu, na niye mugati yako, awene nawo wowe mugati iyetu, uleke ichilunga chihuwile fina agweye nounitumile.
Ditunyo dyouninghile niwengha awene, uleke wowe na umwedu fina aseye fochina umwedu:
Aniye mugati yawo na agweye mugati yangu, uleke wakangale muumwedu, uleke ichilunga chimanye fina agweye kunituma na kuwenda ifyene fyo ukunyenda niye.
“Baba! Nikwenda, awaya awene wo uninghile, wowe hamwedu nani baho honyuwile, wadyone ditunyo dyangu dyo uninghile kwa uwendo wako ukwangu ugele ichilunga chisinati chumbigwe.
Baba ni wachawelu, ichilunga chisikumanyile, ninga aniye nikumanya; na wano wamanya fina hakunituma.
Niwatamila disina dyako, na nikwenda nigendelele kuwatamila, uleke uwendo uwene wo ukunyenda nawo uwe mugati yawo, na niye nuwe mugati yawo.”
Yesu yakamale kulonga simbuli siso hakaleuka na kuloka ichikolongo cha Keduloni, uko hakuwa na busitani, Yesu na wefusa wakwe howokwingila mubusitani.
Hambiya, Yuda ayuya yamusongese, hakahamanya ahanhu haya; kosoko Yesu hakasowela kuluta baho na wefusa wakwe.
Kamei Yuda hakalonda chitewa cha wasilikali, na watogomi kulawa ku makuhani wakulu, na Mafalisayo howowalutila wena na mwenje na mamuli na filama.
Yesu, yakamanye gose agowile kumwande yakwe, yekilafanisa kumwande ya wose, na kuwagamba, “Mukumulangisa nani?
“Hawamubidula Yesu wa Nasaleti.” Yesu hawagamba, “No niye, Yuda, iyamusongese, hakema hamwedu nawo.”
Yakawagambe, “No niye hawoya chisengelenyuma na kugwa hasi.”
Kahi hakawosa, “Mukumuhananga nani?” Hakagamba, “Yesu wa Nasaleti.”
Yesu hakawagamba, “Nimutamilani fina no niye,” hambiya, “Nghona mukunihananga niye, awanhu wano walekeni walute.”
Aino hayuwa kumemelesa imbuli yoyalongile, “Mu waya wowaninghile, simwagilise hata yumwedu.”
Baho Simon Petulo, yowile na dipanga, hakadikwega na kumudumula inghutwi yo kulume imutogomi we mutambiki mukulu. Yenangwa Maluku.
Yesu hakamugamba Petulo, “Yuwisa dipanga dyako muyala yakwe; nileke kunywe ichikombe iBaba choyanyinghile?”
Baho awasilikali we Chilumi na wakulu wa Wayahudi hawamukola Yesu, na kumoha.
Kunghonga hawamwigala kwa Anasi; kosoko hakowa mukwewe wa Kayafa, yowile kuhani mukulu umwaka uya.
Hayuwa Kayafa imwene yejayalonga kuwayahudi fina inogela munhu yumwedu yafe kosoko ya wanhu.
Simoni Petulo hakamwandamila Yesu, na mwifusa yumonga. Kosoko imwifusa yuya yamanyike ne kuhani mukulu hakengila kwi balasa dye kuhani mukulu hamwedu na Yesu,
ugele wuwo Petulo hakema hanje hamulango, kwa nheifo imwifusa yuya yamanyike na kuhani mukulu, hakaluta kunje na kulonga ne mundele yuya yakwimilisa umulango, hakamukola Petulo yengile.
Imundele yuya yakwimilisa mulango yamugamba Petulo, “Agwe nagwe nghwi yumwedu wawo wa wefusa we munhu yuno?” Hoyogamba, “Ka nghana.”
Hambiya, awatumishi na wakulu hawagolosa moto wa makala, kosoko hakuwa na mheho, na hawema wakotela umoto; iPetulo hamwedu nawo, yemile naye yakotela umoto.
Mutambiki mukulu hoyomusa Yesu muchanhya ya wefusa wakwe na mafuso gakwe.
Yesu, hoyomubidula, “Nilonga ne chilunga chimesomeso, majuwa gose nifusa mumasinagogi na mudihekalu, hawakitang'anyila Wayahudi wose; Silongile chochose kwa chifiso.
Nhani ukunyusa niye? Wose awano, awanihulike, hanilonga nawo choni; wamanya hanilonga choni.”
Yakalonga nheifo, imutogomi yumonga yemile habehi naye hoyomutowa Yesu kofi na mukono wakwe, yakugamba, “Afo nofoukumubidula kuhani mukulu?”
Yesu, hoyomugamba, “Hona nilongile fibi, homelela imbuli ihile; ninga hona nilongile fiswanu, choni cho ukunitowela?”
Anasi, baho hoyomutuma yohigwe kwa Kayafa kuhani mukulu.
Baho Petulo hakowa yemile yokotela moto. Hawamugamba, “Agweye nagwe nghwi yumwedu wa wefusa wakwe? Hakekana, yagamba Ka nghana!”
Yumonga wa watogomi wa kuhani mukulu munduguse wa yuya imunhu yadumuligwe inghutwi na Petulo, hakamusa, “Si hanikona kubusitani hamwedu naye?”
Petulo kahi hakakana, chimwande dijogolo hodikwika.
Hawamwigala Yesu kulawa kunyumba ya Kayafa mpaka ku Plaitolia. Hayuwa nhosikusiku. Awene awecho howoleka kwingila ku Plaitolia, uleke wanghachafuke, ninga wadahe kudiya Pasaka.
Pilato hakalawa kunje kowowile, na kuwagamba, “Mwina mbuli yoni yomukumusongesa imunhu yuno?”
Hawamubidula, “Nhanga imunhu yuno yechaka gehile goyagolose, chisowile chikumwigala ukwako.”
Pilato hakawagamba, “Mulondeni nyeye muwecho na mumulamule kwa malagiso genu.” Awayahudi hawamugamba, “Siyo nheifo, aseye chichaka udaha ilagiso wa kumukoma munhu.”
Aino hayuwa kumemelesa imbuli yoyalongile Yesu konesa yakwenda yafe kwa ifa dyaki.
Pilato hakengila ku Plaitolia hakamwinanga Yesu kahi, yamugamba, “Agweye no go Mundewa wa Wayahudi?”
Yesu yamubidula, “Simbuli sino ukulonga du agweye go mwecho, ama kwina wamonga wakutamile muchanhya ya niye?”
Pilato yabidula, “Ani na Muyahudi? Ditaifa dyako gomwecho na makuhani wakulu nowakwigale ukwangu; kugolosa choni?”

Yesu hakabidula, “Undewa wangu si wechilunga chino; nanga undewa wangu wowile we chilunga chino, awatumishi wangu howowa wakunilewelesa na Wayahudi kunihonya ne mikono ya Wayahudi, ninga undewa wangu si wa chilunga chino.”

Pilato hakamugamba, “Nong'amba gweye kwa Mundewa?” Yesu yabidula, “Kuilonga aniye na Mundewa.” Kosoko iyo hanyelekigwa na kosoko iyo hanija kuchilunga, kuhomelela iichawelu. “Chila munhu we ichawelu yakuhulikisa dijwi dyangu.”
Pilato yamugamba, “I chawelu no choni?”
Yakalonge nheifo, hoyoluta kunje ku Wayahudi kahi, na kuwagamba, “Sikona wihi mwi munhu yuno.
Ninga musowela fina ugele we Pasaka nimudoholeleni munhu nyumwedu; Togoleni mokwenda mumudoholeni iMundewa wa Wayahudi?”
Hawenula majwi gawo, kahi, Siyo yuno, ninga Balaba, Hambiya Balaba hakowa muhiji yakuhija kwa ludole.
Kamei Pilato hakamulonda Yesu na kumujola fiboko.
Wasilikali hawaluka nghofiya ya miwa, na kumufasa mwiti, hawamufasa nghasu dunghudunghu;
na kumwijila, wakugamba, “Bahoni, Mundewa wa Wayahudi! Na kumutowa ne makofi.”
Pilato yalawa kunje kahi, na kugamba, “Langeni nikumwigala kunje ukwenu, uleke mumanye fina sonile dyodyose dihile mwi munhu yuno.”
Kameyi Yesu hakalawa kunje, yafalile ikofiya ye miwa, na dijoho didunghudunghu. Pilato yawagamba, “Mulangeni imunhu.”
Awatambiki na watogomi wakamone, hawajoja wakugamba musambaseni, musambaseni mumusalaba! Pilato yawagamba, “Mulondeni anyeye muwecho mukamusambase mumusalaba, kosoko sikona chochose choyabanile.”
Wayahudi hawamugamba, “Aseye china dilagiso, na kwa dilagiso didyo kanogela kufa, kosoko kakigolosa kuwa mwana we Mulungu.”
Pilato yakahulike simbuli siso hakagendelela kuwa na itisi lugano;
hakengila kahi ku Plaitolia na kumugamba Yesu, “Kulawa hoki gweye?” Ninga Yesu nghamubidule.
Kamei Pilato hoyomugamba, “Nghukulonga naniye? Nghukumanya fina nina udaha wa kukulekela na nina udaha kukusambasa?”
Yesu yamubidula, Nghowile ukudaha kuwa na udaha muchanhya yangu niye honaga nghwinghigwe kulawa kuchanhya, kosoko iyo ayuya iyanigale niye ukwako kena uwihi mukulu.
Mu dino Pilato hoyohananga kumulekela, ninga Wayahudi hawajoja, Unghamulekela imunhu yuno agweye nghwi imbuya na Kaisali; chila munhu yakigolosa Mundewa, yakuwa chinyume na Kaisali.
Pilato yakahulike simbuli siso, hakamulafa Yesu kunje, hoyokwikala mudigoda dya ulamusi, ahanhu hakwinangigwa Sakafu ya mawe, Chiebulaniya Gabata.
Haduwa dijuwa dya kutandila ge Pasaka; hayuwa kifana saa ya mutandatu nhafi. Hoyowagamba Wayahudi Langeni Mundewa wenu!
Hawajoja, Muleuse, muleuse, musambase!
Pilato hakawagamba, “Nimutungike mumusalaba iMundewa wenu?” Watambiki wakulu howobidula, “Chechaka Mundewa ninga Kaisali.”
Kameyi hoyomulafa ukwawo yatungikigwe mumusalaba.
Baho howomulonda Yesu, hoyolawa kunje, yenule umusalaba wakwe imwecho, ku ahanhu hakwinangigwa iguha dya itwi, ahakugambigwa Goligota Chiebulaniya.
Baho hawamutundika hamwedu naye wamonga weli, yumwedu chila ulwandi na Yesu hagatigati yawo.
Pilato kahi hakandika diwandiko na kudika mumusalaba; dikugamba Yesu wa Nasaleti Mundewa wa Wayahudi.
Wengi wa Wayahudi howosoma diwandiko didyo, kosoko ahanhu hoyatungikigwe Yesu hahowe habehi ne ikaya; na hadiwandikwa mu Chiebulaniya, Chilatini, na Chiyunani.
Awakulu wawatambiki wa Wayahudi hamugamba Pilato, Unghawandike, Mundewa wa Wayahudi, nanga imunhu yuno kagamba Aniye no ni Mundewa wa Wayahudi.
Pilato hakabidula, Goniwandike niwandika.

Wasilikali wakamale kumusambasa hawalonda sisuke sakwe howosigawa filungo fine, chimwedu kwa chila musilikali; na dijoho dyakwe. Ninga, dijoho didyo haduwa chaka mushono, ninga dilukigwa kulawa kuchanhya mpaka hasi;
Howokigamba, “Chighadidege, ninga chiditowele kula, dyuwe dyani.” Hayuwa nheifo uleke Mawandiko gamemelesigwe,
“Hawagawa sisuke sangu mugati yawo,
na isuke yangu howoyitowela kula.”
Afo nofowagolose wasilikali. Ninga habehi na musalaba hawema ing'ina wa Yesu, ne lumbudye we ing'ina wa Yesu, na Maliamu Magidalena.
Yesu yakamone ing'ina, ne mwifusa yuya woyamwendage, kema habehi naye, hoyomugamba ing'ina, Mudala, mulange imwanago.
Kamei hoyomulonga ayuya imwifusa, Mulange ing'inako! Kulawa isaa iya imwifusa yuya hoyomulonda ukaya ukwakwe.
Hanyuma yakwe Yesu yakamanye fina gose hambiya gahela, hoyolonga (kumemelesa matulumo), “Nikona nghilu.”
Dibakuli dimemile siki haduwa baho; howolonda sifongo howoyifabika, mudibali dina siki howoyisomeka mulusito howomwikila kumulomo.
Kameyi Yesu yakaihokele isiki yiya, hoyogamba, “Ihela!” Hoyofunama ditwi dyake hoyolafa ichidoga chakwe.
Kosoko dyowile ijuwa dya kiyandaa, uleke imitufi inghasigale mumusalaba dijuwa dye sabato (kosoko isabato haduwa ijuwa ikulu lugano), Wayahudi howomufasa Pilato imigulu yawo ibenigwe, na waleusigwe.
Wasilikali howokwija, homubena migulu wa kunghonga na yumonga yatungikigwe mumusalaba hamwedu naye;
ninga wakeje kwa Yesu hawona fina kafulusa kufa wasabanile migulu yakwe.
Ninga yumwedu wa wasilikali hoyomudoma halubafu na mugoha, na chimwande hoilawa sakame na meji.
Ayuya iyonile kahomelela, uhomelesi wakwe ni wa chawelu uleke anye nanye muhuwile.
Kosoko, simbuli sino sigoloseka uleke mawandiko gamemelesigwe, Kahi diguha dyakwe disikubenigwa.
Na kahi diwandiko dimonga dikugamba, “Wakawomulanga imwene wowamudomile.”

Gakahele gano Yusufu Alimataya yowile mwifusa wa Yesu, kwa chifiso, kosoko yakogoha Wayahudi hakamutasa Pilato yawulonde umutufi wakwe, Pilato hakafumila. Kwa nheifo hakakwija na kuulonda na kuuleusa umutufi wa Yesu.
Nikodemo naye, ayuya yejile kwa Yesu nechilo, hoyokwija kegala muhanganiso wa manemane na wudi kifana latili igana dimwedu nhafi.
Howoulonda umutufi wa Yesu, na kumoa musanda ye suke nyelu ya bafuta na manukato fina Wayahudi fowasowele mumasiko gawo.
Ahanhu haya hoyatungikigwe mumusalaba hahowa na busitani, na mubusitani iyo chilalo chisha chisinati chikigwe mutufi wa munhu wowose
Kosoko ya dijuwa dya Wayahudi dya kiyandaa na kosoko ichilalo chiya chowile habehi, howomusika Yesu umo.
Dijuwa dye inghonga dye dijuma, Maliamu Magidalena yekilawa kuluta chilalo, ugele kukali malisalisa, hoyokona fina diwe difingilisigwa kulawa muchilalo.
Hakabilima na kuluta kwa Simoni Petulo, mwifusa yuya yumonga, yendigwe na Yesu, yawagamba, “Wamuleusa Mundewa muchilalo na chisimanyile wamwika hoki.”
Baho Petulo hoyolawa hamwedu na yuya mwifusa yumonga, howoluta kuchilalo.
Wabilima wose weli, ninga imwifusa yumonga hoyomujumha Petulo hoyokonga kufika kuchilalo;
hoyofunamana kusungilila kugati, hoyokona sisuke se bafuta sowile ukuya kugati, ninga nghengile kugati.
