Kameyi Simoni Petulo keja yakumwandamila, hoyokwingila kuchilalo, hoyokona sisuke siya se bafuta suwile baho hasi,
ne chitambala chohigwe kwitwi nacho chabaho, fisunhile hamwedu na sisuke ichene cheimwene chikunjigwa.
Noho ayuya imwifusa yumonga, yakongile kufika hachilalo, naye hoyokwingila, hoyokona na kuhuwila;
kosoko hawowa wasinhati wamanye amawandiko, fina imwagila yenuke kulawa kuwafile.
Kameyi nowefusa wakwe howoleuka howoluta kusikaya sawo.
Maliamu hakema hanje ye chilalo yekulila, foyalilage yafunamana kulanga hasi ye chilalo;
Hoyokona Malaika weli wena suke njelu; wekala howekigwe umutufi wa Yesu, yumonga ulwandi lwa kumatwi, yumonga ulwandi lwa kumigulu.
Hawamugamba, “Gomwanamuke nhani ukulila?” Naye hakawagamba; Kosoko wamuleusa Mundewa wangu, simanyile wamwika hoki.
Yakalonge nheifo, yabiduka na kumona Yesu yemile, ninga nghamanyile fina ni Yesu.
Yesu yamugamba, “Gomwanamuke ukulilila choni? Ukumuhananga nani?” Hakamanya nhagela nomwimilisi wa busitani, yamugamba, “Mukulu, honaga umuleuse nitamile koumwikile, nikudaha kumulonda na kumuleusa.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Maliamu!” Hakabiduka na kumugamba kwa Chiebulaniya “Laboni!” nong'amba, “Mwalimu.”
Yesu hoyomugamba, “Unghanikole, kosoko sinati nikwile kwa Babangu; ninga luta kawatamile wandugu sangu uwagambe nhafi, nikukwila kwe Babangu, na Baba yenu, kwe Mulungu wangu na Mulungu wenu.”
Maliamu Magidalena hoyoluta na kuwatamila awefusa Nimona Mundewa, na kuwatamila fina kalonga simbuli ukwakwe.

Chigele cha hegulo dijuwa didiya, dijuwa dye inghonga dye dijuma, imilango yose ihindigwe ahanhu howowile awefusa wakwe, kosoko ya kogoha Wayahudi, Yesu hakeja na kwima muchiligati yawo na kugamba, “Digaya dyuwe ukwenu.”
Yakamale kulonga nhaifo, na kuwonesa imikono yakwe na lubafu lwakwe. Kameyi awefusa howosekelela wakamone Mundewa.
Yesu hoyowagamba kahi, Digoya dyuwe hamwedu nanye. Fina Baba foyenitumile niye, aniye nani nikumutumani nyeye.
Yakamale kulonga nheifo, hakawakehela, na kugamba, “Hokeleni Muhe Musunhile.
Munghawalekelela wanhu uwihi wawo, wakuwa walekeleligwe.”
Hambiya, Tomaso wa awaya ikumi na weli, iyakwinangwa Ipasa, hakowa hechaka Yesu foyejile.

Kameyi awayagwe howomutamila, Chimona Mundewa, Ninga mwene hoyogamba, “Ninghaleka kona mumiko yakwe singhofu se misumali, na kukwafa ne fidole fyangu isinghofu se misumi, na kwalabata no mukono wangu ulubafu lwakwe, sikwenda nihuwile ng'oo.”

Gakaloke majuwa munane, awefusa wakwe hawowa kahi munyuma, Tomasi naye hakowa hamwedu nawo. Milango hayuwa ihindigwe, ninga Yesu hakeja na kwima muchiligati yawo, hoyogamba, “Digoya dyuwe hamwedu nanye.”
Hoyomugamba Tomaso, Guma ichidole chako hano, ulange imikono yangu; na golola umukono wako, walabate ulubafu lwangu, unghowe munhu yechaka dihuwi, ninga iyakuhuwila.
Tomasi hakabidula, Mundewa wangu na Mulungu wangu!
Yesu hakamugamba, “Kuhuwila kosoko kunyona niye? Ibeka awaya awasonile ninga wakuhuwila.”
Yesu hakagolosa majumo mengi kumwande ya wefusa wakwe, agene gasuwile muchitabu chino;
ninga agano gawandikwa uleke muhuwile fina iYesu no Kilisito, iMwana we Mulungu, fina kwa kuhuwila muwe na uwumi wa majuwa gose umwakwe.
Gakaloke majuwa makefu hakakiyonesa kahi kuwefusa wakwe habahali ya Tibelia; hoyokiyonesa nhafi.
Simoni Petulo, Tomasi yekwinangigwa Ipasa, Natanaeli wa Kana ya Galilaya, awana wa Sebedayo, na wamonga wadatu wa wefusa wakwe hawowa hamwedu.
Simoni Petulo yawagamba, “Aniye nikuluta kulowa somba.”
Hawamugamba, “Chikulutanya,” hawengila mungalawa; ninga ichilo chicho wasapatile somba ng'oo.
Fokwakongile kucha, Yesu hakema munghingi, awefusa wasatangile fina hakowa Yesu.
Yesu yawagamba, “Mowana mwina somba sosose?”
Hawamubidula, hawagamba, “Ka!”
Hoyowagamba, “Kubiteni ulwafu ulwandi lwa kulume lwe ngalawa mukwenda musipate.” Baho howoukubita, kameyi lo hawasumigwa kuukwega, kosoko ya uwingi wa sisomba.
Imwifusa yuya iyendigwe na Yesu yamugamba Petulo, No Mundewa! Petulo yakahulike fina no Mundewa, hakafala sisuke sakwe, kosoko hakowa yasihambule ugele yakugolosa milimo, hakajumha kumeji.
Ninga awefusa wamonga howokwija ne ngalawa, wakukwega ulwafu lumemile sisomba, kosoko hasowile hatali kulawa kunghingi kifana nghanyo imwedu kulawa kunghingi.
Wakalawe kunje ya meji, howokona moto wa makala baho, muchanhya yakwe mwina somba, na mukate,
Yesu hoyowagamba, “Leleni sisomba simonga somulowile lulu baha.”
Kosoko iyo Simoni Petulo hoyoluta kungalawa na kulukwega ulwafu kunghingi lumemile sisomba singhulu igana dimwedu makumi mashano na ndatu; kahi uwingi wose ninga ulwafu lusadegeke.
Yesu yawagamba, “Mwije mudiye chisinhuka nguluule.” Hechaka kahi mwifusa wowose yagesile kumusa No nani gweye? Hawamanya no Mundewa.
Yesu yeja na kulonda umukate hoyowengha, na sisomba naso nheifiya.
Auno hauwa ugele wa kadatu wa Yesu kiyonesa kuwefusa wakwe yakafuluse kwinuka kulawa kuwafile.

Wakamale kudiya chakudiya cha nhosikusiku, Yesu hoyomugamba Simoni Petulo, “Simoni mwana wa Yohana, agwe ukunyenda kusuma wano?” Hoyomugamba, “Heye, Mundewa, kumanya fina nikukwenda.” Yesu hoyomugamba, “Ufinghe chakudiya ifikolo fyangu.”
Lwakeli kahi hoyomulonga, “Simoni mwana wa Yohana, ukunyenda?” Hoyogamba, “Heye, Mundewa, kumanya fina nikukwenda.” Yesu hoyomugamba, “Dima singholo sangu.”

Hoyomulonga kahi lwakadatu, “Simoni, mwana wa Yohana, ukunyenda?” Petulo hakona usungu kosoko yalongile naye lwakadatu, “Ukunyenda?” Na hoyomugamba, “Mundewa, kumanya fina nikukwenda!” Yesu homugamba, “Usinghe singholo sangu chakudiya.

Chawelu, chawelu, nikukutamilani fowowile mujelelo, wende ukiyoha gomwecho na kuluta koukuhananga; ninga foukuwa musehe, ukwenda ugolole imikono yako na munhu yungi kohutasa na kulongosa uhunhu ko nghukwenda kuluta.”
(Hakalonga nheifo konesa ni kwa difa dya nhani doyakayomutunyila Mulungu.) Sikahele siso hoyomugamba, “Nyandamile!”
Petulo hoyobidula hoyomona imwifusa yumonga yakuwandamila, ayuya iyendigwe na Yesu, iyegamile muchifa chakwe ugele we chakudiya na yagambile, Mundewa no nani yakukusongesa?
Petulo yakamone hoyomulonga Yesu Mundewa yanhani imunhu yuno naye?
Yesu yamugamba, “Nghona nikwenda yekale mpaka ugele wonikuya inachoni ukwako? Nyandamile!”
Inonga hayenela kuwandugu fina imwifusa yuno nghakufa, ninga Yesu nghalongile nheifo ukwakwe fina nghakufa, ninga, Honaga nikwenda ayuno yakale mpaka nuye ina choni ukwako?
Ayono no mwifusa yakuhomelela simbuli sino; na chimanya fina uhomelesi wakwe ni chawelu. Kumalagisa.
Ninga kwina mbuli nyingi soyagolose Yesu, kusigwa sose sandikigwe, hata Ichilunga chose sichowile chikudaha kwika ifitabu fyose fitulumwe.
Ichitabu achiya che inghonga hanichiandika Teofilo simbuli sose soyagolose na kufusa Yesu kulawa kunghonga ye milimo yakwe
hata dijuwa diya dyoyenuligwe kuluta kulanga. Ugele nghenati yenuligwe kuluta kulanga hakawalekela misigililo kwa njila ya Muhe Musunhile, awaya awatumigwa wakwe woyawasagule.
Ukwawo hakakionesa imwenyecho yemumi foyamalile amagayo gakwe kwa uhomelesi mwingi, hoyokiyonesa ukwawo kwa majuwa makumi mane na kulonga simbuli se undewa wa kulanga.
Fowowile hamwedu hakawalagisa nhafi: Munghaleuke Yelusalemu ninga mugojele achiya choyawahuwise iBaba “ichene, choyalongile”, chomuhulike kulawa ukwangu;
Kosoko Yohana hakabatisa kwa meji, ninga nyeye fogakuloka majuwa makefu, anyeye mukubatisigwa kwa Muhe Musunhile.
Awefusa, wakakitanganyile na Yesu howomusa, “Togola Mundewa ugele uno noho ukuuwisa undewa ku Isilaeli?”
Hakawagamba simulimo wenu kumanya, ugele hegu chipisi chikigwe na Baba kwa udaha wakwe imwenyecho,
Ninga mohokela ludole foyakumwijilani Muhe Musunhile muchanhya yenu nanye mokuwa wahomelesi wangu ahano Yelusalemu, Muyahudi yose na Samaliya mpaka kundumo ye chilunga.
Yakamale kulonga nheifo, fowagendelelage kulanga hakenuligwa kuluta kulanga na difunde hodimulonda mumeso gawo.
Na foyakwilage kulanga hawakumhula meso gawo kulanga chimwande wanhu weli wafalile suke njelu howokwima habehi nawo
howogamba, “Anye Muwagalilaya, nhani mwimile ho mukulanga kuchanhya? Yesu yuno, iyalondigwe kulawa ukwenu kuluta kulanga, yakayokwija nheifo fomumonile yakuluta kulanga.”
Kamei hawoya Yelusalemu kulawa kwitunda dye miseituni idihabehi na Yelusalemu chitambo cha nghanyo igana nhafi;
wakengile mwikaya hawaluta kuchibuha cha kuchanya, mowekalage Petulo, Yohana, Yakobo, Andelea, Filipo na Tomaso Batolomayo na Matayo, Yakobo imwana wa Alifayo, Simoni Selote na Yuda imwana wa Yakobo.
Wose wano hawagendelela hamwedu kutasa, hamwedu na wanawake, na Maliamu ing'ina wa Yesu, na wanduguse.
Mumajuwa gago, Petulo hoyokwima muchiligati ya awandugu (wose hamwedu hawafika wanhu igana dimwedu na makumi meli), hoyogamba,
“Wandugu sangu ditulumo hayagila dimemelisigwe, idilongigwe ne Muhe Musunhile, kwa simbuli sa Daudi, hakalonga muchanhya ya Yuda iyawalongose awaya awejile kumukola Yesu;
Yuda hakowa yumwedu wetu, kosoko hakasaguligwa yowe hamwedu nase mu mulimo wetu.”
(Hambiya imunhu yuno hakagula umugunda na mapesa gaya goyapatile kulawa munhenda yakwe ihile, hoyokugwa hasi, na kutulika utumbu wakwe wose houlawa kunje.
Chila munhu mu Yelusalemu hoyohulika imbuli kwa nonga yakwe howowinanga umugunda uya Hakelidama no ng'amba, “Mugunda wa Sakame.”)
“Iwandikigwa mu chitabu cha Sabuli:
‘Uwikalo wakwe usigale mahame;
Munhu wowose yanghekale umo.’
Kahi iwandikigwa,
‘Munhu yungi yalonde ahanhu hakwe haugolosaji.’
Kamei yumwedu wa wanhu awendewochandamila muugele wose iMundewa Yesu woyendeyokwingila na kulawa mugati yetu,
kukogela muubatiso wa Yohana mpaka mwijuwa dyoyalondigwe kulawa ukwetu kuluta kuchanhya yumwedu wa wanhu wawo yowe hamwedu na seye, muhomelesi wo kwinuka kwakwe.”
Baho howotambula masina ga wanhu weli wa kunghonga Yusufu iyakwinangwa Balisaba disina dyakwe dya keli Yusto, na Matiya.
Kamei, hawatasa, wakugamba, “Mundewa, gowumanyile imimoyo ya wanhu wose, chonese no yehoki woumusagule mu wano aweli,
uleke yalonde ahanhu ho umulimo na utumigwa hoyaleke Yuda na kuluta kunhu kwakwe imwenyecho.”
Howotowa kula; ikula na kumugwila Matiya naye hoyokongesigwa kulafigwa hamwedu na awaya ikumi na imwedu.
Dijuwa dye Pendekosite fodiyifikile, wose hawowa wakilundile hanhu hamwedu.
Kamei chimwande hoihulikika kifana mheho ya ludole kulawa kulanga na kumemela munyumba yose yowowekale
Kamei hagoneka kumeso gawo malilimba go moto gakigawile, na kumwikalila chila munhu.
Wose howomemesigwa Muhe Musunhile, howokonga kulonga kwa nonga ingi, ifyene iMuhe foyawenghile udaha wokulonga.
Kamei hahowa na Wayahudi wakwikala Yelusalemu wanhu wena chogoho kwe Mulungu kulawa chila itaifa hasi ya ulanga.
Dijwi didyo fodyahulikwe matewa howokitang'anyila, howokwingila itisi, kosoko chila munhu hakawahulika wakulonga mu nonga yakwe imwecho.
Howokisina na kujuma wakugamba, “Awa wose wochikuhulika wakulonga nheifino si Wagalilaya?
Ya nhani, hambiya, chila yumwedu wetu yakuwahulika wakulonga kunonga yakwe imwecho?
Wamonga wetu ni Wapalitiya, Wamedi na Waelamu; wamonga wakaya wa Mesopotamiya, Uyahudi, Kapadokia, Pondo na Asiya,
Filigiya na Pamufiliya, Misili na ulwandi lwa Libiya habehi na Kilene; Wamonga wetu ni wageni kulawa Loma.
Wayahudi na wanhu wabidukile idini ye Chiyahudi na wamonga walawa Kilete na Alabiya ase chose chikuwahulika wakulonga ku nonga setu chiwecho mbuli ghulu sa Mulungu.”
Wose howokisina na kogoha, ukuno wakiyusa, “Ayi nayo yoni?”
Ninga awamonga hawogelela wakugamba, “Awanhu wano wonywa difai nyisha.”

Ninga Petulo hoyokwima hamwedu na waya ikumi na yumwedu, hoyokwinula dijwi dyakwe hoyokonga kulonga: “Wandugu sangu Wayahudi, na nyeye mose mukwikala hano Yelusalemu; munitegelese fonikulonga simbuli sangu.
Awanhu wano wasilewile, fina fomukudoga, kosoko digaluka isaa dya kadatu du dye dijuwa;
ichawelu ni kugamba imbuli ino no iya yoyalongile imugonesi Yoeli:
‘Mumajuwa go kundumo, yakulonga iMundewa,
nikuwetilila awanhu wose Muhe wangu.
Awana wenu we chigosi na we chike wakwenda walafe ugonesi,
na wajelelo wenu wokona magubulo
na wasehe wenu walota njosi.
Heye, na awatogomi wana we chigosi na we chike
nokuwetilila Muhe wangu majuwa gago nawo
wakwenda walafe ugonesi.
Nogolosa majumo kwichanhya mulanga
na chitangilo hasi muchilunga,
Kukuwa na sakame, moto na mosi musito;
dijuwa dyokugumigwa chisa,
umwesi ukuwa mudunghu kifana sakame,
ugele disinati difike, adiya
dijuwa dikulu dye ditunyo dye Mundewa.
Baho, wowose iyakwinanga kwe disina
dye Mundewa, yakuhonyigwa.’

“Anye Waislaeli mutegelese simbuli sino! Yesu wa Nasaleti, imunhu imwene udaha wakwe we chilungu hawoneka ukwenu kwa njila ya majumo, gokwisina na ifitangilo foyagolose Mulungu mugati yenu kwa njila yakwe fina fomumanyile.

Imunhu yuno hakalafigwa kwandamila iMulungu imwecho foyadumula mbuli kulawakatali, na kwa kumanya kwakwe, kuwa Yesu kogumigwa kumikono yenu nanye homumuguma mumiko ya wanhu wihile howomutungika na kumukoma
imwene, Mulungu kamwinula kulawa mudifa, hoyoudohola, usungu we difa, isadahile yakoligwe nawo.
Kosoko iDaudi yakutambula simbuli soko ye imwene,
Hanimona iMundewa kumwande
yangu majuwa gose,
kosoko kowa ulwandi iwo mukono
wangu wo kulume ninghasingisike.
Kosoko iyo umoyo wangu houkwendeswa
dilimi dyangu hodisekelela;
kamei umutufu wangu haukwikala mudihuwi.
Kosoko nghukuchileka ichidoga changu kusimu,
nghukumulafa imusunhile wako yone kukubanika.
Kunyonesa injila ya uwumi
kuwakwako hamwedu naniye
kanimemesa chinyemi.
“Wandugu sangu nikumutamilani muchawelu ku iBaba yetu Daudi. Yejayafa, hoyosikigwa, na ichilalo chakwe chabahano ahetu mpaka diyelo nhafi.
Ninga kosoko Daudi yowile mugonesi, hakamanya kuwa Mulungu hakimulahila fina yakwenda yumwedu we cheleko chakwe kuwa Mundewa ahanhu hakwe.
Daudi hakona katali Mulungu cho yakwenda yagolose kosoko iyo hoyolonga muchanhya ya kwinuka mwichilalo kwa Kilisito, ugele foyagambile: Nghalekigwe kusimu, umutufi wakwe usadodile.
Mulungu hakamwinula muchilalo yuyo Yesu ase chose cha wahomelesi we imbuli yo.

Yesu yakafuluse kwinuligwa na kwikigwa na Mulungu ulwandi lwakwe lwo kulume, hoyohokela kulawa kwa Baba ayuya Muhe Musunhile, imwene woyachihuwise, kachitilila yuyo Muhe, acho nocho mukona hambiya na kuhulika.
Kosoko Daudi mwecho, ghakwilile mpaka kulanga; ninga imwene hakagamba:
‘Mundewa hakamulonga Mundewa,
Ikala ulwandi lwo kulume kwangu
mpaka niwagolose awanghondo wako
wowe hasi ya migulu yako.’
Wanhu wose wa nyumba ya Isilaeli inogela wamanye kwa chawelu ayo Yesu womwamutungike, no yuyo, Mulungu woyamugolose fina Mundewa na Kilisito.”
Wakahulike simbuli siso howotamigwa mumoyo yawo, howomusa Petulo na waya awatumigwa wamonga, “Aho chitende nhani wandugu setu?”
Petulo hoyobidula, “Mulambe na chila munhu yumwe yumwe yabatisigwe mu disina dya Yesu Kilisito, uleke muleusiligwe uwihi wenu na kuhokela ichinghwa che Muhe Musunhile.
Kosoko dihuwiso dino hadyuwa kosoko yenu na kosoko ya wana wenu kosoko ya wose wowile kutali na kosoko ya chila munhu imwene Mundewa Mulungu wetu yakumwinanga ukwakwe.”
Na kwa mbuli nyingi du Petulo hoyolonga kwa ludole na kuwasongesa wanhu yakugamba, “Mukihonye ne cheleko chino cha uwihi.”
Wengi howosifumila simbuli sakwe, howobatisigwa. Awanhu wafikile figulu fidatu howokongeseka muchitewa chiya dijuwa dyo.
Awa wose howogendelela kifusa kulawa kuwatumigwa, kwikala hamwedu chindugu, kumega mukate na kutasa.
Chila munhu hakengiligwa itisi, kosoko ya fitangilo na majumo mengi gagoloseke na watumigwa.
Na wose wahuwile hawowa hamwedu na kuwa ne finhu fyose muhangi.
Howokwambasa isimali sawo ne finu fyawo kamei howogawa ifesa kwandamila chila munhu foyakuhanga.
Na chila ijuwa hawagendelela kitang'anyila mwihekalu kwa moyo umwedu na mega umukate musinyumba sawo, wakudiya chakudiya chawo kwa chinyemi na kwa moyo mujelu,
howomutogola Mulungu, howokwendigwa na wanhu wose. Chila ijuwa iMundewa hoyokongesa dikanisa kwa waya awendile kuhonyigwa.
Dijuwa dimonga wugele we saa ya dikenda ya nhemisi, Petulo na Yohana wendewoluta kwihekalu, ichigele cho kufuga.

Ugele wuwo awanhu hawamwinula munhu imwene nghenati yagende kulawa kwelekigwa kwakwe. Awanhu wawo wendewomwinula na kumwika hamulango ukwinangigwa, “Mulango Muswanu,” uleke yatase chokwinghwa na awaya awakwingila kwihekalu.
Yakawone Petulo na Yohana wakowe wakwingila mwihekalu, hoyowatasa wamwinghe chinhu chochose chiya.
Howomukumhulila meso, kamei, Petulo hoyogamba, “Chilange seye!”
Kamei hoyowalanga yakuhuwila kuhokela chinhu kulawa ukwawo.
Ninga Petulo hoyomugamba, “Nachaka mapesa hegu sahabu, ninga nikukwingha choninacho: Mwisina dya Yesu wa Nasaleti nikukugamba winuke na kugenda!”
Kamei hoyomukola umukono wokulume hoyomutasa kwinuka. Chimwande imugulu yakwe na simwegele sakwe hosikuwa na ludole;
hoyojumha, na kwima kwa mimigulu yakwe, hoyokonga kugenda yakusunguluta. Kamei hoyokwingila mwihekalu hamwedu nawo, yakugenda na kujumha na kumutunya Mulungu.
Awanhu baho howomwona yakugenda na kumutunya Mulungu,
wakamutange fina no yuya imutasaji yekalage ha Mulango Muswanu, wose howokisina lugano ku chinhu chigoloseke ukwakwe.
Ugele foyendeyowandamila Petulo na Yohana, wanhu wose howokikonghola howobilima kudikumbo idikwinangwa Dikumbo dya Sulemani. Wakisina lugano.
Kamei Petulo yakone nheifo hoyowabidula awanhu waya, Anyeye Waislael, nhani mukuching'olela meso aseye, kifana aseye chimugolosa ayuno yagende kwa udaha wetu seye?

Mulungu wa Ibulahimu na wa Isaka na wa Yakobo, wa waBaba setu, kumutunya imutumishi wakwe Yesu imwene anyeye hamumutungika na kumukana kumwande ya Pilato, ugele foyalafile ulamusi wakwe fina yadoholeligwe.
Ninga anyeye homumukana ayuya Imusunhile, ayuya Imuswamu; homuhananga mwinghigwe imukomaji;
Homumukoma ayuya imukulu wa uwumi, imwene yenuligwe na Mulungu kulawa mu wafile; na seye na chiwahomelesi wakwe

ku disina dyakwe, kwa kudihuwila disina dyakwe, dimugolosa imunhu ayuno wo mukumona womumumanyile, na kwa dihuwi didyo duwile umwakwe imwene, dimwingha ayuno uwumi umemelekele kumwande ya meso genu anyeye mose.
Ninga hambiya wandugusangu, nimanya fina hamugolosa nheifo kosoko musamanyile fina na wakulu wenu fowatendile.
Ninga agaya iMulungu goyalongile kulawa katali kwa milomo ya wagonesi wakwe wose, fina Kilisito yakwija yadumangisigwa kagamemelesa naifo.
Hambiya, mulambe na kumubiduchila Mulungu, uleke uwihi wenu uleusigwe, wije ugele wo kuhola mufidoga,
kulawa kwa Mundewa, yekumutuma Kilisito Yesu womwikiligwe kulawa katali;
imwene hayagila kuhokeligwa kulanga na kuwa uko mpaka ifinhu fyose fogolosigwe usha fina foyalongile Mulungu kwi milomo ya wagonesi wakwe kulawa katali.
Kosoko Musa hakagamba Mundewa iMulungu wenu yakumwigalilani mugonesi, fina foyanigale niye, naye yakuwa yumwedu wa wanhu awenu muwecho: Iwagila mwandamile chila choyakulonga mugolose.
Imunhu wowose inghakumuhulikisa foyakulonga yakubaguligwa na wanhu wa Mulungu na kubanigwa.
Awagonesi wose, kukongela Samweli na waya wamwandamile hawalonga simbuli sino isene sikugoloseka majuwa gano.

Amahuwiso kwa njila ya wagonesi ni kosoko yenu, na mukuhangila dilagano iMulungu dyoyagolose na wakuku senu, fina foyamutamila Ibulahimu. Kunjila ye cheleko chako, ifyeleko fyose fye chilunga fyomotesigwa.
iMulungu kamwinula kulawa mudifa imutogomi wakwe, mbuli swanu kosoko yenu, kunghonga, hoyomutuma yamwigalile imboto kwa kumugolosa chila yumwedu wenu yabiduke kulawa kuwihi.
Petulo na Yohana fowalongage na wanhu, watambiki ne chilongosi we dihekalu na Masadukayo hawawejila,
wadeseke kosoko wendewowafusa wanhu na kuhubili fina mu Yesu awafile wakwija wokwinuligwa kulawa mu difa.
Howowakola, howowaguma mwigelesa mpaka nhosiku yakwe nhosikusiku, kosoko hauwa ugele wa hegulo.
Ninga wengi mu waya awahulike iyo imbuli howohuwila; mu wawo wahuwile wakudaha kuwa figulu fishano.
Nhosiku yakwe, wakulu na wasehe na watulumi howokitang'anyila Yelusalemu,
hamwedu na Mutambiki Mukulu Anasi na Kayafa, na Yohana na Isikanda, na wose wose waya awene howawa wo lukolo lwa kuhani Mukulu.
Kamei hawaweka hagati yawo, na kuwosahowowosa Kwa ludole lwaki ama kwa isina dyake mugolosa dino?
Kamei Petulo yakameme Muhe Musunhile, hoyowagamba Anyeye Filongosi na wasehe wa wanhu:
Hona chikusigwa diyelo mu ichitendo ichiswamu choyagoloseligwe ayuya ichiwete yahonyigwe na kuwa mumi,

imanyike ukwenu nyeye wose, na kwa wanhu wose wa Isilaelii, fina imunhu yuno kama kumwande yenu diyelo, mumi, telele, kwa udaha wa disina dya Yesu wa Nasaleti imwene anyeye hamumutungika, ninga Mulungu kamwinula kulawa mudifa.
Ayuno no yakulongigwa na Matulumo Masunhile fina
Isumbi yomulemile nyeye mukujenga,
hambiya igaluka sumbi nghulu
ye nghindiso.
Kwachaka uhonya kwa yeyose yuya, kosoko kwachaka isina dyodyose hasi ya ulanga, dyowenghigwe awanhu dikuchagila kuhonyigwa nadyo aseye.
Wakone ing'inyo ya Petulo na Yohana na kumanya fina hawowa wanhu wachaka chisomo, howomanya fina hawowa na Yesu.
Ninga wakamwone yuya imunhu yahonyigwe kema hamwedu nawo howoswela mbuli ya kulonga
baho, howowagamba walawe kunje ya ibalasa, awene howosigala kugati wakusimulila kwa Chifiso.
Howokiyusa Chitende nhani na awanhu wano? Kosoko ijumo ikulu digolosigwa kwa njila yawo na dimanyikana na wanhu wose wa Yelusalemu, chisikudaha kuikana imbuli ino.
Ninga uleke imbuli ino inghagendelele kwenela kuwanhu, chiwagambe wanghalonge na munhu wowose kudisina dya Yesu.
Howowenanga kahi kugati howowelagisa wanghalonge kahi kahiwanghafuse wanhu kwa disina dya Yesu.
Ninga Petulo na Yohana howowabidula, Mulamule anyeye muwecho, hona ni fiswamu kumwande ya Mulungu kuwahulikisa anyeye kusuma Mulungu.
Kosoko chisikudaha kuleka kulonga simbuli so chonile na kuhulika.
Kamei wakawagume chogoho na kuwagombela, howowalekelela. Howolemeligwa kuwatenda chinhu kosoko awanhu wose wendewomutunya Mulungu kosoko ya didyo dya goloseke.
Imunhu yuyo yagoloseligwe dijumo didyo dyokuhonyigwa hakowa mukulu mugima yena minyaka kujumha makumi mane.
Chimwande, fowalekeligwe, Petulo na Yohana howokuya kuwayawo, howowatamila agaya gowalongigwe na watambiki wakulu na wasehe.
Wakahulike simbuli so, Howomwinulila Mulungu majwi gawo kwa moyo umwedu, wakugamba, “Mundewa Mukulu, agweye no Mulungu wumbile ulanga ne iisi, ne bahali na fyose fuwile umo;
nagwe hakulonga kwa mulomo we mutogomi wako Baba yetu Daudi, kwa udaha wa Muhe Musunhile:
‘Nhani awamembe wakugolosa ukali
Na makabila gakudoga hechaka chinhu?
Na wandewa we chilunga wakiika fiswanu,
uleke wamuleme Mundewa na Masiha wakwe.’
“Kosoko chawelu nofyo Helode, Pontio Pilato, na wanhu wa Isilaeli na wanhu wa wamembe fowakitang'anyile bahano mukaya iino, kumulema imutogomi wako musunhile Yesu, imwene wowamugumile mafuta,
uleke wagolose gose agene umukono wako na kwenda kwako kulawa hatali hakuhananga gagoloseke.
Hambiya, Mundewa ulange kogohesa kwawo, uwenghe awatumwa wako kuilonga imbuli yako kwa ludole;
golola umukono wako kuhonya, fitangilo na majumo gagoloseke ku disina dya Mutumishi wako musunhile Yesu.”
Wakamale kumutasa Mulungu, ahanhu haya howakitang'anyile hohosingisika wose howomemesigwa na Muhe Musunhile, howolonga imbuli ya Mulungu kwa ludole.
Na awanhu awahuwile hawowa na moyo umwedu na chidoga chimwedu; hachaka munhu wowose yagambile fina ichinhu chochose cho yenacho ni mali yakwe imwecho; ninga hawowa ne finhu fyose muhangi;
awatumigwa howolafa uhomelesi wa kwinuka kwakwe Yesu kulafa mudifa kwa ludole lukulu, na dihewa ikulu hadyuwa hamwedu nawo wose.
Kusowile na munhu mugati yawo yowile kachaka chinhu choyakuhanga, kosoko awanhu wose wowile na fiwanja ama nyumba wawafyambasa, howokwigala diyombe dye finhu fiya fyo fyaguligwe,
howofika hamigulu ya watumigwa; chila munhu hoyogawiligwa fina foyakuhanga.
Na Yusufu iyenangigwe na watumigwa Balinaba (nong'amba: Mwana wa usindamafu, “Mulawi, nghonga yakwe ni munhu wa kupono”).
Hokowa na mugunda houguligwa, hoyokwigala ifesa yose, hoyoika hamigulu ya watumigwa.
Ninga munhu yumonga hamwedu ne muke Safila howousa umugunda.
Hoyofisa isehemu ye fesa ilawile mumugunda kwa chifiso, imuke naye hakamanya, hayokwika sehemu ndodogi na kwiigala hamigulu ya watumigwa.
Petulo hogamba, “Anania nhani Ishetani yamemese umoyo wako, kumutamila udasi Muhe Musunhile? Na kufisa isehemu ya imali ilawile mumugunda?
Fowowile ukwako usowile wako? Na chikamale kuguligwa imali yakwe isowile mu udaha wako? Hayuwa yuwa nhani noho wike imbuli iino muchidoga chako? Nghumudanhilise munhu, ninga Mulungu.”
Anania yakahulike simbuli sino hoyokugwa hasi, hoyokufa. Chogoho chikulu hochiwapata awanhu wose awahulike simbuli sino.
Awanike howoleuka, howomuguma mu sisanda howeja musika.
Chipisi cha saa ndatu hanyuma yakwe, imuke naye hoyokwingila, na hamanyile dyodyose muchanhya ya simbuli silokile.
Petulo hoyomubidula yakumugamba, “Nitamile, hamuusa umugunda kwa diliho didyo?” Hoyogamba, “Heye, kwa diliho didyo.”
Hayuwa nhani mulagane kumugesa Muhe Musunhile we Mundewa? Langa, imugulu yawo wamusikile imugosi wako yuwa hamulango, nawo wakwenda wakulonde agwe nagwe.
Chimwande hoyokugwa hamigulu yakwe hoyokufa. Awaya awanike howokwingila howomufika yafile, howomulafa kunje, howomusika hamwedu na mulume.
Chogoho chikulu hochiwengila, dikanisa dyose na wanhu wose awahulike simbuli siya.
Kwa mikono ya Watumigwa hogogoloseka mengi ga majumo na kisina muchiligati cha wanhu. Awahuwile hawekala hamwedu mwikumbo dya Sulemani.
Hechaka munhu yungi wowose imwene inghahuwile yadahile kihasa nawo, ninga awaya du awawatunyage.
Kamei awamuhuwile iMundewa wagosi kwa wanawake hawongeseka lugano.
Kamei hawawenula awatamu hata awoile musikaya, kamei na kuwagonesa musinghingo na mumikeka, uleke dinyefu dya Petulo diwogwile awamonga ichigele foyalokage.
Na wanhu wa sikaya sa munghanda ya Yelusalemu howokikonghola, wakwigala watamu, na wendewokwidasigwa na simhepo sihile na wose howohonyigwa.
Kamei Imutambiki mukulu na wose wowile hamwedu naye, (awo no wamasehebu ga Mafalisayo), wamema wifu.
Howowakola watumigwa howowaguma imwigelesa.
Ninga imusungula we Mundewa hoyokumula umulango wa digelesa nechilo, hoyowalafa, hoyogamba,
“Luteni mukeme mwi hakalu na kuwatamila awanhu si mbuli sa uumi uno.”

Nawo wakahulike howoluta nhosikusiku kwihekalu, howokonga kufusa. Hoyokwija Ikuhani Mukulu na waya wowile hamwedu naye, howowakusanya awanhu wa dibalasa, na wasehe wose wa Isilaeli, howotuma wanhu kwigelesa wakawalonde.
Ninga awatogomi waya fowafikile wasawonile kwigelesa, howokuya howowatamila,
wakugamba Digelesa chifika dihindigwe fiswanu, na awemilisi wema kumwande ye milango, ninga chikakumule chisonile munhu kugati!
Kamei ichilongosi we dihekalu na wakulu wa watambiki wakahulike nheifo, howokwila manhonge kosoko yawo, imbuli ino yokuwa nhani.
Munhu yumonga hoyokwija hoyowatamila fina, awanhu waya womwawekile kwigelesa wowa kwihekalu, wemanyima wekufundisha wanhu.
Noho yuya ichilongosi we dihekalu hoyoluta hamwedu na watogomi waya, howowegala, ninga si kwa ludole, kosoko hawogoha wanhu wangheje wowatowa na mawe.
Wakawegale, howoweka mudibalasa. Ikuhani Mukulu hoyowosa,
yakugamba, “Togoleni, chisawagambile kwa udaha kuwa munghafuse kusisina dino?” Nanye langeni mumemesa Yelusalemu na mafuso genu, na mukuhananga kuigala isakame ye munhu yuya muchanhya yetu.
Petulo na watumigwa howobidula wakugamba, “Ichagila kumuhulikisa Mulungu kusuma wanhu.
Imulungu wa WaBabaset hakamwinula Yesu kulawa muchilalo, imwene anyeye hamumukoma kwa kumutungika mwibiki.
Imunhu yuno iMulungu kamwinula kumukono wakwe wo kulume yowe Chilongosi na Muhonya yawenghe wa Isilaeli dilumbo dya chawelu na kulekeligwa uwihi.
Na seye cha wahomelesi wa simbuli siso, hamwedu na Muhe Musunhile imwene Imulungu yakuwengha awanhu wose awakumuhulika.”
Awene wakahulike howokwafigwa mufidoga fyawo; howogola njama yakuwakoma.
Ninga munhu yomonga, Falisayo, Gamalieli, mwalimu wa tolati, yakogohigwa na wanhu wose, hoyokwima mwibalasa, na kulagisa watumigwa wekale hanghanda kwa chipisi chiguhi,
hoyowagamba, “Anye wagosi wa Isilaelii, muchilangisise fomukuwatendela awanhu wano.

Kosoko ugele wawo fowowile usinati ufike hakalawanisa Teuda, hokigamba imwene munhu mukulu, wanhu wafikile magana mane howomwandamila. Naye hakachinjigwa na wose awamuhuwile howokwaganika howokuwa si chinhu.
Hanyuma yakwe hoyolawanisa Yuda wa Mugalilaya, ugele uya wokutala wanhu, hoyowakwega wanhu wengi howomwandamila, naye hoyokwagilila na wose wamwandamile howokwaganika.
“Hambiya, nikumugambani nhafi, Mukinege na wanhu wano, walekeni; kosoko imbuli iino no mulimo uno hona ulawile kuwanhu, ukwenda ubanike uwecho,
ninga hona ulawile kwa Mulungu musikudaha kuubana; mungheje mukoneka fina mukulewa na Mulungu.
Howofumila simbuli sakwe; kamei wakawenange awatumigwa, howowatowa, howowalemesa, wanghalonge ku disina dya Yesu; kamei howowaleka ku disina dya Yesu; kamei howowaleka walute.
Nawo hawaleuka mwibalasa diya, na chinyemi, kosoko watalikwa, kugumigwa chinyala, kosoko ya disina didyo.
Na chila ijuwa, mwihekalu na musinyumba sawo, wasalekile kufundisha na kuhubili si mbuli si swanu sa Yesu kuwa ni Kilisito.”

Hambiya mumajuwa gago, chigele awefusa fowendewakongeseka, hakulawanisa kung'ung'ulika mugati ya waya wakulonga Chiyunani na waya wakulonga Chiebulaniya. Awaya wakulonga Chiyunani howonghunghulika fina awegane wao wendewosimiligwa ugele wokugawiligwa amahitaji gawo ga chila ijuwa.
Kosoko iyo, awaya awatumigwa ikumi na weli howokwinanga mulundo wa wanhu wose awahuwile howogamba, “Si fiswanu aseye chileke kuhubili imbuli ya Mulungu, uleke chishugulikie kugawa amahitaji.
Kosoko iyo, wandugu setu, saguleni wanhu mufungate, awakoneka wanhu waswanu, wamemile Muhe na misungu, uleke chiwenghe u mulimo uwo.
Ninga, aseye, chuwe no mulimo wa mataso na kuhubili imbuli ya Mulungu.”

Imbuli ino hoiwendesa ditewa dyose, kamei howowasagula Sitefano, munhu yena ihuwi ikulu na yamemesigwe na Muhe Musunhile, Filipo, Polokoni, Nikanola, Timona, Palimena na Nikolao wa Andiyokiya imwene yabidukile idini ye Chiyahudi kunghonga.
Howoweka kumwande ye watumigwa, nawo howowatasila na kuwechila mikono.
Imbuli ya Mulungu hoigendelela kongeseka na matewa ga wanhu awahuwile ako Yelusalemu hoikongeseka lugano, na matewa makulu ga watambiki howohuwila.
Kamei hoyomwingha Sitefano yamemile ihewa ikulu na ludole, hoyomwigha udaha mwingi; hoyodaha kugolosa fitangilo na majumo mugati ya wanhu.
Ninga wanhu wamonga awoile we disinagogi dya walekeleligwe fina fodyenangwa, wakilene, Walekisandaliya, na wamonga kulawa Kilikiya na Asiya, hawema na kuwanga na Sitefano.
Ninga wasadahile kumusuma kosoko ye misungu yakwe na Muhe yamulongose kukulanga.
Kosoko iyo howowafupa wanhu Awagambile chimuhulika imunhu yuno yakulonga mbuli sa kumuliga Musa na Mulungu.
Howowasongesa awanhu na wasehe na watulumi, howomulutila, howomukola, howomwigala kwibalasa.
Howokwinula wahomelesi wa udasi wagambile, Munhu yuno ghakuleka kulonga simbuli si kubesa ahanhu hano hasunhile na malagiso ga Musa.
Kosoko chimuhulika yakugamba ayo iYesu wa Nasaleti yakwenda yahabane lugano ahanhu ahano na kugaleusa ijadi yetu yochinghigwe kulawa kwa Musa
Wose wowile mumulundo uya we dibalasa howomukumhulila amaso Sitefano, howokona ichihanga chakwe kifana chihanga cha malaika.
Kamei imutambiki mukulu hoyomusa, Togola simbuli sino ni chawelu?
Naye Sitefano hoyogamba, “Wandugu sangu na waBaba sangu munitegelese! Mulungu hakailawanisa kwi Baba yetu Abulahamu foyowile kuya Mesopotamiya ugele ghenati yakekale Halani.
iMulungu hoyomugamba, ‘Leuka muisi yako, waleke awanhu wo lukolo lwako, ulute ku isi yonikwenda nikonese.’
Kosoko iyo Abulahamu hoyosama iisi ya kalidayo, hoyejakwikala Halani. iBabakwe yakafe. Mulungu hoyomuleusa kahi Halani hoyokwija na kwikala mu isi ino yomukwikala hambiya.

iMulungu nghamwinghile hata uhasi we iisi ino hata nghanyo imwedu uwe mali yakwe; hata nheifo, hoyomuhuwisa fina yakwenda yamwinghe iisi ino yuwe yakwe ne cheleko chakwe, hata fina ugele uwo hakowa chaka mwana.
Mulungu hakalonga nhafi: ‘Icheleko chako wakwigaligwa ku isi ukutawaligwa na wanhu wengi, na uko wakagolosigwa watumwa, na kugoloseligwa fihile, kwa minyaka magana mane.
Ninga niye nikuhananga nidiliganise ditaifa didyo dikuwagolosani watumwa. Kamei nikwenda niwaleuse mu isi iyo uleke weje wanifuge ahanhu ahano.’

Hanyuma iMulungu hoyogolosa dilagano dye dikumbi kwa nheifo Ibulahimu hakowa Baba wa wa Isaka na kufinigwa mwijuwa dye munane na Isaka naye yagaluka Babakwe wa Yakobo na Yakobo Baba wa wakuku ikumi na weli.
“Awaya awakulu wetu howomonela finju Yusufu, howomusambasa, hoyoguligwa kuutumwa Misili Ninga iMulungu hoyokuwa hamwedu naye,
hoyomuhonya mumagayo gakwe gose. Mulungu hoyomwingha ihewa na misungu kumwande ya Falao, iMundewa wa Misili, iFalao hoyomwika kuwa mukulu wa iisi ne inyumba ye chindewa.
“Baho hakulawanisa njala nghulu mu isi yose ya Misili na Kanaani, hoikwigala magayo makulu lugano. Awababu setu howolemeligwa kupata chakudiya chochose,
Ninga iYakobo yakahulike fina ako Misili kwina chakudiya, hoyowatuma wanangwe, awaBaba setu weje uko Misili ichipango cha kunghonga.
Inhambo yawo iyakeli Yusufu hoyokiyonesa kuwanduguse na Falao hoyowamanya awanduguse wa Yusufu.
Kamei Yusufu hakawatuma na kumwinanga Baba yawo Yakobo na wandugu sakwe wose wamwijile, hawowa kifana magana mufungate na na shano wose.
Kamei Yakobo hakadulika Misili. Imwene imwenyecho hakafila ukuya hamwedu na waBaba setu,
kamei imitufi yawo hoikwigaligwa mpaka Shekemu, hosikigwa mu chilalo cha Abulahamu choyagulile kuwa kwi kabila dya Hamoli kwa chayasi fulani cha mapesa.
“Ugele wo kumemelesa dihuwi dya Abulahamu, ukowe habehi ditewa dya wanhu waya akuya Misili hadyongeseka na kuwa ikulu lugano.
Hanyuma yakwe, hoyotawala Mundewa yumonga imwene nghamumanyile Yusufu, ako Misili.
Hoyodigolosela ditaifa dyetu Lwidaso, hoyowatendela wababu setu fihile, kwa kuwagamba wawatage awana wawo we chigosi uleke wafe.
“Musa hoyokwelekigwa ugele uwo. Hokowa mwana muswanu lugano. Hoyoleleligwa ukaya kwa chipango kwa minyesi midatu,
yakalafigwe kunje, imwana we chike wa Falao hoyomulonda, hoyomulela kifana mwanagwe.
Musa hoyofusigwa finhu fyose na misungu yose ya Wamisili, hoyokuwa munhu wa itunyo na chogoho kwa sinhenda na simbuli.
“Yakowe munhu wa minyaka makumi mane, hoyolamula kwijawalanga awanduguse Awaislaeli.
Uko hokomona yumwedu wawo yakutendeligwa fihile, hoyoluta kumuhonya, na kwa kuliha chisasi hoyomukoma ayuya iMumisili.
(Hakamanya nhagela Waislaeli wayagwe womanya fina iMulungu kumutumiya imwene kuwakombola, ninga wasatangile nheifo.)
“Nhosiku yakwe howona Waislaeli weli wakitowa, hoyogesa kuwapatanisha yakugamba, ‘Yoloko anye mwa ndugu, nhani mukulemana muwecho kwa wecho?’
Ayuya yamufowage miyagwe hoyomukundugisa Musa kughanda, yakugamba: Nani yakwikile gweye kuwa chilongosi na mulamusi wetu?
‘Togola ukuhanga unikome fina fowamukomile iMumisili digulo?’
Yakahulike nheifo iMusa hoyotija, hoyeja kwikala ku isi ya Midiani na uko hoyopata wana weli.
“Minyaka makumi mane iyilokile, imalaika we Mundewa hakamwijila Musa muchisinghu chendechikwaka moto akuya kunyika habehi na ditunda dya Sinai.
iMusa hoyokisina lugano kukona kona ichinhu fina chino, hoyosegela habehi uleke yalange fiswanu; ninga hoyohulika dijwi dye Mundewa.
‘Aniye no ni Mulungu wa waBaba sako; Mulungu wa Abulahamu, Isaka na Yakobo.’ Musa hoyotetema kwa chogoho kahinghagendelele kulanga kahi.
“iMundewa hoyomugamba: ‘Hambula ifilwatu fyako kosoko ahano howimile ni hanhu hasunhile.
Niyona agehile gowakugoloseligwa awanhu wangu akuya Misili. Nihulika ichilolo chawo, nani nija niwahonye. Kosoko iyo wije hano nikulagise ulute Misili.’

Ayuno iMusa no yuya awanhu wa Isilaelii wowamulemile fowagambile: ‘Nani yakwikile gweye uwe chilongosi wetu na mulamusi wetu?’ Kwa soko ya yuya imalaika yamulawanisile muchihulo chendechikwaka moto, iMulungu hakumutuma iMusa yuyo yowe chilongosi mwihula kwa njila ya yuya malaika yamulawanisile muchisinghu chendechikwaka moto.
No yawalongose awa awanhu walawe Misili kwa kugolosa mengi ga majumo na gakisina mu isi ya Misili mu bahali ya Shamu na munyika kwa chipango cha minyaka makumi mane.
“iMusa noyagambile awanhu wa Isilaelii, ‘iMulungu yakwenda yamusagulileni mugonesi fina niye kulawa mugatigati ya wandugu senu mwecho.’

Ugele awanhu wa Isilaelii fowakitanganyile akuya kunyika, iMusa noyowile uko hamwedu nawo. Hokowa uko hamwedu na waBaba setu na yuya imalaika isalongile naye akuya kwitunda dya Sinai; noyenghigwe asiya simbuli sikwigala uumi yachinghe seyee.
“Ninga imwene no yuyo awakuku setu yowalemile kumuhulikisa; howomukundugisa kunghanda, howohananga kuya Misili.
Howomugamba Haluni: ‘Chigolose milungu ikudaha kuchilongosa munjila, kosoko chisimale chimupatile iMusa iyachilongose kulawa Misili.’
Baho noho wakigolosele isanamu ye indama, wakuitambichila na kugolosa chinyemi, ichinhu chowagolose kwa mikono yawo awecho.
Ninga iMulungu hoyoleuka mugati yawo, hoyowaleka wafuge sinyelesi sa kulanga, fina foiandikigwe mu chitabu che mugonesi:
‘Anye wanhu wa Isilaelii!
Siniye womwanichinjile sinyama
na kunitambichila kwa chipisi cha minyaka
makumi mane akuya kunyika.
Anyeye hamwinula dihema dya Moleki
ne inyelesi ye mulungu wenu Lefani;
sisanamu sowagolose nosoukufuga;
kosoko iyo nikukwigala kukutagigwa kutali kusuma Babeli.’
“AwaBaba setu hawowa na diya dihema dya homelele akuya kunyika fina Mulungu foyawalongose chigele Mulungu foyamusigilile Musa yadigolose, kifana foyonesigwe ne Mulungu.
Kamei awaBabasetu howokihokela awecho kwa wecho mpaka ugele wa Yoshua, foyailondile iisi iya ya wamembe waya wawingigwe ne Mulungu kumwande yawo. Hodikwikala baho mpaka ugele wa Daudi.
Daudi hakendigwa na Mulungu kusuma wayagwe wose, hoyomutasa Mulungu luneka lwa kumujengela nyumba imwene iMulungu wa Yakobo.
Ninga Sulemani noyamujengele Mulungu nyumba.
“Hata nheifo, iMulungu Mukulu nghakwikala musinyumba sijengigwe na wanhu; fina foyakulonga imogonesi.
iMundewa yakugamba:
‘Ulanga no digoda dyangu dya
ditunyo, na chilunga no digoda
dyangu dya kwichila migulu.
Ni nyumba inhani yomukudaha kunijengela?
Na hoki honikudaha kubwihila?
Ifinhu fono fyose aniye nonifigolose,
aho si nheifo?’
“Anyeye mwichaka chihuliko! Singhutwi si fidoga fyenu sifana awanhu wasimumanyile Mulungu, anyeye mukifana na awaBabasenu. Majuwa gose mukusilema simbuli sa Muhe Musunhile.

Togoleni, kwina mugonesi wowose imwene awaBabasenu wasamudumangise? Hawawakoma awaya awatumigwe ne Mulungu weje watamile kwija kwakwe ayuya imunhu we chawelu. Hambiya anyeye homumusongesa, homumukoma.
Anyeye hamuhokela adiya dilagiso degaligwe ukwenu ne Malaika, ninga musagolose fodikulonga!”
Awaya wasehe we dibalasa wakahulike nheifo, howosuha lugano, howogwegwejula meno kwa nyono.
Ninga Sitefano yakameme Muhe Musunhile, hoyokwinula ameso gakwe kulanga, hoyokona ditunyo dye Mulungu na Yesu kekala ulwandi lwo kulume lwa Mulungu.
Hoyogamba Langeni! Nikona ulanga ugubuka ne iMwana we Munhu kema ulwandi lwo kulume lwa Mulungu.
Baho, awanhu wose awowile mwi Balasa, howotula chowe na kwingisa fidole fyawo kusinghutwi kusihinda. Kamei howomujumhila wose hamwedu,
howomulafa kunje ye ikaya, howomutowa na mawe. Awaya wahomelesi howokwika si amako gawo kwimilisigwa na mujelelo yakwinanga Sauli.
Howogendelela kumutowa Sitefano na mawe, ugele imwene yakuwomba: Mundewa Yesu chihokele chidoga changu!
Hoyotowa mafindi hasi, hoyokwinula dijwi dyake: Mundewa ungawatalilile wihi muchanhya yawo. Yakamale kulonga nheifo, hoyokufa.
Na Sauli hakendesigwa na kukomigwa kwakwe Sitefano.
Dijuwa didyo hokulawanisa lwidaso lukulu lugano kwikanisa diya Yelusalemu. Awahuwile wose ninga awaya awatumigwa du, howokiyagala kusiisi sa Uyahudi na Samalia.
Awanhu awakumogoha Mulungu howomusika Sitefano na kumugolosela mohongesi makulu.
Ugele uwo, Sauli hoyogesa kudibana dikanisa. Hoyoluta kwa chila nyumba, hoyowalafa kunje awahuwile, wagosi kwa wanawake, hoyowaguma kwi gelesa.
Awaya awahuwile awakiyagale, howoluta kose kose wakuhubili imbuli iya.
iFilipo hakadulika mukaya ya Samalia na kumuhubili Kilisito ku wakaya wa baho.
Awanhu howokihasa kwa chinyemi kuutegelesa simbuli sa Filipo na kona majumo gaya goyagolose.
Kosoko simhepo sihile isawekalile wanhu wengi, hosilawa sikutula chowe chikulu; kahi na wanhu wengi wowile na utamu wa kuholola vilungo fyawo no filema howohonyigwa.
Hokukuwa na chinyemi mukaya iya.
Baho, hahowa na munhu yumonga yakwinangwa Simoni, imwenye yagolose uhayi wakwe mukaya iyo ku majuwa galokile, na kuwatenda wanhu wa Samalia wakisine lugano, yakiyona imwene ni munhu mukulu.
Awanhu wose wakulu na wadodo, hawamutegelesa wakugamba, “Munhu yuno ni udaha uya mukulu we Mulungu.”
Hawakwegigwa lugano ne imwene kosoko hawakisina uhayi wakwe kwa majuwa mengi.
Ninga wakahuwile inonga ya Filipo mchanhya ya Imbuli iswanu yo undewa we Mulungu na disina dya Yesu Kilisito, howobatisigwa wanawake na wagosi.
Hata Simoni imwenyecho hoyohuwila; yakamale kubatisigwa hoyokiyandamila na Filipo, hoyokisina amajumo gagolosagwe na Filipo.
Awaya watumigwa wowile Yelusalemu wakahulike fina awakaya wa Samalia waihokela imbuli ya Mulungu, howowatuma ukwawo Petulo na Yohana.
Wakafike howowawombela awahuwile uleke wahokele Muhe Musunhile;
kosoko ugele uwo Muhe Musunhile hakowa nghenati yamwingile hata yumwedu wao muchiligati yao; ninga hawowa wabatisigwe du mudisina dye Mundewa Yesu.
Petulo na Yohana howowechila mikono awaya wahuwile, awo howohokela Muhe Musunhile.
Baho Simoni yakone fina kwa kwikiligwa mikono na watumigwa wanhu wakuhokela Muhe Musunhile. Kosoko iyo hoyoweng'a Petulo na Yohana mapesa,
yakugamba Ningheni na niye udaha uwo uleke wowose wonikumwichila mikono yahokele Muhe Musunhile.
Ninga Petulo hoyomubidula, Wagilile kutali na mapesa gako kosoko kumanya simboto sa Mulungu sikuguligwa kwa mapesa!
Kwachaka mugawo wowose, kahi ifungu dyodyose mumulimo uno kosoko umoyo usiliganile kumwande ya meso ge Mulungu.
Kwa nheifo, ulambe uwihi wako uno na umutase Mundewa naye yakudaha kukonela ubasi amawaso fina gago.
Nikukona kumama wifu mukali na kohigwa na uwihi!
Simoni hoyobidula, Dedede, nitasileni kwe Mundewa dinghanipata dyodyose mugago gomulongile.
Petulo na Yohana wakamale kulafa uhomelesi wao na kutamula imbuli ya Mundewa, howokuya Yelusalemu. Ugele fowoyage hawahubili imbuli swamu mu fikaya fingi fya Wasamalia.
Malaika we Mundewa hoyomugamba Filipo, Winuke, ulute kwikulu kwandamila injila ikulawa Yelusalemu kuluta Gasa, (Injila iyo ikugendela munyika)

Kamei, hakenuka na kuluta. Ugele wuwo hokuwa na Mwesiyopiya yumwedu, yemhende, munhu yuyo hakowa munyamhala mukulu we sawo ye Kendake, iMundewa we chike we Chiyesiyopiya hakowa munhambo kulawa Yelusalemu kukufuga.
Kamei yendeyokuya ukaya hokowa yakwilile umukokoteni ukukwegigwa, munhambo yakwe yendeyosoma chitabu che Mugonesi Isaya.
Baho Muhe Musunhile hoyomugamba Filipo, Luta habehi ne mukokoteni uya ukukwegigwa, ukiyandamile nawo
Filipo hoyobilimila habehi na digali didyo, hoyomuhulika ayo imunhu yakusoma muchitabu cha Isaya. Baho Filipo hoyomusa, Togola, ukutanga ago go ukosoma?
Imunhu yuyo hoyobidula, Nodaha kutanga nhani bila munhu kunilongosa? Baho hoyomwinanga Filipo yakwile mwigali dyakwe, yekale naye.
Hambiya, difungu dya matulumo masunhile dyoyasomage hadyuwa dino:
Hakowa kifana ngholo ikwigaligwa kuchinjigwa;
fina ichana che ingholo fochikunyamala
posi ugele chikugetigwa, nghagubule mulomo wakwe.
Hakagumigwa chinyala na koneligwa.
Hachaka yakudaha kulonga muchanhya ye cheleko chakwe,
kosoko uumi wakwe ulewusigwa muchilunga.
Imwene naye nghalafile dijwi dyakwe hata chidodogi.
Ayo Mwisiyopiya hoyomugamba Filipo, Nitamile, iMugonesi yuno yalonga kosoko yani? Yakulonga kosoko yakwe imwecho ama kosoko ya munhu yungi?
Kamei, Filipo hoyokongela baho mu matulumo Masunhile, hoyomutamila simbuli si swanu muchanhya ya Yesu.
Fowowile wakugendelela ne inhambo, howofika ahanhu hena meji, kamei imukulu yuya hoyogamba, “Ahanhu hano hena meji mengi: Togola, kwina chochose ichikudaha kunemesa nighabatisigwe?”
[Filipo hoyogamba, “Honaga ukuhuwila kwa moyo wako wose ukudaha kubatiswa.” Imwene hoyobidula, “Heye, nikuhuwila fina Yesu Kilisito ni Mwana wa Mulungu.]”
Kamei Imukulu yuya hoyolagisa mukokoteni uya wime; awene wose aweli howohumuluka, ayuya imukulu na Filipo hoyomubatisa.
Wakalawe mumeji Muhe we Mundewa hoyomutenda Filipo yaleuke bila koneka na yuya Muwesiyopiya nghamonile kahi; ninga hoyogendelela na nhambo yakwe yamemile chinyemi lugano.
Filipo hotangila kowa Asoto, hoyogenda musikaya sose yakuhubili Imbuli swanu hata foyafikile Kaisalia.
Ninga ichigele chicho iSauli hakagendelela kongesa itisi ikulu kwa kuwakoma awamuhuwile Mundewa, hoyoluta kwa mutambiki mukulu,
hoyotasa yanghigwe baluwa sa kumanyigwa ku masinagogi ge Chiyahudi gowile Damesiki, uleke yanghafika uko wagosi ama wanawake awakwandamila injila ye Mundewa yawakole na kukwila nawo Yelusalemu.
Ninga foyowile munjila, habehi na kufika Damesiki, chimwande ujelu kulawa kulanga howumumulike kosekose.
Hoyokugwa hasi na kuhulika dijwi dikumugamba Sauli; Sauli! Nhani ukunyidasa?
Imwene naye Sauli hoyokusa Agwe no nani, Mundewa? Dijwi diya hodibidula, Aniye no Yesu imwene agweye ukunyidasa!
Ninga hambiya Inuka, wingile mukaya, na uko ukwende utamiligwe dyokugolosa.
Awaya awanhu awende woluta hamwedu na Sauli howokwima bahaya, howowa chaka dya kulonga; howohulika dijwi diya ninga wasonile munhu.
Sauli hoyokwinuka, yakagubule ameso gakwe nghadahile kona chochose; kwa nheifo awanhu waya howomulongosa kwa kumukola mukono mpaka kukaya ya Damesiki.
Sauli hoyokwikala majuwa madatu bila kona, na ugele uwo nghadiile kahi kunywa chochose.
Kamei, uko Damesiki hakuwa mwifusa yumwedu yakwinangwa, “Anania. iMundewa hoyumugamba mumagubulo, Anania.” Hoyokwidika, “Nuwa hano Mundewa.”
Naye Mundewa hoyomugamba, “Kiyohe ulute kwibalabala dikwinangwa digoloke, kwinyumba ya Yuda ukamuhanange munhu yumonga kulawa Talso yakwinangwa Sauli. Hambiya yakutasa,
na mumagubulo, kona munhu yakwinangwa Anania yakwingila kugati na mwichila mikono uleke yadahe kona.”
Ninga Anania hoyobidula, “Mundewa, nihulika simbuli sa munhu yuyo kulawa kwa wanhu wengi, nihulika agihile mene goyawagolosele wanhu wako ako Yelusalemu.
Na keja hano yena udaha kulawa kwa watambiki wakulu kuwakola awanhu wose awakuwomba kudisina dyako.”
Ninga iMundewa hoyomugamba, “Luta du, kosoko nimusagula yowe chiya changu, yadingase disina dyangu ku mataifa na wandewa wao na kwa wanhu wa Isilaelii.
Aniye nimwecho nikuhanga nimonese mengi goyakwenda yedasigwe kosoko ya disina dyangu.”

Kamei, Anania hoyoluta, hoyokwingila munyumba iyo. Kamei hoyokwika mikono yakwe muchanya ya Sauli, hoyogamba, “Mundugusangu Sauli, Mundewa, iYesu imwecho yakiyonese ukwako fowowile munjila kwija hano kanituma uleke udahe kona kahi, na kumemesigwa Muhe Musunhile.”
Chimwande finhu kifana makangha hofilagala kuulawa kumeso ga Sauli, hoyodaha kona kahi. Hoyokwima hoyobatisigwa;
yakamale kudiya, si ngufu sakwe hosimuwila.
Sauli hoyokwikala majuwa makefu hamwedu na wefusa uko Damesiki.
Chimwande hoyokonga kuhubili Mumasinagogi fina, “Yesu ni Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Wanhu wose wamuhulike howokisina lugano, wakugamba, “Munhu yuno so yuyuya yawakomile waya wawombage ku disina dino akuya Yelusalemu? Hakeja hano uleke yawakole awanhu wawo na kuwegala kuwatambiki?”
Sauli hoyogendelela kupata ludole na kuwagolosa wafumile aWayahudi wekalage Damesiki kwa kuhomela fina Yesu no Kilisito.
Majuwa mengi gakaloke, Wayahudi howokikonghola hamwedu na kugolosa njila ya kumukoma Sauli,
ninga Sauli hoyohulika imbuli iyo. chilo ne misi hawemilisa hemulango wo kwingilila mukaya uleke wamukome.
Ninga ugele wa nechilo awefusa wakwe howomulonda, howomuhulumusa mudisege dikulu kulokela muluneka lowile mulukasi.
Sauli yakafike Yelusalemu hoyogesa kihasa na wefusa. Ninga wose hawamogoha, na wasahuile fina naye kagaluka mwifusa.
Baho Balinaba hoyokwija hoyomulonda Sauli na kumwigala ku Watumigwa na kuwatamila ifyene foyamonile Mundewa munjila na fye ne foyasimulile naye. Hoyowatamila Suli foyahubili bila woga akuya Damesiki.
Kamei Sauli hoyokwikala hamwedu nawo, hoyoigendela Yelusalemu yose yakuhubili imbuli ye Mundewa bila kogoha.
Kamei hakalongaga na kuwanga chinyume na Wahelenisiti ninga wendewahananga kumukoma.
Awaya awandugu wakamanya imbuli iyo, howogolosa njila ya kumulonda Sauli, howomwigala Kaiselia, howomuleka yule Talso.
Kamei dikanisa muisi yose ya Uyahudi na Galilaya na na Samalia, hodijengeka na kukula na kugendelela kumogoha Mundewa na kulongosigwa na Musunhile.
Petulo foyendeyoluta chila hanhu, hoyofika nheifo ku wanhu wa Mulungu awendewokwikala Luda.
Uko hoyomufika munhu yumonga yakwinangwa Enea, imwene yuya kagona mwisasi kwa miyaka ikumi na munana kwa utamu wa kuholola.
Petulo hoyumugamba, “Yesu Kilisito yakuhonya. Inuka utandike disasi dyako. Enea hoyokwinuka chimwande.
Awakaya wose wa Luda na Saloni howomwona Enea, nawo wose howomubiduchila Mundewa.”
Hakuwa na mufusigwa yumonga mukaya ya Yopa yakwinangwa Tabisa (kwa Chiyunani ni Dolika, nong'amba Chipala). Imwanamuke yuno yendeyogolosa maswanu na kuwatasa wakiwa wengi ugele wose.
Ugele uwo hayuwa fina hakatamigwa, hoyokufa. Awanhu howousunha umutufi wakwe, howomutambalisa muchumba cha kuchanhya.
Yopa si hatali sana na Luda, kwa nheifo awefusa wakahulike fina Petulo kuwa Luda, howotuma wanhu weli ukwakwe na imbuli, Wije ukwetu chimwande lugano foikudahika.

Kamei Petulo hoyokilongosa nawo. Yakafike howomwigala kuchumba cha kuchanhya kwigolofa, uko wanawake wegane wengi howomusunguluta Petulo wakulila na kumonesa makoti na sisuke soyendeyogolosa ugele foyowile mumi.
Petulo hoyowalafa wose kunje, hoyofugama, hoyowomba. Hanyuma hoyomubiduchila ayuya yafile, hoyogamba Tabisa inuka! Naye hoyogubuka meso na yakamwone Petulo, hoyokwikala.
Petulo hoyomutasa kwimanyima, kamei hoyowenanga awaya awanhu wa Mulungu na waya wegane, hoyomuleka mumikono yao, ugele ni mumi.
Imbuli iyo yagoloseke baho, hoikwenela chila hanhu uko Yopa na wanhu wengi howomuhuila Mundewa.
Petulo hoyokwikala majuwa mengi uko Yopa, hoyokwikala na munhu yumonga mugolosaji wa nghingo yakwinangwa Simoni.
Uko Kaisalia hakuwaga na munhu yumonga yakwinangwa Kolinelio Mukulu wa chikosi chimonga chikwinangwa, “Chikosi cha Italia.”
Hakowa munhu muswamu; imwene hamwedu na wa munyumba yakwe wose wendewomogoha Mulungu. Yendeyogolosa mengi kuwatasa awakiwa we Chiyahudi na yende yomuwomba Mulungu ugele wose.
Hayuwa kifana saa kenda nhafi ya nemisi, hoyokona chimesomeso, kagubuliligwa, malaika wa Mulungu hoyokwingila kugati hoyomugamba, “Kolinelio!”

Kolinelio hoyomukumhulila meso yuyo malaika kwa chogoho, hoyomugamba, “Kwina choni Mundewa?” Ayo imalaika hoyomugamba, “Amawombi hamwedu na kulafa kwako kuwatasa wakiwa kufika kuchanhya kuwa ngelegesi kwe Mulungu.
Hambiya, watume wanhu Yopa wakamwinange munhu yumonga yakwinangwa Simon, disina dimonga Petulo.
Kowa munyumba ya Simon mugolosaji wa singhingo, nyumba yakwe yuwile habehi ne bahali.”
Kamei malaika yalongile siso hakafulusa kuleuka na kuluta, Kolinelio hoyowenanga awatogomi weli wa munyumba yakwe na yumwedu wa wasilikali wakwe yendeyomogoha Mulungu,
hoyowatamila gose galawanise, hoyowatuma Yopa.
Nhosiku yakwe dijuwa dya keli, awanhu wawo wadatu wakali munhambo, ninga behi na kufika Yopa, Petulo hoyokwila kwipala dye inyumba kuchanhya, ku saa mutandatu ya nemisi uleke yawombe.
Hakona njala, hoyokwenda kupata chakudiya; ugele ichakudiya fochendechigolosigwa, hoyapatigwa na nhongo sito, hoyokona diono chimesomeso.
Hakona ulanga ugubuligwa na chinhu kifana isuke ikulu ikudulisigwa dikoligwa musimhembe sakwe sose ine.
Kugati yakwe kwina fiyumbe fyose: Si nyama se migulu mine, sinyama sikutambala hasi, ne fidege fya mulanga.
Hoyohulika dijwi dikumugamba: Petulo, Inuka uchinje sinyama sino udiye!
Petulo hoyobidula, Hata, Mundewa; aniye sinati nidiye chinhu chochose ichene chikusemunigwa ama chihile.
Dijwi diya hodihulikika kahi dikugamba, “Unghafigambe fichafu ifinhu ifyene Mulungu foyasunhile.”
Imbuli ino hoyigoloseka kadatu, kamei adiya disuke hodikwinuligwa kulanga.
Petulo foyendeyokisina isoko ye digubulo didyo dyoyonile, awaya awanhu watumigwe na Kolinelio, wakaitange inyumba ya Simoni, howofika hamulango,
howokwinanga kwa ijwi: Togoleni, hena mugeni bahano yakwinangigwa Simoni Petulo?
Petulo hakowa nghenati yamanye magubulo gano, na baho Muhe hoyomugamba, “Tegelesa! Hena wanhu wadatu hano, wakukuhanga.
Dulika chimwande na unghowe na manhonge kiyandamila nawo, kosoko aniye noniwatumile.”
Kamei, Petulo hoyodulika hasi, hoyowagamba awanhu wawo, Aniye nowomukuhanga. Nhani mwijile?

Awene howomubidula, Imukulu we chikosi cha wasilikali, Kolinelio; munhu muswanu, yakumogoha Mulungu na yakutunyigwa na Wayahudi wose, kachituma. Hakagambigwa na malaika Musunhile yakwinange ukaya ukwake uleke yategelese chochose chiwinacho cho kulonga.
Petulo hoyowakalibisha kugati, hoyowengha hanhu haguna ichilo chia.
Nhosiku yakwe, Petulo hoyokonga inhambo hamwedu nawo, na wamonga wa wandugu wa Yopa howokiyandamila naye.
Dijuwa dya keli yakwe, howofika Kaisalia, na uko Kolinelio yendeyowagojela hamwedu na wandugu na wambuya, awene woyagoneke.
Petulo yakowe yakwingila Kolinelio, hoyolawa kunje kumuhokela, hoyofugama kumwande yakwe na funamana hasi.
Ninga Petulo hoyomwinula, hoyomugamba, “Inuka kosoko aniye na munhu du.”
Petulo hoyogendelela kusimulila na Kolinelio ugele wakwingila kunyumba koyafikile wanhu wengi wakikonghola.

Petulo hoyowagamba, “Anye muwecho mumanya fina Muyahudi wowose yakulemesigwa na malagiso ge dini yakwe yanghakihase na wanhu wa wamembe gengi. Ninga Mulungu kanyonesa nileke kumwona munhu wowose kuwa yakusemunigwa ama muchafu.
Kosoko iyo, fomuninange nija, bila kulema. Hambiya, nimusani, Nhani muninange?”
Kolinelio hoyogamba, “Majuwa madatu galokile ichigele kifana chino, saa ya dikenda ya nemisi, nendeniwomba kuchumba changu. Chimwande munhu yafalile suke sikwakaika kema kumwande yangu,
hoyogamba, ‘Kolinelio! Amawombi gako na kulafa kwako na kuwatasa kwako wakiwa fihokeligwa na Mulungu.
Mutume munhu Yopa yakamwinange munhu yumonga yakwinangwa Simoni, disina dimonga Petulo; kowa kunyumba ya Simoni mgolosaji wa singhingo behi na bahali.’
Kosoko iyo hanikutumila wanhu baho ni baho nagwe kutenda fiswanu kwija. Hambiya, aseye cha hamwande ya Mulungu, kuhulikisa chochose ichene Mulungu kakulagisa ulonge.”
Baho Petulo hoyokonga kulonga; Hambiya nimanya chawelu Mulungu kechaka ubagusi.
Munhu wa ditaifa dyodyose yakumogoha Mulungu na kugolosa simbuli se chawelu, Mulungu yakuhokeligwa naye.
Aino no imbuli Mulungu yo yawegalile wanhu wa Isilaelii, yakutamila Imbuli swanu iikwigala digoya kwa njila ya Yesu Kilisito imwene no Mundewa wa wose.
Anye mumanya imbuli iya yagoloseke mu isi yose ya Uyahudi kukongela woyahubili Yohana.
Mumanya Yesu wa Nasaleti ifyene Mulungu foyamusagule kwa kumwitilila Muhe Musunhile na ludole. Mulungu hakowa hamwedu naye; holuta ako nako na kugolosa maswanu na wose awoneligwe na Luhoma.
Aseye cha wahomelesi wa simbuli sose soyagolose mu isi ya Uyahudi na Yelusalemu. Howomukoma kwa kumutungika mumusalaba.
Ninga Mulungu hoyomwinula dijuwa dya kadatu, hoyomugolosa yonigwe,
si kuwanhu wose, ninga kwa waya awene awasaguligwe wowe wahomelesi wakwe, no seye chanywile na kudiya hamwedu naye yamale kwinuka kulawa kuwafile.
Kachituma chihubili imbuli swanu ku wanhu wose na kuhomela fina imwene noyasaguligwe na Mulungu yowe mulamusi wa womi na wafile.
Wagonesi wose hawalonga simbuli sakwe fina chila munhu yakumuhuwila yakuleusiligwa uwihi wakwe kudisina dyakwe.
Ugele Petulo hoyowile yakalilonga simbuli siso, Muhe Musunhile hoyowahumuluchila wose wategelesage imbuli iyo.
Awaya Awayahudi wahuwile awejile na Petulo kulawa Yopa howokisina kuhona Mulungu hakawetilila ichipawa che Muhe Musunhile wanhu wa wamataifa gengi nheifiya.
Kosoko hawawahulika wakulonga kwa nonga sa hayo hayo wakumutunya Mulungu. Baho Petulo hoyogamba,
“Awanhu wano wahokela Muhe Musunhile fina seye chiwecho fochihokele. Togoleni kwina wowose yakudaha kulemesa awanhu wano wanghabatisigwe kwa meji?”
Kamei, Hoyogamba wabatisigwe kwa disina dya Yesu Kilisito. Baho howomutasa yekale nawo kwa majuwa makefu.
Hambiya awatumigwa na wandugu akuya Uyahudi howohulika fina awamembe nawo waihokela imbuli ya Mulungu.
Kamei, Petulo yakalute Yelusalemu, awaya Awayahudi wahuwile awendage awanhu wamataifa gamonga wagaligwe kwikumbi, howomugamba kabana, wakugamba,
“Agweye kwijakwikala na walajoni mpaka kudiya nawo.”
Baho Petulo hoyowatamila chila chinhu, simbuli siya sagoloseke kulawa kunghonga:
Dijuwa dimonga nendeniwomba mukaya ya Yopa, honikona iono; honikona chinhu kifana isuke ikulu dikudulisigwa hasi kulawa kulanga dikoligwa mu simhembe sakwe ine, hodikwikigwa hanghanda yangu.
Honisungilila kugati kwa fiswanu honikiona umo si nyama se migulu mine, sinyama sa kumbago, sinyama sikuhambala na fidege fya kulanga.
Baho honihulika dijwi dikunigamba Petulo, inuka, uchinje, udiye.
Ninga aniye honigamba; Hata, Mundewa! Kosoko chochose chikusemunigwa na chihile chisinati chingile mumulomo wangu.
Dijwi diya hodihulikika kahi kulawa kulanga: Unghafigambe fikusemunigwa ifinhu fisunhigwe na Mulungu.
Imbuli hogoloseka kadatu, kamei fyose hofikuwisigwa kuchanhya kulanga.
Chimwande wanhu wadatu awene watumigwe ukwangu, howofika kunyumba yonyendenikwila.
Muhe hoyonigamba nikuyandamile nawo nilekekuwa na manhonge. Awo no awandugu mutandatu howakiyandamila nani kuluta Kaisalia, na uko hochikwingila munyumba ya Kolinelio.
Imwene hoyochitamila ifyene fyoyamonile malaika yemile kunyumba yakwe yakumugamba, “Mutume Munhu Yopa yakamwinange munhu yumonga yakwinangwa Simoni kwa disina dimonga Petulo.
Imwene hokutamila simbuli isene agweye na wayago wose mukwende muhonyigwe.”
Kamei, nikakonge du kulonga, Muhe Musunhile hoyowawadulichila fina foyachidulikile aseye kunghonga.
Baho honigelegela simbuli siya iMundewa soyalongile: Yohana hakabatisa kwa meji, ninga anyeye mukubatisigwa kwa Muhe Musunhile.
Hambiya, honaga Mulungu yawenghile wanhu wa wamembe gamonga ichipawa chichiya choyachinghile seye fochamuhuwile Mundewa Yesu Kilisito, togola aniye no nani mpaka nidahe kumupinga Mulungu?
Wakahulike simbuli siso howoleka lukani, howomutunya Mulungu wakugamba, “Mulungu kawengha wanhu wa wamembe gamonga luneka lwo kulamba na kuwa na uumi!”
Kosoko ya magayo galwanise ugele foyakomigwe Sitefano, wahuwile howokiyagala. Wamonga howoluta mpaka Foinike, Kupulo, na Andiyokiya wakuhubili imbuli iya kuwayahudi du.
Ninga wamonga wa wahule kulawa Kupulo na Kulene, howoluta Andiyokiya, howotamila simbuli siso kuwanhu wa wamembe gengi wakuhubili aiya imbuli swanu ye Mundewa Yesu.
Mundewa hoyowatasi na itewa ikulu dya wanhu hodihuwila na kumubiduchila Mundewa.
Simbuli siso hosihulikigwa akuya kwi kanisa dya Yelusalemu. Kosoko iyo howomutuma Balinaba yalute Andiyokiya.
Yakafike uko na kona Mulungu foyawamotese awanhu waya, hoyokonela na kuwaguma moyo wose wagendelele kuwa wanhu wa dihuwi kwi Mundewa.
Balinaba hakowa munhu muswamu na yamemile Muhe Musunhile na digoya. Itewa ikulu dya wanhu howokwegigwa kwi Mundewa.
Kamei Balinaba, hoyoluta Talso kumuhananga Sauli.
Yakamwone hoyokwija naye Andiyokiya. Nawo wose weli howokwikala na dikanisa diya kwa mwaka wose mugima, wakufusa itewa ikulu dya wanhu. Ako Andiyokiya noko kunghonga, awefusa kwinangigwa Wakilisito.
Ugele uwo wagonesi wengi howokwija Andiyokiya kulawa Yelusalemu.
Yumwedu wawo iyakwinangwa Agabo hoyokwima kwa udaha wa Muhe Musunhile, hoyolonga gakwende kalawanise fina kukwende kuwa na njala nghulu mu isi yose.
Awahuwile howokifumilisa chila yumwedu, kwa udaha wakwe yegale chochose uleke wawatase awandugu waye wekalage Uyahudi.
Kamei, howogolosa nheifo na kwigala kuwasehe wedikanisa umusada wawo kwa mikono ya Balinaba.
Ugele uwo Mundewa Helode hakakonga kuwedasa wanhu we dikanisa.
Hoyomukoma kwa ipanga Yakobo, munduguse wa Yohana.
Yakone Wayahudi wendesigwa na chitendo chakwe chicho, hoyogendelela, hoyomukola na Petulo. (Ayo haigoloseka ugele we sikukuu ye mikate isigumigwe nungo.)
Yakakoligwe, hoyokwikigwa, kulangiligwa na wasilikali fitewa fine fya wasilikali wanewane. Helode hakahananga kumulafa kumwande ya wanhu honaimalile kuloka ikikukuu ye Pasaka.
Petulo fowile kwigelesa, dikanisa dyende dimuwombela kwa Mulungu kwa moyo.

Nechilo dijuwa dya longolele dijuwa Helode yahanangage yamulafe Petulo kunje kumwande ya wanhu wose, Petulo hohowa yagonile hagati ya wasilikali weli. Hakowa yohigwe minyolo mili, na wemilisi wendewokwimilisa dilango dya digelesa.

Chimwande malaika we Mundewa hoyokwima habehi naye, no ujelu houmulika ichumba ichiya chose che digelesa. Malaika hoyomukwafa hambafu hoyomwinusa hoyogamba, “Inuka chimwande!” Baho ni baho iminyolo yamohile mikono hoidumuka na kulagala hasi.
Malaika hoyomugamba, “Fala umukanda wako, fala filwatu fyako.” Hoyotenda nheifo. Kamei Malaika yuya hoyomugamba, “Fala dikoti dyako, unyandamile.”
Petulo hoyomwandamila kunje, ninga nghamanyile fina ago gagolosigwe ne malaika hagowa ga chawelu, hakawa yalota nyosi.

Howoloka ichituwo cha nghonga cha wimilisi na cha keli, hanyuma howofika kumulango we chuma wokwingilila mukaya. Umulango houkumuka uwecho du, awene howolawa kunje. Howokuwa wakugenda mwibalabala dimonga chimwande, ayuya Malaika hoyomuleka Petulo yamwene.

Ako noho Petulo yatangile choni chigoloseke, hoyogamba, “Hambiya nimanya chawelu fina Mundewa katuma Malaika wakwe na kunihonya mumikono ya Helode na simbuli sose awana wa Isilaelii sowende wa gojela.”
Yakatange nheifo hoyula kunyumba ya Maliyamu ing'ina wa Yohana iyakwinangwa Mlk o, umo wanhu wengi hawakikonghola wakuwomba.
Petulo hoyotowa hodi kumulango wa kunje, na mutumishi yumonga we chike yakwinangwa Loda, hoyoluta hamulango kwidika.
Ayo imwana we chike hoyotanga dijwi dya Petulo hosekelela lugano, ahanhu hokukumula auya umulango hoyobilima kugati na kuwatambila Petulo kema kunje hamulango.
Howomugamba ayuya imwana we chike, “Kwina chilalu!” Ninga imwene hoyokasana kuwa ni chawelu nofoyuwile. Nawo howomugamba, “Ayo ni Malaika wakwe.”
Ugele uwo Petulo yakugendelela kutowa hodi. Hanyuma yakwe howokumula u mulango, howomwona, howokisina.
Kamei hakawapungila umukono wanyamale, hoyowatamila ifene Mundewa foyamulafile mwigelesa. Kamei hoyowagamba wagale imbuli kwa Yakobo na ku awandugu wamonga. Kamei hoyoleuka hoyoluta hanhu hengi.
Ikafike nhousikusiku hahowa na lutemanuko mugati ya awasilikali kosoko ye imbuli yagoloseke ya Petulo.
Ichigele Helode foyamukonghile na kuleka kumona, hakawosilisa awasilikali na kulagisa wakomigwe. Kamei hakadulika kulawa Yudea mpaka Kaisaliya na kwikala uko.

Helode hakasuha sana na watu wa Tilo na Sidoni. Ninga wene howomwigalila wanhu. Awene wawo howomupata kunghonga, Blasito yowe ulwandi ulwawo, Blasito hakowa mumyamhala mukulu munyumba ye Mundewa. Kamei howomulutila Helode, howomutasa kuwa na igya kosoko ye iisi yawo haihula iisi ye Mundewa ku chakudiya.
Dijuwa dimwedu dyasaguligwe, Helode hoyofala si suke sakwe sechindewa hoyokwikala mwigoda dyakwe dye chindewa hoyolonga na wanhu.
Wanhu waya howotula chowe cha chinyemi howogamba, “Adino ni ijwi dyo Mulungu si dya Munhu!”
Baho ni baho Malaika we Mendewa hoyomukinya Helode hasi.
Imbuli ya Mulungu hoigendelela na kukula.
Balinaba na Paulo wakamale kugolosa umulimo wawo, howolewuka kahi Yelusalemu howomulonda na Yohana iyakwindigwa kahi Mlk o.

Kwi kanisa dya Andiyokiya hakuwa na wanhu wamonga wagonesi na walimu; mugati yawo hakowa Balinaba, Simoni yakwinagwa hanyuma Mutitu (Nigel) Lukio wa Kilene, Manaeni imwene yaleligwe hamwedu na Mundewa Helode, na Sauli.
Wawagolosage kumufugila Mulungu na kufunga Muhe Musunhile hoyowagamba, “Nisagulileni Balinaba na Sauli kosoko yo mulimo woniwenangile.”
Kamei, wakamale kuwomba na kufunga, howowechila mikono howowaleka walute.
Kamei, Balinaba na Sauli wakafuluse kutumigwa na Muhe Musunhile, howadulika mpaka Seleukia, kulawa uko howokwila meli mpaka ku chisiwa cha Kuplo.
Wakafike Salami howohubili imbuli ya Mulungu mumasinagogi ge Chiyahudi. Yohana hakowa mutasi wasi wawo.
Howogenda kulawa ulwandi lumwedu lwe chisiwa mpaka Pafo, ulwandi lwa keli, na uko howomufika muhai yumonga Muyahudi yekwinangwa Bali Yesu, imwene yendeyokitenda fina mugonesi
Ayuno hakowa hamwedu na Seligio Paulo, no mukulu wa chicho ichisiwa, hokowa munhu yena umanyi lugano. Seligio Paulo hoyowenanga Balinaba na Sauli uleke yaihulike imbuli ya Mulungu.
Ninga ayo imuhayi Elima (foyendeyokwinangwa kunonga ye Chiyunani), hoyogesa kuwabesa uleke yamutende yuya imukulu we chisiwa yanghahuwile na kubiduchila dihuwi dye chiKilisito.
Baho, Sauli imwene yenangigwe kahi Paulo, yakameme Muhe Musunhile, hoyomukumhulila ameso gakwe imuhayi,

hoyogamba, “Agweye kwa mudasi lugano, kwechaka chawelu! Agweye kwa mwana wa luhoma! Agwe kwa mughondo wa chila chinhu chiya che chawelu; nghukuleka hata chimwedu kwaganisa si njila se Mundewa isigoloke.
Hambiya, umukono we Mundewa ukuwa muchanhya yako; ukuwa chipofu na nghukudaha kona ujelu we dijuwa kwa chigele.”
Chimwande chila chinhu hochikuwa kifana ifunde na chisa ukwakwe, hoyokonga kugenda kuno na kuno yakuhananga munhu yamukole mukono yamulongose.
Ayuya imukulu we chiwa yakone nheifo, hoyobiduka, hoyohuwila; hoyokisina lugano amafuso goyahulike muchanhya ye Mundewa.
Kulawa Pafo, Paulo na wayagwe howokwila meli mpaka Pelga ya Pamfulia; ninga Yohana hoyowaleka hoyokuya Yelusalemu.
Ninga awene howogendelela ne inhambo kuwa Pelga mpaka mukaya ya Andiyokiya Pisidia. Dijuwa dye Sabato howokwingila mwi sinagogi howokwikala.

Gamale kusomigwa amasomo mu chitabu cha malagiso ga Musa ne chitabu cha Wagonesi, awakulu wa disinagogi howogelegela ne nonga ino, Wandugu hona mwina mbuli ya kuwatamila wanhu uleke muwagume moyo, longeni
Kamei Paulo hoyokwima, hoyowonesa kwa mukono, hoyokonga kulonga.
Anye wanhu wa Isilaelii na wamonga wose mukumogoha Mulungu tegeleseni!
Mulungu wa wanhu wano wa Isilaelii hakawasagula waBabasetu; hoyowagolosa wowe itaifa ikulu ugele fowowile kuya kuutumwa Misili. Mulungu hoyowaleusa uko kwa udaha wakwe mukulu.
Hoyowafinyilisa kwa minyaka makumi mane munyika.
Hoyowamala mataifa mafungate we isi ya Kanaani, hoyowengha awo awanhu wakwe isi iya yuwe yawo.
Hoyiloka minyaka magana mane na makumi mashano.
Kamei hoyowengha walamusi kuwalongosa mpaka ugele we mugonesi Samweli.
Baho, howokwenda kuwa na Mundewa, Mulungu hoyowegha Sauli, mwana wa Kisha wa dikabila dya Benyamini, yowe Mundewa wawo kwa chigele cha minyaka makumi mane.

Hanyuma hoyomuleusa Sauli, Mulungu hoyomusagula Daudi kuwa Mundewa wawo. Mulungu hak kumufumila kwake hoyogamba: Nimona mwana wa Yese; ni munhu imwene moyo wangu wendesigwa naye, ni munhu yakwenda yagolosa agaya gose gonikwenda kugolosa.
Kwandamila ulukolo lwakwe munhu yuyu, Mulungu, fina foyalongile, kawegalila wana wa Isilaelii muhonya, no Yesu.
Ugele nghenati yeje Yesu, Yohana hakamulongolela yakuwahubilia wanhu wose wa Isilaelii fina ikuhanangigwa walambe na kubatisigwa.
Yohana foyamalagisage imbuli yakwe hakawagamba wanhu, Mukudoga aniye no nani? Aniye ni yuya yomukulangilila. Imwene yakwija hanyuma yangu na aniye sinogelwe hata kudohola sisigi se filwatu fyakwe.
Wandugu sangu, anyeye mu wana wo lukolo lwa Abulahamu, na wamonga wose mo mukumogoha Mulungu! Imbuli ino yo uhonya igaligwa ukwetu.

Kosoko awakaya wa Yelusalemu hamwedu na wakulu wawo wasamumanyile imwene kuwa Muhonya, kahiwasatangile simbuli sa wasungula sikusomigwa chila Sabato. Hata neifo hawagolosa simbuli sa wasungula simemeligwe kwa Yesu yakomigwe.
Ninga wasonile mbuli yoyose yoyabanile iikumutenda yakomigwe, fowamulongile Pilato yamuliganise yakomigwe.
Kamei wakafuluse kumemelesa gose agawandigwe kosoko ye mwene, howomuhulumusa kulawa mumusalaba howomwika muchilalo.
Ninga Mulungu hoyomwinula kulawa kuwafile.
Naye kwa majuwa mengi, hoyokiyonesa kuwa wakiyandamile naye kulawa Galilaya mpaka Yelusalemu. Awo no wahomelesi wakwe hambiya ku wanhu wa Isilaelii.
Naseye chija hano kumwigalilani imbuli swanu; imbuli iya Mulungu yoyawahuwise awaBabasetu.
Kamemelesa ukwetu seye chi wajukulu wawo kwa mwinula Yesu kulawa ku wafile fina foyiwandikwe Musabuli ya keli.
Agweye kwa mwanangu,
Aniye diyelo nigaluka Babako!
Na kukumwinula kulawa kuwafile, yanghadahe kahi kuya uko na kudoda. Mulungu hakagamba nhafi:
Nikukwingha simboto sisunhile
se chawelu sonamuhuwise Daudi.
Heye, nna musisehemu simonga se Sabuli yakugamba:
Nghukumuleka isusunhile wako yadode
Daudi mwecho hakamemelesa foyakwenda Mulungu mu ugele wakwe; kamei hoyokufa hosikigwa habehibehi na wasehe wakwe, na uwili wakwe houdoda.
Ninga yuya yanuligwe na Mulungu kulawa kuwafile nghadodile.
Kwa nheifo, mumanye, wandugu sangu, fina kwe injila ye munhu yuno imbuli yo kulekeleligwa uwihi ikuhubihiigwa ukwenu;
na fina chila munhu yakumwihuwila Yesu yakulekeleligwa uwihi wose; chinhu ichene chisikudahika kwa malagiso.
Muchilangisise, mungheje mufikiligwa nagaya gowalongile awagonesi:
Tegeleseni anyeye mu
wolubeso, jumeni mwagilile!
Kosoko nikugolosa milimo aniye
mumajuwa genu, ni chinhu
ichene musikudaha kuhuwila
hata munhu yanghamutamilani!
Paulo na Balinaba wokowe wakulawa mwisinagogi awaya awanhu howowagoneka weje kahi isabato ikwandamila, walonge wongesele simbuli siso.

Umulango wo ukahele, Wayahudi wengi na wanhu wa wamembe gamonga awabidukile idini ye Chiyahudi howowandamilla Paulo na Balinaba. Awo watumigwa howolonga nawo howagamba wagendele kwikala wakuhuwila dihewa dye Mulungu.
Isabato yandamile, kalibu ikaya yose hoyokwija kuhulikisa imbuli ye Mundewa.
Ninga Awayahudi wakone didyo ditewa dya wanhu, howomema wifu, howopinga goyalongage Paulo na kumuliga.

Hata nheifo Paulo na Balinaba howolonga kwa chigosi bila kogoha, wakugamba: Hayuwa fiswanu imbuli ya Mulungu imufikileni anye we kunghonga; ninga kosoko muilema na kiyona msagiligwe uwumi wa majuwa gose, aseye chikumulekani na kuwalutila awanhu wa mataifa gengi.
Kosoko Mundewa hakachilagisa nhafi:
Nikwika gweye uwe ujelu ku wanhu
wa wamembe,
uleke nwegalile wanhu uhonya
kose kuchilunga.
Awanhu wa wamembe gamonga wakahulike imbuli iyo huwosekelela, howowutunya ulongi wa Mulunguna waya awene wasaguligwe kupata uwumi wa majuwa gose, howohuwila.
Imbuli ya Mulungu hoikwenela kose kose mu isi iya.

Ninga Wayahudi howowasongesa awanawake wakulu wene fyeyo wa mataifa gengi na awene wende womogoha Mulungu na wagosi we kaya iyo. Howokonga kuwedasa Paulo na Balinaba, howowawinga kulawa mu sehemu yawo.
Kamei, watumigwa howokung'unha diluli mumigulu yawo, kuwa ushahidi ukwawo, kamei howoluta Ikonia.
Ninga awaya wahuwile howomema chinyemi na Muhe Musunhile.
Ako Ikonia simbuli hasuwa fina fosowile kuya Andiyokiya; Paulo na Balinaba howoluta kwi sinagogi dya Wayahudi howolonga kwa udaha mpaka Wayahudi wengi na Wayunani howohuwila.
Ninga aWayahudi wamonga awalemile kuhuwila howosongesa na kuguma nyono mu mimoyo ya wanhu wa mataifa wamonga uleke wawaleme awandugu wawo.
Paulo na Balinaba hogendelela kwikala uko kwa udaha muchanhya ye Mundewa, naye Mundewa hoyowililila ulongi wo walongile muchanhya ye dihewa dyakwe, kwa wadahisa kugolosa ga majumo na gokisina.
Awanhu we kaya iyo howokitemanula: Wamonga howokifumilisa na Wayahudi, na wamonga howokuwa ulwandi lwa watumigwa.
Kundumo yakwe, wamonga wa wanhu wa mataifa gamonga na Wayahudi wakihasa na wakulu wawo, howolamula kuwatendela fihile awo watumigwa na kuwatowa na mawe.
Watumigwa wakatange imbuli iyo, howotijila Lisitila na Delibe, sikaya sa Likaonia, na sisehemu sa mubehi behi.
Hogendelela kuhubili imbuli iswanu uko.
Hakuwa munhu yumonga uko Lisitila, imwene yowile chiwete kulawa kwelekigwa kwake hakowa nghenati yagende ng'oo.
Imunhu yuyo yendeyomutegelesa Paulo foyendeyohubili. Paulo hoyomulanga ludole yokone fina hakowa na ihuwi dya kudaha kuhona,
hoyolonga kwa dijwi dya muchanhya, Ima nyima kwa migulu yako! Ayuno munhu imwene imigulu yakwe hailemaa, hoyokwinuka chimwande hoyokonga kugenda.
Chigele itewa dya wanhu wakone choyagolose Paulo, howokonga kujoja mu nonga ye Chilukaonia, Milungu ichijila mu sifuta sa wanhu.
Balinaba hoyokwinangwa Seu, na Paulo, kwa fiya imwene noyalongage, hoyokwinangwa Helme.

Na imutambiki wa dihekalu dya Seu dyowile kunje ye kaya hoyokwigala nghambaku na mahwanya ga maluwa hamwedu yo mulango mukulu we kaya, imwene hamwedu na ditewa dya wanhu hoyohananga kuwatambichila watumigwa.
Balinaba na Paulo wakamanye imbuli iyo, howodega si suke sawo na kudibilimila ditewa dya wanhu wakugamba dijwi ikulu:

“Wandugusetu nhani mukutenda nheifo? Ase nase cha wanhu fina nyeye. Na chabahano kuwahubili imbuli iswanu, musileke asino si sanamu muhala, mukamubidukile Mulungu imumi, Mulungu yowumbile ulanga ne iisi, ibahali na fyose fuwile umo.
Katali Mulungu hakaleka chila itaifa ditende fyo dikwenda.
Hata nheifo nghalekile kiyonesa kusimbuli si swanu soyakuwagolosela: Yakuwatonyesela ifula kulawa mulanga, kugola kwa ugele wakwe na chakudiya na kuimemesa miyoyo yenu na chinyemi.”
Hata walongile nheifo isowile fihufu kuwalemesa waleke kuwatambichila.
Ninga Wayahudi wamonga howokwija kulawa Andiyokiya na Ikonia, howowatenda wanhu wakihase nawo howomutowa mawe Paulo na kumubulumula mpaka kunje ye kaya howogamba kafulusa kufa.
Ninga wahuwile wakakikonghole na kumusunguluta, hoyokwinuka, hoyokuya ukaya. Nhosiku yakwe imwene na Balinaba howoluta Delbe.
Paulo na Balinaba wakamale kuhubili imbuli swanu ako Delibe na kupata wahuwile wengi, howokiyoha nhambo ya kuluta Andiyokiya kwa kugendela Lisitila na Ikonia.
Howowakangasa wahuwile wa sikaya siso na kuwaguma moyo wowe wakangale mu dihuwi, Howowagamba, ichangila chose seye chigendele mu masambasiko mengi, uleke chingile mu undewa we Mulungu.
Howosagula wasehe kwa chila ikanisa kosoko ya wahuwile, kamei kwa kuwomba na kufunga howoweka hasi ya wimilili we Mundewa imwene wowamuhuwile.
Wakalokele mu isi ya Pisidia, howofika Pamfulia.
Wakamale kuhubili imbuli iyo ako Penga, howoluta Atalia.
Kulawa uko hawasafili kwa meli howokuya Andiyokiya ahene kunghonga hawekigwa mu kwimilisi we dihewa dye Mulungu kosoko ye milimo, hambiya hawowa waimemelese.

Wakafike ako Andiyokiya howogolosa mulundo wa dikanisa ahanhu baho, howowatamila simbuli soyagolose Mulungu hamwedu nawo, na fyene foyawakumulile wanhu wa wamembe gamonga umulango wo kwingila mu dihuwi.
Howokwikala na waya wahuwile chipisi chitali hamwedu nawo.
Kamei wanhu wamonga hawafika Andiyokiya kulawa Uyahudi howokonga kuwafusa waya wandugu wakugamba, “Hona musigaligwe kwikumbi kwandamilo amahokelo na malagiso ga Musa musikudaha kuhonyigwa ng'oo.”

Imbuli ino hoikwiga kuwanga kukulu na Balinaba na Paulo wakalonge nao, howokifumilisa fina Paulo na Balinaba hamwedu na wahuwile wengi wa dikanisa dya Andiyokiya wakawona awaya watumigwa na wasehe muchanhya ye imbuli iyo.
Kamei dikanisa, hodiwelaga nawo wokowe wakulokela Foinike na Samalia howowatamila wanhu ifyene awamembe gamonga fowawamubidukile Mulungu. Simbuli siso hosiwendesa sana wandugu wawo wose.
Wakafike Yelusalemu howokalibishigwa na dikanisa, watumigwa na wasehe; nawo howowatamila gose goyagolose Mulungu hamwedu nawo.
Ninga wahuwile wamonga wowile we chitewa cha Mafalisayo, howokwima wakugamba, ikwendigwa wanhu wa wamembe gengi wegaligwe kwikumbi na kufusigwa kwandamila malagiso ga Musa.
Kamei, watumigwa na wasehe howogolosa mulundo wi waimwene uleke wailange imbuli iyo.

Wakamale masimulisi matali, Petulo hoyokwima, hoyogamba, “Wandugu sangu, mumanya fina kukonga Mulungu hakanisagula niye mugati yenu uleke awanhu wa wamembe wahulike imbuli Iswanu na kuhuwila kosoko ya mahubili gangu.
Naye Mulungu yamanyile miyoyo ya wanhu hoyokonesa fina kawafumila nawo kwa kuwengha Muhe Musunhile fina foyachinghile seye.
Nghagolose ubagusi wowose ukwetu na ukwawo, hakaisunha miyoyo kwa dihuwi.
Hambiya, nhani, kumugesa Mulungu kwa kuwatwika awo wahuwile musigo wene hata wababu setu, kahi aseye chilemeligwa kuwinula?
Inghowe nheifo, ninga, chikuhuwila fina aseye fina awene nawo, chikuhonyigwa kwa njila ya dihewa dye Mundewa Yesu.”
Chitewa chose hochinyamala twi, chikuwategelesa Balinaba na Paulo wakutamila majumo na kisina kwagohesigwe na Mulungu kwa mikono yawo mugati ya wanhu wa wamembe gengi.
Wakamale kulonga Yakobo hoyokonga kulonga: Wandugu sangu, nitegeleseni!
Simoni kachitamila fyene Mulungu kunghonga foyawagolosele wanhu wa wamembe gengi, hoyawasagula wamonga wawo wowe wanhu wakwe.
Imbuli ino iligana lugano na simbuli sa wagonesi fina mawandiko masunhile fogakulonga:
Hanyuma ya simbuli sino kukuya,
nikwenda nijenge kahi aiya
inyumba ya Daudi yuwile;
Nikugolosa mahame gakwe na
kuijenga kahi.
Ako awanhu wamonga wose,
wanhu wa mataifa gose
woniwenange wowe wangu
womuhamanga Mundewa.
Nofo yakulonga Mundewa,
iyagolosa imbuli ino
dimanyike kulawa katali.
Kosoko iyo ulamusi wangu nowuno: Chinghawedase wanhu wa wamembe awakumubiduchila Mulungu.
Chiwawandikile baluwa wanghadiye fyakudiya vigumigwe wihi kwa kulafigwa kuwa filafwa ku sisanamu se milungu; waleke dihabwa, wanghadiye nyama yoyose iinyongigwe na wanghonywe sakame.
Kosoko simbuli sa Musa sendesihubiliwa mu chila isinagoti kwa kaya na kusomigwa mu masinagogi gose chila ijuwa dya sabato.

Watumigwa, wasehe na dikanisa dyose walamula kuwasagula wanhu wamonga mugati yawo na kuwatuma Andiyokiya hamwedu na Paulo na Balinaba. Kamei, howousagula Yuda iyakwinagwa kahi Balinaba, na Sila, wose wamanyikana lugano mugati ya wandugu.
Howowengha baluwa ino:
Aseye watumigwa na wasehe
wandugu senu chikuwalamusani
anyeye wandugu wa wamembe gengi
muwile ako Andiyokiya, Silia na Kilikia.
Chihulika fina wanhu wamonga kulawa kuno ukwetu wamidasani kwa simbuli sawo, wayiguma mimoyo yenu chiyangayanga. Ninga wagolosa bila kutumigwa na seye.
Chilamula hamwedu, chisagula wanhu wakefu na kuwatuma ukwenu hamwedu na wendigwa Balinaba na Paulo,
awene walafile uumi wawo kosoko ye disina dye Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Kosoko iyo chikumutuma Yuda na Sila ukwenu, awano wakwenda wawatamileni awenyecho agano gochiwandike.
Muhe Musunhile naseye chikifumilisa chinghamutwikeni musigo kusuma agano gawagile mugamanye.
Munghadiye fyakudiya filafigwe kusisanamu; na kunywa sakame, munghadiye nyama inyongigwe; na muleke dihabwa. Mokuwa mugolose fiswanu munghaleka kugolosa simbuli so. Chikuwalamusani.
Wakamale chilagigwa awo awatumigwe, howoluta ulwandi lwa Andiyokiya, kowenange mulundo wa wahuwile, howowengha ibaluwa iyo.
Wakaisoma iyo ibaluwa, simbuli sakwe hosiwaguma moyo, howokonela lugano.
Yuda na Sila awene wowile wagonesi, howosimulila na wandungu wawo kwakuwaguma moyo na kuwasindamika kwa ugele mutali.
Wakamale kwikala uko kwa chigele chiguhi, wandugu wa Andiyokiya howowelaga, wakuwahangingila dihewa, kamei howokuya kuway awawatumile.
Ninga Sila hakalamula kusigala.
Paulo na Balinaba howosigala uko Andiyokiya kwa ugele muguhi, howofusa na kuhubili imbuli ye Mundewa hamwedu na wanhu wamonga.
Gakaloke majuwa mengi, Paulo hoyomugamba Balinaba, Chuye chikawagendele awaya wandugu mu chila kaya kochahubili imbuli ye Mundewa chikakiyonele fowakugendelela.
Balinaba hoyohananga wamulonde na Yohana yakwinangwa Mlk o,
Ninga Paulo nghendile kumulonda Mlk o, imwene yawalekile akuya Pamfulia na Kulimu kihasa nawo mumilimo yawo.
Hoholawanisa muwango mukali mugati yawo, kwa nheifo howokitamanuka. Balinaba hoyomulonda Maluko, howokwila meli kuluta Kuplo.
Naye Paulo hoyomusagula Sila, awandugu wa baho wakamale kuweka mu udimi wa dihewa dya Mulungu, hoyoleuka.
Mu nhambo iyo hoyolokela Silia na Kilikia yakugemisa makanisa.
Paulo hoyofika Delbe na Lisitila, koyekalage Mkilisito yomonga yakwinaningwa Timoseyo. Ing'ina imwene yawile muKilisito nheifia, hakowa Muyahudi; ninga iBabakwe hakowa Muyunani.
Timoseo hakowa na itunyo ikulu ku mugati ya wandugu wa Lisitila na Ikonia.
Paulo hakahananga Timoseyo yakiyandamile naye munhamo, kosoko iyo hoyomwigala kwikumbi. Hakagosa nheifo kosoko ya Wayahudi wose awekale ulwandi wa ukuya hawamanya fina iBabakwe hakowa Muyunani.
Ugele fowende wogenda musikaya siya hawawengha wanhu agaya malagiso galafigwe na watumigwa na wasehe akuya Yelusalemu howowagamba wagakole.
Nheifo, agaya makanisa ahogokongeseka mudihuwi, na ihesabu ya wawahuile hoikongeseka chila ijuwa.
Howogenda ulwandi lwa Fulugia na Galatiya, Muhe Musunhile hakawalemes kuhubili imbuli iyo mu si isi sa Asia.
Wakafike kusimhaka sa Musia, howogesa kwingila ku si isi sa Bisinia, ninga Muhe wa Yesu hoyowalemesa.
Kamei, howolokela Musia howoluta mpaka Tulowa.
Ichilo chicho, Paulo hoyokona diono, hoyokona munhu yumonga wa Mekedonia kema baho yakumutasa Loka wije Makedonia uchitase.
Chimwande Paulo yakone diono didyo, hochikitayalisha kuluta Makedoni bila kusululuka, chihuwila fina Mulungu kachinanga chiwegalile imbuli swanu.
