Kulawa Tulowa hochikwila meli mpaka Samatilake, nosiku yakwe hochiguma nanga Neapoli.
Kulawa uko, hochiluta Filipi, kaya ya Wilaya ya kunghonga ya Makedonia, yene nheifia ni utawala wa Chilumi. Hochikwikala mukaya iyo majuwa makefu.
Dijuwa dye Sabato hochilawa kunje ye kaya hochiluta kunghingi ye lwanda, hachigamba nhegela hanhu ha kufugila. Hochikwikala, hochilonga na wanawake wakitang'anyila baho.

Mugati ya waya wachitegelesage hokowa baho mwanamuke yumonga yakumogoha Mulungu yakwinangwa Ludia, mukaya wa Tiatila yendeyogolosa uchulusi wa suke sa bafuta sa langi ya ndunghundunghu. Mulungu hoyougubula umoyo wakwe hoyogahokela agaya Paulo goyalongange.
Yakabatiswe mudala yuyu hamwedu ne nyumba yakwe, hoyochigoneka yakugamba, “Hona chawelu munyonile fina niye nikumuhuwila Mundewa, kalibuni ukaya ukwangu.” Hoyochidindilisa chilute.
Dijuwa dimonga fochalutage ahanhu ho kufugila, mundele yumonga yowile na dipepo dya kulagula hakatang'anyila nase. Mundele yowapatila wagoli wakwe fesa nyingi kwa kulagula kwakwe.
Kamei, yendeyomwandamila Paulo na seye, yakujoja na kugamba, “Awanhu ni watogomi we Mulungu Mukulu. Wakuwatamilani injila ya uhonyo.”
Hoyogolosa nheifo kwa majuwa mengi, dijuwa dimonga Paulo hakasuha, hoyomubiduchila nakugamba dipepo, Nikukugamba kwa disina dya Yesu Kilisito, mulawe yuno 1 Chiwande dipepo diya hodilawa.
Awagoli wa yuya mundele wakone fina dihuwi dyawo dyokupata sawo dihela, howowakola Paulo na Sila, howowabulumula mpaka kuwanhu, kumwande ya wakulu.
Howowasongesa kuwalamusi wakugamba, “Wanhu wano Wayahudi wakwigala fujo mukaya yetu.
Wakufusa mahokelo agene aseye chi wanhu we Chilumi chikulemesigwa kusihokela kahikusandamila.”
Ditewa dya wanhu hodikihasa nawo howowatowa.
Awaya watambiki howowadegela cha Paulo si suke sawo, howogamba watowigwe fiboko.
Wakamale kutowigwa lugano, howokwingisigwa kugati, na musilikali wa digelesa hoyotumigwa yaweke hasi ya uwimilisi mukali.
Kosoko ya malagiso gago, ayo musilikali howeka kuchumba cha kugati kuchaisi, che digelesa no kuyoha migulu yawo kusingoso.
Ninga muchilo mugati Paulo na Sila wende wowomba na kwimba nyimbo sa kumutunya Mulungu.
Chimwande, hukulawanisa itetemeko dye isi ikulu, dyasingise imisingi ya digelesa. Chimwande milango yose hoikumuka ne minyolo yawohile awafungwa waya hoikilekela.
Musilikali wedigelesa foyenuke yakona imilango yose yamwasi, hoyogamba nhagela awafungwa wose hawowa watijile, kosoko iyo hoyosomola dipanga dyakwe na kuhananga kikoma.
Ninga, Paulo hoyokwinanga kwa dijwi ikulu, Unghakikome gomwecho kosoko aseye chose chabahano.
Yakamale kumwinanga munhu yegale taa aye msilikali hoyobilimila kugati, hoyokugwa hasi ha migulu ya Paulo na Sila akuno yakutetema kwa chogoho.
Kamei hoyowalongosa kunje, hoyowosa, Wakulu nitende nhani noho nihone?
Awene howomubidula, Muhuwile Mundewa Yesu nagwe ukuhonyigwa na inyumba yako yose.
Kamei, howomuhubilia imbuli ye Mundewa imwene hamwedu ne inyumba yakwe.
Ayuya Msilikali hoyowalonda ugele uuya we chilo, hoyowasunha malonda gawo, kamei imwene ne inyumba yakwe howobatisigwa baho ni baho.
Hanyuma hoyowalonda Paulo na Sila kunyumba yakwe, hoyowengha chakudiya. Imwene ne inyumba yakwe yose howogolosa shelehe kosoko hambiya hawowa wamuhuwile Mulungu.
Nosiku yakwe nosikusiku Mahakimu howowatuma awakulu wa wasilikali awene wakugamba, “Walekeni awanhu waya.”
Ayuya musilikali wa digelesa hoyomutamila Paulo; Mahakimu watuma mbuli fina mudoholeligwe. Hambiya mukudaha kulawa na kuleuka kwa digoya.

Ninga Paulo hoyomubidula, Hawachitowa fiboko kumwande ya wanhu ugele seye cha wanhu wa selekali ya Chilumi. Kahi hawachiguma kugati hambiya wakuhananga wachilafe kwa chinyele. Hata chidodogi! Ikuwagila weje awene awecho bahano weje wachidoholele.
Awaya awakulu wa wasilikali howowatamila amahakimu imbuli iyo, nawo wakahulike fina Paulo na Sila ni wanhu wa Chilumi howokogoha.
Kwa nheifo huwoluta kutasa musamaha na wakamale kuwalafa kugati howowatasa waleuke mukaya iya.
Paulo na Sila howolawa mwigelesa, howoluta kunyumba ya Lidiya, uko howokiyona na wandugu awahuwile na wakafuluse kuwaguma moyo howoleuka.
Kwa kulokela Amufipoli na Apolonia, Paulo na Sila howoluta mpaka Sesalonike kowile na disinagogi dya Wayahudi
Paulo hoyokihasa nawo fina foyasowele, howolonga nawo sabato ndatu, yakutambula mawandiko gasunhile.
Hoyotamila fina haimwagila Masiya kusambasigwa na kwinuligwa kulawa kuwafile. Hoyowagamba, “Yesu imwene wo nikumuhubili ukwenu no Masiya.”
Wamonga wawo howofumila, howokihasa na Paulo na Sila. Nheifo, itewa ikulu dya Wayunani wamogohe Mulungu hamwedu na wanawake wengi wakulu wene fyeyo howokihasa nawo.

Ninga aWayahudi howokona wifu; howowaliha wanhu wehile sokoni, howogolosa chitewa na kwigala fujo ikaya yose. Howoingilila nyumba ya Yasoni, wakuhuwila kuwapata umo Paulo na Sila uleke wawalafe kuwanhu.
Ninga wasawapatile kosoko iyo howowabulumula Yasoni na wandugu wamonga mpaka kuwakulu we ikaya, wakujoja, Awanhu wano wendewobana ichilunga chose na hambiya wowa hano mukaya.
Yasoni kawakalibisha ukaya ukwakwe wose wakugolosa chinyume cha dilagiso dya Kaisali wakugamba Hati kwina Mundewa yungi yakwinangigwa Yesu
Kwa simbuli sisi howowaguma chiyangayanga awakulu we ikaya na ditewa dya wanhu.
Howowatenda Yasoni na wayagwe walafe amana, kamei howowalekela.
Nechilo awandugu howowadindilisa Paulo na Aila walute Beleya. Chimwande wakafike uko, howoluta kwi sinagogi dya Wayahudi.

Awanhu wa uko hawowa wategelesaji waswamu kusuma waya wa Tesaloniki. Howoihokela imbuli iya kwa kwenda mufidoga, howokuwa wakulangisa mawandiko masunhile chila ijuwa, uleke wamanye fina agaya gowakulonga Paulo na Sila ni chawelu.
Wengi wawo howohuwila kahi wanawake we Chiyunani wakulu wene fyeyo na wagosi nawo.
Ninga, Wayahudi wa Tesaloniki wakang'amuwe fina Paulo yendeyohubili imbuli ya Mulungu ako Belea, howoluta ako, howokonga kwigala fujo na kuwasongesa matewa ga wanhu.
Awaya awandugu howomusindikis achimwande mhwani; ninga Sila na Timoseyo howosigala Beleya.
Awaya awandugu awamusindikise Paulo howoluta naye mpaka Asene. Hanyuma, howokuya ne misigililo kuwa kwa Paulo fina Sila na Timoseyo wamwandamile chimwande foikudahika.
Paulo foyawagojage Sila na Timoseo ako Asene, moyo wakwe houchukisigwa yakone ikaya iyo na sanamu sa milungu.
Awanga na Wayahudi na wanhu wamonga wendewomogoha Mulungu mumasinagogi; na chila ijuwa yende yowanga nawo sokoni hamwedu na wose waya awakisololose.

Wamonga awandamilage falisafa ya Epikuwo na Sitoiki howowanga naye. Wamonga howogamba, “Yakuhananga kulonga choni ayuno chilongelonge? Kosoko Paulo yendeyohubili muchanya ya Yesu na kwinuligwa kulawa mudifa, wamonga howogamba Ikonela fina yakuhubili muchanya ya milungu ya chigeni.”
Kwa nheifo howomulonda Paulo, howomwigala Aleopago, howogamba Chikuhananga uchitamile imbuli ino nyisha yowende ulonga.
Finhu fimonga fochihulike na singhutwi setu fikoneka kifan figeni ukwetu. Chikuhananga chimanye simbuli sina maloloso gaki.
Awakaya wa Asene na wamonga wakalage uko wendewolonda ugele wose kwa kitamila na kutegelesa mbuli nyisha nyisha.
Kamei Paulo hoyokwima mugatigati ya Aleopago, hoyogamba Wakaya wa Asene! Nikona fina anyeye kwa fyu fyuse, ni wanhu wa dini lugano.
Kosoko mukugendagenda kwangu nilanga si sinamu sa sinhambiko senu nifika masabahu iwandikigwe kwa Mulungu inghamanyike Hambiya, ayo yomukutambichila bila kumumanya, ukwenu.
Mulungu yombile iisi na fyose fyuwile umo ni Mundewa wa Ulanga na iisi. Imwene nghakwikala musinyumba sijengigwe na wanhu.
Kahi ghakutogomeligwa kwa mikono ya wanhu, kifana yakuhananga chochose chiya, kosoko imwene noyakuwengha wanhu uumi, yakuwadahisa kukeha na kuwengha chila chinhu.
Kulawa kwa munhu yumwedu, komba mataifa gose na kugadahisa kwikala muisi yose. Yalamula na kupanga katali lugano milaki na hoki mataifa gago gekale.
Hakagolosa nheifo uleke amataifa gago gamuhanange, hata fina kwa kwalabata kwalabata, uleke wamufikile. Hata nheifo Mulungu nghe hatali nase;
fina foyalongile munhu yumonga
Mugati yakwe aseye chikala womi.
Fina yumonga wenu yakutunga mashaili,
foyalongile, kosoko Ase chose cha cheleko chakwe
Honanga seye chi wana wa Mulungu isichagile kugamba Mulungu kakifana sahabu ama fesa ama iwe, finhu fisongoligwe kwa ufundi we mwanadamu.
Ugele uya wa ubwalasi Mulungu hakakitenda kifana nghakugona; ninga hambiya yakuwalagisa wanhu wose wa chila hanhu walambe.
Kosoko kekala ijuwa doyakayowaliganisa wanhu we chilunga chose kwa chawelu, kwa imunhu yuya woyamusagule; naye kawengha wanhu wose dihuwi dye imbuli iyo kwa kumwinula kuwa kuwafile.
Baho, wakahulike muchanhya ya wanhu kuinuligwa kulawa kuwafile, wamonga howokwigala utani; wamonga howogamba, “Chokuhulika ku imbuli iyo.”
Kamei nheifi, Paulo hoyoleuka hoyowaleka.
Wamonga howokiyandamila naye, howohuwila mu wawo, hakowa umo Dionesio, Mwaleopago, na mwanamuke yumonga disina dyakwe Damali, na wanhu wengi hamwedu nawawo.
Ago gakahole, Paulo hoyoleuka Asene, hoyoluta Kolindo.

Ako Kolindo hoyomufika Muyahudi yumonga yekwinangwa Akula hamwedu na muke yekwinangwa Plisila, hawo wowile kulawa Stalia majuwa gago kosoko Kaisali Kilaudio hokowa yagambile Wayahudi wose waleuke Loma. Paulo hakaluta kuwona,
na kosoko awene wowile mafundi wakusoma mahema fina imwene.
Chila Sabato hakalongaga nawo mwisinagogi, na kugesa kuwakwega Wayahudi na Wayunani.
Wakeje Sila na Timoseyo kulawa Mekodoniya, Paulo hoyohananga kutumia ugele wakwe wose kuhubili, hoyowatamila chawelu fina Yesu no Masiya.

Wakakonge kuwanga naye na kukonga kumuliga, hoyolonda dikoti dyakwe hoyokonga kudikung'unha kumwande yawo yakugamba, “Munghagilila ni kosoko yenu muwecho; aniye nechaka uwihi wowose muchanhya ye imbuli ino. Kulawa hambiya nikuwalutila wanhu wa mataifa gengi.”
Kamei, hoyoleuka aho hoyuluta kwikala na munhu yumonga yakumogoha Mulungu yekwinangigwa Tito Yusito. Inyumba ya Tito hayuwa habehi na disinagogi diya.
Ninga, Kilisipo imukulu we disinagogi, hoyomwihuwila Mundewa imwene na wanhu wakwe wose.
Dijuwa dimonga nechilo Mundewa hoyomugamba Paulo mumagubulo, Unghogohe, gendelela kuhubili du bila kufa moyo,
kosoko niye nahamwedu nagwe. Hachaka munhu yakwenda yagese kukutowa kahikukubulage kosoko hano mukaya hena wanhu wengi wuwile ulwandi ulwangu.
Kamei, Paulo hoyokwikala uko yakufusa imbuli ya Mulungu mugati yawo kwa mwaka umwedu na nusu.
Ninga Galiyo yakowe mukulu wa Wilaya ya Akaya, Wayahudi howokihasa hamwedu howomukola Paulo kwa ludole na kumwigala kumahakama.
Howogamba, “Chimusongese munhu yuno, kosoko yakusongesa wanhu wamufuge Mulungu kwa namuna ikupingana na malagiso.”
Ugele Paulo nghenati yakonge kulonga, Galiyo hoyowatamila Wayahudi, Hulikiseni anye Wayahudi Hona imbuli ino chawelu yowile muchanhya ya ubanaji ama uwihi hanuwa tayali kuwahulikisani.
Ninga wonaga ni kuwanga du muchanhya ya masina na malagiso genu mulamule anyeye muwecho. Aniye sikuhananga kuwa mulamusi wa simbuli sino!
Hoyowawinga kulawa kumahakama.
Nawo wose howomukola Sositene yowile chilongosi we disinagogi howomutowa baho hamahakama. Ninga Galiyo nghonile imbuli iyo kuwa chinhu, hata chidodogi.

Paulo hogendelela kwichila ako Kolindo na wandugu waya kwa majuwa mengi. Hanyuma, hoyochilaga, hoyakwila meli kuluta Silia hamwedu na Plisila na Akula. Ako Kenkileya, hoyogeta sinjwili sakwe kosoko ye chilaho yoyekile.
Howofika Efeso na baho Paulo hoyowaleka Pilisila na Akila, hoyoluta kwi sinagogi, howanga na Wayahudi.
Howomutasa yekale nawo ugele mutali lugano, lakini nghendile.
Nanga, foyaleukage, hoyogamba, “Mulungu yanghenda hokwija ukwenu kahi.” Hoyoleuka Efeso kwa meli.
Meli hoiguma nanga, Kaisalia naye Paulo huyoluta Yelusalemu kudilamusa dikanisa, hanyuma hoyoluta Andiyokiya.
Hoyokwikala uko ugele muguhi kamei hoyogendelela na inhambo ya kwa kulokela ulwandi lwa Galatiya na Fulugiya yakuma moyo awefusa wose.
Muyahudi yumonga iyakwinangwa Apolo, yelekeligwe Alekisandilia, hoyofika Efeso. Hakowa munhu yena udaha wa kulonga na yena umanyi mwingi wa maandiko Gasunhile.
Hakowa yafusigwe injila iyo ya Mundewa, na hoyokuwa na motomoto, hoyosimulila muchanhya ya simbuli sa Yesu. Hoyofusa kwa chawelu hata ingawa yapatile ubatiso wa Yohana du.
Plisila na Akila wakamuhulike yakulonga kwa chawelu kugati ya disinagogi, howomulonda ukwawo howomufusa iyo injila ya Mulungu fiswanu lugano.

Apolo yakalamule kuluta Akaya, awaya wandugu howomuguma moyo kwa kuwawandichila awefusa wa Akaya wamuhokele. Yakafike uko hoyodaha kwa udaha wa dihewa dya Mulungu, kuwatasa lugano awaya awandugu awahuwile;
kosoko hakagendelela kwa udaha wakwe kuwasuma Wayahudi kumwande ya wanhu fina chawelu kwa Mawandiko Masunhile fina Yesu ni Masiya.
Ugele Apolo foyowile Kolindo, Paulo yakaloke si isi sa kuchanhya, hoyofika Efeso na uko hoyowafika wefusa wengi.
Hoyokusa, Togoleni, fomwahuwile hamuhokela Muhe Musunhile? Ng'o, hata kuhulika fina kwina Muhe Musunhile chisinati chihulike.
Naye hoyogamba, “Hambiya hamupata ubatiso wa namuna yaki? Howobidula Ubatiso wa Yohana.”
Naye Paulo hoyogamba, “Ubatiso wa Yohana hauwa wakonesa fina wanhu walambe. Yohana hakawagamba wanhu wamuhuwile ayuya imwene yakwija kunyuma yakwe, nong'amba Yesu.”
Wakahulike gago, howobatisigwa kwa disina dye Mundewa Yesu.
Kamei, Paulo hoyowekila mikono, Muhe Musunhile hoyowahumulukila, howokonga kulonga kwa nonga sa hayo hayo na kulafa ugonesi.
Wose hamwedu hawafika wanhu ikumi na weli.
Kwa ugele wa minyesi midatu Paulo yendeyoluta ku disinagoti hoyokuwa na ugele wa kulonga hamwedu nawo na kuwakwega muchanhya ya utawala wa Mulungu.

Ninga wamonga howokuwa wafudutu, howolema kuhuwila, howokonga kulonga fibi muchanhya ye injila ye Mundewa. Baho Paulo hoyokileka nawo, hoyowalonda hanghanda awaya awefusa wakwe, howosimulila nawo chila ijuwa munijuma dya masomo dya Tulano.
Hoyogendelela kugolosa nheifo kwa minyaka mili, wose wakwila Asia, Wayahudi na wanhu wa Mataifa gengi howodaha kuhulika imbuli ye Mundewa.
Mulungu hoyogolosa majumo ga kisina kwa mukono wa Paulo.
Wanhu wendewolonda ifitambala na sisuke simonga isene se milimo soyatumiye Paulo, howosigala kuwatamu, nawo howohonywa sinamu sawo; na waya wowile na simhepo sihile, howolawigwa na simhepo siso.

Wayahudi wengi wende wolafa simhepo sihile, howaluta ako nako wakugosa kuditumia disina dye Mundewa Yesu ku waya wengiligwa na si mhepo sihile. Wendewogamba Nikulonga kwa disina dya Yesu imwene woyahubili Paulo.
Wana mufungate wa Sekewe, kuhani Mukulu wa Chiyahudi, hawa mu wawo wagolosage nheifo.
Ninga dipepo dihile hodiwabidula, Nimumanya Yesu, nimumanya naye Paulo, ninga anye mwa cha nani?
Kamei ayuya munhu yowile na dipepo hoyowafumhila kwa ching'undi, hoyowashinda uludole. Na wawo awana wa Sikewe howotija kulawa munyumba iya wemwasi na wena malonda.
Kila munhu ako Efeso, Muyahudi na asiye Muyahudi, hoyohulika muchanhya ye ichituko chicho. Wose howokwingiligwa na itiso, howoditunya disina dya disina dya Bwana Yesu.
Wahuwile wengi howokisololosa kumwande ya wanhu na kulamba sinhenda sowatendile.
Wamonga howowa wakutumikia simbuli sa uhayi uko kunghonga, howokonghola ifitabu fyawo, howofisoma kumwande ya wanhu wose. Howoliganisa ibei ye fitabu fifyo, howokona ikudaha kuwa figulu fishano.
Kwa nheifo, imbuli ye Mundewa hoikongeseka na kuwa udaha lugano.
Simbuliso, sikahele, Paulo hoyolamula kuluta Yelusalemu kwa kulokela Makedonia na Akaya. Hoyogamba, “Ninghamala kufika uko kunyagila nifike na Lumi nheifiya.”
Kwa nheifo hoyowatuma weli wa watasi wakwe, Timoseyo na Elasito, wamulongolele kuluta Makedoniya naye hoyosigala kwa chipisi chidodogi ako Asiya.
Ugele wuwo noho kwalawanise mugogolo mukulu ago Efeso kosoko ya iyo injila ye Mundewa.

Hakuwa na munhu yakugolosa fesa, disina dyakwe Demetelio, hakowa na milimo ya kugolosa sanamu sa nyumba ya Mulungu wa chike yakwinangwa Alitemi. Umulimo uwo wende umwigalila Demetilio na wanhu wakwe we milimo faida nghulu.
Demetilio hoyowakonghola awo awakugosa milimo u kwakwe, hamweu na wamonga wowile ne milimo fina iyo, hoyowagamba, “Wakaya mumanya fina isawo yetu ikulawa mu uchulusi uno.

Hambiya, mukudaha kuhulika na kona anyeye muwecho simbuli soyakugolosa Paulo, si hano du Efeso ninga na kose Asia Imwene kawashawishi na kuwabidula wanhu wafumile fina milungu iya iigolosigwe na wanhu si milungu hata chidodogi.

Kwa nheifo kuna hatali ibiyashala yetu ikwende yuwe na isina dihile. Si nheifo du ila imbuli yo ikudaha kuigolosa imyumba ya Alitemi kuwa si chinhu cha itunyo. Kundumo yakwe ayo imwene ditunyo dyakwe dyenela mu Asia ne chilunga chose chikumutambichila dikuhela.”
Wakahulike gago, howokola nyono, howokonga kujoja: Mukulu ni Alitemi wa Efeso!
Ikaya yose hoimema mugogolo. Howomulonda Gayo na Alistaliko mukaya wa Makedonia, awowile wasafili wayagwe na Paulo, howotija nawo mpaka kunyuma ye miseigo.
Paulo imwecho hoyohananga kiingisa muditewa diya, ninga awaya awahuwile howomulemesa.
Wamonga wa wakulu Asia, awowile wambuya sakwe howotuma wanhu ukwakwe wamutase fina yanghakiingise kuchiwanja che miseigo.
Ugele uwo chila munhu yendeyolonga sakwe, ayu yakulonga nhafi, ayu yakulonga nhafi, umulunfo uya houfulugika, hata wanhu wengi wasamanyile hata isoko yo kitang'anjila kwawo.
Kosoko Awayahudi hawamutenda Alekisanda yachilafanise, wamonga wa wanhu mumulundo uya hawamanya no mwene. Kamei Alekisanda hoyowenulila mukono uleke yakitetee kumwande ya wanhu waya awengi.
Ninga wakatange fina imwene ni Muyahudi, wose kwa hamwedu howojoja, “Mukulu ni Alitemi wa Efeso!” Howogendelela kujoja nheifo kwa masaa meli.

Hanyuma yakwe kalani we ikaya hoyowanyamasa, hoyowagamba, “Wakaya wa Efeso,” chila munhu kamanya fina ikaya ino ya Efeso ni mwimilise we nyumba ya mulungu Alitemi na mwimilisi wa iya isanamu yalagale kulawa kulanga.
Hachaka yakudaha kukana simbuli sino. Kosoko iyo, mutulie. Munghagolose chochose kwa chimwandemwande.
Muwenanga awanhu wano ahano wasitofule inyumba ya mulungu kahikumuliga mulungu wetu we chike.
Honaga Demetilio na awanhu wakugolosa milimo ukwakwe wena mashitaka gawo ku wanhu wano, sabaho si mahakama na wakulu we iisi; wakishitake uko.
Hona mwina mbuli singi sigaleni ku fikalo fye halali.
Kosoko chikudaha kushitakigwa kosoko ya mugogolo uno wa diyelo, uwene usina sababu, mu mbuli ino chisikudaha kulonga mbuli ikwigutisa
Yakamale kulonga siso hoyofunga mulundo.
Umugogolo uya wa Efeso ukatuliye, Paulo hoyowenanga hamwedu awaya wahuwile, hoyowaguma moyo. Kamei hoyowelaga, hoyotamba kuluta Makedonia.
Hoyolokela mu lwandi lwa isi siya yakuwaguma moyo kwa mbuli nyingi. Hanyuma hoyofika Uyunani.
Koyekale kwa minyesi midatu. Foyendeyokitayalisha kuluta Silia, hoyomabya fina Wayahudi wende womupangila mbuli ihile; kosoko iyo hoyokuya kwakulokela Makedonia.
Sopatilo mwana wa Pilo kulawa Beleya, hoyokiyandamila naye, na Alistaliko na Sekundo kulawa Sesalonike, Gayo kulawa Delbe, Timoseyo, Tukiko na Tulofomo wa isi ya Asia.
Awo howolongola na kuchigojela ukuya Tulowa.
Aseye, dikahele dijuwa dye dikukuu ye mikate isigumigwe nungo, nochipanda meli kulawa Filipi gakaloke majuwa madatu hachiwawafichila akuya Tulowa. Ako hochikwikala chipisi cha ijuma dimwedu.
Mwijuwa dye nghonga dye dijuma, hochikitang'anyila kukumega mukate. Kosoko Paulo yendeyohananga yaleuke nhosiku yakwe, hoyolonga na wanhu, hoyogendelela kusimulila mpaka muchilo mugati.
Muchumba mochowile, mwigolofa, hamuwa na taa nyingi sikwaka.

Mwanike yumonga yekwinangwa Eutiko hekekala hedilisha ugele Paulo foyagendelelelage kulonga, Eutiko hoyokonga kusisila chidochido hanyuma sonhongo hosimukola, hoyukugwa hasi kulawa mwi golofa dya kadatu. Howomudondola kafulusa kufa.
Ninga Paulo hoyohulumuka hasi, hoyofunamana, hoyomusungulusila imikono yakwe ayuya imwanike yafile, hoyogamba, “Munghowe na manhonghe kosoko kwina uwumi ukali kugati yakwe.”
Kamei, hoyokwila kahi kugolofa, hoyomega mukate, hoyodiya. Hoyogendelela kuhubili kwa muda mutali mpaka nhosikusiku, kamei hoyoleuka.
Awaya wanhu howomulonda mwanike yuya ukaya ni mumi kabisa, howopata falaja nghulu.
Aseye hochikwila meli, hochilongola kuluta Aso, kochamanyile chomulonda Paulo. Nofyo yapangile, kosoko hakahona kufika uko kwa kulokela kuisi kwa migulu.
Kamei, hoyochifika uko Aso, hochimukwisa mumeli, hochiluta Mitilene.
Hochileuka ne meli kulawa uko, dijuwa dya keli yakwe hochifika Kio. Dijuwa dya keli yakwe hochikwima Samo, na nhosiku yakwe hochifika Mileto.
Paulo hakahananga kugendelela ne inhambo kwa meli bila kulokela Efeso, uleke yanghachelewe ako Asia. Hakuwa na chimwande cha kufika Yelusalemu ku sikukuu ye Pendekosite inghadahika.
Kulawa Mileto Paulo hoyotuma mbuli kuwasehe wa Efeso wakitang'anyila naye.
Wakafike ukwakwe hoyowagamba, “Mumanya fina nitumiye ugele wose hamwedu naye kulawa dijuwa diya dye kunghonga dyo nengile Asia.
Mumanya fyene fyonimutogomele Mulungu kwa unyekefu wose, kwa masosi ne makugutu ganipatile kulawa mu mipango na si hila sa Wayahudi.
Mumanya fina sogohe hata chidodogi kuwahubilia kumwande ya wanhu wose na musinyuma senu na kuwafusa chochose ichene chikudaha kuwataseni.
Niwasugula wose Wayahudi, nheifo na wanhu wa wamembe gengi, wamubidukile Mulungu na kumuhuwila Mundewa wetu Yesu.
“Hambiya, hulikiseni! Aniye kosoko nikumuhulika Muhe, nikuluta Yelusalemu bila kumanya aganipata uko.
Chonimanyile du nifina Muhe Musunile yakunitamila chawelu mu chila kaya fina fifungo na magayo fikunigojela.
Ninga, sikona fina uwumi wangu ni chinhu lugano ukwangu muladi nimemelese kutumigwa kwangu na kumala umulimo uya woyaninghile Mundewa niugolose, wokuhubili imbuli swanu ye dihewa dya Mulungu.
“Nendenigenda ako nako muchiligati yenu nikuhubili utawala wa Mulungu. Hambiya, ninga, hachaka hata yumwedu wenu yakwenda yanyone kahi.
Kwa nheifo diyelo dino nikumutamilani chawelu chawelu, fina inghowa yumwedu wenu yanghagilila, aniye sina wihi wowose kusakame ye munhu yuyo.
Kosoko sogohe hata chidodogi kuwatangasila Mulungu foyalongile.
“Muchilangilile muwecho; mudidime ditewa diya idyene Muhe Musunhile hamwikani anyeye mudimise. Didimeni dikanisa dya Mulungu adyene dyoyakipatile kwa sakame ye Mwanagwe.
Nimanya fiswanu lugano fina aniye fonikuleuka, mausi makali gamwingilani na wachaka ubasi kuditewa didyo.
Hata kulawa mugati yenu wakwenda walawanise wanhu awene wakwenda walonge mbuli sa udasi na maganisa wanhu na kuwagolosa wawandamile awene du.
Kosoko iyo, muwe meso, mukugelegela kwa minyaka midatu, chilo nemisi, sisokile kumufusani chila yumwedu wenu.
“Hambiya nikumulekani mu mikono ya Mulungu ne imbuli ye dihewa dyakwe. Kenawo udaha wokuwajenga nyeye na kuwadahisa musipate asiya simboto soyawekile wanhu wakwe.
Aniye sitamani fesa, kahisahabu, kahisuke sa munhu.
Anye muwecho mumanye fina imikono yangu ino itumika ku mahitaji gangu na gawaya wowile hamwedu na niye.
Kwa njila sose niwonesani fina kwa kugolosa imilimo nheifino yawagila kuwasa wechaka ludole, na kugelegela simbuli se Mundewa Yesu imwecho: ‘Ibeka kulafa, kwina chinyemi kusuma kuhokela!’”
Yakamale kulong nheifo, Paulo hoyofugama hamwedu nawo wose, hoyowomba.
Wose wendewolila: Howomusungulusila mikono yawo howomwilaga kwa kumunonela howomukumbatila.
Imbuli yawenghile usungu lugano hayuwa yoyalongile fina wasikwenda wamone kahi. Kamei, howomusindikisa mpaka kumeli.
Chikamale kilaga nawo, hochikwila meli hochiluta bila kwingila hamonga mpaka kosi; Nhosiku yakwe hochifika Lodo na kulawa uko hochiluta Patala.
Uko hochifika meli ikuluta Foinike, nheifo hochikwila, hochisafili.
Chakafike ahanhu ahene chikudaha kuyona Kuplo, hochogendela ulwandi lwakwe lwa kwekulu hochiluta Silia. Hochiguma nanga mukaya ya Tilo ahene imeli iya hayuwa ihulumisigwe misigo yakwe.
Hochikitang'anyila na wahuwile uko, hochikwikala hamwedu nawo kwa ijuma dimwedu. Awahuwile wawo wakulonga kwa udaha wa Muhe, howomugamba Paulo unghalute Yelusalemu.
Ninga, ugele wetu ukahele hochileuka, chose hamwedu na wanawake na wana wawo, howochisindikisa mpaka kunje ye ikaya. Chikafike mhwani chose hochifugama chochiwomba.
Kamei, hochichilaga; aseye hochikwila meli; awene nawo howokuya ukwawo.
Aseye hochigendelela ne nhambo yetu kulawa Tilo hochifika Tolemai, ahene hochawalamuse awandugu setu, hochikwikala nawo ijuwa dimwedu.
Nhosiku yakwe hochileuka hochiluta Kaisalia. Ako Kaisalia hochiluta ukaya kwa muhubili Filipo. Aye hakowa yumwedu wa waya mufungate wasaguligwe Yelusalemu.
Hakowa na wana wadatu, we chike, awene wowowile ne chinghwa che ugonesi.
Chikekale uko majuwa mengi, mugonesi yumonga yekwinangwa Agabo, hoyofika kulawa Uyahudi.

Hoyochijila hoyolonda mukanda ya Paulo hoyokiyoha mumikono na mumigulu, hoyogamba, “Muhe Musunhile yakugamba nhafi: ‘Awayahudi kuya Yelusalemu wakamoha fina nheifino imunhu mwenye mukanda uno na kumulaguma mumikono ya wanhu wamembe!’”
Chikahulike nheifo aseye na waya wamonga wowile baho hochimukongelesa Paulo yanghalute Yelusalemu.
Ninga imwene hoyobidula, Mukuhanga kutenda nhani? Natayali si kugumigwa kugati du akuya Yelusalemu, ninga hata kufa kosoko ye Mundewa Yesu.
Chikalemeligwe kumukongelesa hochinyamala na kugamba du, Foyakwenda Mulungu figoloseke.
Chikekale bahaya kwa ugele muguhi, hochikoha misigo yetu hochigendelela ne nhambo kuluta Yelusalemu.
Wamonga mugati ya waya wefusa wa Kaisalia hochilutanya, howochigala kunyumba ya Mnasoni mukaya wa Kupulo na hakowa mwifusa kwa majuwa mengi.
Chikafike Yelusalemu, wandugu wahuwile hawachihokela fiswanu lugano.
Nosiku yakwe Paulo hachilutanya kumulamusa Yakobo, na wasehe wose wa dikanisa hawowa uko nheifia.
Yakamale kulamusa Paulo hoyowatamila chikamilifu simbuli Mulungu so soyagolose muchiligati ya wamembe kwa njila ya utumishi wakwe.
Wakahulike gago howomutunya Mulungu. Kamei, howomutamila Paulo ukudaha kona fina hambiya kwina figulu fingi fya Wayahudi awene hambiya wahuwile na wose wawo wakola fiswanu malagiso ga Musa.
Wahulika simbuli sako fina ukuwafusa Wayahudi wakwikala na wamembe gengi fina wanghawegale kwikumbi wana wawo kahiwanghandamile mila sa Wayahudi.
Hambiya, yokuwa nhani? Hachaka chifiso wakuhulika fina kufulusa kufika hano.
Hambiya, ugolose fochikukutamila. Chenawo hano wanhu wane awene wekile chilaho.

Kihase nawo mu nhambiko yo kitakasa, ukalihe na diyombe dikuhanangigwa, kamei wagetigwe si njwili sawo. Kwa nheifo wanhu wose wakwenda wamanye fina simbuli siya sowatamiligwe muchanhya yako sachaka musingi wowose, na fina agweye gomwecho ukuishi na kwandamila shelia na malagiso ga Musa.

Ku awa awanhu wa wamembe gengi awejile awahuwile, chifulusa kuwegalila baluwa chikuwatamila simbuli sochilamule: Wanghadiye chochose chitambikiligwe milungu ya udasi, wanghanywe sakame, wanghadiye nyama ya inyama inyongigwe na waleke dihabwa.

Kamei, nhosiku yakwe Paulo hoyowalonda waya wanhu hoyogolosa nhambiko hamwedu nawo, kamei hoyokwingila kwi Hekalu hoyolonga muchanya yo kumala majuwa go kitakasa na sabihu ikuhanangigwa ilafigwe kwa chila yumwedu wawo.
Ugele amajuwa go mufungate gokowe habehi kuhela, Wayahudi walawile ku isi ya Asia hawamwona Paulo mwihekalu. Howosongesa nyono muditewa dyose dya wanhu, howomukola,

howojoja Wakaya wa Isilaeli, taseni, taseni! Ayuno noyuya munhu yakufusa wanhu chila hanhu simbuli sikupinga wanhu wa Isilaelii, sikupinga malagiso ga Musa na ahanhu hano hasunhile. Hata hambiya kawengisa wanhu wa wamembe gengi Mwihekalu na kahaguma uchafu ahanhu hano hasunhile.
Isoko yakulonga nheifo ni kosoko hawamona Tulofimo mukaya wa Efeso hamwedu na Paulo mukaya, howogambe nhegela Paulo hakamwigisa mwihekalu.
Ikaya yose hoyikwenela mugogolo, wanhu howokwija kulawa chila ulwandi lwe ikaya, howomukola Paulo, howomubulumula howomulafa kunje ye dihekalu, baho ni baho imilango ya Dihekalu hoyihindigwa.
Howowa tayali kumukoma, ninga simbuli so hosimufichila imukulu wa dijeshi we Loma fina Yelusalemu yose imema mugogolo.
Chimwande imukulu wa jeshi hoyowalonda wasilikali na cholongosi wa wasilikali igana, hoyodifikila diya ditewa dya wanhu. Nawo wakone ukulu wa dijeshi na wasilikali, howoleka kumutowa Paulo.
Imukulu wa dijeshi hoyomulutila Paulo na kumukola na kulagisa yohigwe minyolo mili. Kamei hoyokusa, Ni munhu waki yuno, na katenda choni?
Wamonga mwitewa diya wende walabwata chinhu chino na wamonga chinhu chingi. Kosoko ye mugogolo uwo, hoyodaha kumanya ichotoko checho. Nheifo hoyowatuma wanhu wakwe wamwigale Paulo kugati ye ngome.
Paulo yakafike mungasi, wasilikali haiwagela kumwinula kosoko yo umugogolo wa wanhu.
Kosoko itewa ikulu dya wendewokwandamila wakujoja Mukomeni, yakaleuke!
Ugele fowendewomwingisa mungome, Paulo hoyomutasa imukulu wa dijeshi yakugamba, “Nikudaha kukutamila chinhu? Ayuya imukulu wa dijeshi hoyomusa Kudaha Chiyunani?
Agweye si yuya Mumisi imwene majusi hano hakegala kasi na kuwalongosa wakomaji figulu fine mpaka kunyika?
Paulo hoyobidula, Aniye na Muyahudi; nelekeligwa Talso ku isi ya Kilikia, anie na laia wa kaya ikuheshimiwa. Dede, nileke nilonge na wanhu.
Ayuya imukulu wa dijeshi hoyomuleka yalonge, kwa nheifo Paulo hoyokwima mu ngasi, hoyowenulila mikono awaya awanhu wakanyamale posi, hoyokonga kulonga nawo kwa Chiebulaniya.
“Wandugusangu na waBabasangu, munitegelese fonikilongela kumwande yenu.”
Wakahulike yakulonga nawo kwa Chiebulaniya hawagendelela kunyamala posi kusuma kunghonga. Kamei hakawagamba;

Aniye na Muyahudi, nyelekigwa Talso akuya Kilikiya, ninga nikulila mukaya iyino na kufusigwa ne Mufusa Gamaliyeli honifusigwa na kumanya lugano amalagiso ga waBabasetu, na chilafa lugano kwe Mulungu fina nyeye mose diyelo.
Honiwedasa kahi kuwakoma awaya awandamilage Injila ino, na kuwoha na kuwegala kumagelesa wagosi na wanawake.

Ifene fowakuhomelela makuhani na dibalasa dyose dya wasehe. Kulawa ukwawo honikwinghigwa ibaluwa kuwandugu waya honiluta mpaka Damesiki kuwalonda awaya awowile uko mpaka Yelusalemu wohigwe, uleke waliganiswe.
“Honikonga inhambo yangu, nikasegele habehi na Damesiki, saa ya mutandatu nehemisi, honikona ujelu mukulu lugano kulawa kulanga unisunguluta kosekose.
Honikugwa hasi, honihulika ijwi dikugamba, ‘Sauli, Sauli, nhani ukunyidasa?’
Honibidula, ‘Gwegwe nani Mundewa?’ Hoyonigamba, ‘Aniye no ni Yesu wa Nasaleti, woukwidasa.’
Hambiya awaya awowile hamwedu naniye, hawawona ujelu du ninga dijwi diya wasadihulike dya yuya yalongage naniye.
Hoyogamba, ‘Nitende nhani Mundewa?’ iMundewa hoyonigamba, ‘Inuka ulute Damesiki na uko ukweda utamiligwe gose agekigwe kosoko yako ugagolose.’
Nikowe sikudaha kona kosoko ya ukali wa ujelu uya wonyonile, honilongosigwa kwa kukoligwa mukono na waya awowile hamwedu naniye hochikwingila Damesiki.
Uko hakuwa na munhu yakwinangigwa Ananiya, munhu yakumogoha Mulungu, yakwandamila malagiso getu, imwene yuyo hakowa munhu muswanu hakendigwa naWayahudi wose awekale uko,
hoyonijila hoyokwima habehi na niye, hoyonigamba, ‘Mundugusangu Sauli, hokela kona kwako na disaa didyo ameso gangu hogogubuka honikona.’
“Hoyogamba, ‘I Mulungu wa waBaba setu kakusagula agweye umanye inyenda yakwe, kumwona imutogomi wakwe yaliganile na kumuhulika imwene imwenecho yakulonga kwa mulomo wakwe;
kosoko ukuwa muhomelesi wakwe kuwanhu wose muchanhya ya gowonile na go uhulike.
Hambiya ukugoja choni? Inuka ubatisigwe, usunhwe uwihi wako kwa kwinanga disina dyakwe.’”
“Nikoye Yelusalemu ugele nikutasa mwihekalu, hanyona majumo, honimona yakulonga naniye,
Golosa chimwande uleuke Yelusalemu, kosoko wasikwenda wakuhulike uhomelesi wako muchanhya yangu.
Kamei hanigamba, ‘Mundewa, awene awenecho wamanya fina chila isinagogi haniwoha na kuwaguma mwigelesa awaya awakuhuwile,
na ugele isakame ya Sitefano imuhomelesi wako foyalafigwe, ani nayi hanyuwa nyimile baho, nikufumila, inghomigwa yakwe, na kulekeligwa sisuke sa waya wamukomage.’
“Hoyonigamba, ‘Leuka; kosoko nikukwigala kutali ku wamembe.’”
Kulawa kunghonga mpaka imbuli ino hawamutegelesa; kamei howekwinula amajwi gawo na kugamba, “Muleuse muchilunga! Kosoko nghagile kuwa mumi!”
Hawagendelele kujoja na kwinula sisuke na kutimula diluli muchanhya,
imukulu wa wasilikali wose hakalagisa wamukole Paulo wamwigale kwikigo kugati na kumujola mikotya uleke wamanye isoko iikuleka awanhu wakumujojoweka nheifo.
Ninga hawamoha ne mikowa ye singhingo, Paulo hoyolonga na mukulu we chitewa cha wasilikali igana dimwedu iyemila habehi naye, “Togola ikudahika kumujola imunhu iMulumi ugele nghenati yaliganiswe?”
Ugele ayuya imukulu we ichitewa cha wasilikali wose, hoyomugamba, “Mukuhananga mugolose choni? Kosoko imunhu yuno ni Mulumi.”
Kosoko iyo imukulu wa wasilikali wose, hakeja na kumusa, “Nitamile agwe kwa Mulumi?” Hakagamba, “Heye.”
Imukulu wa wasilikali wose hakabidula, “Aniye nigula Ulumi kwa mapesa mengi.” Paulo hakagamba, “Aniye nyelekigwa Mulumi,”
Kosoko iyo awaya awanhu awahanangage wamusilise hawatimuka wose chimwandemwande; ayuya imukulu wa wasilikali wose naye hakogoha, kosoko hakatanga fina iPaulo hakowa Mulumi naye fina hakamoha.
Ninga ikowe nhosikusiku uleke yamanye ichalekile Wayahudi wamusongesa, hakamudohola, na kulagisa makuhani wakulu na dibalasa dyose wakitanganyile, hoyomwigala Paulo, hoyomwika kumwande yawo.
Paulo hoyowang'olela meso awaya awadibalasa, kamei hoyokonga kulonga, “Mpaka diyelo nafi nigendelela kwikala na moyo muswamu kumwande ye Mulungu.”
Baho iMutambiki mukulu Anania hoyowalonga awaya awemile habehi na Paulo wamutowe kofi mumulomo.

Kamei Paulo hoyomugamba, “Mulungu imwecho yakwenda yakutowe kofi agweye goufanile lukasi lubakigwe swakaya! Ukudahani kwikala baho uniliganise chishelia na gweye gomwecho ubana ishelia kwa kugamba nifowigwe?”
Awanhu awemile baho howomugamba Paulo, “Ukumuliga iMutambiki mukulu wa Mulungu?”
Paulo hoyobidula, “Wandugu sangu samanyile fina imwene ni kuhani mukulu. Kosoko amawandiko gagamba nhafi: ‘Unghalonge fihile muchanhya ye mutawala wa wanhu wako.’”

Ninga ugele uwo Paulo yakamanye fina wamonga wa wanhu wadibalasa diya ni Masadukayo na wamonga ni Mafalisayo. Kamei, hoyokwinula dijwi kumwande ya Dibalasa, “Wandugu sangu aniye na Mufalisayo. Aniye nigaliku balasa dya ulamusi, kosoko nikuhuwila fina awanhu wakawokwinuka.”
Yakalonge nheifo, howokonga kuwanga lugano Mafalisayo na Masadukayo, umukutano houkitemanuka matewa meli.
Isoko iyecho hayuwa aino, Masadukayo wakugamba kwichaka kwinuka wanhu wafile, kwichaka malaika, na kwichaka Muhe, ninga Mafalisayo wakuhuwila gose madatu.

Ichowe hochikongeseka wamonga wa walimu we shelia we chitewa cha Mafalisayo howokwima na kulafa malalamiko gawo kwa ludole. “Chisikona chochose chihile mwi munhu yuno; ikudahika nhagela Muhe au malaika kalonga naye?”

Kuwanga hokukuwa kwingi mpaka imukulu wa wasilikali we nghondo hoyokogoha fina wakudaha kumudega fihindihindi. Kosoko iyo hoyowatuma wasilikali wakwe wengile muchiligati cha ditewa diya, wamulafe Paulo na kumuwisa kugati ya digelesa.
Ichilo chandamile Mundewa hakema habehi na Paulo, hoyomugamba, “Kiinghe moyo! Kosoko fina founihomelela ahano Yelusalemu, ukwenda utende nheifo ukaya ya Lumi.”
Kukoche Wayahudi howogolosa chikalo cha chinyele. Howochilaha: Chisikudiya kahikunywa mpaka ma chimalile kumukoma Paulo.
Wanhu wafike makumi mane wakifumilise injama yo kugolosa nheifo.
Kamei howoluta kuwatambiki wakulu na wasehe, howogamba, “Aseye chichilaha fina chisikuwonja chochose kumilomo yetu mpaka baho ma chimalile kumukoma Paulo.

Hambiya, anyeye na Dibalasa mutume mbuli kwi mukulu wa dijeshi,” yamwigale Paulo ukwenu mukitende kifana mukuhananga kumanya simbuli sakwe chikamilifu ku imwene. “Chatayali kumukoma ugele yakali nghenati yafike habehi.”
Ninga imwana we munduguse wa Paulo hoyohulika simbuli umupango uwo; kwa nheifo hoyokwingila kwigelesa, hoyomutamila Paulo injama iyo.
Paulo hoyomwinanga yumwedu wa wasilikali hoyomugamba, “Mulonde mwanike yuno mwigale kwi mukulu wa dijeshi, kena mbuli yakumutamila.”
Musilikali homugala imwanike yuya hoyomulongosa mpaka kwi mukulu wa majeshi, hoyogamba, “Ayuya imufungwa Paulo kanyinanga hoyonitasa nimulete imwanike yuno ukwako kosoko kena mbuli ya kukutamila.”
Imukulu wa dijeshi homukola mukono imwanike yuya hoyoluta naye hanghanda, hoyomusa, Kwina choni chokunitamila?
Imwene hoyogamba, “Awayahudi wakifumilisa wakutase umwigale Paulo ku Dibalasa dikuhananga dipate simbuli sakwe fiswanu.

Ninga agweye unghafumile kosoko kwina wanhu wengi kusuma makumi mane wakiyohile kumukola kwa ludole. Wachilaha fina wasikudiya chinhu ama kunywa chinhu mpaka wowe wamalile kumukoma. Hambiya wakiyoha wagojela du ulamusi wako.”
Imukulu wa dijeshi hoyomuleka yalute hoyomusugula fina yanghamutamile munhu wowose fina kamwigalila imbuli iyo.

Baho, imukulu we dijeshi hoyowenanga wasilikali weli hoyowagamba, “Weke tayali wasilikali magana meli, na wakukwila si nyumbu makumi mufungate, na wasilikali magana meli we migoha, walute Kaisalia; muwe tayali kuleuka, ugele isaa tatu inghati ifike diyelo neichilo.
Ikeni nyumbu nghefu kosoko ya Paulo; mumwigale digoya kwa Felisi, imukulu we iyisi.”
Kamei hakawandika baluwa ku mbuli ino:
Aniye Kilaudio Lusia nikukuwandichila agweye mukulu Felisi: Mukulu we iisi Nikulamusa!
Wayahudi hawamukola munhu yuno na hawowa habehi na kukoma nanga satamiligwe fina ni mukaya wa Chilumi, kwa nheifo honiluta na wasilikali na honimuhonya.
Nikahanange kumanya imbuli ilekile womushitaki gawo muchanhya yakwe, honimwigala kwi Balasa dyawo dikulu.
Honikona fina mashitaka agecho hagowa ga kuwanga muchanhya ya finhu fingi fye sheliya yawo, kwa nheifo sonile fina kagolosa chochose chiya ichagile yakomigwe ama yohigwe mwigelesa.
Nikatamiligwe fina Wayahudi hawagolosa njila ya kumukoma, honilamula kumwigala ukwako. Honiwagamba awashitaki wakwe wagale mashitaka gawo kumwande yako.
Kamei awo awasilikali howomulonda Paulo fina fowalagisigwe. Howomwigalaichilo chicho mpaka Andipatili.
Nhosiku yakwe wasilikali we migulu howokuya kunghambi, howowaleka awaya awasilikali awakukwila si nyumbu wagendelele ne inhambo hamwedu na Paulo.
Wakafika Kaisalia howomwingha yuya imukulu we iisi ibaluwa iya na kumwika Paulo mu udaha wakwe.
Felisi yakamale kuisoma ibaluwa iya, hoyowosa Paulo kalawa iisi yaki. Yakatamiligwe fina kalawa iisi ya Kilikia,
hoyogamba, “Notegelesa imbuli yako ma wafulusekwija awashitaki wako.” Kamei hoyolagisa Paulo yekigwe wimilisi mwikumbo dya Helode.

Gakaloke majuwa mashano, iMutambiki mukulu Anania hoyokwija Kaisalia hamwedu na wasehe wakefu na wakili yumwedu wa shelia iyakwinangwa Telitulo. Howomulutila ayuya imukulu we iisi howomutamila amashitaka gawo muchanhya ya Paulo.
Paulo hoyokwinangigwa na Telitulo, hoyokumula mashitaka nhafi:
Mukulu Felisi, ulongosi wako muswanu ugolosa mabadiliko agawagile mwitaifa dyetu chila hanu chihokela dino kwa moyo wa ilumbo.
Chila hanu na chila ugele chikuhokela dino kwa moyo wa ilumbo.
Ninga chinghagilise umuda wako kahi, chikukutasa ku uswanu wako, utegelese ulongi wetu.
Chitanga fina imunhu yuno niwakogoha lugano. Imwene yukukonga migogolo muchiligati ya Wayahudi chila hanhu, muchilunga chose kasi ni chilongosi we chitewa cha Wanasaleti.
Kahi hakagesi kuchafula dihekalu, nase hochimukola,
“Ninga Lisiya Ichilongosi hoyeja na kumuleusa mumikono yetu kwa ludole.”
Kwa kumusamusa agweye gomwecho ukwenda wone pwii simbuli sino sose isene sochikumushitaka.
Nawo Wayahudi howofumila fina chawelu foyalongile yuya amashitaka gago.
Kamei imukulu we iisi hoyomonesa Paulo kuwa yakudaha kulonga. Naye Paulo hoyogamba,
“Nikonela kitetea kumwande yako, fina kosoko nimanya fina mulimo wa mulamusi wa ditaifa dino kwa minyaka mingi.
Ukudaha kuhananga ukweli fina gasilokile majuwa ikumi na meli du galokile fonalutile kufuga Yelusalemu.
Wayahudi wasinifikile nikuwanga na munhu wowose. Wasanifikile nikusongesa wanhu mwihekalu, ama mumasunagogi gawo, ama ahanhu hengi hohose mukaya iyo.
Hata wasikudaha kuhomelela amashitaka gowalafile muchanhya yangu.

“Ninga chino nochonikufumila kumwande yako: Aniye nikufuga Mulungu ku Njila yo wagumba ya usushi. Nikufuga Mulungu wa waBaba setu, nikuhuwila chila chinhu chiwandikigwe mu fitabu fye sheliya na fya wagonesi.
Aniye nikumuhuwila Mulungu imwene, awa nawo wakumuhokela, fina kwina kwinuligwa kwa wanhu wafile, awaswamu na wehile.
Kosoko iyo nikitahidi kuwa na moyo muswanu kwa Mulungu na kuwanhu.
“Nikekale kutali chipisi cha minyaka mikefu, honikuya Yelusalemu na kwigalila ditaifa dyangu sadaka na filafya.
Fonagolosage nheifo noho wanifikile mwihekalu nigolose difugilo dyo kitakasa. Kusowile na itewa dya wanhu kahimugogolo.
Ninga hakuwa Wayahudi kulawa iisi ya Asia; awo no yowile fiswanu wowe bahano kumwande yako na kulafa mashitaka gawo hona wena chochose chokulonga ku niye.
Ama waleke wano walonge dikosa dyowonile ukwangu fonyemile kumwande ya Dibalasa dyawo dikulu,
ninga simbuli sino sonalongile fonyemile kumwande yawo: ‘Mukuniliganisa diyelo dino kosoko yo kolelesa fina awafile wakawokwinuligwa.’”
Baho, Felisi imwecho hakaimanya oyo Injila iswanu, hoyokwimisa dishauli dyo. Hoyowagamba, “Nikanilafa ulamusi wangu muchanhya ye dishauli dino ugele Lusia mukulu wa dijeshi foyakwija hano.”
Kamei hoyomulonga ayuya chilongosi wa wasilikali we inghondo yamwike Paulo kugati, ninga yowe na uhulu chiyasi, na wambuya sakwe wanghalemesigwe kumwingha fyoyakuhitaji.
Gakaloke majuwa makefu, Felisi hoyofika hamwedu ne muke Dlusila, yowile Muyahudi. Holagisa Paulo yegaligwe, hoyomutegelesa yakulonga muchanhya ya kumuhuwila Yesu Kilisito.
Ninga Paulo foyakongile kulonga muchanhya ya kuliganila, kuwa na chiyasi, muchanhya ya uligaswe ukwija, Felisi hoyokogoha hoyogamba, “Kwa hambiya ukudaha kuluta; nokwinanga kahi ninghapata luneka.”
Ugele uwo yendeyohuwila fina Paulo komwingha fesa. Kosoko iyo hakagendelela kumwinanga na kusimulila naye chila ugele.
Ikaloke minyaka mili, Palikio Festo hoyolonda ahanhu ha Felisi, hoyokuwa mukulu we iisi. Kosoko hakenda kuwendesa Wayahudi, Felisi hoyomuleka Paulo mwigelesa.
Dijuwa dya kadatu yakafike Kaisali, Festo hoyoleuka kuluta Yelusalemu.
Watambiki wakulu na filongosi wa Wayahudi hawalonga naye muchanhya ya mashitaka gondeyoshitakiigwa Paulo. Howomutasa kwa dede, Festo
yawagolosele uswanu kwa kumwigala Paulo Yelusalemu. Howadiya njama wamukome hona yowile munjila.
Ninga Festo hoyobidula, Paulo yakusigala kuya Kaisalia mwigelesa ani nani nikwenda nilute uko majuwa si mengi.
Walekeni filongosi wenu walute uko hamwedu naniye wakafe mashitaka gawo hona yagolose dyodyose dihile.
Festo yakamale kwikala nawo, majuwa gafikile munana ama ikumi nhafi, kamei hoyoyokuya Kaisalia. Nhosiku yakwe hoyoluta kwi balasa hoyolagisa Paulo yegaligwe kugati.
Ugele Paulo yakeje, Wayahudi awalawile Yelusalemu howokonga kulafa mashitaka mengi, masito agene gowasadahile konesa fina ni chawelu.
Kukitetea Paulo hoyogamba: Aniye sigolose ikosa dyodyose muchanhya ye sheliya ye Chiyahudi, ama dihekalu, ama muchanhya ya Kaisali.
Festo hoyohananga kuwendesa Wayahudi, kwa nheifo hoyomusa Paulo Togola! Kokwenda kuluta Yelusalemu uleke ukahukumiigwe uko kumwande yangu muchanhya ya mashitaka gano?
Paulo hoyobidula, Nima hamwande ya mahakama ga Kaisali, na bahano no hanogele ninghigwe hukumu. Fina foumanyile fiswanu, siwagolosele Wayahudi uwihi wowose.

Ninga, hona nyoneke na ikosa dyodyose dinogele kufa, sikutasa kulekeleligwa kutendeligwa nheifo. Ninga hona kwichaka chawelu mu mashitaka, kwichaka yakudaha kuniguma mumiko yawo. Nikukanha lufaa kwa Kaisali!
Baho, Festo yakamale kusimulila na washauli wakwe, hoyomugamba Paulo, Kukanha lufaa kwa Kaisali, haya ukuluta kwa Kaisali.
Majuwa makefu hanyuma Mundewa Aglipa na Belinike howofika Kaisalia, uleke walafe heshima sawo kwa Festo.
Howokuwa uko majuwa makefu, naye Festo hoyomutamila Mundewa simbuli sa Paulo. Henamunhu yumonga hano imwene Felisi hakamuleka mwigelesa.
Nikalute Yelusalemu, watambiki wakulu na asehe wa Wayahudi howomushitaki na kunitasa nimuhukumu.

Ninga niye honiwabidula fina si jadi ya Walumi kumulafa munhu yenghigwe asabu ugele iyekushitakigwa nghenati yakitang'anyile na awashiliki wakwe chimeso meso na kwinghigwa luneka lwa kitekea muchanhya ya gago mashitaka.
Wakafike baho sachelewe, ninga honigolosa chikao kumahakama, nhosiku yakwe honilagisa imunhu yuyo yegaligwe.
Awashitaki howokwima lakini wasalafile mashika gehile fina fonendenidoga.
Ninga du howowa na lukani lwa mbili, si dini yawo na sa munhu yakwinangigwa Yesu yafile, ninga Paulo yakukolelesa fina ni mumi.
Nilemeligwa kumanya dyo kugolosa mu imbuli iyo. Kamei honimusa Paulo hona yakwenda kuluta kama hakama akuya Yelusalemu kosoko ya mashitaka gago.
Ninga Paulo hoyokanha lufa, hoyotasa yalekigwe mwigelesa mpaka ulamuso we imbuli iyo ulafigwe na Kaisali. Kosoko iyo hanidaha kumuleka mwigelesa mpaka ma nikudaha kumwigala kwa Kaisali.
Aglipa hoyomugamba Festo, Nokwenda kumuhulika imunhu yuyo aniye nimwecho. Festo hoyomugamba, “Komuhulika nhosiku.”
Kwa nheifo, nhosiku yakwe Aglipa na Belinike howokwija kwa chinyemi ku dikumbo dye mikutano wakilose na wakulu wa majeshi na filongosi we kaya. Festo hoyolagisa Paulo yegaligwe kugati.
Kamei hoyogamba, “Mundewa Aglipa na mose muwile hano hamwedu nase! Hano hamwande yenu hena munhu yuno, imwene aWayahudi wose wowile hano na kuya Yelusalemu, wakujoja fina nghawagilwa kuwa mumi kahi.
Ninga niye sonile fina kagolosa chochose chihile ichene chikumutenda yagiligwe kukomigwa; ninga kosoko imwecho hakakanha lufaa kwa Kaisali, nilamula kumwigala.

Ninga ku ulwandi ulwangu nichaka chinhu ichene chonikudaha kumuwandichila Kaisali muchanhya yakwe. Nochileka nimwigale hano kumwande yenu, na gano ukwako gweye, Mundewa Aglipa! Uleke munghamala kumusa Musa nipate mbuli ya kuwandika.
Kosoko ikuwa mbuli ya chibwalasi kwigala mufungwa, akuno hechaka amakosa gakwe goyagolose.”
Kamei Aglipa hoyomugamba Paulo, “Ukudaha kitetea.” Baho Paulo hoyogolola mukono wakwe hoyokitetea nhafi:
“Mundewa Aglipa, nikiyona nijaliwa diyelo kitetea kumwande yako muchanhya ya mashitaka gose agene Wayahudi walonga muchanhya yangu.
Chawelu kosoko gweye kumanya simila sa Wayahudi na migagolo yawo, nikukutasa unitegelese kwa ufumilifu.
“Awayahudi wamanya amaisha gangu gose kulawa udodo wangu fyene fonikale kulawa kunghonga ne ditaifa dyangu ako Yelusalemu.
Wanimanya kwa ugele mutali, na wakudaha kuhomelela, wanghenda fina kulawa kunghonga hanikala kifana munhu yumwedu wa waya awakolile lugano idini yetu, chitewa cha Mafalisayo.
Na hambiya nima hano nilamuligwe kosoko nikuhuwila dihuwi Mulungu dyoyawahuwise waBaba setu.
Diwi dyo nodidiya dikuhuwiligwa na makabila kumi na meli kupata fowakumufuga Mulungu chilo ne misi. Ku dihuwi dino nikushitakigwa na Wayahudi!
Mundewa, Nhani nyeye mukona isikudahika kwi Mulungu kwinula wanhu wafile?
Chawelu aniye nimwecho hanihuwila fina inyagila kugolosa mbuli nyingi kulema disina dya Yesu wa Nasaleti.

“Simbuli so, noso nagolose ako Yelusalemu, aniye nimwecho ugele wonenghigwe udaha kulawa ku watambiki wakulu, haniwaguma mwigelesa wengi wa wanhu wa Mulungu. Fowalamuligwe kukomigwa, aniye hanitowa kula ya kufumila.
Mikongho mingi haniwatenda wotowigwe mumasinagogi gose, honiwalonga kwa ludole wadikane dihuwilo dyawo. Inyono yangu ukwawo hoikuwa ghulu mpaka nende niwasaka sikaya sa kutali.”
“Kwe njila iyo honiluta Dameski ugele umoja, nina udaha na malagiso kulawa ku watambiki wakulu.
Mukulu, ugele fonowile munjila saa mutandatu ya nemisi, hanyona ujelu mukulu kusuma we dijuwa, ukwaka kulawa kulanga, hounisunguluta niye hamwedu na wachowanye munhambo.
Chose hochikugwa hasi, nani honihulika ijwi dikulonga nani kwa Chiebulaniya, ‘Sauli, Sauli! Nhani kunibulaga? Ukibulaga chaka kifana kutowa mundome ichuma chisongoke.’”
Honigamba, “Gwegwe nani Mundewa?” Naye Mundewa hoyobidula, “Aniye no Yesu imwene agweye ukubulaga.
Si chinhu, inuka hambiya, imanyima. Nikisololosa ukwako kosoko ino nikwike uwe mutumishi wangu kuhomelela ifyene fyo unyonile niye na simbuli sonikwenda nikiyonese ukwako.
Nikukuhonya kulawa ku wa Isilaelii na wanhu wa wamembe gamonga wonikwenda nikutume ukwawo.

Ukuwagubula meso gawo na kuwadahisa walawe muchisa na kwingila mu ujelu; walawe mu utawala wa Shetani, wamubidukile Mulungu kwa kumuhuwila kwawo, walekeleligwe uwihi na kulonda ahanhu hawo mugati ya waya awene wagaluke fina wanhu wa Mulungu.”
“Nheifo, Mundewa Aglipa, sibesile diwono didyo dya kulanga.

Ninga hanikonga kuhubili kunghonga ako Dameski, hanyuma ku waya wanhu wa Yelusalemu na wanhu wose wa Uyahudi na wa wamembe gamonga. Niwasonghesa wamubidukile Mulungu na konesa kwa sinhenda fina wabadilisha imiyoyo yawo.
Kosoko iyo Wayahudi hawanikola nuwile Mwihekalu, howohananga kunikoma.
Ninga Mulungu hoyonitasa; na kwa neifo mpaka diyelo nima chigosi nikuhomelela ku wose, ku wakulu na kuwadodo. Gonikulonga nogaya kuwagonesi na Musa wagamba gakagolawanisa:
Fina Kilisito yakusambasigwa na kokuwa wanghonga kwinuka kulawa kuwafile, uleke yafamile fina ujelu wa uhonya ukuwamulikia awanhu wose hambiya, Wayahudi na nheifiya wanhu wa wamembe gamonga.”
Paulo yakafike baho mukitetea kwakwe Festo hoyolonga kwa kwinula dijwi, “Paulo! Kwina chilalu!
Ninga Paulo nichaka chilalu Mukulu Festo, honikulonga ni chawelu muhala.
Agweye Mundewa kusimanya simbuli sino, kosoko iyo nikudaha kulonga nichaka chogoho kumwande yako. Nichaka manhonge fina aga gose gagoloseka gamanyika ukwako kosoko imbuli ino isigoloseke kwa chifiso.
Mundewa Aglipa, Togola ukuhuwila wagonesi? Nimanya fina ukuhuwila.”
Aglipa hoyomubidula Paulo, “Chidodogi du ukwenda unitende muKilisito?”
Paulo hoyobidula, Nikumutasa Mulungu, fina kwa chapangu chiguhi ama chitali, si gweye du ninga wose awakunihulika diyelo wowe fina niye fonuwile, ninga bila ino iminyolo.
Baho iMundewa mukulu we iisi, na Belinike, na waya wose wamonga wowile hamwedu nawo howokwinuka.
Wakaleuke howokiyusa wecho kwa wecho, Munhu yuno hakowa yadaha kulekeligwa howile ghakanhile lufaa kwa Kaisali.
Aglipa hakamugamba Fesito, “Imunhu yuno hakowa yakulekeleligwa woile ghatasile kuluta kwe Mundewa.”
Wakafuluse kulamula fina chilute mpaka Italia, howomwika Paulo hamwedu na wafungwa wamonga ku wimilisi wa akida we chikosi chikwinangwa Chikosi cha Kaisali.
Hochikwila meli ya Adilamito iyende iluta na kulokela musibandali sa mu iisi ya Asia, hochikonga lugendo. Alistaliko mukaya wa Makedonia, kulawa Sesaloniki hakowa hamwedu nase.
Nhosiku yakwe hochikwima kubandali ya Sidoni. Yuliyo hoyomutendela Paulo fiswamu kwa kumuleka yamone wambwiya sakwe na kupata ifinhu foyakuhananga.
Kulawa uko hochigendelela ne nhambo, ninga kosoko imheho yendeitowa kwa ludole kulawa kumwande yetu, hochilokela ulwandi lwe chisiwa cha Kupulo ukwene kusowile na mheho nyingi.
Hanyuma hochiloka ibahali ya Kilikia na Pamfulia, hochikwima Mula, ikaya ya Lukia.
Baho, ichilongosi wa wasilikali igana yuyo hoyofika meli imonga ya Alekisandilia iyendeluta Italia, kwa nheifo hoyochikiwisa kugati.

Kwa chipisi cha majuwa mengi hachigenda digaluga, na kwa fikugutu hochifika habehi na Nido. Na kosoko imheho isachinghile luneka hochiluta kumwande bila kubiduka, hochigenda ulwandi lwa Klete habehi na Salimone ukusowile na mheho nyingi.
Hochigenda kunghanda yakwe digaluga, hochifika hanhu hakwinangwa Bandali Swanu, habehi ne kaya ya Lasea.
Chipisi chitali hachuwa chilokile, hata dijuwa dyo kufunga hadyuwa dilokile. Hambiya hayuwa hatali lugano kugenda na meli. Kamei, Paulo hoyowasugula:
Wakulu, nikona fina inhambo ino ikuwa na mugogolo, kwagilila finhu fingi, si imisigo du yuwile mu meli, hata na kwa mwumi wetu.
Ninga ayuya ichilongosi wa waslikali igana hakahulikila simbuli sa ayuya iyakugendesa imeli na imwenye meli kusuma soyalongile Paulo.

Kosoko ibandali iyo isowile hanhu haswanu kwikala ugele we imheho ye inyota, uwengi huwosagula kugendelela ne inhambo kwa kubahatisha fina wakudaha kufika Foinike, bandali ya Kleti, hasi ya kuuswilo we dijuwa na kuchanhya ya kuuswile we dijuwa; na uko hawowa wakudaha kwikala uko ugele we inyota.
Kamei imheho ya kusini ikakonge kuputa fiswanu, howodoga fina wapata dowahanange, kosoko iyo howoleuka howoigenesa imeli habehi sana na mwani ya Klete.
Ninga, chisalokile chipisi chitati, imheho inghali ikwinangwa Mheho ya kasikasi haikonga kuputa kulanga kuchisiwa.
Imheho hoitowa imeli iya, na kosoko chisendechidaha kuisuma hochiileka ikwelegetigwe na iyo imheho.
Chisiwa chimonga chikwinangwa Kauda, hochichikinga chidodogi imheho iyo; na chikole kusini kwakwe hochisuma, hata nheifo kwa fikugutu kuhonya u munhumbwi uya wa imeli.

Awaya anamaji howowukweka umunhumbwi kugati, kamei howoisungulusila imeli lusigi na kuyoha kwa ludole. Awogoha fina wakudaha kwangamila kuchilo che bahali ku mwani ya Libiya. Kosoko iyo hawadulisa matanga na kuileka imeli ibulumuligwe ne imheho.
Umusukosuko hougendelela kuputa, na nhosiku yakwe howokonga kukubita kunje imisigo ya mumeli.
Dijuwa dya kadatu howokonga kuguma mumeji ifinhu fye imeli kwe mikono yawo awecho.
Kwa majuwa mengi chisadahile kona dijuwa ama sinyelesi; umusingisiko hugendela kuputa lugano. Hata dihuwi dyo kuhona hodichihelela.

Chikafuluse kwikala majuwa mengi bila kudiya chakudiya, Paulo hoyokwima mugati yawo hoyogamba, “Wakulu nanga yowile fiswamu nanga mwanitegelese na kuleka kugenda kulawa Klete. He mwatendile nheifo chosowile chikwingila mugogolo uno na si hasala sino sose.
Hambiya nikumutasani muwe na moyo, kwichaka hata yumwedu wenu yakwenda yagilise uumi wakwe; imeli du noikwende yagilile.
Kosoko digulo nechilo choikwinuchila diyelo, malaika we Mulungu imwene aniye na munhu wakwe, kahi nowo nikufuga, kanijila,
hoyonigamba, ‘Paulo, unghogohe, Inogela wine kumwande ya Kaisali, naye Mulungu kwa uswamu wakwe kakutendela maswanu kwa kukuhonya agweye na wose womuwaniye munhambo wanghagilile.’
Nheifo, mowanhu nye, kiingheni moyo! Kosoko nikumuhuwila Mulungu fina ikwende yuwe sawa fina fonitamiligwe.
Ninga hata nheifo chikwenda chikatagigwe muchiwa chingi.”
Ichilo cha dijuwa dya ikumi na ine, chendechikwigaligwa kuno na kuno mu bahali ya Adilia. Habehi na muchilo mugati, wanamaji howokona fina chuwa habehi na iisi.
Kwa nheifo howohananga chilinde che bahali uleke walagase ulusigi lohigwe chinhu chisito, howopata chilindi cha meta makumi mane, hanyuma howopima kahi howopata meta igana dimwedu na makumi madatu.
Kosoko ya kogoha kukwama kumawe, howodulisa nanga ine kunyuma ye imeli; howotasa usiku uche chimwande.
Wanamaji howohanga kutija na hawafulusa kudulisa auya umunhumbwi kumeji, wakitenda fina wakahulumusa si nanga kumwande ye meli.
Ninga Paulo hoyomulonga yuya akida wa dijeshi na wasilikali wakwe, Awano awanamaji wanghaleka kusigala amuno mu meli musikuhona.
Baho awasilikali waya howosidumula sisigi sakolelese au umunhumbwi, howouleka ulondigwe na meji.
Kukwende kuche, Paulo hoyowatasa wose wadiye chakudiya: Kwa majuwa ikumi na ine hambiya, hamuwa mumanhonge na musighati mudiye chinhu chochose.
Hambiya, nikumutasani mudiye chakudiya kosoko muchananga ikuhanangika mudiye uleke mudahe kugendelela kuwa womi. Kosoko hata lujwili lumwedu lwa matwi genu usikwagilila.
Yakamale kulonga nheifo hoyolonda mukate, hoyulumba kwa Mulungu, kumwande yawo wose hoyoubendula hoyokonga kudiya.
Baho wose howosindamala, howodiya chakudiya awecho.
Chose hamwedu hachuwa wanhu magana meli na makumi mufungate na mutandatu, mu meli.
Wose wakamale kudiya na kwiguta, howohungula usito mu meli kwa kutanga ingano mubahali.
Kukoche, wanamaji wasadahile kuitanga iisi iya ninga howokona hanhu hamonga hena mhwani na disanga, howolamula kuluta ne imeli uko mhwani inghahadahika.
Kwa nheifo hawosidumula si nanga na kusileka kubahali sisigi isohile ikukani, kamei howokwinula itanga dimwedu kumwande kukola imheho, howoluta imhwani.
Ninga howofika hanhu ahene mikondo mili ye bahali ikitang'anyila, ulwandi lwa kunyuma hoibenduka dibasibasi kusoko ya uludole lwa mawimbi.
Wasilikali howohananga kuwakoma awafungwa wose kwa kogoha fina wakudaha kogela mpaka mhwani na kutija.
Ninga kosoko yuya akida wa dijeshi hakahananga kumuhonya Paulo, hakawalemesa wanghatende nheifo. Hoyolagisa fina kunghonga awaya awakudaha kogela wajumhe kulawa mu meli na kogela mpaka mhwani,
na wamonga wendamile wakikolele mufibao au mufipande fye imeli ineneke. Nofo aseye chose chafikile mhwani.
Chikafuluse kufika kuisi hochimanya fina ichisiwa chiya chikwinangigwa Melita.
Wakaya wa baho howa waswanu sana ukwetu. Ifula yendeikonga kutonya na hakuwa na mheho, kosoko iyo howokwasa moto, howochikalibisha.
Paulo hoyodondola chisigo chidodogi cha figodi, ugele foyasigumange mumoto. Baho kosoko ya dijoto dya umoto hodilawa ijoka mufigodi hodikisinga mumukono wakwe hodinyalilila.
Awakaya wa baho wakone ichiyumbe chiya chikuning'inha mumukono wakwe, howokitamila kwa wecho, Chawelu imunhu yuno kakoma munhu hata kona yahonile kufila mubahali, ihaki isimulekile yowe mumi.
Ninga Paulo hodikung'unhila mumoto ichiyumbe chiya, na imwene nghabulagigwe hata chidodogi.

Awa wanhu wendewolangilila fina kofimba ama kokugwa hasi na kufa. Wakagojele kwa chipisi chitali bila kona Paulo yapatigwa na chinhu chochose ichene si cha kawaida, howobidula mafikili gawo muchanhya yakwe, howogamba fina ni mulungu.
Habehi na ahanhu baho hahowa na migunda ya Publio, imukulu we chisiwa chiya. Publio hoyochikalibisha chimbuya, hochikuwa wageni wakwe kwa majuwa madatu.
Hoyikuwa fina iBabakwe wa Publio hakowa mutamu wa mhungo na kahala, kagona mwisasi. Paulo hoyoluta kumwona na yakamale kuwomba, na yakamwikile mikono yakwe muchanhya yakwe hoyonona.
Kulawa dino kugoloseka, watamu wose muchisiwa howokwija howohonyigwa.
Howochingha finghwa fya hayo hayo, na ugele wochaleukage howochigumila mumeli ifinhu fyose fochendechihanga.
Ikaloke minyesi mitatu, hochileuka na meli yowile baho kosoko ye imheho mu chisiwa, meli ya Alekisandilia iikwinangwa, Wandugu mapasa (Milungu Mapasa)
Hochifika ikaya ya Silakusa, hochikwikala baho majuwa madatu.
Kulawa uko hachileuka hochisunguluta na kufika Legio. Dikaloke ijuwa dimwedu, imheho hoikonga kuputa kulawa kusini, kamei gakaloke majuwa meli hochifika bandali ya Potioli.
Uko hachifika wandugu wakefu awe wahanange chikale nawo kwa ijuma dimwedu. Nheifi nofo ehafikile Lumi.
Awandugu wa Lumi fowahulike simbuli setu, howokwija kuchihokela kwe soko dya Apio na Mikahawa midatu. Paulo yakawone hoyomulumba Mulungu, na hoyopata moyo.
Chikafike Lumi, Paulo hakalekeligwa yekale yemwene na musilikali yumwedu wa kumwimilisa.

Gakaloke majuwa madatu, Paulo hoyowenanga filongosi wose we Chiyahudi wa hanhu baho, wakakikonghole, Paulo hoyowagamba, “Wandugu sangu, aniye sagolose chochose chihile, kahikulema sijadi sa wasehe wetu, hamikoligwa akuya Yelusalemu na kugumigwa mumikono ya Walumi.
Wakanyusenyuse na kona fina nichaka wihi wowose, howohananga wanilekele.
Ninga Wayahudi wamonga howolema imbuli yo hoinigolosa nihanange lufaa kwa Kaisali, ninga niye sowile na mbuli yoyose ya kuwashitaki awaditaifa dyangu.
Kosoko iyo nihananga kiyona nanye na kusimulila nanye, kosoko nyohigwa iminyolo ku dihuwilo didyo dya Waislaeli.”
Nowo howomugamba fina, “Chisihokele baluwa sosose kulawa Uyahudi muchanhya yako, na kwichaka ndugu yeyose yejile hano yachitamile mbuli yoyose ihile ulwandi ulwako.
Ninga chikona inogela chihulike kulawa ukwako gomwecho foukona agweye; kosoko cho chimanyile muchanhya ye chitewa chino ni fina chila hanhu chikulongigwa fibi.”

Wakakifumilise dijuwa dyo kitang'anyila naye, howokwija hoyekalage wanhu wengi lugano. Hoyoyowatamila imbuli iyo kulawa nhosikusiku mpaka hegulo, yakuhomelela ku undewa wa Mulungu kuwonesa fina chawelu simbuli sa Yesu kulawa mu sheliya ya Musa na amanabii.
Wamonga wawo howofumila ku siya soyalongile, ugele uwo wamonga wasahuwile.
Howoleka kifumilisa wecho kwa wecho, howoleuka ugele Paulo yakagambe: “Muhe Musunhile hakowa sawa foyalongile kuwa Baba senu kwa njila ye mugonesi Isaya:
‘Luta ku wanhu wano, ukagambe,
chaweli mukamuhulika ninga musikutanga ng'oo;
kosoko imisungu ya wanhu wano ibwalata,
wahindi singhutwi sawo, wafinya meso gawo.
Hona si nheifo, wowa wakona kwa meso gawo,
hawahulike kwa singhutwi sawo,
na kutanga kwe misungu yawo,
na kunibiduchila, yakulonga Mundewa,
nani nuwanikuwa honya.’”
Paulo hoyomalagisa kwa kugamba, “Mumanye fina uhonya uwo wa Mulungu.
wigaligwa kuwawamembe wakwende wahulike!”
Paulo hoyokwikala minyaka mili munyumba yakwe imwecho yendeyolihila kodi, yendeyowakalibisha wose wamwijilage.
Yakuhubili undewa wa Mulungu na kufusa muchanhya ya Mundewa Yesu Kilisito kwa udaha hechaka kulemesigwa.
Paulo, imutogomi wa Yesu Kilisito, kenangigwa kuwa Mutumigwa, yasaguligwe kosoko ye imbuli swanu ye Mulungu,
iyalaganisigwe ne Mulungu kulawa katali kupulutila awagonesi wakwe mumatulumo gasunhile,
imbuli swanu ni kosoko ya mwanagwe yalawile mulukolo lwa Daudi kwa chimutufi
na kutambusigwa kuwa Mwana we Mulungu hamwedu na ludole kosoko ya Muhe wo Usunhile kwa kwinuligwa kwakwe kulawa mudifa, Yesu Kilisito Mundewa wetu,
kulokela imwene chihokela dihewa, na utumigwa wo kwigala habehi ichihuliko che dihuwi mugati ya wose Amataifa kosoko ye disina dyakwe,
hamwedu na nyeye muwecho mwinangwe muwe wa Yesu Kilisito,
kuwose wendigwa ne Mulungu woile Loma wenangwe kuwa wasunhile:
Kunghonga, nikumulumba Mulungu wangu kulokela Yesu Kilisito kosoko yenu mose, kosoko ye dihuwi dyenu idikuhubiliigwa muchilunga chose.
kosoko iMulungu no muhomesi wangu, wonikumutogomela hamwedu ne muhe kwa kutamila imbuli swanu ye Mwanagwe, bila kuleka nigendelela kuwagelegela kwa kuwatasilani majuwa gose munhasa yangu,
nikutasa fina Mulungu yanghenda nidahe kwija ukwenu.
Kosoko nikusulumila niwoneni uleke niwengheni finghwa fye chimuhe na kuwagumani ludole,
uleke chuwe wakangasi wasindamafu kwa dihuwi dya chila munhu na miyagwe kosekose ukwenu na ukwangu.
Nikuhananga mumanye wandugu sangu fina mikangha mingi hanihananga kwija ukwenu (ninga hanilemesigwa) uleke nidahe kugola ugolaji ukwenu na nheifiya kifana kuwamembe wasigale.
Nikudaiigwa kuhubili Imbuli swanu kuwanhu wose Awayunani na Awasigendelele kuwene misungu na awabwalasi:
kosoko ya iyo nikuhananga kuhubili Imbuli swanu hata ukwenu nyeye muwile Loma.
Kosoko sikuyonela chinyala Imbuli swanu; ni ludole lwa Mulungu kwa uhonya wa chila munhu yene dihuwi, kwa Muyahudi kunghonga na kahi kwa Muyunani.
Kosoko kwa iyo ichawelu ye Mulungu igubuligwa kugendela dihuwi kwa dihuwi fina foitulumigwe kugamba; “Imuchawelu kokwikala kwa kulokela dihuwi.”
Kosoko inyono ye Mulungu yonesigwa kulawa kulanga kuwanhu wose awasikwenda Mulungu na wihi wa awakukanhamisa ichawelu.
Kosoko iikudaha kumanyika muchanhya ye Mulungu ni chalinse ukwawo, kosoko iMulungu kayonesa ukwawo.
Kulawa kukumbigwa kwe chilunga inyuwa yakwe ye ludole yo kuleka koneka na udaha wa majuwa gose waumanya na kuona kulokela finhu fyumbigwe. Nong'amba wechaka chibalalilo.
Kosoko hawamumanya Mulungu, ninga wasimwinghile chogoho kifana Mulungu ama kumulumba, ninga hawagilila mudasi mumadoga gawo kamei misungu yawo hoigumigwa chisa
Wakidai wena misungu wagaluka, wabwalasi;
na kubidula ditunyo dye Mulungu idichaka ubani kuwa futa ye chimunhu iikubanika, na fidege na fikewe hamwedu na ifikutambala.
Kosoko ya iyo Mulungu kawengha mukusulumila mumimoyo yawo uwihi kuleka kiyogoha mumitufi yawo awecho
kosoko wabidula ichawelu ye Mulungu kuudasi na kufuga fyumbigwe na kufifugamila na kuleka Iyombile, imutunyigwa wa majuwa gose! Hano.
Kosoko ya iyo Mulungu kawengha usulumisi wichaka chogoho. Wanawake wao nawo wabidula sinhenda kulawa fosumbigwe kuluta kusisumbigwe,

nheifiya awagosi nawo, hawaleka sinhenda ifene foyumbigwe kuwa nawake sawo na kikola usulumisi wecho kwa wecho. Hata wagosi wagolosa mbuli sa chinyala na wagosi wayawo na kuhokela itoso dya nhenda sawo sihile.
Na kosoko wasonile fiswanu kumumanya Mulungu, Mulungu hakawaleka wandamile madoga gawo gehile agasiku hanangigwa wagolose.
Hawamema na chila ilalago dya wihi, ulwafu, usulumisi, chigiso, wamemile finju, ukomaji, unghondo, udanhilisaji, kubalalila, na walongaji we mbuli sa wamonga,
wakusigila wayawo, awasikumwenda Mulungu, wetogosi, weyoni, lubeso, wanhu wakudoga gehile, na awasikuhulika awaweleke,
wabwalasi, wechaka dihuwi, wakomaji wa mimoyo ya wanhu, wechaka ubasi na munhu.
Hata inghowa wamanyile ulamusi we Mulungu, fina awaya wakugolosa gago wagiligwa kufe, ninga siyo du wakugagolosa du kahi wakubwedelela wamonga nomowakugagolosa.
Hambiya kwichaka chibalalilo, kwawowose, nomo ukuliganisa wamonga; kosoko kwa kuwaliganisa wamonga ukilamula gomwecho, kosoko agweye gomulamulaji nagwe ukugolosa wihi uuya.
“Chimanya fina ulamusi we Mulungu kwa wayawakugolosa gago ni wachawelu”.
Ukudoga, gweye fina nomoukulamula awakugolosa gago kamei nagweye ukugagolosa nghukwija udaha kuitija inyono ye ulamusi we Mulungu?
Ama ukubesa uugoli we uwendo na ufinyilisi wakwe. Nghumanyile fina wendo we Mulungu wabaho kukulongosa gweye kukulamba?
Ninga kosoko youkugutu na kuleka kufinyilisa kwa umoyo wako ukiikila nyono muchanhya yako mwijuwa dye inyono ugele uliganiso we chawelu we Mulungu foukwija ukoneka
Kosoko Mulungu komuliha chila munhu fina foyaliganile:
Kuwanya awakufinyilisa mukugolosa maswanu wahananga kumutunya Mulungu na kumogoha na kowengha uumi wa majuwa gose;
na kuwamonga awakwandamila njila sao wenyecho na wasikwenda kuihulika ichawelu ninga uwihi, inyono ye Mulungu yofungha ukwawo.
Kokuwa na magayo na kutamigwa kwa chila iyakugolosa uwihi, kukongela kwa Muyahudi na kwe Muyunani,
ninga ditunyo na chogoho hamwedu na dihewa dyuwe kwa chila munhu iyakugolosa uswanu, kwa Muyahudi kunghonga kamei ne Muyunani naye.
Kosoko Mulungu kechaka kwendelela.
Kosoko awaya wose wagolose wihi bila dilagiso wakwagilila nheifiya bila dilagiso na wose wagolose wihi mudilagiso wolamuligwe ne dilagiso.
Kosoko siyo wakuhulika dilagiso nowene nhenda swanu hamwande ye Mulungu, ninga awagolosaji we dilagiso nowakwija wataliligwa nhenda swanu.
Nghona awamembe, awechaka dilagiso wakumanya chowakuhanagigwa wagolose, awano, awechaka dilagiso, wagaluka ilagiso awecho.
Wakonesa fina ichikuhanangigwa ne dilagiso chiyandikigwa mumimoyo yao, na madoga gawo gakuwahomelesa na kuwasongesa ama kuwabalalila
mwijuwa dye uliganiso fina imbuli yangu swanu foilongile, Mulungu kulokela Yesu Kilisito, yakwija yaliganisa amadoga gose agakifisile.
Ninga nghonaga ukiinanga Muyahudi na ukuhuwila dilagiso ukiyona kosoko ya Mulungu
na mumanya iMulungu choyakuhananga na kufumilisa ichiswanusi kosoko mulolesigwa mwilagiso,
na nghona umanyile fina kwamulongosaji wa wamudula na fina agweye no ujelu kwawaya woile muchisa,
ni mulolesaji wa wabwalasi na mufusaji wa wana wadodogi mumalagiso uwine umanyi we chawelu mugati yako,
agweye, goukufusa awamonga nghudaha kifusa gomwecho? Ukuhubili uhiji sambi gomwecho kahi ukuhija?
Agweye ukulemesa dihabwa, gomwecho ukugolosa ihabwa? Agweye ukudesekela fisikimunhu ukuhija mumahekalu?
Agweye ukitunyila mwilagiso, kahi ukumubesa Mulungu kwa kubena malagiso gakwe?
Kosoko, fina foitulumigwe, “Disina dye Mulungu dikutofuligwa mugati ya Wamembe kosoko yenu.”
Dikumbi dikuwa na chambusi nghona mukukola dilagiso amba nghona mukubana dilagiso mugaluka fina wanhu wasifinigwe.
Kosoko iyo, nghona munhu inghafinigwe yakukola malagiso kuleka kufunigwa kwakwe kusikugaluka kufinigwa?
Kamei na waya wasifinigwe chimutufi, ninga wakukola dilagiso wowalamula nyeye mwina umulundo wa matulumo na dikumbi, ninga mukubana dilagiso.
Kosoko iMuyahudi we chawelu nghakiyonesa kwa kunje, ama dikumbi dya chawelu siyo chinhu cha kunje ama cha chimutufi.

iMuyahudi wa chawelu no yuya iMuyahudi kwa kugati, na dikumbi dye chawelu dyuwa mumoyo, ayi ni mbuli ya chimuhe na siyo mawandiko du. Uleke munhu yahokele ditunyo siyo kulawa kuwanhu, ninga kwe Mulungu.
Kahi, iMuyahudi kena choni chongeseke ama ichambusi che dikumbi no chihoki?
Telele, chila hanhu. Kosoko kunghonga, Awayahudi hawenghigwa imbuli ye Mulungu.
Nhani ghona wamonga wasowile wanhu wakuhuwilika togoleni nonghamba kuleke kuhuwilika kwawo no kuleka kuhuwilika kwe Mulungu?
Gwe putu! Lekeni Mulungu yagendelele kuwa muchawelu hata nomowamonga wakuwa wadasi fina foitulumigwe,
“Uleke utaliligwe chawelu musimbuli sako,
na ukasume mwijuwa dyo uliganiso.”
Ninga inghowa wihi wetu unghagoloseka konesa ichawelu ye Mulungu, chigambeki kogamba Mulungu ni mwihi yakwigala nyono muchanhya yetu? (Nikulonga chimutufi.)
Gwe putu! Aho mbiya kodaha nhani Mulungu kuchiliganisa ichilunga?
Ninga inghowa kulokela udasi wangu ichawelu ye Mulungu yohigwa mwitunyo dyakwe, nhani nigendelele kuliganiswa kuwa mwihi?
Na nhani chinghalonge (kifana wamonga fowakuchisigila kwa kulonga gaya gochikulonga). “Chigolose gehile uleke maswanu geje?” Sigafu ye uliganiso wao ikuwagojela!
Chigambeki? Aseye Chiwayahudi chawaswanusi? Gwe putu! Kosoko nifulusa kuwalamula wose Awayahudi na Wayunani fina wowa hasi ya ludole lwe wihi;
fina foitulumigwe, kugamba,
“Hechaka muchawelu, hechaka hata yumwedu
hechaka yamanyile,
hechaka yakumuhananga Mulungu.
Wose wagilila, wose wagolosa wihi,
hechaka hata yumwedu yakugolosa uswanu,
hechaka hata yumwedu.”
“Malaka gawo ni makabuli gagubuligwe
wakutumiya malimi gawo kudanhilisa.”
“Usungu mukali wa majoka wuwa mumilomo yawo.”
“Milomo yawo imema kuligitisa na usungu lugano.”
“Migulu yawo ikubilima lumangho kwitila sakama;
Ubani na magayo gowa musinjila sawo,
na njila ye digoya wasiimanyile.”
“Wechaka chogoho cha Mulungu kumwande ya meso gawo.”
Hambiya chimanya fina chochose ichikulongigwa ne dilagiso, dikuwalonga waya wowile hasi ye dilagiso, uleke chila mulomo unyamale, na chilunga chose chilamuligwe ne Mulungu.
Kosoko “Hechaka munhu yene mutufi yakudaha kutaliligwa chawelu kwa kona” nhenda sa dilagiso, kosoko kulokela dilagiso no kwija kumanya kwe wihi.
Ninga hambiya, ichawelu ye Mulungu ifulusa konesigwa kahi kunje ye dilagiso, hata inghowa dilagiso ne wagonesi fikuhomelela imbuli ayi,
uchawelu we Mulungu kugendela dihuwi mwa Yesu Kilisito kwa wose wakuhuwila, kosoko kwachaka kubagula.
Kosoko awanhu wose wagolosa wihi na kuhungukiligwa ne ditunyo dye Mulungu;
wakutaliligwa chawelu chaka kwa njila ya dihewa, kulokela uhonya wuwile mugati ya Kilisito Yesu;
yalafigwe ne Mulungu kuwa maliho kwa sakama yakwe kwa waya wene dihuwi ukwakwe. Ayino hayuwa kosoko yo konesa uchawelu we Mulungu, kosoko muufinyilisi wakwe we chilungu nghaulangile uwihi wa katali;
hayuwa kuhomelela kwa chigele chino kuwa imwene imwecho ni muchawelu na yamutalile chawelu yuya iyakumuhuwila Yesu.
Kahi inyiyona yetu ikulawahi? Yahechaka. Kwa dilagiso dihoki? Kwa milimo ihoki? Ninga putu! Ninga kwa dilagiso dyuwile mwihuwi.
Kosoko chimanya fina munhu yakutaliligwa nhenda swanu ninga kwa ihuwi ninga siyo kwa kukola malagiso.
Ama iMulungu ni wa Wayahudi muhala? Si Mulungu wa Wamembe nheifiya? Heye na Wamembe nheifiya,
kosoko Mulungu ni yumwedu naye kawagolosa wechawelu wafinigwe kwa dihuwi dyawo, na wasifinigwe nawo kulokela dihuwi dyawo,
nong'amba chikubesa dilagiso kwa dihuwi dino? Putu! Ahanhu hakwe chikudimilila dilagiso.
Chilonge choni, kosoko ya Ibulahim iBaba yetu kwa chimutufi?
Kosoko inghowa Ibulahimu hakataliligwa nhenda swanu kwa njila ya milimo, kena chinhu cha kitunyila, ninga si hamwande ye Mulungu.
Kosoko matulumo gakugambaki? “Ibulahimu hakamuhuwila Mulungu, na haitaligwa kwe mwene fina Muchawelu.”
Hambiya kwa yuya yakutogoma mulimo, maliho siyo gakutaligwa kifana chinghwa, ninga kifana chinhu chimwagile.
Na kwa yuya inghakutogoma yakumuhuwila imwene iyakutalila wanhu awasimulungu, dihuwi dijo ditaligwa kifana uchawelu.
Nheifo Daudi yakulonga kwa kumotesa awaya wataliligwe chawelu ne Mulungu bila kugolosela milimo:
“Wamotesigwa wose awalekeleligwe wihi wao, na wihi wawo ugubikigwa.
Kamotesigwa munhu imwene
Mundewa nghemutalila uwihi wakwe.”
Togoleni mboto sino silongikwa ni kwa waya du wafinigwe ama na kwa wasifinigwe? Chikugamba, “Kwa Ibulahimu dihuwi dyakwe haditaligwa kuwa chawelu.”
Hakataliligwa finhani? Hayuwa foyowa yenghati yafinigwe? Hayowile ugele yafinigwe, ninga foyowile yekali.

Hakahokela chitangilo cha kufinigwa, mutojo wa ichawelu woyowile nawo kwa njila ya ihuwi chigele foyowa yekali kufinigwa. Hayuwa kumugolosa yowe Baba wa wose awakuhuwila hata ugele wasinati wafinigwe, ninga wena ichawelu yowataliligwe,
no nheifo yowe Baba wa waya wafinigwe, si kwa kufinigwa du ninga wandamile mbasi ye dihuwi adiya dyoyowile nadyo Baba yetu Ibulahimu chigele yenati yafinigwe.
Kwa dihuwiso dyoyakwija yahala, ichilunga hachilawile kwa Ibulahimu ama kwa lukolo lwakwe kwakulokela dilagiso, ninga kwa kulokela ichawelu ye dihuwi.
Kosoko inghowa awaya we dilagiso nowahasi, dihuwi digaluga dyachaka na dihuwiso nheifiya.
Kosoko dilagiso dikwigala nyono, ninga ahanhu hechaka ilagiso, basi hechaka ubanike.

Kosoko ya iyo dilagiso dima mwihuwi, uleke dihuwi dikale mwihewa na kuwa na nghinyo mulukolo wakwe wose, siyo du kwawakukola dilagiso, ninga kwa waya wakuhanga mwihuwi dya Ibulahimu (kosoko imwene ni Baba wa seye chose,
fina foitulumigwe, “Nikugolosa gweye uwe Baba wa mataifa mengi”) hamwande ye Mulungu imwene woyamuhuwile, iyakwinanga finhu ifisiuko na kufitenda fyuwe uko.
Yakuhuwila agasikuhuwilika, uleke yowe Baba wa mataifa mengi, “Kosoko yagaya galongigwe, no nheifo lukolo lwako usikwija utalika.”
Nghahunguke mwihuwi ugele foyadogage muchanhya ye mutufi wakwe, fowowile ufulusa kufa, (foyowa na minyaka kifana igana dimwedu) ne umusilatungulu we sinda se muke Sala.
Ghowile na manhonge muchanya ye dihuwiso dye Mulungu, ninga hakakula kwa ludole mwihuwi dyakwe na kumutunya Mulungu,
na kuhuwila fina Mulungu kogolosa gose goyamuhuwise.
Kamei “Hayitaligwa ukwakwe kuwa chawelu.”
Hambiya simbuli, “Haitaligwa ukwakwe,” haitulumigwe fina sikosoko yakwe muhala,
ninga naseye nase. Yotaliligwa na ukwetu naseye chikumuhuwila imwene yamwinule Yesu Mundewa wetu kulawa muchilalo,
iyalafigwe kufa kosoko ya wihi wetu na kwinuligwa kosoko ya kutaliligwa chawelu.
Hambiya, kosoko chitaliligwa chawelu kwa njila ya ihuwi, china digoya hamwedu ne Mulungu kulokela Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito,
kulawa muimwene chipata mboto mwiiyo chikwima; na chikitunyila dihuwi dyetu dyo kuhangila ditunyo dye Mulungu.
Na sididyo muhala, ninga kahi chikitunyila magayo, chimanya fina magayo gakwigala ufinyilisi,
na ufinyilisi ukwigala kupimigwa, na kupimigwa kukwigala ihuwi,
na dihuwi hadikudaha kumuleka munhu, kosoko wendo lwe Mulungu witiligwa mumimoyo yetu kwa njila ya Muhe Musunhile wochinghigwe.
Kosoko chigele fochahungukiligwe, muchigele chiswanu chikafike Kilisito hakofa kosoko ya wanhu awasimumanyile Mulungu.
Kosoko ni fikugutu munhu yafe kosoko ya muchawelu, ninga kosoko ya munhu muswanu yakudaha kufa.
Ninga Mulungu yakuchonesa wendo wakwe hata chigele fochowile wehi Kilisito hakofa kosoko yetu.
Ichikulu lugano hambiya, ni kutaliligwa chawelu kwa sakame yakwe, na chihonyigwa kulokela imwene ne inyono ye Mulungu.
Kosoko inghowa fochowile wanghondo hachilamuliligwa ne Mulungu kulokela difa dye Mwanagwe, nheifo chawelu lugano, kulamuliligwa, na kuhonyigwa kwa wumi wakwe.
Si nheifo du, ninga chikitunyila Mulungu kulokela Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito, muimwene hambiya chihokela ulamulo.
No nheifo, kifana wihi fowingile muchilunga kwa njila ya munhu yumwedu, na difa nadyo hadija kwanjila ya wihi, kamei difa hodikwenela kwa wose kosoko wose wagolosa wihi,
wihi hawuwa muchilunga hata chigele dilagiso disinati dije, ninga wihi usikutaligwa inghowa hechaka ilagiso.
Ninga difa hadyuwa uko kulawa Adamu mpaka Musa, na hadiwalongosa hata awasigolose wihi ufina wa Adamu umufano wa yuya yakwenda yeje.
Ninga ichighwa sichifanile wihi uya. Kosoko inghowa matewa wafa kosoko ya kubana kwa munhu yumwedu, nheifo chawelu dihewa dya munhu yumwedu Yesu Kilisito dyongeseka kosoko ya matewa.

Na ichinghwa chisikifanile wihi uya we munhu yumwedu. Kosoko uliganiso ukwandamila dikosa dye munhu yumwedu na kwigala uliganiso, ninga ichingwa ichene chikwandamila makosa mengi chikwigala kutaliligwa chawelu.

Kosoko inghowa kwa kubana kwa munhu yumwedu, difa dyenela kosoko ya yuya munhu yumwedu, yokuwa lugano kwawaya wakuhokela dihewa dimemile na chiya ichingwa che chawelu wohala uumi kwayuya munhu yumwedu, Yesu Kilisito.
Kahi fina uwihi wa munhu yumwedu fowigale difa kuwanhu wose, no nheifo igolosa ya uchawelu wa munhu yumwedu ikwigala uwumi na kulekeleligwa kuwanhu wose.
Kosoko ya kuleka kuwa na chogoho kwe munhu yumwedu wengi hawagolosa wihi, nheifiya kosoko ya chogoho cha munhu yumwedu wengi wokuwa wachawelu.
Ninga dilagiso hadingila, hamwedu nadyo ubani hawongeseka, ninga wihi fowongeseke dihewa dye Mulungu hadyongeseka lugano,
uleke kifana, wihi foukulongosa mudifa, nheifo dihewa nadyo dilongose mukutaliligwa chawelu, kwingila kuwumi wa majuwa gose kulokela Yesu Kilisito Mundewa wetu.
Togoleni chigambeki? Chigendelele muwihi uleke dihewa dyongeseke?
Gwe putu! Yokuwa nhani aseye chufile muwihi kahi chuwe womi muwihi?
Hamumanyile fina chose chibatisigwe mugati ya Kilisito Yesu hachibatisigwa mudifa dyakwe?
Kwanheifo hachisikigwa hamwedu naye kwa njila ya ubatiso mudifa, uleke kifana Kilisito foyenuke kulawa mudifa kwa itunyo dye Baba, ase nase chigende muusha we uwumi.
Hambiya halika chihanga naye mudifa kifana idyakwe, chohanga naye kahi mukwinuka kwakwe.
Chimanya fina unhu wetu wa katali usambasigwa hamwedu naye, uleke umutufi we wihi ubanigwe, uleke chinghowe watumwa wa wihi keli.
Kosoko imwene iyafile kalekeleligwa kutali ne wihi.
Ninga inghowa chufa hamwedu na Kilisito chikuhuwila chokwikala hamwedu naye.
Chimanya fina Kilisito, foyafulusa kwinuligwa mudifa, nghakufa keli; difa dichaka ludole muchanya yakwe keli.
Kosoko difa dyoyafile hakaufila wihi lumwedu du, ninga uumi woyowile nawo kenawo kosoko ye Mulungu.
Kosko iyo nanye dogeni muwecho kuwa wafile muwihi womi muKilisito Yesu.
Kwanheifo, munghaleke wihi ulongose mitufi yenu iikubanika na kuhulikisa sulumisi sakwe.

Munghagendelele kahi kulafa filungo fyenu fyuwe fiya fya kugolosa wihi, ninga kilafeni muwecho kwe Mulungu kifana wanhu walawile kudifa kwija kuwumi, na kulafa filungo fyenu kwe Mulungu fyuwe fiya fye ichawelu.
Kosoko iyo wihi wokuwa wichaka ulongosi mugati yenu, kosoko hamuwile hasi ye dilagiso ninga mudihewa.
Togoleni! Nong'amba chigolose wihi kosoko hachuwile hasi ye dilagiso, ninga hasi ye dihewa? Gwe putu!
Hamumanyile fina kwayuya wowose womukilafa ukwakwe kifana watumwa wakogoha, mugaluka watumwa ukwakwe wo mukogoha, hegu yuwe wihi ukulongosa kudifa ama chogoho ichikulongosa kuuchawelu?
Ninga yalumbigwe Mulungu kosoko anyeye, mowile watumwa wo wihi, mugaluka wanhu wakuhulika kulawa kufidoga kugati, amafuso ge umanyi uya womwekigwe hasi yakwe,
na mulekeleligwa kutali kulawa kuwihi, mugaluka mbiya watumwa we chawelu.

Nikulonga chimunhumunhu kosoko ye inyuwa yenu ye chimutufi. Kifana fomwakilafile filungo fyenu kuwa watumwa wa kugolosa mbuli so wihi mukulu na mukulusi, nheifo lafeni filungo fyenu fyuwe watumwa we kugolosa ichawelu kwa usunhile.
Kosoko fomowile watumwa wa wihi hamuwa kutali ne ichawelu.
Hamupata chotoko chaki majuwa gaya kwa kugolosa mbuli sa chinyala? Indumo ya mbuli aso ni difa.
Ninga hambiya mulekeleligwa kulawa wihi na kugolosigwa watumwa we Mulungu, chotoko cho mukupata ni usunhile. Na indumo yakwe uwumi wa majuwa gose.
Kosoko digelo dyo wihi ni difa, ninga ichinghwa che Mulungu ni uwumi wa majuwa gose mugati ya Kilisito Yesu Mundewa wetu.
Hamumanyile, wandugu sangu, kosoko nikulonga na waya awamanyile dilagiso, fina togoleni dilagiso dikumoha munhu nomo yemumi?
Ni kifana mwanamuke yatoligwe foyohigwe ne dilagiso kwe mulume nomo ye mumi; ninga mulume yanghafa yakuwa kalekeleligwa ne dilagiso muchanhya ye mulume.

No nheifo kokwinangwa kena ihabwa inghowa yakwikala na mulume yungi chigele mulume kabaho mumi. Ninga inghowa mulume yeja yafa, basi kalekeligwa ne dilagiso, na halika kotoligwa na mugosi yungi hakudaha yenangwe kena ihabwa.
No nheifo, wambuya sangu, hamufa mudilagiso kulokela mutufi wa Kilisito, uleke muwe kwa yungi ambaye no imwene yenuligwe mudifa uleke cheleke mamudyo kwe Mulungu.
Fochowa munhenda se chimutufi, musulumisi we wihi, ukulemana ne dilagiso hachitogoma milimo na kweleka mamudyo ga difa.
Ninga hambiya chilafigwa kulawa mudilagiso, mudifa idyachikolile muutumwa, uleke chitogome muusha na siyo munyuwa ya katali ye diwandiko, ninga mumikalile misha ye Muhe.
Hambiya chigambeki kahi? Togoleni idilagiso digaluka wihi? Du hata! Ninga woile si dilagiso sowile nikuumanya wihi, hata sowile nikumanya dilagiso dikugamba, “unghasulumile chinhu che miyago.”
Ninga wihi haupata luneka kwa diya dilagiso, na kweleka mugati yangu chila usulumisi wihile. Kosoko wihi muhala bila dilagiso ufa.
Hanuwa mumi fonowile nachaka dilagiso, ninga dikeje adiya dilagiso wihi winuka keli
kamei honikufa, kamei idilagiso dyonahuwile fina dyokwigala uwumi digaluka ifa ukwangu.
Kosoko wihi kwa kupata luneka mudilagiso, haunidanhilisa na kulokela didyo hounikoma.
