Kahe nikukutasa agwe nagwe, mwituma we chawelu, uwatase awanawake wano, kosoko hawagolosaga hamwedu naniye umulimo we mbuli swanu hamwedu na Kilemendi na awamonga wochagolosanyage umulimo, awandikwe masina gawo mu chitabu cho uwumi.
Bwedeleleni mwi Mundewa majuwa gose; kahi nikugamba, bwedeleleni.
Awanhu wose waumanye uholo wenu. iMundewa kamala keja.
Munghakiidase kwa mbuli yoyose, ninga kwa chila chinhu kwa kutasa na kufuga hamwedu ne dilumbo lekeni ifinhu fomukwenda fimanyike ne Mulungu.
Ne digoya dye Mulungu, idilokile umanyi wose, didime imimoyo yenu ne misungu yenu mu Kilisito Yesu.

Kumalagisa, wandugusangu, simbuli sose se chawelu, simbuli sose se chogoho, simbuli sose sichaka koneligwa, simbuli sose selile, simbuli sose so uyendo, simbuli sose se ditunyo diswamu, inghowa kwina chinhu chochose cha kutunya, dogeni simbuli senele siso.
Simbuli somukifusile na kuhokela na kuhulika na kona ukwangu, sigoloseni; ne iMulungu we toyoyo kokuwa hamwedu nanye.
Nina chinyemi mwe Mundewa lugano kosoko hambiya monesa ifyene fomowile hamwedu nani; hamuwa hamwedu nani chawelu, ninga hamuswela luneka.
Sikulonga gano kosoko nechaka chinhu nihungukiligwa; kosoko nghifusa kumemeswa na hali yoyose yoninayo.
Nimanya kuwa na finhu fikefu kahe nimanya kuwa na fingi; mu hali yoyose nikifusa isili yo kwiguta na kona njala, kuwanafyo na kuwa chaka.
Nina udaha wa kusuma simbuli sose mugati ye mwene iyekuniguma uludole.
Amba hamugolosa fiswamu, kwa kuwa hamwedu nani mumagayo gangu.
Kahe anyeye mo Wafilipi mowenyecho mumanya fina mu nghonga ye Injili, fonaleguke Makedoniya, hasowile na ikanisa dingi idyowile hamwedu nani mu ndafa na kuhokela ninga anyeye mwiwene;
kosoko hata kuya Sesalonike hamunigalila finhu fya kunisapusa siyo kamwedu amba majuwa itewa.
Munghagambe nikusulumila ifinhu fomwanyingile du; amba nikusulumila amamudyo ge nyongeseka yenu.
Ninafyo finhu fingi, na kongesekela; nimemelekela, mhokela kwa mukono wa Epafulodito ifinhu afiya ifilawile ukwenu, mhungile ya mafuta, sadaka yendeke, iikumwendesa Mulungu.
Ne Mulungu wangu yawamemeleseni chila chomukwenda ifyenele ugoli wakwe fouwile, mu ditunyo dhya Kilisito Yesu.
Kwe Mulungu wetu na Baba ditunyo dyuwe ukwakwe amajuwa gose. Hano.
Munamusile chila musunhile mugati ya Kilisito Yesu. Awandugusangu awowile na niye wekumulamusani.
Awasunhile wose wekumulamusani, awaya awowile mu nyumba ya Kaisali.
Dihewa dye Mundewa Yesu Kilisito dyuwe hamwedu ne fidoga fyenu.
Aniye Paulo mutumigwa wa Kilisito Yesu kwa wendo we Mulungu, na Timoseyo imundugusetu,
Kuwandugusangu awasunhile muchawelu ya Kilisito awowile Kolosai; Dihewa dyuwe nanye, ne idigoya dye Baba yetu Mulungu.
Chikumulumba Mulungu, iBabakwe we Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito amajuwa gose ichigele chochikuwatasila,
kosoko hachihulika dihuwi dyenu kwa Kilisito Yesu na uwendo womwinawo kuwasunhile wose,
kosoko ye dihuwi dyomwikiligwe kulanga. Mwihuwi didyo, hamuhulika katali simbuli sakwe se ichawelu ye Imbuli Swamu
iyafikile ukwenu, kifana foyowile muyisi yose, ikweleka mamudyo na kukula, kifana foyikukula ukwenu nako, kulawa dijuwa dyomwahulike na kumanya dihewa dye Mulungu muchawelu,
kifana fomwafusigwe na Epafula imwendigwa na mutumigwa miyetu. Kagaluka mutumigwa wa kuhuwilwa wa Kilisito ahanhu hetu
naye hakachitamila uwendo wenu ukwetu mu Muhe.
Kosoko yiyo, kukongela dijuwa dyochawahulike, chisilekile kumutasilani, kumutasa iMulungu yamumemeseni umanyi we isinhenda sakwe, no ubala womukwinghigwa ne Muhe wakwe.
Mugendelele kwikala ifene iMundewa foyakwenda na kugolosa gose agekumwendesa. Inyikala yenu yeleke mamudyo ge milimo yenu imiswamu kugendelela mu umanyi we Mulungu.
Mudahiswe no udahi wose, wo uludole wo ukulu wakwe, noho mudahe kufinyilisa na gose, hamwedu ne chinyemi;
mwingheni ilumbo iBaba iyachinghile kuhokela uhasi wa wasunhile mu ujelu.
Imwene hakachihonya muludole we chisa, na kuchisanyisila mu undewa we Mwanagwe mwendigwa;
iyekuchingha uhonya wo kulekeleligwa uwihi.
Imwene no futa ye Mulungu inghekoneka, mwelekwa we bosi we fyumbigwe fyose.

Kugendela imwene ifinhu fyose fyumbigwa, ifyuwile kulanga na ifyuwile muisi, ifikoneka na ifisikoneka; fyuwe fya magoda go undewa kahi magoda ga udaha, kahi ga ludole na udaha. Ifinhu fyose fyumbigwa kwa injila ye imwene kosoko ya imwene.
Naye yejayowa ugele ifinhu fyose na ifinhu fyose finghali fyuwe, na umwakwe ifinhu fyose fikikolelesa hamwedu.
Imwene no ditwi dyo umutufi, dikanisa; kahe imwene no nghonga, no mwelekwa we bosi wa awafile, imwene no chilongosi wa fyose.
Kosoko mugati yakwe hayendesa umemelesi wose we Mulungu wikale;
na kugendela imwene ifinhu fyose filamulwe foyafulusa kugolosa ihoso ne isakame yo musalaba wakwe; ifinhu fyose ifyuwile muisi na ifyuwile kulanga.
Anyeye, umowile aho bosi mulekigwa, kahe wanghondo mufidoga fyenu, kwe sinhenda senu sihile,
hambiha kamulamulani mumutufi wakwe, na kwa difa dyakwe, uleke yamwigaleni hamwande yakwe, wasunhile, mwichaka wihi,

mwikale mu dihuwi, mwikigwe muchanhya ye nghindiso, munghafumile kusingisigwa na kuleka dihuwi dye imbuli swamu iyahubiliigwe kwe ifyumbigwe fyose ifyuwile mu yisi; iyene aniye Paulo hanigaluka mutumigwa wakwe.
Hambiya nina chinyemi mu magayo goninago kosoko yenu; kahe nikugamemelesa mumutufi wangu amagayo agahunguke mumutufi wa Kilisito, kosoko yo umutufi wakwe, dikanisa,
dyonigaluke mutumigwa wo mulimo we Mulungu fina foninghigwe, kosoko yenu; umulimo wo kugolosa imbuli ye Mulungu inghamanyike.
Imbuli aiya iyafisigwe kulawa katali fyotoke ifyeleko fyose, hambiya igubuligwa ku wasunhile wose.
Mulungu iyendile kuwatamila ifene fouwile ugoli we ditunyo dye imbuli aino kuwamembe, uwo no Yesu mugati yetu dihuwilo dye ditunyo.
Yuyo nochikuwatamilisa imbuli yakwe, chikumujama chila munhu, na kumufusa chila munhu, mu umanyi wose uleke chimwigale chila munhu yamemelekele kwa Kilisito.
Nani nikiidasa kwa ludole lose kwe imbuli iyo, kwa udaha uukulawa ukwakwe uwuwile mugati yangu.
Kosoko nikuhananga anyeye mumanye ukulu we nyituma yangu kosoko yenu, na kosoko ya awoile Laodikiya, hamwedu na awanhu wose awasinimanyile;
uleke wahongesigwe mufidoga fyao, wakuhanganisigwa na uwendo, wakapate ugoli wose wa kumanya kwa chawelu, wamanye imbuli ifisigwe ye Mulungu na Kilisito imwenyecho,
iyina mugati yakwe ugoli wose wa ubala hamwedu no umanyi uwikigwe.
Nikumutamilani imbuli aino, imumhu yangheje yamudanhilisani kwa mbuli sa kukochelesa.
Hata ninghowa nahechaka chimutufi, mumanye fina nahamwendu nanye chimuhe, kwa nyemo kosoko ya kona ifene fomwimile chawelu mwihuwi dya Kilisito.
Hambiya fina fomumuhokele Kilisito Yesu, iMundewa, gendeleleni kwikala naye nhaifo;
mukijimbila na kujengwa naye; mugolosigwa ngwingwingwi mwihuwi, ifene fomufusigwe; na kugendelela mwi lumbo.
Langisiseni imunhu yanghawagolose kifana mwa watumwa kwa umanyi wakwe na udasi uwichaka chinhu, ifene awanhu we iyisi fowahokele, ifene amafuso age iyisi agakatali fogowile, nago ng'o si ga Kilisito.
Kosoko mugati yakwe mwina umemelesi wose we Mulungu, ifene fouwile mumutufi.
Nanye mumemelekela mugati yakwe imwene no ditwi dyo ukulu wose na undewa.
Mugati yakwe mufinigwa ku dikumbi disigolosigwe kwe imikono, kwa kuuhambula umutufi we inyama, kwa dikumbi digoloseke kwa njila ya Kilisito.
Kahe hamusikigwa hamwedu naye, mu ubatiso; na kwinuka hamwedu naye kwa kuhuwila uludole we Mulungu iyamwinule mudifa.
Nanye fomofile muwihi kuleka kufinigwa mumitufi yenu, hakawagolosa mwawomi hamwedu naye foyamalile kuchilekelela uwihi wetu wose;
foyamalile kuilegusa diwandiko dyoa uwihi wetu idyawandikwe kuchisongesa hoyailegusa inghowe baho kahi haibamandiligwa mumusalaba.
Foyamalile kuhambula ukulu na undewa na kusigubula kwa ludole, hakabwedelela naso mumusalaba uwo.
Hambiya imunhu yanghawaliganise nyeye mufyakudiya kahi ifinhu fyo kunywa, kahi kosoko ye sikukuu kahi kulawa ko umwesi kahi kosoko ye sabato.
Isimbuli aso hasuwa inyefu dya isimbuli isikwija; amba umutufi no Kilisito.
Imunhu yanghawahokeni digelo dyenu, kwa kinenela kwa kwenda kwake imwecho na kufuga malaika, kwa kigamba kwa magubulo gakwe na kiyona chaka kwa umanyi wakwe we chimunhu munhu;
kahe iyalekile kikolela ngwingwi mwitwi dyo umutufi. Kulawa imwene umutufi wose ukukula na kukoleleswa hamwedu ne ifilungo ne isinghwali, ukukula kwa udaha wa Mulungu.
Nghona mwafile hamwedu na Kilisito kulawa kumafuso agakatali agechilunga, nhani mukwikala kifana mwawanya muchilunga? Nhani mukugendelela kulongosigwa na malagiso,
Munghakole, munghawonje, munghakwafe
ifinhu afyo fyose fikubanika ugele wofikutumiigwa; na kugendelela kwandamila malagiso na mafuso ga awanhu?
Asino sikonesa kifana sina misungu, mumafugo gomukigolosele mowenyecho, na kufuga na kuudima umutufi kwa ukali; ninga gechaka ludole lwa kuwalemesa usulumisi wo mutufi.
Hambiya halika mwinuka muchilalo hamwedu na Kilisito, galangiseni agowile kuchanhya, koyowile Kilisito, kekala ku mukono wo kulume we Mulungu.
Dogeni agoile kuchanhya, siyo age muchilunga.
Kosoko hamufa, na uumi wenu ufisigwa hamwedu na Kilisito mwi Mulungu.
Ugele Kilisito foyawija yakoneke yuyo uwumi wetu, noho nanye mukwija mukoneka hamwedu naye mwitunyo dyakwe.
Kosoko yiyo, ikomeni chila mbuli iyihile ye chilunga iyuwile umwenu: Dihabwa, uwafu, kusulumila, magelegesi gehile, usulumisi wihile, na kufuga ifisikimunhu.
Kosoko ya gago inyono ye Mulungu ikwija.
Mugaga anyeye nanye hamugendela katali, fomowage mugago.
Amba hambiya gekeni kutali nanye ago gose: Inyono, fihi, uwihi, amaligo na amaligo mumilomo yenu.
Munghakidanhilise, kosoko mufulusa kuhambula uunhu wenu wa katali hamwedu ne sinhenda sakwe;
na kuufala uunhu musha, uukugolosigwa musha noho upate umanyi kifana imwenyecho iyawombile.
Aho hechaka Muyunani kahi Muyahudi, kufinigwa kahi kuleka kufinigwa, mugeni kahi mumataifa, mutumwa kahi isimutumwa, amba iKilisito no gose, na mugati ya gose.
Hambiya, kosoko mugaluka wanhu musaguligwe ne Mulungu, wasunhile umukwendigwa, faleni moyo wa ubasi, uswamu, unenenghesi, chogoho, uholo, na ufinyilisi,
mukitase na kilekelela, imunhu yanghowa kena mbuli ne miyagwe yamulekelele fina iMundewa foyawalekelele anyeye nanye mukilekelele nheifo.
Kahe, muchanhya yago gose kiyoheni uwendo no chifungo cha umemelesi.
Na digoya dya Kilisito dilamule mufidoga fyenu; nodyo mwenangiligwe, mumutufi umwedu, kahe muwe wanhu wa ilumbo.

Imbuli ya Kilisito ikale kwa umemelesi mugati yene, mukifuse na kijama chila munhu na miyagwe mu ubala wose, na kwimba sabuli na nyimbo, na nyimbo se Chimuhe; akuno mukumwimbila Mulungu kwe ilumbo dyose mufidoga fyenu.
Na chila chomukugolosa, kwa mbuli au kwa nhenda, goloseni gose mwisina dye Mundewa Yesu, akuno mukumulumba Mulungu Baba kugendela imwene.
Anyeye muwanawake muwahulike awalume senu, ifene foyagilwe mwi Mundewa.
Anyeye muwagosi, wendeni awake senu munghowe na ukali nawo.
Anyeye muwana wahulikeni awaBaba senu na awang'ina senu musimbuli sose; kosoko imbuli ayo ikumwendesa Mundewa.
Nanye muwaBabamunhu, munghawande awana wenu wangheje wafifihala mufidoga fyawo.
Anyeye muwatumwa muwahulike awakulu wenu we chilunga, musimbuli sose, siyo kiyonesa mumeso, kefana awekikomba kuwanhu, ninga kwa moyo muswanu akuno mukumogoha Mundewa.
Chila dyo mukugalosa goloseni kwa moyo, fina kwi Mundewa kahe si kwa wanhu,
mumanye nhafi mohokela kwe Mundewa uhasi kifana igelo dyenu; mukumutogomela Mundewa Kilisito.
Kosoko iyekupujila kohokela maliho go uwihi wakwe, kahe hechaka koneligwa.
Anyeye Muwakulu, wagoloseleni awatumwa wenu mu digoya na kuwengha foiwagile kwinghigwa, kosoko mumanye nanye fina mwina Mundewa kulanga.
Mugendelele lugano kutasa, na kuwa meso mu nhasa hamwedu na kulumba;
kahe muchitasile naseye, noho iMulungu yachikumulile mulango we imbuli yakwe, chilonge imbuli iyifisigwe ya Kilisito ilekile aniye nikohigwa,
noho nilonge, fonikwendigwa nilonge.
Muwe wabala na wose awowile kunje, na kugolosela digoya ichigele chomwinghigwe.
Isinonga senu suwe na ihewa amajuwa gose, sikolele munyu, mudahe kumanya foyagile kumubidula chila munhu.
iTikiko komutamilani simbuli sangu sose; imwene mwendigwa wangu kahe mutogomi yahuwilwe miyetu mu milimo ye Mundewa.
Nimutuma imwene ukwenu kosoko mumanye ifene fochuwile, kahi yawagumeni moyo,
kahe hamwedu na Onesimo, imundugusangu yahuwilwe, iyowile hamwedu nanye. Wowatamilani chila chinhu ichigoloseke ahano.
Alistaliko, iyohigwe hamwedu naniye, yakumulamusani; na Maluko imwihwawe wa Balinaba iyamwinghileni amalagiso yangheja ukwenu muhokeleni,
na Yesu iyekwinangigwa Yusito. Awo ni wanhu wafinigwe mugati ya watogomi wayangu kosoko yo undewa we Mulungu kahe wagendelela kunhasa lugano.
Epafula imwinya ukwenu, imutumigwa wa Kilisito Yesu, yekumulamusani, na kugolosa ludole majuwa gose kosoko yenu munhasa yakwe, uleke mwime ngwingwingwi na kugendelela chawelu kumwendesa Mulungu.
Kosoko nikumutamilani fina kagolosa kwa ludole kosoko yenu na kwa waya Laodikiya, na awoile Hielapoli.
Luka, imuganga mwendigwa, na Dema wekumulamusani.
Walamuseni awandugesetu awowile Laodikiya, na Nimufa, na dikanisa idyuwile munyumba yakwe.
Ibaluwa ino fomukufulusa kuyisoma, wengheni awayenu wa dikanisa dya Laodikiya waisome nawo; na ibaluwa iya yonawandikile awa Laodikiya wamwingheni nanye muisome.
Mugambeni Alikipo, Yakonye kuwugolosa umulimo woyenghigwe ne Mundewa.
Aniye Paulo, nyandika umulamuso uno kwa mukono wangu. Ngelegeleni muminyolo yangu. Dihewa dyuwe hamwedu nanye.
Paulo, Siliwano na Timoteyo.
Kudikanisa dya Wasesalonike dye Mulungu Baba ne Mundewa Yesu Kilisito: Mboto ne dihewa dyuwe na nyeye.
Chikumulumba Mulungu majuwa gose kosoko ya nyeye mose, ninga hachikuleka kuwatajani nomo chikutasa.
Ninga chikugelegela dihuwi ne milimo yenu ye uwendo kamei na kufinyilisa kwenu ne dihuwilo dyenu mwiMundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Kosoko chimanya wandugu setu wendigwa we Mulungu fina Mulungu yawasagula nyeye.
Kosoko imbuli yetu swanu haimwijilani nyeye si kwa nonga muhala ninga kwa ludole na Muhe Musunhile hamwedu na umanyi mukulu, kahi mumanya hachuwa wanhu wa aina yaki ukwenu,
nanye hamuwa wandamisi wetu na wandamilaji wa Mundewa kosoko ye imbuli iya yomuhokele kwa lwidaso mukulu, ninga kwa chinyemi chigumigwe na Muhe Musunhile;
Kamei homukuwa mufano muswanu ku Wakilisito wose woile Makedoniya na Akaya.
Ninga siyo kugamba imbuli ye Mulungu ikuhulikika ako ukwenu Makedoniya na Akaya du muhala ninga dihuwi dyenu mwi Mulungu dimanyike kose uleke seye chuwe chichaka dyokulonga
Kosoko awene awecho wakusimulila muchanhya yetu ifene fomwachihokele kamei fomwamubidukile Mulungu na kuleka kufuga fisikimunhu na kumutogomela Mulungu ye mumi ne wechawelu,
na kumugojela imwanagwe yakulawa kulanga imwene woyamulafile kulawa muchilalo, naye yuyo no Yesu iyakuchihonya seye na inyono inghulu ikwija.
Kosoko nyeye muwecho wandugu setu mumanya kwingila kwetu ukwenu fina kusowile chaka
ninga kwa kudumangisigwa na kugoloseligwa gehile kifana ako Filipi ni kosoko ye Mulungu du no ilekile chihubili imbuli swanu kwa njila ya magayo makulu.
Kosoko majamo getu gasilawile kwa makosa ama kwa wihi, na finju ihile,
ninga ni kosoko chipata luhusa kwe Mulungu na kuhuwilika ne inonga ye imbuli swanu hata nheifo chikulonga siyo kwa kwendesa wanhu ninga kwa kumwendesa Mulungu iyakugesa mimoyo yetu.
Fina fomumanyile ne Mulungu muhomelesi wetu hachejile kwa nonga sa kiyona ama ga uchoyo;
togoleni nong'amba hachija kiyonesa na kukongha kutogoligwa na wanhu, nikuwatamilani ninga si ukwenu kahi kuwamonga,
uleke chuwe watumigwa wa Kilisito. Na ninga hachuwa waholo mugati yenu kifana mwanamuke foyakulela chali chakwe imwecho.
Kwanheifo ase nase chikuwalelani nyeye na kuhangila siyo imbuli swanu du ye Mulungu ninga na fidoga fyetu nafyo, kosoko mugaluka wandugu lugano ukwetu.
Kosoko mukugelegela magayo getu na difuke wandugu setu hachitogoma milimo chilo na misi uleke chinghamutwike munhu wowose ikanda mugati yenu nomochikutamilisa imbuli swanu ye Mulungu.
Anyeye mwawahomelesi hamwedu ne Mulungu inyuwa yochowile nayo mugati yenu ya uswanu na moyo mujelu wichaka nonga ihile munghenda yetu ukwenu Wakilisito.
Fina fomumanyile hachimujama chila munhu mugati yenu kifana Baba yakulonga na wanagwe,
Hachiwagumo nghinyo na kuwatasani mwikale mikalile ikumwendesa Mulungu iyawenangileni muundewa wakwe imwecho we ditunyo.

Ase nase majuwa gose chikumulumba Mulungu kosoko yaiyo kosoko kulawa fomwaihokele imbuli ye Mulungu yomuhulike kulawa ukwetu hamuihokela siyo kifana mbuli ya munhu ninga ye ichawelu ye Mulungu iikutogoma milimo mugati yenu.

Hambiya nyeye wandugu sangu liganeni na muwe kifana makainisa ge Mulungu muKilisito Yesu gowile Yudea, kosoko nanye hamutabika mumagayo gagaya kuwanhu we ditaifa dyenu muwecho fina fowagoloswe wamonga na Wayahudi
fina fowamukomile Mundewa Yesu hamwedu na wagonesi, na kuchitaga seye kunje; hawamudesa Mulungu na kumulema chila munhu
kwa njila ya kuchihindila seye chinghawahubiliye wamembe uhonyi uleke wagolose nhenda sawo so wihi majuwa gose. Ninga inyono ye Mulungu iwejila kundumo.
Ninga kwa seye wandugu setu hata inghowa hachikiyonile kwa chipisi ni kwa chimutufi ninga kwa fidoga hachihananga lugano kuwonani meso kwa meso.
Kosoko hachihananga kwija ukwenu lumwedu hadodo Aniye Paulo kwija ninga Shetani hakachihindila njila.
Kosoko ihuwi dyetu, chiyemi chetu na nghofiya yetu ya undewa yoni halika sinyeye kumwande ye Mundewa wetu Yesu chigele cho kwija kwakwe
Kosoko nyeye no ditunyo dyetu na chinyemi chetu!
Kamei hambiya fochasumwa kugojela lugano hachona ni fiswanu chilekigwe ako Asene.
Kamei hachimutuma Timoseyo, mundugu setu mutogomi milimo miyetu kwe Mulungu mukuhubili imbuli swanu ya Kilisito uleke yawagume ludole mwihuwi dyenu na kuwagumani moyo.
Na fina munhu wowose yanghaganiswe na magayo gano kosoko nyey muwecho mumanya fina agano nogo chinangiligwe.
Kosoko fochowile hamwedu na nyeye, hachiwatamilani kumwande fina chotabika na kugaya kifana fomonile.
Ayo noilekile nimutuma Timoseyo kosoko ya kusumwa kugojela uleke kumanya dihuwi dyenu; Hanuwa na itisi fina nhegela mugesa kwagesani na mulimo wetu ugaluka wachaka chakasi ukwenu.

Ninga hambiya Timoseyo koya kulawa uko ukwenu na kuchitamilani mbuli swanu muchanhya ye dihuwi dyenu na wendo wenu. Kachitamila fina mukuchigelegela chila ijuwa na kuhananga kuchona kifana seye fochikwanga kumonani nyeye.
Hambiya wandugu setu chigumigwa ludole lugano kulawa mumagayo na gose gochilokele kosoko ye dihuwi dyenu.
Kosoko hambiya chikwikala halika nyeye mokwima ngwingwi MwiMundewa
Chomulumba Mulungu ilumbo dyaki ikulu halika nyeye mukwima gwi kosoko ye chinyemi chochinacho kwe Mulungu wetu.
Chilo na misi chikutasa kwa ludole fina chodaha kiyona meso kwa meso na kongesela gaya gahunghuke mwihuwi dyenu.
Hambiya Mulungu Baba yetu imwecho na Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito yachilongose njila ya ukwenu.
Mundewa yawongese na kuwamemelesa uwendo wakwe nyenye kwa nyenye na kwa wose, kifana seye fochimemile wendo ukwenu.
yaigolose mimoyo yenu ime ngwi muusunhi uleke muwe wanhu wechaka wihi kumwande ye Mulungu na Baba chigele cho kwija Mundewa wetu Yesu hamwedu na wasunhile wakwe wose.
Hambiya ichisigale wandugu sangu chikuwatasani dedede mwisina dye Mundewa Yesu kifana fomukifusile kulawa ukwetu fina mukonye kwikala imikalile iyo ikumubwedesa Mulungu.
Kosoko mumanya amasigilisi go chamwinghileni kulawa kwe Mundewa Yesu.
Nago nogo yakwenda iMulungu fina nyeye musunhingwe mulekane na dihabwa;
Fina chila munhu mugati yenu yamanye kwikala no Mutufi wakwe muusunhi na fiswanu.
Inghowe kwa usulumisi wihile kifana wanhu wasimumanyile Mulungu.
Hanghowe na munhu yamugolosele miyagwe wihi kosoko Mulungu noyakuliha wihi kwa wihi fina fochiwatamileni kunyuma na kuwajamani lugano.
Kosoko Mulungu hachinangile muuwihi ninga muusunhi.
Hambaya nong'amba imunhu iyakuuilema imbuli yakuwa nghalemile mbuli ya munhu ninga ya Mulungu yakumwinghani Muhe wakwe Musunhile.
Hambiya muchanhya ya uwendo chila munhu na miyagwe ichaka haja munhu yawaandikile, kosoko nyeye muwecho mufusigwa ne Mulungu kiyenda nyenye kwa nyenye;
kosoko mukugolosa kuwandugu wose woile Makedoniya ninga chikuwatasa mugendelele kwa ludole.
Kahi mukitulise na kugolosa milimo yenu kwa mikono yenu muwecho kifana fochiwalagise,
uleke muwe wanhu waswanu kuwanhu woile kunje na uleke munghamwegamile munhu wowose.
Ninga wandugu sangu hachikwenda munghamanye chochose muchanya ya wanhu wafile uleke munghowe na lutwitwi kifana wanhu wechaka ihuwi.
Kosoko inghowa chikuhuwila fina Yesu hakofa na hakenuka muchilalo basi kulokela iyo na waya wafile mwa Yesu Mulungu yakwija yawalafa muchilalo.
Hambiya chikuwatamilani gano kwa mbuli ya Mundewa, fina aseye chiwomi na awakusigala mpaka chigele cho kwija Mundewa chawelu hachikwija chiwalongolela waya wafile.
Kosoko Mundewa imwenyecho na lwinango hamwedu na malaika wakwe mukulu ne dijwi dye digunda dye Mulungu fodulika kulawa kulanga, kamei wafile muKilisito nowakukonga kwinuligwa.
Kamei aseye chiwomi, chisigale chodakigwa muchanhya mumafunde na chokuwa ne Mundewa minyaka na minyaka.
Kigumeni nghinyo nyenye kwa nyenye kwa mbuli sino.
Hambiya wendigwa wangu kwa mbuli ya fipisi na figele ichaka haja niwaandikile,
kosoko nyeye muwecho mumanya fiswanu fina dijuwa dye Mundewa dikwija kifana muhiji nhechilo.
Nomowakugamba, “kwina digoya na kusalama,” wihi noho ukuwejila kwa kusinhukisa kifa mwanamuke nomo yakwijiligwa na usungu wo kwelekwa na kwichaka kinega!
Ninga nyeye, wendigwa hamuwile mwichisa, mpaka dijuwa diya diwejile kifana muhiji bila kumanya;
Kosoko nyeye mose mwa wana wa ujelu na wana wa nhemisi aseye siyo wana wa nhechilo ama wa ichisa.
Hambiya chinghagone kifana wamonga fowakugona, ninga chuwe meso na kulanga.
Kosoko awakugona wakugona nhechilo na awakulewa wakulewa nhechilo.
Ninga kulawa chuwe muujelu, basi chuwe meso, na kufala ngulo ye chuma ye dihuwi na wendo, na kofiya ye dihuwi dye uhonyi ukulawa mwe Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito,
kosoko Mulungu hachikile kwa nyono ninga chipate uhonyi mwiMundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito,
iyafile kosoko yetu, uleke inghowa chameso ama chigona chuwe womi hamwedu naye.
Kahi kiingheni moyo nyenye kwa nyenye na kijenga kifana fomukugolosa.
Ninga wandugu chikuhananga muwamanye waya wakugaya kosoko yenu na kuwemilani mwiMundewa na kuwajamani.
Wagoloseleni fiswanu muuwendo, kosoko ya milimo yawo. Muwe na dihewa mugati yenu muwenyecho.
Na chikuwatasani wandugu, wajameni awekale fibi, wagumeni moyo wofile fidoga, wataseni wasokile, muwe wafinyilisi na gose.
Hanghowe mugati yenu na munhu yakumuliha miyagwe dihile kwa dihile, ninga majuwa gose konheni kigolosela maswanu munhu na miyagwe na wose.
Muwe na chinyemi majuwa gose.
Taseni bila kuleka.
Lumbeni kwa chila mbuli; kosoko nhafo nofoyakwenda Mulungu mwa Kilisito Yesu ukwenu.
Munghamulemese Muhe.
Munghaubese ugonesi we Mulungu.
Ninga geseni chila chinhu koleni amaswanu;
kaleni kutali na chila dihile.
Mulungu we digoya imwecho yawasunhe lugano fidoga na mimoyo yenu na mitufi muwe waswanu chigele cho kwija kwakwe Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Iyawenangileni yakuhuwilika na kogolosa gano.
Wandugu chitasileni.
Walamuseni wose wandugu kwa mulamuso usunhile.
Nikuwalagisa kwa ludole fina wandungu wose wasomeligwe ibaluwa ino.
Mboto ya Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito yuwe hamwedu nanye.
Paulo, Siliwano na Timoseyo,
Kudikanisa dyuwile Sesalonike mwi Mulungu Baba ne Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito:
Mboto yuwe ukwenu ne idigoya kulawa kwe Mulungu Baba ne Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Chikulumba Mulungu majuwa gose kosoko yenu, wandugu setu kosoko dihuwi dyenu dikukula lugano na fina wendo we chila munhu ne miyagwe ukugendelela.
Hambiya aseye chiwecho chikiyona kosoko yenu mumakanisa ge Mulungu kosko yo ludole lwo mwinawo na dihuwi mumagesa na magayo gose gomukulokela.
Ago gose gakonesa fina ulamulaji we Mulungu wa chawelu uleke mutaliligwe fina mukwingila muundewa we Mulungu uwo womukwidasika nawo.
Muchawelu yakwe Mulungu kowaliha magayo awaya awakumugolosani nyeye mugaye,
na kuwaliha nyeye mukwidasika chinyemi hamwedu na seye, nomo yakwijayagubuligwa Mundewa Yesu kulawa kulanga na malaika wakwe wene uludole
ne dililimba dye umoto kuwatosa awaya wamulemile Mulungu na awaya awasikwenda kuhulika imbuli swanu ye Mundewa wetu Yesu.
Nawo wakwija wagaya muuliganiso wa magayo ge minyaka na minyaka, kubaguliwa mumeso ge Mundewa na muditunyo dyakwe dikulu,
mudijuwa didyo dyoyakwija yatunyigwa na wasunhile wakwe na majumo ge dijuwa didyo muwanhu wakwe wamuhuwile kosoko uhomelesi wetu ukwenu hauhuwilika.
Hambiya chikutasa majuwa gose kosoko yenu uleke Mulungu wetu yawataleni fina mukufaha mu lwinango lwakwe yawamemeleseni chila chiswanu ne umulimo we dihuwi,
uleke disina dye Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito ditunyigwe.
Hambiya imbuli yo kwija kwakwe Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito na kitang'anyila kwetu ne mwene
chikuwatasani wandugu setu ingawagumeni lutwitwi mumadoga genu ama kuwenghani itisi ninga dya muhe ama mbuli kahi baluwa kulawa ukwetu konesa kifana dijuwa dye Mundewa difulisa kwija.
Na ninga munhu wowose yanghawadanhilise mudyodyose; kosoko dijuwa diya disikwija mpaka yalawanise imwihi iyalugutisigwe kumoto, imwana wo ubani
iyakulema na kiinula imwenyecho muchanhya mwa chila chikwinangwa mulungu ama ichikufugamiligwa, uleke yekale mwigoda dye dihekalu dye Mulungu, na kigamba imwene noMulungu imwecho.
Musikugelegela fina haniwatamilani simbuli sino kunyuma yakwe fonowile na nyeye?
Na hambiya mumanya ichikulemesa yanghalawanise, kolawanisa nomo chigele chwakwe chifikile.
Kosoko wihi hambiya ufulusa kukonga milimo yakwe, ninga mpaka iyakulemesa nomoyalegusigwe.
Na nomo imwihi yakulawanisa yuyo yekwija yabanigwa ne Mundewa Yesu kwa muye kulawa mumulomo wakwe na kumubulaga fibi kwa ugubulo wo kwija kwakwe.
Inija yakwe imwihi yo ni kifana nija ya Shetani mutogomi milimo na majumo makulu na fitangilo fyo udasi
na chila wihi kuwanhu waya awakwagilila, kosoko hawalema kuhonyigwa.
Kosoko iyo iMulungu yakuwatumila ludole lwa lwa wihi kuwalongosa kuhuwila go udasi,
Uleke waliganiswe wose awasihuwile ichawelu ninga hawandamila gehile.

Ninga chikumulumba Mulungu majuwa gose kosoko yenu nyeye wandugu setu wendigwa ne Mundewa kosoko Mulungu hakawasagulani nyeye muwe mamudyo ge nghonga muuhonyi kulokela kusunhigwa na Muhe na kuhuwila ichawelu.
Kosoko iyo hakawenangani kulokela mahubili ge imbuli swanu uleke mupate ditunyo dye Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito.
Hambiya wandugu setu imeni ngwingwingwi na kukolelesa mafuso gomukifusile ukwetu gowe ga mbuli mulomo ama baluwa.
Na Mundewa wetu Yesu imwenyecho ne Mulungu iBaba yachendile na kulokela mboto yakwe kachingha umi uholile na ihuwi iswanu,
yaigume ludole mimoyo yenu na kihuwisa muchila mulimo muswanu na mbuli.
Wandugu sangu nikumalagisa kwa kugamba taseni kosoko yetu uleke imbuli ye Mundewa igendelele lugano mugati yenu,
kamei nase chinghogwile mumikono ya wanhu wehile kosoko siyo wose wene dihuwi.
Ninga Mulungu muchawelu kowenghani ludole na kuwadimani na wihi.
Ninga china ihuwi mwiMundewa fina mukugolosa na mogolosa gochimusigilileni,
kahi Mundewa kowalongosa mimoyo yenu kuuwendo we Mulungu na muunyima ya Kilisito.
Hambiya chikuwalagisani wendigwa wetu mudisina dye Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito fina mulafeni mugati yenu imundugu wowose imudoba kosoko siyo malagiso kulawa ukwetu hata.
Kosoko anyeye muwecho mumanya fomukuhanangikwa kulondela ukwetu aseye fochowile na nyeye sichowile wadoba hata.
Sichidiile ndiya ya munhu na kuleka kuliha, ninga kwa ifuke misi ne chilo hachitogoma milimo uleke chinghamukache munhu wowose ikanda.
Ninga siyo kosoko sichagiligwe kuduya ila ni kosoko chuwe mbasi ya kwandamila wamonga.
Kahi hata fochowile na nyeye hachilagisa fina munhu wowose inghakutogoma mulimo indiya nayo yanghadiye.
Kosoko chikuhulika ukwenu wamonga wasikwenda kutogoma milimo ninga wadiyage ichikutogomigwa na wayawo muhala.
Hambiya wanhu kifana wo chikuwatasa na kuwalagisa mwisina dye Mundewa Yesu Kilisito watogome milimo kwa ludole uleke wapate chakudiya.
Wandugu munghasoke kugolosa maswanu.
Halika munhu yakulema kukola gatulumwe mubaluwa ino basi mughahangane naye uleke yapuwe.
Munghawone kifana wanghondo ninga wajameni kifana wandugu.
Hambiya Mundewa we dihewa yawengheni ihewa chigele chose na mugose. Mundewa yowe nanye mose.
Aniye Paulo, nikuwandika baluwa ino kwa mukono wangu nimwecho. Awuno no muwandiko wangu muchila baluwa yangu; nofonikoniandika.
Imboto ye Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito yuwe nanye mose.
Paulo, mutumigwa wa Kilisito Yesu ku dilagiso dye Mulungu Mwihula wetu na wa Kilisito dihuwi dyetu,
Ku Timoseyo gomwanangu we chawelu mwi huwi: Dihewa, ubasi ne digoya kulawa kwe Mulungu iBaba na Kilisito Yesu iMundewa wetu fyuwe nagwe.
Ifene fonakulagise gweye usigale Efeso ichigele chonalutage Makedoniya, uleke uwalemese awanhu wamonga wanghafuse mafuso gengi,
kahi wanghakiingise musisimo isichaka chinhu kahi musimbuli sinhali sa wagono isikwigala ulukani kusuma amafuso ge chimulungu mwi huwi;
ninga isoko ye dilagiso dyetu ni uwendo uwukulawa mu moyo mujelu ne chidoga chiswanu ne dihuwi idichaka chimwefe.
Awanhu wamonga kwa kuswela gano wabidukila simbuli sibwalate.
Wenda inyuwa wafusaji wa malagiso, akuno wasimanyile chowekulonga kahi simbuli sowekudindilisa.
Hambiya chifulusa kumanya fina dilagiso dikugaluka iswanu kwe munhu iyekuditogomela munjila ye chawelu,

yanghaimanya imbuli ino, fina dilagiso sidikiligwe awachawelu ninga awabanaji kahi awechaka chogoho, kosoko ya awechaka Mulungu kahi we sisambi, kosoko ya awechaka usunhile kahi awehi, kosoko ya wakomaji wa waBaba sawo na wakomaji wa wanghina sawo, kosoko ya wakomaji,
kahi awedihabwa, kahi awekuduwa na wanhu munjila ye cholo chikulu, awahijaji wa wanhu, kahi awadasi, kahi awekilaha kwa udasi, kahi na mbuli yoyose iisikifumilisa na na mafuso go uwumi,
ifene foilongingwe mu Mbuli Iswanu ye ditunyo ye Mulungu we imboto yonyikiligwe.
Nikumulumba Kilisito Yesu Mundewa wetu, iyanigumile ludole, kosoko hakanyona namuchawelu hakanisagula mumulimo wakwe.
Hamwedu katali hanimutofulaga na kumudumangisa na kumudesa imwene; ninga hanihokela ubasi kosoko hangolosaga gago kwa kuleka kumanya na kuswela dihuwi,
kahi dihewa dye Mundewa wetu hadyongeseka lugano ukwangu hamwedu na dihuwi na uwendo ifyuwile mu Kilisito Yesu.
Ni mbuli ya chawelu kahi yagila kuhuwiligwa lugano, ing'amba Kilisito Yesu yeja muchilunga kuwehula awena sisambi. Aniye no we nghonga wa awena sisambi;
ninga hanipata ubasi kosoko ino, uleke mu niye we inghonga, Yesu Kilisito yonese umemelesi wo ufinyilisi wakwe, uwe ifuso ku wose awakawomuhuwila imwene kosoko yo uwumi wa majuwa gose.
Kwe Mundewa wa majuwa gose, inghekufa, inghekoneka, iMulungu ye iwene, chogoho na ditunyo fyuwe naye majuwa gose. Hano.
Dilagiso dino nikukwingha gweye, Timoseyo, gomwangu, ifene simbuli sa wagonesi fosalongile mchanha yako, uleke musiso uilewe inghondo iya fiswamu,
uwe na dihuwi na chidoga chiswamu. Kwa kuleka ichidoga chiswamu, awanhu wamonga wogwa na kwagilisa dihuwi,
mugati yawo waumo cha Himenayo na Isikanda, wonimulekele Shetani uleke yawafuse wanghamutofule Mulungu.
Iyilongolele sose, nikuhananga inhasa, kutasa, utasaji na malumbo figoloseke kosoko ya wanhu wose,
kosoko ya wandewa na wose awena udaha, uleke chikale mikalile ye toyoyo ye chimulungu ne migendele miswanu
Imbuli ni swanu, kahi ifumilwa ne Mulungu Mwihula wetu,
iyekuhananga awanhu wose wehuligwe kahi wamanye ichawelu.
Kosoko kwina Mulungu yumwedu, kahi kwina mulamusi yumwedu hagati ya Mulungu na wanhu, imunhu Kilisito Yesu,
iyakilafile imwenyecho yowe mwihula wa wose, uhomelesi uwejile kwa ichigele chakwe.
Kosoko ino hanisaguligwa nyuwe muhubili kahi mutumigwa (Nikulonga chawelu, Aniye sikudanha), na mwalimu wa Wamembe mwihuwi ne chawelu.
Nikuhananga awagosi watase chila hanhu, wenule imikono misunhile chaka nyono hegu kugomba.
Nheigo kahi awanawake wakihambe suke sa usindamafu, hamwedu na chogoho kahi moyo wichaka makulu, si kwa kushuka njili hegu kwa sahabu na mawe gakwakaika hegu kwa suke sa maliho makulu,
ninga kwa sinhenda siswanu, ifene foiwagile awanawake awekumufuga Mulungu.
Imwanamuke yefuse muusindamafu na kwa chogoho chose.
Sikumwingha mwanamuke luneka lwa kufusa hegu kuwalongosa wagosi; yekuhanangigwa yanyamale twi.
Kosoko Adamu noyakonga kumbigwa, kamei Hawa;
kahi Adamu siyadanhiliswa, ninga imwanamuke noyadanhiliswa na kugwila muwihi.
Ninga imwanamuke kodaha kwihuligwa kugendela icheleko chakwe, yanghagendelela mwihuwi na uwendo na usunhile hamwedu na usindamafu.
Ilongwa chawelu: Imunhu iyekuhananga yowe asikofu, yekwenda mulimo muswanu.
Ninga yagila asikofu yowe munhu inghekutofuligwa, mulume wa muke yumwedu, musindamafu kahi kena mahala, munhu wa digoya, munhu wa chise, iyadahile kufusa,
si mulewaji wo ugimbi, si mutowaji wa wanhu, ninga muholo, si mubuni kahi yanghowe mwenda mapesa.
Yowe iyekwimila inyumba yakwe fiswanu, iyamanyile kuwajama awanagwe wowe wasindamafu na chogoho mumikalile yose;
kosoko imunhu inghamanyile kwimila inyumba yakwe digoya, kodaha nhani kulongosa dikanisa dye Mulungu?
Kahi yanghowe munhu yamuhokele Yesu majuwa makefu, yangheje yakiyona na kugwila muuliganiso wa Shetani;
kahi yagila yowe yakuhomelelwa masanu na wanhu wose awowile kunje, uleke yanghogwile mumatofulo na mumuheto wa Shetani.
Nheifo kahi, yagila awatogomi wowe wasindamafu, si wa malimi meli, si walewaji wo ugimbi, siwasulumilaji wa mapesa;
wakolelese isili ye dihuwi ne chidoga chiswanu.
Kahi yagila wamule kugesigwa; kamei wanghoneka wanjelu wagolose umulimo wo utogomi.
Awake sawo nawo, wowe wasindamafu, si wasigilaji, wanhu we digoya, wahuwiligwe musimbuli sose.
Imutogomi yowe mulume wa muke yumwedu, kahi iyekwimila awanagwe digoya mukaya yakwe.
Kosoko awekugolosa digoya umulimo wo utogomi wekupata itunyo iswanu awenyecho kahi wechaka woga mwihuwi idyuwile mu Kilisito Yesu.
Nikukwandikila sino mhuwile kwija ukwako chimwande,
ninga ninghasulukuka, udahe kumanya ifene foiwanogele awanhu kuwa munyumba ye Mulungu, nadyo no dikanisa dye Mulungu imumi, isumbi ne inghindiso ye chawelu.
Hechaka manhonge, isili ye ifuga igaluka nghulu: Hakoneswa mumutufi, na kumanyika mu Muhe, hakonigwa na wamalaika hakahubiliigwa muwamembe hakahuwiligwa muchilunga na kwinuligwa kuchanhya mwitunyo.
Hambiya iMuhe yakulonga bila chifiso nhafi ifigele fye indumo awamonga wokitemanula ne dihuwi na kuhulikisa imimuhe yo udasi na mafuso ga magini,
kwa udasi wa wanhu awekulonga udasi, akuno ifidoga fyawo fikwaka moto,
wakuwalemesa awanhu wanghakitole na kuwagamba wenege ne fyakudiya ifyumbigwe ne Mulungu fihokeligwe kwe ilumbo, na wose awena dihuwi kahi awamanyile ichawelu.
Kosoko chila chinhu chumbigwe ne Mulungu chigaluka chiswanu, kahi hechaka ichilemigwa chinghahokeligwa kwe ilumbo;
kosoko chihojojolwa ne imbulu ye Mulungu na kutasa.
Unghawengha amafuso gano awandugu, kokuwa mutogomi muswamu wa Kilisito Yesu, akuno ukugendelela musimbuli se dihuwi na mumafuso maswanu gowandamile.
Unghandamile sisimo se chibwalasi sa katali isichaka ulungu. Kifuse gomwenyecho imikalile ye chimulungu;
kosoko inghowa inyifusa amafuso ge chimutufi inoga, ninga inyifusa amafuso ge chimulungu inoga lugano musimbuli sose, kosoko ina ilagano dyo uwumi wa hambiya na uya we chigele chikwija.
Inonga ino ya chawelu kahi yagila kufumiligwa.
Kosoko mpaka kundumiliso ino chikiidasa na kupiligala, kosoko china ihuwi mwi Mulungu imumi, Mwihula wa wanhu wose, lugano awahuwile.
Lagisa kahi fusa simbuli sino.
Imunhu wowose yanghaubese ujelelo wako, ninga uwe chinhu cha kifusila kuwahuwile mu nonga na mumigendele na muwendo na mwihuwi na mumikalile miswanu.
Mpaka fonikwihja, piligala mu soma na kujama na kufusa.
unghaleke kuchitogomela ichise che Mulungu chuwile mugati yako, choninghigwe kwa ugonesi na kwa kwikiligwa mikono na wasehe.
Wandamila gano, wikale mugago, uleke wanhu wose wone ifene foukugendelela.
Kituse ne chidoga chako, na mafuso gako; gakolelese kosoko kwa kugolosa nheifo kodaha kihonya agweye gomwenyecho na wekukuhulikisa.
Unghamugombele imusehe, ninga mulolese kefana Babako; wagolosele awajelelo kefana wanduguso,
awadala kifana wang'inasako, awanawake wadodo kifana welumbuso muuya wose.
Uwe na chogoho ku wanawake wegane, awegane chawelu chawelu.

Imwanamuke mwigane yanghowa na wana ama wajukulu, leka wende kifusa simbuli se ifuga ukaya ukwawo kamei kamei wawagolosele digoya awaBaba sawo na wang'ina sawo; kosoko imbuli yo ifumiligwa ne Mulungu.
Ninga imwene imwigane chawelu chawelu, kalekigwa yemwene, yuyo keka dihuwi dyakwe mwi Mulungu, naye kogendelela mu kutasa na inhasa chilo ne misi;
ninga imwanamuke inghodaha kisisa imwenyecho kafulusa kufa hata yanghowa yekali mumi.
Uwenghe amalagiso gano, uleke wanghowe na ilema.
Imunhu wowose inghekuwatasa awanhu wo ukwakwe, nong'amba awanhu we inyumba yakwe kafulusa kulema dihuwi dyakwe kahi kagaluka mwihi kusuma imunhu inghahuwile.
Imwigane yanghawandikigwe mpaka yafike minyaka makumi mutandatu, naye hakowa muke wa mulume yumwedu;

naye yowe kahomelelwa sinhenda siswanu, yanghowa kakusa wanagwe fiswanu, iyawagolosele ihewa wageni, yanghowa kawanasha wasunhile migulu, yanghowa kawatasa awekudumangiswa, kahi iyakilafile kugolosa sinhenda siswanu.
Ninga lema kuwawandika awegane wa disika didido; kosoko wanghakolwa no usulumisi we chimutufi fonghekwenda Kilisito wohanga kutoligwa,
nawo wagila uliganiso kosoko wabena ichipingo chawo cha bosi.
Kahi hamwedu nag ago, wakifusa kuwa wadoba, kwa kusunguluta nyumba kwa nyumba, kahi si udoba du, ninga wagaluka wahehaji kahi wasakusaku, wakulonga simbuli isisiwagile kulonga.
Hambiya nikuhananga awegane we disika didodo watoligwe, walele wana, walongose sinyumba sawo, uleke wanghamwinghe imunghondo luneka lwa kuchitofula seye.
Kosoko awamonga wafulus kubiduka na kumwandamila Shetani.
Inghowa hena mwanamuke dikanisa dinghowe na musigo, uleke diwatase wamonga, awegane chawelu chawelu.
Awasehe awekulongosa fiswanu yagila wenghigwe maliho keli, nawo no waya awekutogoma umulimo wo kuhubili na kufusa.
Kosoko diwandiko dikugamba “Unghayowe mulomo ing'ombe youkutogomela umilimo wo kutowa uhemba mu chuga inghadiye simhule”, kahi “imutogomi yagila yahokele maliho gakwe.”
Unghafumile usongesi ku imusehe, ninga imbuli iyo ihomelelwe na wahomelesi weli hegu wadatu.
Awaya awekugendelela mu sambi, uwagombele mumeso ga wose, uleke wamonga wogohe.
Nikukulagisa mumeso ge Mulungu na Kilisito Yesu na wamalaika wasagulwe, ugolose gano bila kuliganisa chimwande hegu kwa konela.
Unghamwikile munhu mikono chimwande, kahi unghakigume musisambi wa wanu wamonga; ikala mikalile ye uuya.
Unghonywe meji muhala, ninga gimbi chidodogi kosoko ya sinda sako, ne sinhamu isikukwidasa chila chigele.
Sisambi sa wanhu wamonga sa hajelu, silongola ku uliganiso, ninga sisambi sa wamonga sikuwandamila ichigele chikwija.
Nheifo kahi sinhenda siswanu sa hajelu; kahi asiya isikoneka sisidaha kifisa.
Wose wowile hasi yo utumwa wawenghe chogoho awakulu wawo, uleke disina dye Mulungu dinghatofuligwe na mafuso getu.
Awaya awena wakulu awahuwile wanghawabese kosoko wagaluka ndugu; yagila wawatogomele muuswanu lugano wose, kosoko wose awekupata nyongesa kosoko yo mulima wawo wagaluka ndugu kahi wendigwa.
Fusa kahi jama simbuli sino.
Imunhu wowose yanghafusa mafuso gengi kahi nghekufumila amafuso ge chawelu ge Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito, hegu mafuso ge ifuga yetu,
kamema nyiyona kahi nghamanyile mbuli yoyose; ninga muchilalu wa kudoga simbuli so kuwanga, isina mugati yakwe gele, lefi, usongesi, ubalalilaji,
na kugomba na wanhu wabanike mahala gawo, awaswelile ichawelu, awekudoga fina imikalile ye chimulungu ni luneka lwa kupatila ugoli.
Imikalile ye chimulungu ina ugoli mukulu kwa kumugolosa imunhu yegusigwe ne ifinhu foyenafyo;
kosoko sicheja na chinhu muchilunga kahi sichidaha kuleuka na chinhu kulawa muchilunga;
ninga chinghowa na chakudiya na suke chodaha kwigusigwa ne finhu fifyo.
Ninga wose awekwenda kuwa wagoli wakugwila mumagesa, na kugwila mumutego na usulumisi we chibwalasi kahi uukukoma, uukuwatubugisa awanhu mu uwagilisi na ubani.
Kosoko kwenda mapesa no musisi wo wihi wose; awanhu wamonga kwa kwenda lugano mapesa, waleka dihuwi dyawo na kihoma mumimoyo yawo kwa usungu mwingi lugano.
Ninga agweye, munhu wa Mulungu kinege na mabuli gano kongha ichawelu, mikalile ya chimulungu, dihuwi, uwendo, kugojela na upolo.
Lewa imilewo miswanu ye dihuwi; kolelesa uwumi wa maiwa gose wowenangiligwe ichigele fowalambile hamwande ya wahomelesi wengi.
Hamwande ye Mulungu iyekufingha ifinhu fyose uwumi, na hamwande ya Kilisito Yesu iyaihomelele na kuifumila ichawelu hamwande ya Pondiyo Pilato,
nikukulagisa ukolelese dilagiso dino bila ya ibando hegu ilema mpaka koneka kwakwe kwe Mundewa wetu Yesu Kilisito;
Kahi adino dikadikoneka bila ya chifiso muchigele chifumiligwe, ne imwene iyalugutisigwe kahi iyena ludole yemwene, Mundewa wa wandewa kahi Mukulu wa wakulu.
Yuyo ye imwene inghekufa, kahi iyekwikala muujelu uusikudaha kusegelelwa, inghenati yonigwe na munhu wowose hegu iyedaha kumona. Imwene yenghigwe chogoho na udaha majuwa gose. Hano.
Awagoli muchilunga chino, wagambe waleke kiyona, hegu wangheke ugoli uwichaka ichawelu, ninga wamuhuwile Mulungu iyekuchingha ifinhu fyose fingi uleke chifidiye kwa kubwedelela.
Wagolosele maswanu, uleke wowe wagoli wa kugolosa sinhenda siswanu, undewa na chise,
akuno wakiikile sigafu yuwe nghindiso swanu kosoko ye chigele ichikwija, uleke wapate uwumi we chawelu.
Agweye Timoseyo, kolelesa simbuli sose sowinghigwe. Kinege ne simbuli isichaka ulungu isichaka chuinhu na inyisuma ya misungu iikwinangigwa yo udasi,
kwa kuihomelela iyo awamonga waswela dihuwi. Dihewa dyuwe hamwedu nanye.
iPaulo, mutumigwa wa Kilisito Yesu kwa wendo we Mulungu, kosoko yo uumi uwuwile mugati ya Kilisito Yesu,
kwa Tinoseyo, imwanangu mwendigwa; Imboto, ubasi, na imheho kulawa kwe Mulungu Baba na Kilisito Yesu iMundewa wetu fyuwe hamwedu nagwe.
Nikumulumba Mulungu yonikumufuga kwa chidoga chelile, ifene fowagolosaga cha Baba, ichigele chose chonikukugelegela munhasa yangu.
Ifene fonikugelegela amasosi gako, nina ngwina lugano nechilo na nemisi ya kukona gweye, uleke memelesigwe ne chinyemi.
Nikugelegeswa na dihuwi dyako idichaka chimwefe, dihuwi idyowaga mwe imamako Loisi ne inghinako Eunike na ichigele chino nimanya fina dyuwa umwako.
Hambiha nikukugelegesa usonghelese ichipawa che Mulungu ichuwile mugati yako kwa kwikiligwa mikono yangu;
kosoko iMulungu nghachingha moyo we ikeng'enha ninga moyo wa ludole na wendo na ufinyilisi.
Hambiha unghawonele chinyala uhomelesi we Mundewa wetu, kahi unghanyonele niye chinyala nimufungwa wakwe, ninga ufinyilie agehile hamwedu nani kosoko ye Injili muludole we Mulungu,
iyachihonya seye na kuchinanga seye mu lwinango umusunhile, siyo kosoko ya sinhenda setu, amba kwasoko yo uwendo wakwe ne simboto soyachingha seye mugati ya Kilisito Yesu minyaka itewe iilongole.
na hambiya igubuligwa kwa kwija kwakwe Mundewa wetu Kilisito Yesu, iyasumile difa na kwigala umi na kubanika kuwa jelu kwa njila ya injili.
Kosoko ye injili nasagulwa nyuwe muhubili kahe mufusaji,
kahe hambiya nikudumangila fina fonyuwile. Ninga sikona chinyala, kosoko nimumanya yonimuhuwile, na nimanya fina kena ludole lwa kwikilisa ichinhu chonikiligwa mpaka Dijuwa diya.
kolelesa umufano we simbuli so uumi souhulike ukwangu, mwihuwi na uwendo uwuwile mugati ya Kilisito Yesu;
kolelesa imbuli ye chawelu yowinghigwe gweye ne Muye Musunhile iyowile mugati yetu.
Ifene foumanyile fina awanhu wose awowile Asiya, wafulusa kunileka, mugati yawo no cha Figelo na Helimogene.
iMundewa yawonele ubasi wose awowile munyumba ya Onesifolo, kosoko hakanisangalasaga figele fingi, na kuleka konela chinyala iminyolo yangu,
ninga foyafikile ahano Lumi hakanikongha kwa ludole hoyonyona.
Mundewa yamonele ubasi Mwijuwa diya, na agweye kumanya fiswanu ifene foyanihokele kwa mengi ako Efeso.
Hambiya gweye, mwanangu, wime chewelu mumboto iyuwile mugati ya Kilisito.
Na simbuli siya souhulike ukwangu hamwande ya mashahidi itewa uwenghe awanhu awahuilwe awodaha kuwafusa wamonga nawo.
Uwe mumagayo hamwedu nani kefana chitung'ati yahuwilwe na Kilisito Yesu.
Hechaka chitung'ati iyekitowa munghondo iyokiguma mu milimo ye chilunga, yadahe kumwendesa imukulu wakwe iyamwingise mumulimo.
Hata imunhu iyekisuma mumiseigo nghodaha kwinghingwa mhongesi yanghaleka kisuma muchawelu ifene foikwendigwa.
Yagila imulimi iyekituma mumulimo yowe wa nghonga kuhokela dikanda dya mamudyo agalawile mumugunda.
Kolelesa lugano gonikutamile, kosoko iMundewa kokwingha udaha wa kumanya chila chinhu.
Mugelegele Yesu Kilisito, iyenuke kulawa kwa wofile, iwo lukolo lwa Daudi, ifene foikulonga Injili yangu,
nani mu Injili iyo ndumangiswa mpaka kohigwa kefana ngolosa wihi. Ninga imbuli ye Mulungu isikudaha kohigwa.
Kosoko iyo nikufinyilisa simbuli sose, kosoko ya wanu wasagulwe, uleke nawo wapate uhonya uwuwile mugati ya Kilisito.
Ni mbuli ya kuhuwiligwa: Inghowa chufa hamwedu naye, chokwikala hamwedu naye;
inghowa chofinyilisa, chokuwa wandewa hamwedu naye; chinghamulema imwene, naye kodaha kuchilema seye;
chinghaleka kuwa na ihuwi, imwene yakusigala wa kuhuwiligwa, kosoko ngodaha kilema imwenyecho.
Uwagelegese simbuli sino, na kuwajama hamwande ye Mundewa wanghowe na nyisuma ye simbuli isichaka chinhu chochose, amba sikuwagilisa awekusihulikisa.
Upiligale lugano ukiyonese fina kufumiligwa ne Mulungu, mtogomi we milimo iyechaka chinyala, iyakolelese imbuli ye chawelu ye Mulungu.
Kinege na mabuli agechaka dini, kosoko gakuwegala awanhu kutali ne Mulungu,
na dibuli dyokwenela kefana ilonda ndugu. Mugati yawo no cha Hinenayo na Fileto,
awaiswelile ichawelu, wekugamba nhafi indumo ifulusa kuloka. Howabidula dihuwi dya wamonga.
Amba umusingi we Mulungu uukangale ufulusa kwima, wina muhuli uno: iMundewa kawamanya wose awakwe na chila iyekutambula disina dya Mundewa yauleke uwihi.
Mugati ye inyumba inghulu siyo du mwina finhu fye sahabu na fesa amba mwina fya mabiki na fya ulongo; ifimonga fina heshima na ifimonga fichaka.
Hambiya inghowa imunhu kakikwema kwa kinega nawo, kokuwa chiya cha kwinghigwa heshima, ichisunhigwe, ichimwagile Mundewa, chigoloswa kwa chila mulimo muswamu.
Ninga utije usulumisi wo ujelelo na uikonghe ichawelu, dihuwi, uwendo, na itoyoyo hamwedu na wose awekwinanga iMundewa kwa chidogo chelile.
Ugaleme amaswali go ubwalasi agechaka mahala; umanyile fina gakwigala ulefi.
Na kwa uholo awekisuma naye. Mulungu kodah Imutogomi we Mundewa yakwendigwa yanghowe mulefi amba muholo kwa chila yumwedu, iyekudaha kufusa, mufinyilisi,
iyekudaha kuwajama kwa uholo awekisuma naye. Mulungu kodaha kuwatasa walambe na kuimanya ichawelu,
wadahe kinega no muheto wa luhoma, uwuwakolile, wagolose sinyenda sakwe.
Ninga umanye imbuli ino, nhafi amajuwa ge indumo kokuwa na figele fya kogohesa.
Kosoko awanhu wokuwa wakiyenda awenyecho, wakwenda mapesa, wakwenda kitunya, wakiyona, waligaji, wasikuwahulika awaBaba sawo na awang'ina sawo, wechaka ilumbo, wehi,
wasikuwenda awanhu wo ukwawo, wasikwenda kulamulwa, wasongesi, wechaka ufinyilisi, wakali, wasikwenda uswamu,
wahomelesi wo udasi, wafumbi, wekiyona, awekwenda amabuli gehile kuliko Mulungu,
wekigamba wamuhokela Mulungu amba awekukana uludole wakwe. Kinege na wanhu wo.
Kwasoko mugati yawo waumo wanhu awekwingila musinyumba sa wanhu na kuwalonda wanawake awechaka ludole, awena amakanda go uwihi wakoligwe no usulumisi wa mataho itewa,
awekituma kuhulikisa kwa chila munhu amba awesidaha kugafikila mahala ge chawelu.
Kefana Yanne na Yamble awamulemage Musa, awano nawo wakuilema ichawelu, wanhu wajugume matwi na awalemigwe na simbuli se dihuwi;
Ninga siwodaha kutowa nghanyo; kwasoko ubwalasi wawo wokonigwa na wanhu wose, kefana fowowile awuya wa wanhu weli. Mafuso ge ndumiliso
Ninga agweye kufulusa kona amafuso gangu, dihuwi dyangu, ufinyilisi wangu, uwendo wangu, umwimo wangu,
amagayo gangu, indumangiswa yangu, agamhatile Lisitila, amba hanifinyilisa kwa chila igayo; kahe mugago gose iMundewa hakamhonya.
Chawelu wose awekwenda kwikala ifene Kilisito Yesu foyekwenda wondumangiswa,
ninga awehi na wadasi wogendelela na kongeseka kuwa wehi, kudanha na kudanhiliswa.
Ninga gweye, ugendelele ne simbuli siya soufusigwe na kuhuiswa, kosoko kumanya kwifusa kwa che nani
na kulawa udodo wako kugamanya amawandiko masunhile, agodaha kukwingha mahala go kupata uumi kwa dihuwi idyuwile mugati ya Kilisito Yesu.
Amawandiko gose gena Muhe wa Mulungu kahe gena udaha wa kufusa, kugombela, kujama, kufusa mu chawelu,
uleke imunhu we Mulungu yamemelekele, yadahe kugolosa chila mulimo muswamu.
Nikukulagisa hamwande ye Mulungu na ya Kilisito Yesu iMulamusi wa wanhu awomi na wafile, na kwa kugubuligwa kwakwe no uumi wakwe:
tamilisa imbuli, wiyohe chigele chiswamu ne chihile, jama, gombela, na kulolesa kwa ufinyilisi wose na kufusa.
Kosoko chokwija chigele awanhu wakaalema mafuso go uumi, ninga kwa kwandamila sinyenda sawo awenyecho wodaha kupata wafusaji awekuwendesa,
nawo wokinega wanghahulike simbuli se chawelu na kubidukila sisimo so udasi.
Amba gweye, wiyohe majuwa gose, finyilisa mumagayo, togoma umulimo wo uinjilisti, togoma umulimo wako.
Kosoko aniye nyuwa muchigele cho kulafigwa nyuwe nhambiko; ichigele cha difa dyangu chisegelela.
Nilewa inghondo fiswamu, inhambo niimala, dihuwi nidimilisa;
kulawa baho nyikilwa mhongesi yo kusuma kwangu, yonikanikwinghigwa ne Mundewa, imulamusi we chawelu mwijuwa diya, kahe siyo niye muhala amba na wose awendile kwija ukwakwe.
Witahidi kwija ukwangu chimwandemwande.
Kosoko Dema kwa kwenda ichulunga chino hakandeka na kuluta Tesalonike; Kilesike kaluta Galatiya, Tito kaluta ku Dulumatiya.
Luka du noyowile naniye. Mulonde Maluko kamei mwijanye; kosoko yakunhasa lugano mumulimo.
Tikiko hanimwigala Efeso.
Ichigele chowukwija, wigale inghasu yangu yonalekile kwa Kalupo ku Tolowa, kahe wigale ifitabu fiya fye singhingo.
Alekisanda ayuya imulugulusaji we finhu fye shaba hakonesa winhi mwingi ukwangu; Mundewa komuliha ifene uwihi wakwe fowuwile.
Kinege naye, kosoko hakasilema lugano simbuli setu.
Munyinenela yangu ya bosi hechaka hata munhu yumwedu iyemile ulwandi lwangu; wose hawandeka niye. Nikutasa wanghawaliligwe itoso kwasoko yiyo!
Amba iMundewa hakema ulwandi lwangu na kunyingha ludole lwa kuitamilisa imbuli yose, uleke awamataifa nawo waihulike. Nani hanihuligwa mumulomo we simba.
iMundewa konihonya kulawa mu wihi wowose na kunhasa niufikile undewa wakwe wa kulanga. Ditunyo dyuwe ne mwene majuwa gose.
Walamuse cha Pilisika na Akila, hamwedu no ulukolo lwa Onesifolo.
Elasito yasigala Kolinto; Tulofimo hanimuleka mutamu ku Mileto.
Usunguse kwija ichigele che imheho chinati chikonge. Eubulo, Pude, Lino na Kilawudiya wose wakukulamusa.
iMundewa yowe hamwedu ne chidoga chako. Imboto yuwe nanye.
Paulo, mutogomi we Mulungu kahi mutumigwa wa Yesu Kilisito, kugendelesa dihuwi dya wasagulwe ne Mulungu no umanyi wawo we ichawelu iikufumila imikalile ye chimulungu,
mwihuwi dyo uwumi wa majuwa gose, uwene Mulungu, inghekudaha kudanha, hakaulaganisa minyaka mingi ilokile,
kahi muchigele chakwe haugubuligwa mumbuli yakwe kwa njila ya mahubili gonyenghigwe kwe dilagiso dye Mulungu iMwihula wetu.
Kwa Tito, gomwanangu we chawelu mwihuwi dyochihangile: Dihewa ne digoya kulawa kwe Mulungu iBaba na Kilisito Yesu iMwihula wetu fyuwe nagwe.
Nochanghone nakulekile ku Kilete, uleke ugolose digoya agasigale, na kuwasagula wasehe mu chila ikaya ifene fonakulagise,
nghona hena munhu munjelu, mulume wa muke yumwedu, kahi awanagwe wena ihuwi kahi wasikusongeswa na mbuli yoyose yo uwihi hegu kuleka kuwa na chogoho.

Kosoko iasikofu, kagaluka munyamhala we Mulungu, yagila yowe munhu inghekusongeswa na mbuli yoyose; yanghowe munhu iyakiyona, yanghowe munyono, yanghowe mulewaji wo ugimbi hegu mulefi hegu iyekilundila finhu itewa kosoko yakwe,
ninga yowe mundewa, iyekwenda uswanu, iyekiimila imwenyecho;
yekuhanangigwa yakolelese imbuli ye chawelu foifusigwe, uleke yadahe kulafa mafuso ge ichawelu, kahi kuwajama wose awekugalema.
Kosoko kwina wanhu wengi awechaka chogoho, wena mbuli sichaka chinhu, kahi wadasi, lugano awo ulwandi lwa wafinigwe;
wekuhanangigwa wanyamasigwe, kosoko wekuwabana awanhu we sikaya sose kwa mafuso gawo uleke wapate chinhu, amafuso gowasikwendigwa wafuse.
Yumwedu wawo, imugonese wawo yagamba “Awakilete wowaga wadasi majuwa gose malimu gehile, wadoba kahi wadiisaji”
Uhomelesi uno ni chawelu. Kosoko yo wagombele kwa ukali, uleke wadahe kuwa womi mwihuwi,
waleke kusitegelesa sisimo se Chiyahudi hegu amalagiso ga wanhu awekuilema ichawelu.
Ifinhu fyose fikugaluka fyela kuwanhu awelile, ninga kuwehi na awasikuhuwila hechaka chinhu chochose ichelile; amahala ne misungu yawo fibanika.
Wakigamba wamumanya Mulungu, ninga wakumulema kwa sinhenda sawo; wena ludeso, wechaka chihuliko, wasagile kwa nhenda yoyose iswanu.
Ninga gweye, fusa amafuso go uwumi.
Uwalagise awasehe wanghowe na makulu, ninga wowe wasindamafu, wowe na mahala, womi mwihuwi na muuwendo na mungojela.
Uwalagise kahi awadala wowe wasindamafu, wanghowe wasigilaji, hegu wonywaji wo ugimbi lugano; ninga awekufusa iswanu,
kahi na kuwafusa awanawake awadodogi wawende awalume sawo na wana,
wowe na chihuliko, usunhile, kutogoma milimo musinyumba sawo, waswamu, wowe na chihuliko kuwalume sawo, uleke imbuli ye mulungu inghatofuligwe.
Nheifo kahi, walolese awajelelo wakituse awecho.
Kiyonese gomwenyecho musimbuli sose chinhu cha kifusila sinhenda siswanu, kahi mumafuso gako yonesa uchawelu na usito,
na simbuli so uwumi isisidaha kutofuligwa uleke imunhu iyedaha kulema yengile chinyala, kwa kuswela mbuli ihile ya kulonga muchanhya yetu.
walagise awatumwa wowe na chogoho kuwakulu wawo, na kuwendesa musimbuli sose; wanghowe wabidulaji,
wanghowe wahiji, ninga wonese uchawelu wose, wagahambe amafuso fe Mwihula wetu Mulungu musimbuli sose.
Kosoko dihewa dya Mulungu digubuligwa uleke awanhu wose wehulwe,
nadyo dikuchifusa kuulema uwihi na usulumisi we chilunga, chidahe kwikala fiswanu, na mikalile yo kumogoha Mulungu muchilunga chino,
akuno nikudigojela dihuwidyetu idilugutisigwe, na magubulo ge ditunyo dye Mulungu wetu imukulu ne Mwihula Yesu Kilisito,
iyakilafa imwenyecho kosoko yetu kuchihula seye kulawa mu wihi wose na kisunhila imwenyecho wanhu wakwe awekupiligala musinhenda siswanu.
Longa simbuli sino; jama na kugombela kwa ludole. Munhu wowose yanghakubese.
Uwagelegese awanhu kinenenghesa kuwandewa na wena udaha, kuwa na chogoho, kuwa tayali kwa chila mulimo muswanu,
waleke kumulonga munu wowose, wakinege ne ing'omba, wowe waholo na konesa chogoho ku wanhu wose.
Kosoko ase nase katali hachuwaga chaka mahala, chichaka chogoho, chagiliswe, watumwa wo usulumisi wa mbuli nyingi, chikale mu wihi ne finju, chisuligwe na wanhu, nase chikisulile munhu na miyagwe;
ninga ichigele uswanu wakwe na uwendo wakwe Mulungu iMwihula wetu fowoneke,
hakachihonya seye, si kwa sinhenda setu, so uchawelu sochigolose, ninga kwa ubasi wakwe, kwa kusunhwa kwa kwelekigwa keli na kugoloswa usha ne Muhe Musunhile;
iyachitilile kwa ugoli wose kugendela Yesu Kilisito iMwihula wetu,
chidahe kutaliligwa ichawelu kwa dihewa dyakwe uleke chuwe wahasi mwihuwi dyo uwumi wa majuwa gose.
Ni nonga ya chawelu. Nikukuhananga gweye ulonge simbulisino kwa ludole uleke wose awamuhuwile Mulungu, wagendelele kusigala musinhenda siswanu; simbuli sino ni swanu kahi sina faida kuwanhu.
Ninga kinege ne sinonga se chibwalasi, sinonga sinhali sa wagono, ing'omba na iwanga kosoko ya malagiso, kosoko gechaka faida kahi gechaka chinhu.
Imunhu mudasi, yanghadaha kujamigwa ichigele cha bosi na cha keli, muleke,
umanye fina imunhu yefane yo kagilila kahi yakugolosa sambi; kafulusa kiliganisa imwenyecho.
Ichigele chonikanimutuma Alitema ukwako hegu Tikiko, piligala kwija ukwangu kuno Nikapoli, kosoko nilamula kwikala kuno ichigele che imheho.
Piligala kuwatasa Sena imulamusi na Apolo munhambo yawo; langisisa wanghahungukilwe na chinhu.
Leka awanhu wetu wefuse kusigala musinhenda siswanu, wadahe kuwatasa awechaka ichawelu, wanghaleke kulela mamudyo maswanu.
Awanhu wose awehamwedu nani wakukulamusa. Walamuse wose awekuchenda seye mwihuwi. Dihewa dyuwe hamwedu nanye mose.
Aniye Paulo, inyohigwe kosoko ya Kilisito Yesu, na Timoseyo imundugusetu.
Chikukwandikila agweye Filemoni mwendigwa wetu, mwituma milimo miyetu,
na Afiya ilumbudyetu na Alikipo musilikali miyetu hamwedu ne dikanisa idikitang'anyila munyumba yako.
Dihewa dyuwe nanye, ne digoya idikulawa kwe Mulungu na kwe Mundewa Yesu Kilisito.
Nikumulumba lugano iMulungu wangu amajuwa gose, fonikuwagelegela munhasai yangu;
Ifene fonikuhulika isimbuli so uwendo wako, ne dihuwi dowinadyo mwe Mundewa Yesu na wasunhile wose.
Kahi nikutasa fina uumwedu wochinawo mwihui dyako dyongesele udaha wo kumanya maswanu gose muumi wetu mundugusangu mugati ya Kilisito.
Uwendo wako unyingha chinyemi lugano na kuhoswa! Kulawa muuwendo wako, fidoga fya wasunhile, fisangalaswa lugano kosoko yako.
Kosoko iyo nichaka chogoho mugati ya Yesu, kukulagisa ichikuhanangigwa ugolose,
ninga kosoko ya uwendo nikwenda kukutasa, (aniye Paulo nimusehe na hambiya mufungwa kosoko ya Kilisito Yesu).
Nikukutasa kosoko ye imwanangu Onesimo yonimweleke mwihuwi mugati ye inyohigwa yangu.
Iyowage katali munhu chaka ukwako mumilimo yakwe, amba hambiya kagaluka munhu munhusi ukwako na ukwangu.
Nikumuwisa ukwako kwa moyo wangu wose.
Hanyuwa nikwenda nisigale naye uleke yanhogomele ahanhu hako ugele nyuwile muchifungo kosoko ye mbuli swanu,
aniye sendile kugolosa mbuli yoyose yonghwendile agweye, kosoko yo uswamu wako unghowe fonghukwenda agweye, ninga foulamule gweye kwa kwenda kwako.
Nhagela nochileka yakulekile kwa chigele, uleke uwe naye kwa amajuwa gose,
hambiya, nghefane mutumwa du, amba imutumwa iyohigwe chawelu chawelusi mundugusangu mwendigwa ukwangu kosekose ukwako agweye chimutufi na kwe Mundewa.
Hambiya nghona ukunyona aniye chahamwedu nagwe, muhokele ayuno fina fowowile ukunihokela aniye.
Nghona yakugolosele mbuli yoyose ihile, kahi nghona ukumudai chilunhu chochose noliha niye.
Aniye Paulo nyandika, kwa mukono wangu nimwenyecho aniye noliha. (Sikulonga mbuli yoyose yonikukudai hata gweye gomwenyecho).
Heye mundugusangu nikuhananga nyongesa mwe Mundewa, kahi kusangalasa umoyo wangu mu Kilisito.
Kosoko mhuwila ichihuliko chako nochileka nikuwandikile nimanyile nhafi kogolosa kusuma agene gonilongile.
Ugele uwo munyikile ugono, kosoko nikuhuwila fina munhasa yenu modaha kunyona.
Epafula iyohigwe hamwedu naniye mu Kilisito Yesu, yekukulamusa;
hamwedu na Maluko, Alisitako, Dema, na Luka, awekugolosa imilimo hamwedi naniye.
Dihewa dye Mundewa Yesu Kilisito, dyuwe hamwedu ne ifidoga fyenu.
Katali iMulungu hakalonga na wababa setu kugendela wagonesi mikangha mingi na kwa njila se hayo hayo;
ninga majuwa gano kalonga nase kugendela iMwana, yoyamusagule yowe muhasi we finhu fyose, kahi kugendela imwene iMulungu kachumba ichilunga.

Imwene yakonesa ditunyo dye Mulungu kahi kena lubonoto lwe nyuwa yakwe, yakolelese ichilunga chose kwa ludole lwe mbuli yakwe. Foyagolose dihojojolo kosoko yo wihi, hakekala mumukono wo Ukulu uko kuchanhyasi,
Kagaluka mukulu muchanhya ya malaika kosoko disina dyoyapatile iswanu lugano kusuma agawo.
Kosoko kwina malaika yuhoki ugele wowose iyadaha kwinangigwa ne Mulungu,
“Agweye kwa mwanangu,
2 diyelo nghweleka”?
Ama kahi,
“Aniye nokuwa Babakwe,
2 naye kokuwa ukwangu mwanangu.”
Na kahi, ugele foyekumwigala inhula hanju muchilunga, yekugamba,
“Leka awamalaika we Mulungu wose wamufuge imwene.”
Na ku malaika yekugamba,
“Iyekugolosa awamalaika wakwe wowe mheho,
na watogomi wakwe malilimba ga moto.”
Ninga kwi mwana yekugamba,
“Undewa wako, Go Mulungu, ni wa majuwa gose na ugele wose,
nagwe ukudima digoya majuwa gose muundewa wako.
Agwe ukwenda ichawelu na kudesekela uwihi;
2 hambiya Mulungu, iMulungu wako kakubaka mafuta ga chinyemi
kusuma awayago.”
Kahi,
“Agweye, Mundewa nowejawomba iyisi kunghonga na ulanga
ni mulimo we mikono yako;
nafyo fyobanika, ninga agweye kosigala;
fyose fyodaha kulala kifana suke,
kofisinga kifana suke na fyo fyobiduka,
nafyo fyobiduka.
Ninga agweye kosigala fina fouwile,
na iminyaka yako ichaka ndumo”
Ninga kwina malaika yuhoki yoyadaya kumugamba chigele chochose,
“Ikala ulwandi lwo mukono wangu wo kulume,
mpaka niweke awanghondo wako
chigoda cha kwegamikila migulu”?
Nhafo awo si mimuhe watumigwe kutogoma, kosoko ya wanhu awakwija wahokela uhonya?
Hambiya chikuhanangigwa chikolelese lugano simbuli sose sochihulike, uleke chingheje chisiswela.
Kosoko inghowa imbuli iyalongigwe na malaika hayuwa ya chawelu na chila kubana hegu kuleka kuwa na chihuliko, hakuhokela maliho galiganile,
aseye nase chodaha kinega nhani chinghaulema uhonya uno umukulu? Haulongigwa kunghonga na Mundewa, na kuhomelelwa na wose ukwetu na wose awamuhulike imwende,
ugele iMulungu naye yakuwuhomelela kwa fitangilo na majumo na majumo gehayohayo na kwe chinghwa cho Muhe Musunhile ichikwinghigwa ifene imwenyecho foyekwenda.
Kosoko iMulungu nghachilekile ichilunga ichikwija chochikulionga chilongoswe na malaika.
Fina foihomeleligwe ahamonga,
“Imunhu no nani hata umugelegele,
hegu imwana we munhu, hata umulangilile imwene?
Kumugolosa mudodogi kusuma malaika kwa chipisi,
kumufasa inghofiya ye ditunyo na chogoho,
kwika ifinhu fyose hasi ye migulu yakwe.”
Hambiya munyika ifunhu fyose hasi yakwe, nghasigase chinhu isichuwile hasi yakwe. Fina foyuwile, chisinati chone chila chinhu chuwe hasi yakwe.

Ninga chikumona Yesu, imwene kwa chigele chiguhi hakagolosigwa mudodogi kusuma malaika yafasigwe ditunyo na chogoho kosoko ya magayo ge difa, uleke kwe dihewa dye Mulungu yadahe kunomola difa kosoko ya chila mumunhu.
Kosoko haimwagila imwene, imwenele na kugendela imwene ifinhu fyose fyabahano, munyigala wana itewa ku ditunyo, yamugolose chilongosi wo uwumi wao yaliganile kugendela magayo.
Kosoko iyakuhojojola na wose awakuhojojoligwa wena chotoko chimwedu. Nochanghone wena iYesu ighakona chinyala kuwenanga awene wanduguse
yakugamba
“Notagusa disina dyako kuwandugu sangu
muchiligati ye dikanisa nomutunya imwene.”
Na kahi,
“Nomuhuwila imwene.”
Na kahi,
“Aniye nabahano na wana woninghigwe ne Mulungu.”
Hambiya kosoko wana wahangila mumutufi ne sakame, Yesu naye yowa nheifo uleke jugendela difa yadahe kumubana imwene yene udaha we difa, naye no luhoma,
na kuwehula awo wose woile mwibalangulu dya wose watumwa kosoko ye ditisi dye difa.
Kosoko ni chawelu fina Yesu nghejile kuwatasa malaika ninga icheleko cha Ibulahimu.
Hambiya haimwagila kuligana na wanduguse musimbuli sose uleke yadahe kuwa mutambiki mukulu yena ubasi akahi muchawelu mufuga ye Mulungu, yadahe kuwa iliho kwa wihi wa wanhu.
Kosoko imwene naye yahokela magayo na kugesigwa, kena udaha wa kuwatasa wose awekugesigwa.
Hambiya wandugu sangu wasunhile mukuhangila mulwinango lwa kulanga mugelegeleni Yesu imutumigwa na mutambi mukulu wo kulamba kwetu.
Yeja yowa muchawelu kwe Mulungu yamusagule imwene kifana Musa foyowile muchawelu munyumba ye Mulungu.
Kahi Yesu yataliligwa muchawelu iyena ditunyo lugano kusuma Musa ifene imujengaji we inyumba foyena ditunyo lugano kusuma inyumba iyecho.
(Kosoko chila nyumba ijengigwa na munhu yumonga, ninga imujengaji we finhu fyose ni Mulungu.)
Hambiya Imusa yeja yowa muchawelu munyumba yose ye Mulungu yefane mutogomi yowe muhomelesi we simbuli isikasilongigwa ichigele chikwija.
Ninga iKilisito yeja yowa muchawelu muchahya ye nyumba ye Mulungu kifana mwana, kahi aseye no sinyumba sakwe chinghakolelesa lugano ighinyo yetu na inyitogolela dihuwi dyetu.
Hambiya fina Imuhe Musunhile foyakulonga,
“Diyelo, munghahulika dijwi dyakwe,
munghaigolose imimoyo yenu yuwe mikugutu fina ichigele che ufuti
fina dijuwa dyo kugesigwa kunyika,
ako konagesigwe na wababa senu na
kona imilimo yangu,
kwa minyaka makumi mane.
hambiya hanidesigwa ne cheleko chiya,
na kugamba, ‘Majuwa gose ni wanhu wagilile mumimoyo yawo,
wasisimanyile sinjila sangu.’
Fina fonikilahile munyono yangu,
‘Wasidaha kwingila muubwihilo wangu.’”
Wandugu sangu langisiseni, nghanghowe na yumwedu wenu imwihi yena umoyo uwichaka dihuwi uukulongosa kugwila kutali ne Mulungu imumi.
Ninga mukilolese munhu na miyagwe chila ijuwa, inangwa, “Diyelo,” uleke nghanghowe na yumwedu wenu yowe mukugutu kosoko ya kudanhiliswa na wihi.
Kosoko chihangila muKilisito chinghagendelesa kukolelela inghinyo yetu ye nghonga mpaka kundumo.
Kosoko hailongigwa,
“Diyelo munghahulika dijwi dyakwe
munghaigolose mimoyo yenu yuwe mikugutu kifana chigele cho ufuti.”
No chenani wahulike na kugendelela kuwa wafuti? Nhafo siwowile awaya wose awaleuke Misili ugele wo ulongosi wa Musa?
Kahi no chenani awamudesile kwa minyaka makumi mane? Siwaya wose awagolose wihi, awene mitufi yawo hayugwa mwibalangu?
Kahi no chenani welahile fina wanghengile mubwihilo wakwe ninga si waya awowile wafuti?
Hambiya chikona fina wasadahile kwingila kosoko ya kuleka kuhuwila kwawo.
Hambiya kosoko dihuwilo dyo kwingila muchinyemi chakwe dinghali baho, chogohe uleke yanghowe yumwedu wenu yaliganiswe kosoko ya kusuma kudifikila.
Kosoko imbuli iswanu haija ukwetu fina ukwawo, ninga imbuli yahubiliigwe ukwawo iswatasile, kosoko isahangile ne dihuwi dya wategelesage.
Kosoko aseye chihuwile chikwingila muubwihilo wakwe, kifana Mulungu foyalongile
“Fina fonakilahile munyono yangu,
Wasidaha kwingila mubwihilo wangu,”
hata inghowa imilimo yakwe haihela ugele wo kwikigwa inghindiso ye chilunga.
Kosoko ahamonga kalonga simbuli se dijuwa dye mufungate, “Ne Mulungu hakabwihila dijuwa dyo mufungate kulawa kugolosa milimo yakwe yose.”
Na kahi ahanhu hano hakagamba, “Wasidaha kwingila mubwihilo wangu.”
Kosoko hambiya isigala kuwamonga kwingila umo, na wose awene kunghonga, hawahokela imbuli swanu ninga hawasumwa kwingila kosoko ya ufuti wawo,
kahi keka ijuwa dimonga, “diyelo” yakugamba kulokela Daudi minyaka mingi ilokile, musimbuli isamule kuwandikigwa,
“Diyelo munghahulika dijwi dyakwe,
munghaigolose imimoyo yenu yuwe mikugutu.”
Kosoko inghowa Yoshua hakamwinghani hanhu ha kubwihila iMulungu nghodaha kutambula hamwande dijuwa dingi.
Hambiya kahi ahaya isigala sabato dijuwa dyo kubwihila kwe Mwana we Mulungu!
Kosoko wowose iyakwingila muubwihilo we Mulungu yakubwihila munhogoma milimo yakwe fina Mulungu foyabwihile munhogoma yakwe.
Lekeni hambiya chipiligale chingile kuubwihilo uya, uleke hanghowe na yumwedu wetu yogwe kosoko yo ufuti uno.
Kosoko imbuli ye Mulungu nyumi, kahi ikutogoma milimo, nghali kusuma isunja, kahi ikuhoma mpaka ikutemanhula chidoga ne umuhe ne ifilungo fya umutufi ne umusopo, kumanya amadoga ne inyenda ye umoyo.
Kahi hamwande yakwe hechaka ichumbigwe chikifisile ninga fyoose fyahajelu na kugubuligwa mumeso gagwe imwene yena simbuli setu.
Kosoko hambiya china Imutambiki Mukulu iyengile kulanga, Yesu Imwana we Mulungu, chigendelele kukolelesa dihuwilo dyetu.
Kosoko chichaka Mutambiki Mukulu iyekuhanga nase musokesi wetu, ninga imwene naye hakahesigwa musinyuwa sose fina seye bila kugolosa wihi.
Chisegelele kwa nghinyo hegoda dye undewa dye dihewa, uleke chidahe kuhokela ubasi na dihewa dyo kuchitasa ugele wo chikuhananga.
Kosoko chila Mutambiki Mukulu yasaguligwe kulawa muwanhu, kekigwa yeme ahanhu ha wanhu yawatogomele musimbuli se Mulungu, kulafa filafwa na sinhambiko kosoko yo wihi.
Yekudaha kuwalondela kwa uholo awasimanyile na wokwagilila, kosoko imwene naye kowa musokesi.
Kosoko ino imwagila naye yalafe nhambiko kosoko yo wihi wakwe na wihi wa wanhu wamonga.
Na hechaka munhu yekiingha ditunyo dyo Utambiki Mukulu ninga ayuya iyenangigwe ne Mulungu, fina foyowile Haluni.
No nheifo kahi iKilisito naye nghakiinule imwenyecho kuwa Mutambiki Mukulu, ninga hakasaguligwa ne Mulungu yagambile,
“Agwe no Mwanangu,
diyelo nikweleka,”
fina foyakulonga ahanhu hamonga,
“Agweye no mutambiki wa majuwa gose,
anhanhu ho utambiki ha Melikisedeki.”

Mumajuwa gakwe goyekalage muchilunga, Yesu hakatasaga lugano na kutasilisa, kwa ijwi ikulu na masosi kwe Mulungu yena udaha wo kumuhonya kulawa mudifa, na hakahulikigwa kosoko ye chogoho che Mulungu ichowile umwakwe.
Hamwedu na gago hakowa Mwana, iyakifusile kuhulika kugendela amagayo goyapatile
naye foyakangasigwe hakagaluka chotoko cha uhonya wa majuwa gose kuwose awekumuhulika,
kahi imwene kasaguligwa ne Mulungu kuwa mutambiki mukulu ahanhu ha Melikisedeki.
Muchanhya yakwe china mbuli nyingi sa kulonga, ninga nghugutu kusilonga, kosoko anyeye hamukwenda kuhulika.
Kosoko hamwedu na gago muwagila muwe wafusaji mukuhananga munhu yun gi yawafuseni amafuso ge inghonga ge Mulungu. Mukuhananga mele siyo chakudiya chikugutu;
Kosoko chila munhu iyakwikala kwa ndiya ya mele nghamanyile imbuli ye chawelu, kosoko ni mwana na.
Ninga chakudiya chigugutu ni cha wakulu wagima, kosoko wose awene imisungu wakudaha kusagula diswanu na dihile.
Hambiya chileke amafuso ge nghonga agechikilisito na chandamile agakangale, chingheke nhindiso kahi: Kwa kulamba kulawa mumilimo yufile ninga chike dihuwi kwe Mulungu,
malagiso ge mbuli sa ubatiso na kwikiligwa mikono na kwinuka wafile na uliganiso wa majuwa gose.
Agano chogolosa Mulungu yenghenda.
Kosoko isikudahika kulamba kahi kwa wanhu awalekile dihuwi wowile muujelu na kunomola ichinghwa che Mulugu na kuwa na lugota na Muhe Musunhile,
na kufulusa kunomola uswanu we mbuli ye Mulungu na uludole we chigele chikwija,
na kuleka dihuwi isikudahika kuwowisa walambe kahi, kosoko wakumusambasa Imwana we Mulungu keli mufidoga fyawo na kumutofula kwa hajelu.
Kosoko isanga inyunyile ifula, itonyelwa chila ugele na kotesa mamudyo maswanu kwa yuya yakulima na kuhokela simboto kulawa kwe Mulungu.
Ninga inghotesa miwa na magugu, yokuwa chaka chambusi na kuwa habehi na kuhugutiswa; na kusomigwa kumoto.
Hata inghowa chikulonga nheifo, wendigwa wangu musimbuli senu chihuwila simbuli siswanu lugano so uhonya.
Kosoko Mulungu siyo mukugutu hata yaleke kona imilimo yenu na wendo womonese kosoko ye disina dyakwe, kuwatogomela awasunhile fina fomukugolosa hata hambiya.
Chikuhananga chila yumwedu wenu yonese upiligale uwo kwa kumanya umemelesi we dihuwi mpaka kundumiliso,
uleke munghowe wadoba, ninga awekuwandamila wose awena kulokela dihuwi na ufinyilisi wakuhala isilaganiswe.
Kosoko ichigele iMulungu foyamulaganise Ibulahimu, na kosoko nghowile hata na munhu yumwedu mukulu wa kilahila, hakelahila muimwecho,
yekugamba, “Chawelu nokumotesa gweye na kukongesa.”
Kamei Ibulahimu yakamale kufinyilisa, hakahokela choyalaganiswe.
Kosoko awanhu wakilaha kwa yuya imukulu kusuma awene, na nyilaha ukwawo no kumala simbuli sose.
No nheifo, Mulungu naye yakwenda konesa lugano awahasi we dihuwilo ifene amadoga gakwe fogechaka chibidubidu hakongesa mudihuwiso kilaha,
uleke kwa finhu fili ifisikudaha kubiduka mufifyo Mulungu nghodaha kulonga udasi, uleke aseye chibilimile chuwe na ludole lukangale kudikola dihuwi dikigwe hamwande yetu.
Chinadyo dihuwi dino, dye chawelu na dimile nghwi kifana chigingi che fidoga, ne dihuwi idikwingila mugati ye dipasiya,
Umo nomoyengile Yesu kosoko yetu, imwene noyachilongolele hakagaluka mutambiki mukulu wa majuwa gose kifana Melikisedeki.
Kosoko ayuno, “No Melikisedeki Mundewa wa Salemu, imutambiki we, Mulungu Iyekuchanhyasi, hakakitanyila na Ibulahimu foyendeyakuya kulawa kuwatowa wandewa na kumotesa,”

na kwe imwene yuyo Ibulahimu hakalafa, “Imwedu ye ikumi ya chila chinhu choyowile nacho,” itapita ye Disina dyakwe bosi ni, “Mundewa we chawelu,” keli ni mundewa wa Salemu, “Imwene ni mundewa we digoya.”
Munhu yo kechaka baba, ninga ng'ina, kechaka welekwa, hegu nghonga ama ndumo mulwikala lwakwe, ninga kaliganisigwa ne Mwana we Mulungu, imwene ni kuhani mwajuwa gose.
Langeni fonimukulu! Ibulahimu baba yetu hakamwingha imwedu ya kumi ye ifinhu ifilawile kunghonga.
Na wose awecheleko cha Lawi awakuhokela umulimo wo utambiki wene lusigililo mwilagiso fina walonde imwedu ya kumi kulawa kuwanhu wawo, kosoko nawo ni welekwa wa Ibulahimu.
Ninga munhu yuno siyo wa lukolo lwawo, hakahokela imwedu ya kumi kwa Ibulahimu na kumumotesa imwene yene dihuwiso.
Kahi imanyika fina imudodogi yakumotesigwa ne mukulu.
Na hata wanhu ambawo wakudaha kufa wakuhokela imwedu ya ikumi, ninga kwa Melikisedeki imwdu ya kumi haihokeligwa na kuhomeleligwa ne imwene imumi inghakudaha kufa.
Munhu yakudaha kugamba fina, Lawi imwenyecho, iyakuhokela imwedu ya kumi, hakaliha kugendela Ibulahimu,
kosoko hakowa mufyuno fye Babakwe ugele Melikisedeki foyakitang'anyile naye.

Hambiya inghowa ukangasi haupatagwa kwa njila ya utambiki we Chilawi, (kosoko hasi yakwe awanhu hawahokela malagiso), hahowa na soko yaki kahi ya mutambiki yungi yeme ahanhu ha Melikisedeki, kusuma hata yumwedu iyatambuligwe ahanhu ha Haluni?
Kosoko halika utambiki ukudaha kubiduka, yagila amalagiso nago gabiduke.
Kosoko umwene yalongigwe mugago hakowa muhangi wo ulukolo lwingi, ulwene hechaka hata yumwedu mulukolo lwalwo iyetuma mulimo wo utambiki hefugilo.
Kosoko imanyika chalinje fina iMundewa wetu yalawa mucheleko cha Yuda, mulukolo ulwene Musa nghalonga mbuli yoyose muchanhya yakwe musimbuli sa watambiki.
Adino digaluka dya chalinje lugano, ichigele mutambiki yungi yakwima kefana Melikisedeki,
iyagaluke mutambiki siyo kwa kwandamila inyenda ya malagiso ge chimutufi, ninga kwa ludole lwa uumi uusikubanika.
Kwasoko kahomelelwa fina
“Agweye kwa mutambiki wa majuwa gose,
ahanhu ha Melikisedeki.”
Kwa ulwandi lumonga dilagiso idilongole dikigwa hanghanda kosoko yo usokesi wakwe na kuleka kuwa na chakutogomelwa.
(Kosoko dilagiso sidyamemelese chochose); kwa ulwandi lumonga, dihuwilo diswanu hadinghiswa, uleke mugago chidahe kumusegelela Mulungu.
Kahi sidyowile nheifo bila ya kilaha.
Wose kunghonga awowile watambiki hawalonda mulimo uwo bila ya kilaha, ninga ayuno kenghigwa kwa kilaha,
“Imundewa kakilaha
kahi nghodaha kubidula chidoga chakwe,
‘Agweye no mutambiki wa majuwa gose.’”
Kwa nheifo Yesu kagaluka mwimilisi we dilagano diswanu.
Lugano, awatambiki we nghonga hawowa wengi, kosoko hawakindisigwa ne difa wanghagendelele mumulimo;
ninga imwene kenawo utambiki wakwe uwichaka ndumo, kosoko ukugendelela majuwa gose.
Nochanghone ugele wose kena udaha wa kuwahonya wose awakumusegelela Mulungu kwa kulokela imwene, kosoko muchigele chakwe chose choyakwikala yakuwatasila.
Kosoko hayagila chuwe na mutambiki mukulu kifana yuyo, imusunhile yechaka ilema dyodyose, inghachafuke, iyakinega na uwihi, na yenuligwe kulanga.

hafanile, kifana awatambiki wamonga wakulu; kechaka haja kulafa nhambiko chila ijuwa, kunghonga kosoko yo wihi wakwe imwenyecho, keli kahi na kosoko yo uwihi wa wanhu wose; aga hakagagolosa malumwedu du kwa wanhu wose ichigele foyakilafile imweneyecho.
Kosoko dilagiso dikuweka wanhu wose awechaka ludole kuwa watambiki wakulu, ninga inonga ye nyilaha, iyejile kunyuma ye dilagiso haimusagula Mwana iyamemelekele majuwa gose.
Hambiya imbuli inghulu musose sochikulonga no ino: China mutambiki mukulu iyefane yuyo yekale mumukono wo kulume we digoda dye Undewa Mukulu ako kulanga,
imutogomi ahanhu hasunhile he dihema dye chawelu, idyekigwe siyo ne munhu, ninga Mundewa.
Kosoko chila mutambiki mukulu kasaguligwa uleke yalafe filafwa na nhambiko; kosoko ikuhanangigwa imutambiki naye yowe na chinhu cha kulafa.
Hambiya kusigwa yowile wamuchilunga nghowile yakuwa mutambiki hata chidodogi, kosoko hena watambiki awakulafa filafwa ifene dilagiso fodikulagisa.

Wakutogoma mulimo hanhu ha sunhile kifana futa na inyefu dya finhu fya kulanga; kifana Musa foyowile habehi kugolosa dihema, hakajamigwa kugambigwa, “Langa ukagolose finhu fyose kifana fowonesigwe akuya kwitunda.”
Ninga Yesu kapata mulimo muswanu lugano, na muchanhya ya iyo, imwene kakifana mulamusi we dilagano diswanu, kosoko dija kulokela mahuwiso maswanu.
Kosoko woile diya dye nghonga dyowile hadihunguke, kusowile kukuwa na soko ya kukongha dingi dya keli.
Mulungu hakona wihi kuwamonga nochinghone yakugamba,
“Chawelu majuwa gakwija, yakulonga Mundewa,
chigele chonikwija nikwiga ilagano isha ne nyumba ya Isilaeli
na hamwedu na nyumba ya Yuda;
hadikuwa kifana dilagano diya dyonekile ne wababa sawo,
mwijuwa dyonawalafage kwa mukono
na kuwalongosa kuluta iisi ya Misili;
kosoko hawagendelele mwilagano dyangu,
na kwa nheifo naniye haniwadesekela,
yakulonga Mundewa.
Adino no dilagano dyonikwenda
nigolose hamwedu ne nyumba ye Isilaeli
ganghaloka majuwa gago, yakulonga Mundewa,
nikwenda nike malagiso gangu mumisungu yawo,
na nowandika mumimoyo yawo,
nani nokuwa Mulungu wawo,
nawo wokuwa wanhu wangu.
Na wasikuwa wanhu wa kifusa munhu na miyagwe
ama kwa kigamba, ‘Goloko mumanye Mulungu,’
kosoko wose wonimanya,
kulawa mudodogi hata imukulu.
Kosoko nowonela ubasi kwa nhenda sawo sihile,
na sikwijanigelegela wihi kahi.”
Munonga ye dilagano, lagano isha, nong'amba Mulungu kagolosa dye nghonga dyuwe disakala na ichinhu chisakale chahabehi na kwagilila.
Hambiya hata dilagano dye inghonga hadyuwa na nhenda sa kufuga na ahasunhile hakwe he chilunga.
Kosoko dihema hadigoloswa, idyakunje, idyekigwe chigwaso che itaa na imesa na imikate yo Konesa; hekwinangigwa Hanhu Hasunhile.
Kunyuma ye dipasiya dya keli hadima dihema dikwinangigwa Ahasunhile ha Hahasunhile,

dina chiya cho kufunghisila ubani chigoloswe kwa sahabu na disanduku dye dilagano digubikwe musisandi sose kwa shaba, umowile na dikopo dya sahabu idyowile na imana iya na imhando ya Haluni iyatugute ne fibawo fiya fye dilagano;
muchanhya ya disanduku hamuwa na makelubi ge ditunyo gakuguma inyefu mwigoda dyo ubasi. Ninga musimbuli sino chichaka luneka lwa kulonga kwa utali.
Ifinhu afyo finghafulusa kugoloswa, awatambiki wakugendelela kwingila mwihema didyo dye inghonga kutogoma imilimo yo kufuga;

ninga mwihema didyo dya keli dikwingiligwa ne mutambiki mukulu muhala, mukangha umwedu chila mwaka; kahi si bila sakame, yoyekuhanangigwa yalafe kosoko yakwe na kosoko ye sisambi sa kuleka kumanya sa wanhu awo.
Mu dino iMuhe Musunhile yakonesa fina injila yo kwingila ahanhu hasunhile hayuwa inhati ikumuligwe, kosoko dihema dya kunje hadyuwa dikali dimile
(idyowile chitangilo che chigele chino). Mugoloswa nheifi; filafwa ne sinhambiko ifisikudaha kumugolosa imunhu, iyekufuga yowe na misungu ikangale,
kosoko fikutogomela muhala ifyakudiya ne ifinhu fyo kungwa na uhojojolo we hayo hayo na malagiso ge chimutufi agekigwe mpaka ichigele chino.
Ninga ichigele Kilisito foyejile imutambiki mukulu we finhu fiswanu ifijile, kahi kugendela dihema dikulu, kahi idikangale lugano (idisigolosigwe kwe mikono, no ngamba, si dye cheleko chino)
hakengila kamwedu kosoko ya wose Ahanhu Hasunhile, yalondile isakame siyo yesimhene na sindama, ninga isakame yakwe imwenyecho na kuwa ne indekelela ya majuwa gose.
Kosoko inghowa isakame ye simhene na makambaku na difu dye sindama se singombe dyowetililigwe awanhu awena uwihi dikusunha na kukwema umutufi,
silugano isakame ya Kilisito, imwene kugendela iMuhe wa majuwa gose hakelafa imwenyecho kuwa chilafwa chichaka wihi, kuwasunha amadoga genu na sinhenda senu sufile mudahe kumufuga Mulungu wenu imumi.

Kosoko ino Kilisito noyekugolosa dilagano disha uleke wose awenangwe wadahe kuhokela uhasi uwuhuwisigwe wa majawa, kosoko ye difa digoloseke kuwaleusila uwihi wawo awowile hasi ye dilagano dhe nghonga.
Kosoko yagila ahena dilagano dyo uhasi, howe na ifa dya imunhu iyadigolose.
Kosoko dilagano dyo uhasi dina ludole ichigele imunhu foyekufa, amba foyekuwa yekali mumi dikuwa chaka ludole.
Ninga hata dilagano diya dya katali sidyakongesigwe bila ya sakame.

Kosoko chila ilagiso fodyalongigwe na Musa kuwanhu wose ifene foilongigwe mumalagiso, hakailonda isakame ya sindama na yesimhene na kuhanganisa mumeji na kuinyaga muchitabu cha malagiso na awanhu kwa sufi na kwa mahamba ge dibiki dikwinangigwa hisopo,
yekugamba, Ayino no sakame ye dilagano dye Mulungu dyoyamulagiseni.
Kahi nheifiya hakainyaka isakame yakwe mu fyose dihema na ifiya fyo kufugila.
Chawelu, hasi ya malagiso chila chinhu chikusunhigwa kwa sakame, na bila ya sakame kwachaka kulekeleligwa kwa wihi.
Ninga hayagila simbuli sose isasigale kulanga sisunhwe kwa kwandamila sinhenda sino, ninga simbuli isenyecho sa kulanga sisunhigwa kwa nhambiko siswanu kusuma sino.
Kosoko Kilisito nghengile ahanhu hasunhile ahagolosigwe ne mikono hefane chawelu ninga kulanga ukwenyecho, hambiya koneka hamwedu ne Mulungu kosoko yetu.
Kahi siyo yelafe kwa kuwila kuwila, imutambiki mukulu foyekwingilaga Ahanhu Hasunhile, chila mwaka kwe sakame siyo iyakwe;

Kusigwa no nheifo, hayuwa ikumwagila kusambasigwa mikangha mingi kulawa kwikigwa kwe isinghindisi se chilunga. Ama hambiya kamwedu du kwa umemelesi we figele, kagubuligwa, yauleuse uwihi wa wanhu kwe nhambiko yakwe imwenyecho.
